
1a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rim ji lta ba bzhugs/ /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): #/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra nA ma d+ha ra Ni maN+Dal pra kri ya ya thA kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par
1b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rims ji lta ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la
1b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma:tsaN+Da badzra pA na ye/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho gas rang dam 'gro ba
1b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi gdon dang nad rnams las grol bar 'dod pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa pos/ phyugs lhas sam/ shing gcig dang lha khang
2a1(rgyud 'grel): ngam/ lam gyi gzhi mdo 'am/ khang stong ngam/ nags tshal gang yang rung bar bsam gtan gyi khang par chag
2a2(rgyud 'grel): chag dang ba'i rnam lnga dang/ spos dri zhim pos byug ris byas la/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa thams cad rdzogs par bshams
2a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ khrus dang 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byas te/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs gtsang zhing sar pa gon la/ phyag na
2a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis mchod pa byin gyis brlabs la/ yungs kar lag tu thogs te/ na mo ratna tra yA ya/ nas bind+ha bind+ha
2b1(rgyud 'grel): badzra hUM phaT ces pa'i bar du lan gsum mam bcu brjod do/ /de nas bum pa bca' ste/ gser dang dngul lam ma rnyed na zangs sams las byas kyang
2b2(rgyud 'grel): rung ste/ lto ba che la mgrin pa ring ba zhabs zhum pa kha g.yel ba/ nag por ri med pa/ grangs lha grangs dang mthun pa drug gam/ yang na bdun
2b3(rgyud 'grel): nam gcig kyang rung ste/ gu gul gyis bdugs pa dang/ yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog la/ der 'o ma dang chu nyung zad blug pa der rin po che
2b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ dri lnga dang/ sman lnga dang 'bru lngas dgang la mgrin pa gos kyi shing las byung ba'i kha tshar phun cher ma nyams pa'i mthing shun gyis kha
2b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba 'am/ dkar po gsar zhing gtsang bas mgul pa bcings la/ me tog sngon po dang bcas pas kha brgyan la mgul pa ras kyi steng du
3a1(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar dang/ rtswa dur ba nyag ma bdun dang bcas pa dri zhim pa'i me tog phreng ba bcings la/ mdud pa la hUM bris pa'i ba'i lci bas
3a2(rgyud 'grel): la ma lhung bas so/ /gdugs dang ba dan kyang ngo/ /de nas maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhag go /yang khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/ las kyi rdo rje dang/
3a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang gdub dang/ gdub bu'i cho ga rnams byas la/ der rang gi snying gar nyi ma las sa bon ltas pa des rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas pa dmigs la/
3a4(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa dam pa'i chos/ /tshogs chen bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum po phyag na rdo rje la/ /khyad par du yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid
3a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ong mchod rdzas ji snyed rnams/ /rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas la dbul/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/ /da lta sdig pa bgyis pa dang/ /bgyid
3b1(rgyud 'grel): du brtsal dang yi rang ba/ /shin tu 'gyod pas bshags shing sdom/ /bdag dang gzhan gyis gang bgyis pa'i/ /dge ba kun la rjes yi rang/ /byang chub snying por nyer gnas te/ /gang yang byang chub
3b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog rtog pa'i/ /bdag gis gsol ba rgyal ba kun/ /'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol/ /bya ba thams cad byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' ba rnams/ /bdag gis gsol bas rgyal
3b3(rgyud 'grel): ba kun/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' gsol/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs bsod nams gang/ /ji snyed bdag gis bgyis pa rnams/ /ji ltar mgon pos mkhyen pa ltar/ /byang chub tu ni yongs su
3b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngo'o/ /de nas raM? gyis rang ma rtogs pa stong par bsam/ /a ser pos gser gyi sa gzhir bsam/ /de'i steng du baM las 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho bsam/ /de nas sum las ri rab de'i steng du bruM las
3b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs dang bcas pa/ /dbus dang mtshams bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dang phyogs bzhi ni gri gug bzhis mtshan pa'o/ /de'i dbus su raM las stong par song
3b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ngang las chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i sgra byung bar bsam/ /oM dzwa la na ya swAhA/ de las sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med pa/ de las rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi skur grub/ /sku yongs su rdzogs pa
4a1(rgyud 'grel): ni sku mdog ljang sngon yid tsam khro ba g.yas na rdo rje rgya gram la ngos gcig med pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ g.yon dkur brten cing 'gying ba/ /mgul rgyan dang dpung rgyan la sogs pa dang ldan pa//
4a2(rgyud 'grel): stod g.yogs dar la smad g.yogs tshig gu can mnams pa'o/ /oM tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da ki li kI li swAhA/ oM tra sa ya trA sa ya badzra ki li kI li ya swAhA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra d+ha ra ya swAhA/ oM pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra b+hany+tsa na ya swAhA/ zhes pa
4a3(rgyud 'grel): las/ dbang ldan dang me dang srin po dang rlung rnams kyi 'khor lo'i steng du go rims bzhin du rdo rje gdengs pa dang/ rdo rje ka na ka dang/ rdo rje be tson dang/ rdo rje tho ba rnams so/ /de rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje gtum mo dang/ rdo rje ki
4a4(rgyud 'grel): li kI la dang/ rdo rje be con dang/ rdo rje tho ba rnams kyi skur grub bo/ /khro po rdo rje gtum po smug nag bzhin khro gnyer can/ /g.yas pa khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyar te thogs pa/ /lha thams cad g.yon bstan nas 'gying pa'o/ /rdo rje ki li ki la ya mdog ljang
4a5(rgyud 'grel): nag khro gnyer can/ /g.yas na rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ /rdo rje be con mthing nag khro gnyer can/ smar ser po can/ /g.yas na be con gyi rtse mo rdo rjes mtshan pa/ rdo rje thob mdog nag po shin tu khro ba mche ba gtsigs pa/ /g.yas na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'o/ /de nas mchod yon lag tu
4a6(rgyud 'grel): thogs te/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gsheD tshur gsheD khro rgyal rnams/ /bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /oM Aha ra A ha ra sarba bi dya d+ha ra swAhA/ zhes pas mchod yon gyi spyan drangs la rang la bstis la/ /phyag rgya
4b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis rgyas gdab ste/ gong ma'i sngags la brjod cing lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug la phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo 'dzub mo'i drung du cung zad byung bar byas la/ gud mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol naS mdzub mo gnyis bkug
4b2(rgyud 'grel): ste bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas 'as?/ /mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa ni rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi'o/ /g.yon pa ni bsdigs mdzub snying gar bzhag pa/ g.yas pa sor mo gsum bsgreng la mthe chung gis sen mo mtheb mos mnan pa'o/ /lag pa gnyis
4b3(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur nang du bcings la/ cung zad bsnol ba'i tshul du bcug ste/ mthe bong gnyis gyen du gshibs la bsgreng ngo/ /lag pa thal mo phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba las/ mthe bong gnyis bsgreng te tshigs bar pa bkug nas srin lag gi drung du gzugs so//
4b4(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs te/ mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug phyag rgya chen po rnams gong ma bzhin bsgoms pas rgyas gang ba/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya /de nas bruM las rin po'i bum pa la nang 'o ma can kyi
4b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho las pad+ma 'khrungs par bsams la/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba ro de'i steng du sngags lngas lha lnga bskyed la ye shes kyi lha rnams mchod yon gyis spyan drangs pa bstims/ /phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas btab nas mchod bstong byas la/ bum pa'i ste
4b6(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag la/ de la gzungs thag btags la/ rang dang lha'i thugs kar sngar gyi sngags lnga po gang bzlos pa gsal bar dmigs la/ phreng ba snyim par bcug la gzungs thag nas bzung la/ oM badzra a tsind+ha ye swAhA/ zhes brjod pa phreng ba lags g.yas
4b7(rgyud 'grel): pas bzung la so so'i sngags bzlas pas yi ge phreng ba gzungs thag la 'khril nas ye shes sems dpa' mnyes shing bum par ye shes kyi chu rgyun gyis khengs par bsam/ /thun re la gla la dang spring pa gsang sbubs la sogs pa spangs la ma yengs par
5a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzab du dbul lo/ /glal la sogs byung na khrus sogs byas la bzlas pa bskyar yang na kun la thun mong du yang snying thun re la brgya rtsa brgyad dam ji ltar nus pa dbul/ de nas mchod bstod byas la/ phyi rol du dpung bzangs las 'byung ba
5a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gtor ma btang la/ lus ngag gi kun spyod bya/ thun gnyis phan chod rang khrus sogs byas la mchod bstod bzlas pa bya'o/ /thun tha ma la mchod bstod gtor ma btad pa'i rjes la bzod par gsol la/ slar yang bdag la nges par ni/ /rjes su bzung bar
5a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nas kyang/ /mgon po rig dang sngags bcas pas/ /ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsol/ /zhes thabs kyi ye shes pa gshegs su gsol/ /khro bo bzhi po rang la bsdu/ rang bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la nyal/ /yang tho rangs khrus dang mthor 'thung nye reg dang
5a4(rgyud 'grel): las gyi rdo rje cho ga nas bzung la thams cad sngar bzhin byas la/ me long gi ngos ltar mnyam pa la rnam lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs las bzung bya'o/ /de nas khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/ sa gzung nyi ma nas brtsams te/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug
5a5(rgyud 'grel): gi bar/ /slob dpon rtogs par 'jug par bya/ /dri dang bcas pa'i zas bza' zhing/ zhes gsungs pas/ bsnyung ba la gnas pa 'am/ yang dkar gsum la dris bsgos pa nyung zad tsam bza' o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus sam nub phyogs su ku sha'i stan la 'dug
5a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ lha drug gi sgo nas rang lha lngar bskyed cing ye shes bcug nas rgya gsum gyis btab pa la/ shar phyogs nas slob ma 'am yon gyi bdag pos khrus la sogs pa byas nas gos gtsang zhing gsar pa gon la me tog gi phreng ba dri zhim pos bsgos pa lag tu thogs
5a7(rgyud 'grel): la tsog pur 'dug ste/ mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /mi zad pa yi nad rnams kyang/ /de dag thams cad zhi bar blta/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/
5b1(rgyud 'grel): de bas rdo rje rigs mchog gi/ rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /zhes dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pas lan gsum gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas sngags 'chang bsgreng ste/ rang gi lha'i 'khor lo nam mkha' la bteg la/ rang bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la/ mig la hUM
5b2(rgyud 'grel): bkod la nyi zla 'bar bar bya zhing/ rkang pa gnyis su hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje kha gyes par bsams la/ /se gol gyi sgra brdabs shing khro bo'i lta bas phyogs mtshams thams cad blta zhing rdo rje lan gsum du gsor la/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
5b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje can gyi thabs chen de/ /zhi yang sems can gdul don du/ /dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur/ /bcom ldan bdud rtsi 'khyil pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags rings brjod/ /de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu stod bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnam pa
5b4(rgyud 'grel): la smad zur gsum par 'dug pa la/ na mo ratna tra yA ya nas/ /kro d+ha kro d+ha ki li kI la ya swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam ma nus na lan gsum btab la/ dbus dang mtshams? bzhir gdab/ cod pan dang tsan dan
5b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar pos thig le gsum dang gu gul dang/ yungs kar dang/ dri sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lnga dang/ dbu'i gtsug tor rnams rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas brtan ma lhag gnas bya ste/ g.yas pa'i srin lag gis haM gis bkug la/ dri sngon du song ba'i rnam
5b6(rgyud 'grel): lngas mchod la spos thogs la/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas la sogs kyis/ /mkhyen pa gsol pa lan gsum bya/ /de nas lha lnga'i sa dang/ phyogs skyong gi gnas su dri'i thig le dang/ me tog gi tshom bu byas la lha lnga nam mkha' nas phab la bzhugs su gsol/ /phyoD
5b7(rgyud 'grel): skyod rnams yid tsam mam/ /yang na ri rgyal gnya' shid 'dzin gyi tshul lto nas/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs su 'chal/ /bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /log 'dren gzhom pa'i slad du 'dir gshegs shig /e hye hi da sha lo ka sa
6a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ri bA ra sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod do/ /de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bstod pa kun gyis kyang bstod la/ /bum pa ma tshang ba 'dir bca' zhing bum pa la mchod la brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu snga ma bzhin du bzlas so/ /yon
6a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang slob ma yang khrus la sogs byed du bcug la/ gsum la skyabs 'gro sbyin/ gtor ma btang la pus mo g.yas pa gtsugs la/ dril bu bsil shing rdo rje spos thogs la/ rdo rje rnam 'joms bcom ldan 'das/ /rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rig
6a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal khro bo'i tshogs rnams dang/ /gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba mthu chen rnams/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor ni/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i
6a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /yo byad ci 'byor pas 'brin/ /khyod kyis snang ba mdzad pa dang/ /las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum brjod/ nyi ma 'char kha sngags 'chang g.yog dang bcas pa thig ji lta ba bzhin sgrubs la/ ye shes kyi thig dang las kyi thig dang/ kun la
6a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon kha nub tu lta ba lhag ma'o/ /seng ldeng gi phur bus dbus su btab la/ srad bu bstod pas bskor phyogs su/ rnam 'joms kyi gnas cha chen gcig la bskor/ /mu khyud cha bran lnga pa bskor/ de nas lha rnams la thug pa la 'khor lo'i mu khyud cha bran gnyis bskor/ /de
6a6(rgyud 'grel): nas phyi rol rdo rje ra ba dang/ me ri rta babs kyi phyi rol du cha bran gnyis gnyis la bskor/ de nas 'grus thig btab la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thig btag/ phyogs bzhir gri gug re bya/ de nas tshon bsgrubs la/ phyogs tshon la shar dkar/ lho ser/ nub dmar/ byang ljang/ dbus
6a7(rgyud 'grel): mthing/ 'khor lo bzhi dang gri gug sngo skya/ pad+ma rA ga dang por sngo/ /de'i phyi rol ljang/ de'i phyi rol dmar/ de'i phyi rol ser/ ? gyi phyi rol dkar po/ de nas 'khor lo'i dbus dang 'dab ma rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re dris la/ dbus rdo rje rgya gram ljang sngon la ngos
6b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig med pa dris byang shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa smug nag/ shar lho'i rtsibs la rdo rje rtse gcig pa ljang nag/ lho nub kyi rtsibs la be con mthing nag/ nub phyang gi rtsibs la thob nag po bri 'khor lo'i mu khyud dkar po la/ gru ched ljang gu la bum pa bri/ lha'i rnam bur phyogs skyong dgong
6b2(rgyud 'grel): de yang gsang ba'i spyi rgyur las/ /brgya byin gyi ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /me lha'i phyag mtshan me thab yin/ /gshin rje yi ni be con te/ /bden bral gyi ni ral gri ste/ /chu bdag gi ni zhags par bya/ /rlung lha'i phyag mtshan rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /ku be ra yis dbyug sngon no/ /dbang phyug
6b3(rgyud 'grel): gi ni tri shul/ /sa yi? lha mo bum pa'o/ /nyi zla'i phyag mtshan de nyid do/ /de rnams gdan byas pa'i steng du dgod par bya'o/ /de nas sgo bzhir nub kyi sgor dpal be'u dang 'khor lo/ /byang gi sgor gdugs dang rgyal mtshan/ shar gyi sgor pad+ma dang bum pa/ lho'i sgor dung dang nya bri/ de
6b4(rgyud 'grel): nas rta babs la sogs rdzogs par ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas pa'i rnam lnga dang dri zhim pos nye bar byugs la/ bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ lhab lhub kyis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyan cing/ me tog sil ma gtor zhing mchod pa'i yan lag
6b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bshams la dra phur bres la/ de nas sngags 'chang bdag nyid khrus la sogs pa thams cad la/ nub sgor rtswa ku sha'i stan la 'dug la/ las gyi rdo rje'i cho ga dang gsang gdub dang gdu bu'i cho ga rnams byas la maN+Dal blang la mtshan ma dang sta gon gyi lha bsres
6b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ me tog sngon po'i phreng ba thogs la rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing/ oM badzra dzwa la na ya swAhA/ zhes brjod cing lan gsum gsum bskor ba byas la/ me tog rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi dbul phul/ slar rang gi mgo la bcings la/ nub sgor 'greng la khro bo'i bstod pa btang la/
6b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs gang la la zhig sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ dngos grub kyi bar chad rtsom pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po drag pos/ rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba 'dis mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas so zhes brjod cing/ a mo g+ha badzra/ e hye badzra/ zhes pa nas/ badzra rA ga dzwa
7a1(rgyud 'grel): la ya swAhA'i bar du lan cig brjod pas mtshams bcad/ de nas sngags 'chang nub sgor ku sha'i gdan nyid la bsdad la/ dril bu bsil zhing spos snod thogs la/ ye shes bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /ma rig 'dod pa'i bdud khams
7a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsregs/ /zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms/ /log 'dren srin po ma lus gdul ba yi/ dpa' bo dpa' mtshan stag lpags rlon pa gsol/ /rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo bzhugs gsol 'tshal/ /log 'dren 'joms pa'i slad du stan?
7a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dren gyis/ /'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /badzra bi d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha sa ba ri bA ra sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod/ de nas mchod yon phul la/ dam tshig la ye shes gzhug pa ni/ /ma ti s+thi ra badzra/ su tis+thi ra badzra/ pra ti s+thi ra badzra/ mahA badzra/ a pra? ti? ha ta
7a4(rgyud 'grel): badzra/ zhes pas bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas dam tshig chen po de'i phyag rgya bstan te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung mnan la lhag ma rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul du bsgreng pa'o/ /oM shaM ka re mahA sa ma ye swAhA zhes brjod pa ni dam tshig chen po'i sngags
7a5(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya gsum gyis gdab/ /de nas bum pa sngar bzhin bzlas la gzhug go/ dam tshig gso ste lag pa gnyis rgyab tu thal mo sbyar ba'i tshul du byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor 'khyud la lte ba'i thad kar bzhag la/ oM
7a6(rgyud 'grel): badzred? b+ha pa ya swAhA/ zhes brjod pa rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig bskor zhing gsong go? sku khrus gsol mchod yon phul/ dri sngon du 'gro ba rnam lnga dbul/ 'dod yon dang rin po che sna bdun dang/ 'phra mchod dbul/ de nas bstod de/ chos nyid stong pa gnyis med dang nyid las//
7a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong ste/ /thabs la mkhas pa 'jigs byed skur ston pa/ /khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang/ /sku yi cha lugs za byed rngam stabs can/ /gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong
7b1(rgyud 'grel): sdir ba'i sgra/ /ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lha yi ye shes rol pas rab ston cing/ /bsdigs pa'i mtshon cha mang po phyag na bsnams/ /nyon mongs dug chen sna tshogs 'joms mdzad pa/ /dug sbrul rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM gtum chen
7b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar pa bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /khro gnyer klog stong 'od zer 'gyu ba bzhin/ /rngam ba'i nga ro 'brug stong bzhin du sgrogs/ /khro rgyal bgegs tshogs 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i glong dkyil nas/ /dpa' bo'i stangs stabs brkyang
7b3(rgyud 'grel): bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis/ /bgegs dpung bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas dpung bzangs nas 'byung ba bzhin/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs bcas/ /zhes bya ba la sogs ba dang/ dbang po rdo rje
7b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba'i lha zhes pa la sogs kyis phyogs skyong la gtor ma dang bstod pa bya/ /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas la sogs kyis 'byung po'i gtor ma btang/ /de nas gang zag de khrus dang 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byed du bcug la gos gtsang ma gon du bcug /
7b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang sngags 'chang gnyis la phyag byed du bcug la/ lag tu me tog gi phreng pa dang bcas pas/ rigs sngags 'chang chen dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal las thar phyir/ /rdo rje 'dzin de 'khor bcas la/ /bdag ni gus bskyabs su
7b6(rgyud 'grel): mchi/ /zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod par bya ste/ ji ltar sngon tshe bde gshegs pho brang du/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir rdo rje can gyis ni/ /rjes mthun phrin las khyad par gang bsgo pa/ /dam bcas phrin las de ni grub
7b7(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod/ /de slad bgegs dang log 'dren tshar bcad ltar/ /'gro ba nyam thag 'di ni gzung ba'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal nges bsal bde mchog la sbyar ba'i/ /khro rgyal khyed kyis deng 'dir byin brlabs gsol/ /de nas 'gro ba de rtswa ku sha'i steng du bzhag la/ gdug pa'i
8a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bgegs bskrad de/ na mo ratna tra yA ya nas hUM phaT kyi bar du brjod/ de nas las bum gyis bkru zhing sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ zhes pa nas/ sdig pa kun las rnam par thar zhes pa'i bar du khrus kyi phan
8a2(rgyud 'grel): yon brjod cing bkru'o/ /de nas khrus sa'i stegs bu gsum pa la khru ngo stong bar dbus su bzhag la/ khru phyed lha rnams la phyogs skyong rnams bkod la khru gang la rta babs med pa'i sgo bzhi bris te/ dbus su rtswa ku sha bting bar 'gro ba der bzhag pa 'am/
8a3(rgyud 'grel): khrum sa'i stegs bum 'byor na/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha lnga bum par yid kyis spyan drangs la/ rma bya'i sgrol sogs pa mtshan ma lnga po phyis la/ de rtsa? ku sha 'am ras dkar po bting la/ 'gro ba der bzhag la bum pa rnams thogs te/ gang la ser
8a4(rgyud 'grel): sna rnams chags pa'i/ /rnam 'joms dri med mdzad pa yi/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du sdud mdzad cing/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa
8a5(rgyud 'grel): des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang gis byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba
8a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'khor dbar? 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing/ /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /
8a7(rgyud 'grel): ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /brgya byin bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu byin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi 'dod don gang
8b1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa/ /don de di ring grub 'gyur cig /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shog /ces brjod la/ na mo ratna tra yA ya nas na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da
8b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se na pA ta ye/ oM dzwa la na ma ya/ shAn ti ku ru swA hA/ zhe skhro bo bzhi'i sngags dang 'bru spel la bkru/ sdig pa dang nad dang gdon la sogs pa dag par bsams la/ shar sgo nas bton la gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin
8b3(rgyud 'grel): la snying gar rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi phyag mtshan bskyed cing bcug la bzhag /de nas slob ma rdo rje'i rwa 'dzin du bcug la/ ya gcig nas slob dpon gyis bzung la/ 'gro ba 'di la nga yis bsrung zin gyis/ /da ni 'di la su yang gnod mi byed/ /gal te
8b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di la gnod pa byas gyur na/ /mgo bo tshal pa brgyar ni 'gas par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod la/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo 'am bsrung skud gdags/ nyi ma gza' las grol ba bzhin du che ge mo 'di yang nad dang gdon la sogs pa las grol bar gyur cig /
8b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar gyur cig mang du brjod cing rol mo mang du yang rdungs du gzhug go /de nas ras dkar po gtsang ma'i steng du bkra shis kyi rdzas rnams bzhag ste/ yungs kar dang/ dur ba dang/ bil ba dang/ gi waM dang/ li khri dang/ zho dang/ me long dang/
8b6(rgyud 'grel): dud g.yas su 'khyil ba dang/ brgyad byin te/ yungs kar rdo rje'i rigs te thams cad du/ /bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms par byed pa po/ /mthu stobs yon tan phun sum tshogs 'gyur bar/ /bkra shis des kyang thams cad zhi bar shog /
8b7(rgyud 'grel): dur bas tshe ni 'phel bar byed pas ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i tshe ni rab grub nas/ /nyon mongs skye shi rgyun chad gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang tshe ni 'phel bar shog /bil bas rgyu rkyen 'bras bur gyur pa'i chos/ /'jig rten pa las
9a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i spyod pa kun/ /byang chub snying po mchog tu gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang mchog tu grub gyur cig /gi wang dug gsum 'joms pa'i nad kyi sman/ /chos kyi chos nyid rab tu rtogs nas ni/ /nyon
9a2(rgyud 'grel): mongs zug rngu med par gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang sdug bsngal bral gyur cig /li khri dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin te/ /chos rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus nas kyang/ /chos kyi rgyal srid rab brtan gyur pa ste /bkra shis des kyang
9a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod srid brtan gyur cig /zho ni kun gyi snying por gyur pas na/ /snying po rnam dag ye shes rnam rtogs nas/ /yon tan chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang dug gsum zhi bar shog /me long ye shes chen po'i rgya mtsho
9a4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /ye shes rgya mcho mchog tu bdag gyur te/ /rnam dag chos la thogs med longs spyod pa'i/ /bkra shis des kyang deng khyod dga' gyur cig /dung ni chos kyi sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i tshul/ ye shes rgya mtsho nyid du bdag gyur te/ /chos
9a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ma lus yongs su ston pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang tshig la dbang thob shog /ces blangs la slob ma la sbyin no/ /de ma 'byor na dkar gsum tsam mam 'bras can la bkra shis brjod la sbyin/ slob mas kyang 'byor tshad kyis mchod
9a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bya/ de nas slar bum pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khor dang bum pa'i lha la gang yang bdag blo gti mug la sogs kyis bshags/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /la sogs kyis ye shes pa gshegs su gsol la/ dam
9a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig rnams rang la bsdus la rang bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad ni gdod ma nas dag pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'o/ zhes brjod cing rdul tshon phyags la bum pa dang/ dman pa rnams chu bo 'am gnas mthon por bskyal lo//
9b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa rnams kyi gzhung bzung nas/ /sna tshogs rgyud la rab brten te/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ldan pa yi/ /khrus kyi cho ga brtsams pa las/ /dri med dge ba gang thob des/ /'gro kun sdug bsngal zhi nas kyang/ /lam
9b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog rnams la zhugs gyur cig /rigs sngags 'chang gi slob dpon ratna shI las mdzad pa'i rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga gzhan la phan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra
9b3(rgyud 'grel): b+ho d+hi dang/ lo tsA ba tshul dge rin chen gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra d+hA ra ni sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
9b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shigs kun 'joms rdo rje 'dzin/ /khros shing gtum pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /rdo rje yon tan rdzogs btud de/ /de nyid bsgrub pa'i rim pa bshad/ /dad brtan g.yo dang nga rgyal med/ /ser sna chung zhing bla ma gus//
9b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di la lhag par che dad pas/ /sgrub pa 'di 'bad bde legs shog /dang por yid 'ong phyogs suAng/ /'gro ba bsgral ba'i bsam pa yis/ /rtag tu 'di la brtson par bya/ /maN+Dal mchod dang gtor ma dang/ /las dang po yis rnal 'byor pas/ /dmigS
9b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rten yang bri bar bya/ /rang nyid phyi nang khrus byas te/ /khyad par du ni lus kyi khrus/ /dri yi chu yis rtag tu bya/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang nyid zla ba sa bon bsam/ /de yi 'od kyi bla ma sogs/ /nam mkha' i phyogs su dmigs nas ni/ /byin
9b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs bar gsol ba gtab/ /de nas sems can thams cad la/ /lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya/ /de bzhin snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms tshul bzhin bsgom par bya/ /de rjes rnam par mi rtog pa'i/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya//
10a1(rgyud 'grel): de la cung zad dmigs nas ni/ /rnam pa rtog par ldang bar bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa mi dmigs kyang/ /sngags kyi sgra ru bsgoms par bya/ /de rjes rang gi shes pas ni /sngags kyi phreng bar bsgom par bya/ /gsung gi rnam par
10a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa yi/ /dra zhing gsal ba'i rnam par ro/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de/ /gsal zhing cha ma 'dres par bsam/ /de yi 'od kyi 'gro ba rnams/ /rnam par 'joms par byas nas ni/ /tshur la bsdu ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /rang snying rnam bar 'joms bar
10a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /zhabs gnyis chu 'dzin dag la ni/ /g.yon brkyang ba ni rnam par zhugs/ /sku ni in+d+ra nI la dang/ /rdo rje'i snying po dang yang mtshungs/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste/ /spyan dmar dpral ba khro gnyer can/ /mgo skyes dmar ser gyen 'greng ba//
10a4(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa che zhing sprul gyis brgyan/ /smad ni ba tis mnan pa ste/ /sku stod dar la yis dkris pa/ /rin po che yi dbu rgyan can/ /rang gi bdag po dbu la gnas/ /g.yas pa rgya gram phyogs gsum bsnams/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin/ /sra zhing
10a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhregs pa'i sku dang ldan/ /'ja' ltar gsal ba'i bdag nyid du/ /bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab bya zhing/ /gnas lnga dag tu bdug par bya/ /oM badzra dzwa la na ya swAhA/ de nas rang mdog phyag
10a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan yang/ /blo yis gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /gsal pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya/ /de las skyon sngags bzlas pa/ /de ni phyi dang nang gi'o/ /de la nang gi bshad bya ste/ /rang nyid zla ba rang sa bon/ /de yi tha ma gsang sngags rgyal//
10a7(rgyud 'grel): mu tig ? dang dmar me ltar/ /rnam pa de ldan zla bar bsgom/ /de la cung zhig dmigs nas ni/ /yang ni gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas/ /de dag ni na mo ratna tra yA ye zhes pa nas/ /a mri te hUM phaT ces pa'i bar du'o/ /de ni sgra dang bcas pa'o/ /rang snying khro bo'i tshogS
10b1(rgyud 'grel): spros te/ /kun kyang gsang sngags rgyal po bzlos/ /sngags kyi 'brug gi sgra dang bcas/ /phyogs rnams kun du rnam par spro/ /gdug pa can rnams bsdigs par mdzad/ /de bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba ni/ /mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag spyod la/ /zhi la 'od zer dkar po ste/ /dbang la
10b2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dmar po'o/ /rgyas pA ni ser po ste/ /de ltar las dang rje mthun par/ /'od zer dag kyang spro bar bya/ /phyi ni nam mkha' i zla dkyil du/ /yi ge'i phreng ba bsams byas te /rgyud las ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /de ltar bsam
10b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan 'bum gyi? bar/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni/ /las rnams kun tu spyad par bya/ /de dag rab tu bshad pa ni/ /rig sngags bcad dang bcing ba dang/ /phur bus gdab cing mnan pa bya/ /de bzhin nor sogs rgyas pa dang/ /sdigs so
10b4(rgyud 'grel): zhi dang dbang du bya/ /de la dbang du bya ba ni/ /byu ru dmar 'dra'i sa gzhi la/ /mo yi pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /thab khung dag ni /bca' zhid bsam/ /de nas star bu'i me bus te/ /me yi lha ni bdag po nyid/ /dmar po lcags kyu thogs bsams nas/ /mngon byas nas ni
10b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer sgo/ /gsang sngags 'jug la las mthun gdags/ /star bu'i 'bru dang me tog dmar/ /phub ma dag ni brgya stong bsreg /de yis gang 'dod de bzhin no/ /pad ltar dkar ba'i sa gzhi la/ /zla rgyas 'dra ba'i thab khung du/ /tsan dan dkar po'i me sbar te/ /rang lha dkar? po?
10b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsir ldan/ /de la skad cig dmigs byas la/ /tsan dan dkar po'i 'o ma spag /de bzhin dkar po'i rdzas rnams la/ /de bzhin yang ni sngags bzlas te/ /ji tsam nus pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /sa gzhi ser zhing 'phos pa na/ /dbang chen lta bu'i dbyings su bya/ /mkhas pas thabs ni
10b7(rgyud 'grel): bca' bya zhing/ /ltar ka a ru ra'i me/ /cho ga dang bcas spar bya ste/ /'bras bur bcas pa'i yam shing la/ /de bzhin ba ru la sogs kyis/ /dbang chen la gnas bcom ldan 'das/ /gser mdog 'dra zhing dbang chen 'phro/ /de la sbyin sreg stong byas la/ /gang dag 'dod
11a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyas par bya/ /de dag las kyi rim pa ste/ /rang nyid bsnyen pa rdzogs pas su/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rjes dran bya/ gang dag gdon gyis nyen pa yi/ /cho ga la sogs bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor legs par byas nas ni/ /bum pa rdza sogs ldan par dri
11a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags brgya dang gcig bzlas te/ /bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste/ /de la khrus ni lan gsum bya/ /bsrung skud mdud pa gsum pa ni/ /dpung pa 'am srin lag dag la bcing/ /des ni grol par the tshom med/ /'khor lo dag gis bsrung bya ni/ /rtsibs
11a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i mtshams su mtshon char ldan/ /mu khyud me ri rdo rjes bskor/ gur gum gi waM dag la bris nas ni/ /snga dro cho ga ldan par bsrung bar bya/ /de ltar 'di ni bsrung ba'i rgyal po ste/ /'go ba rnams la gsang sngags rgyal pos brlab/ /de rgyud de dang gzhan las gsungs pa'o//
11a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra dzra lA na ya swAhA/ /oM tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da ki li kI la ya swAhA/ oM tra sa ya badzra ki li kI la yA swAhA/ /oM ha ra ha ra badzra da ra ya swAhA/ /oM pra twa pra ha ra badzra pra pAny+dza na ye swAhA/ /bsrung ba yi'o/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ /na ma shtsaN+Da badzra pa Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ tadya thA/
11a5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba dya ti sarba bakAn/? sarba du ra sa ma ni/ sarba dur mi ti/ sarba gra he/ sarba dza re/ sarba ka ya la smi du/ sarba u pa tre pe bya sarba sha truM/ sarba pA paM shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes khrus kyi'o/ /oM sarba pus ta yai puSh+TiM ku ru ye swAhA/ rgyas pa yi'o/ /oM badzra bA shaM ku ru swAhA/ zhes
11a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang du bya'o/ /'di rnams las dang mthun pa'i sngags kha las kyang shes par bya'o/ /'di ni rdo rje rnam par 'joms kyi sgrubs thabs rgyud dang 'brel pa'i las dang bcas par shes par bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'dir ma bkod pa rnams bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o
11a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni sgrub thabs kun gyi rgyal/ /rang sems mos pa'i rjes 'brel pa'i/ /rtog pa dang bcas sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rnal 'byor rnams la phan byed yin/ /'di byas bsod nams dri med pa/ /zla ba yang ngo bzhin du 'phel gyur pa'i/ /'gro rnams mos pa'i bye brag
11b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub 'gyur te/ /rnam par 'joms pa'i skur 'grub shog /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs las dang bcas pa slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid
11b2(rgyud 'grel): la rab gnas kyang/ /thugs rjes gtan du mya ngan mi 'da' zhing/ /'dod pa'i don grub mdza' yas gzugs mnga' ba/ /dpa' brtan rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por bum pa'i mtshan nyid brtan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas/ nor bu yungs kar dur ba dang//
11b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rma med tsan dan bcas/ /shel dang rdo rje me tog dang/ /chu yi gser ram yang na ni/ /dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung/ /gtsang ma'i gos kyi dkri zhing dgang/ /zhes gsungs pas/ gser ram dngul lam zangs las byas kyang rung zhabs kyi gdub ko rin 'chang du ser
11b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig gi tshad du byas la gdags so/ /dbus kyi dbyibs ni lhung bzed 'dra bar bya'o/ /mgrin pa'i 'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya'o/ /mgrin pa'i nang gi tshad kyang sor bzhi ba'i sbubs su bya'o/ /mgrin pa'i kha khyer phyir bskyed pa ni sor gnyis kyi tshad du byas la/ /kha'i cha ga'i
11b5(rgyud 'grel): bshal ka sor gcig gi tshad du bya'o/ /dbul po rnams kyi dngul dang gser? la sogs pa las bya ba mi rnyed pas de'i phyir rgyu gzhan la bya bar gsungs te/ /bum pa pad+ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar zhing byu ru dang li khri dang mtshal gyi mdog? ltar dmar pa dags btang nges pa'i nag po?
11b6(rgyud 'grel): ra ri med par bya'o/ /ltor ni chu phul lnga yan chod nas bcu shong ba'i tshad gang nus pa'i tshar byas te de nas lag ba byug spos kyis byuD te/ dri zhim po shin tu bkra shis pa'i bdug pas bdugs la/ gu gul la/ oM a mri te hUM phat ces bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags kyis lan bdun du
11b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pas bum zhi? nang du bdugs la/ chu gtsang ma srog chags med par btsags pas bkang ste/ de'i nang du tsandan na dang/ ga pUr dang/ gur gum dang/ dzA ti dang/ gla rtsi lnga po bsres pa'i chu yang blugs nas der rin po che lnga zhe bya ba nor bu rin po che dang/ byu ru dang/ gser
12a1(rgyud 'grel): sa le sbram dang/ mu tig dang/ shel dag dang/ sman lnga zhes bya ba/ bya kri dang/ seng kri dang/ gi bri kar ni dang/ sa hA dang/ sa ha de ba dang/ 'bru lnga zhes bya ba/ nas dang/ so ba dang/ til dang/ mon sran dang/ mon sran gre'u nams kyang bcug la bum pa'i khar?
12a2(rgyud 'grel): gser ram dngul phor ram/ kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du yungs kar blugs pa'i snod bzhag ste/ ras gtsang ma kha 'tshar ma gong pas bum pa'i kha dang yungs kar gyi snod dang bcas pa dkri zhing g.yogs la bcing ste/ mdud pa'i steng du pa'i lci ba rgyas gdab pa'i tshul
12a3(rgyud 'grel): du glan la der rtswa dur ba'i nyag ma bdun btsugs te phyug na rdo rje la dbul par 'os pa'i me tog dmar po dri zhim po 'am yang na me tog dri zhim po gang lnga rung ba'i phreng baS kyang buM pa'i mgrin pa bskor ba'i don no/ /dkyil 'khor med par bum pa 'ba' zhig gis 'dod pa'i la ni 'grub pas
12a4(rgyud 'grel): thos mar dkyil 'khor brin sa brtag dgos pas spyi'i rgyud dpung bzang gis zhus pa las 'dir sbyar bar bya ste/ phyugs ltas shing cig lha'i khang pa'am/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo khang steng? nags tshal du/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar bstan pa yang de nyid las/ dkyil 'khor gru
12a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi lham pa gru bzhi'i tshad/ /tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams gyis bri/ /phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su bzung/ /sgo bzhi pa la phyogs kyi rtswa yang dgram zhes gsungs te/ /de yang sa gzhi shin tu sbyangs shing shin tu 'thas par bcags ba'i rnam lnga zhes bya bar/ 'o ma dang/
12a6(rgyud 'grel): mar dang/ zho dang/ gcin dang lci ba rnams dang/ spos rnams bsres pa rnams kyis bskus la thig gdab par bya'o/ /gru bzhi'i tshad khru bzhi par byas la phur bus legs par gdab? bo?/ /de'i dbus su gsang sngags 'chang khrus byed pa'i sa khru do bzhag go /de'i phyi rim khru gang khyon? yod pa la
12a7(rgyud 'grel): cha gsum du bgos te/ dang por 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi gnas su bya'o/ /gnyis pa ni sdo khyud mu khyud mu tig gi phreng ba dag bri'o/ /gsum pa la ni mchod pa dag bri'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams dgod pa yang/ /spyi'i rgyud gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ 'di skad du /brgya byin gyi ni
12b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor gsungs/ /me lha'i phyag rgya me thab yin/ /gshin rje'i phyag rgya be con te/ /bden bral gyi ni ral grir bstan/ /chu bdag gi ni zhags par bstan/ /rlung? gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin/ /ku be ra yi dbyug to yin/ /dbang phyug ni rtse gsum gsungs/ /sa'i phyag rgya bum pa yin/
12b2(rgyud 'grel): nyi bla'i bya rgya zlum por bya zhes gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor ni sgo bzhir stong cing/ bkris brgyad po'o dpal pe dang/ 'khor lo dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ pad+ma dang/ bum pa dang/ dung dang/ nya dag bris pas mdzes par bya'o/ /dbus su ni ku sha gding zhing phyi rol thog
12b3(rgyud 'grel): dag tu yang ku sha dgram mo/ /steng du yang bla res legs par dag bcing me tog gi phreng ba dang/ ba dan dang/ dang gyi lnga ldi dang/ me long gis brgyan na khrus kyi cho ga bkra shis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bum pa yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur pa
12b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa bzlas shing btsugs nas/ tshon sna lnga yis skud pa la yang gsang sngags de nyid bzlas shing bskor bas mtshams bcad par bya'o/ /bshos dang gtor ma dgod pa yang/ /dpung bzangs kyis zhus ba'i rgyud 'am? bzang
12b5(rgyud 'grel): dang sha chad la phug la sogs bcas/ /'bras chan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin zhes gsungs te/ ma phyi ba yang 'os 'os su phye ste/ sha chang la phug dag ni gshin rje dang bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin no/ de nas rig sngags 'chang ba bdag nyid phyi nang gi dri ma dag
12b6(rgyud 'grel): par byas la/ gos sar pa bgos te/ cho ga brtsams pa'i dbang du mdzad nas/ des ni rab khrus gtsang ma yin/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyam par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing/ /gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan
12b7(rgyud 'grel): byed na zhes gsungs te/ /de'i don rang gi rgyud dag ba de dkyil 'khor gyi nub sgor 'greng la/ lag pa byug sbos kyis byugs nas/ /rang gi lta ji ltar mnos pa bzhin du bsgoms la/ mig gnyis su yi ge hUM 'bar ba re bsams la se gol gyi sgra phyung zhing/ phyogs su bltas
13a1(rgyud 'grel): pas mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad nas/ slar stan bde ba la 'dug nas dkyil 'khor de yang rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i lha'i gnas bzang po dpe med par dmigs shing/ bum pa de yang yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar
13a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs te/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las kha phye ste pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni pad+ma gdan gyi phyag rgya yin te/ /de'i sngags la/ oM pad+ma ka ma la ye swAhA/ zhes brjod nas yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i dbus su pad+ma'i sdong pa dang lo ma dang 'dab ma dang ze ba dang
13a3(rgyud 'grel): snying por bcas pa dpe med par bzang zhing che ba zhig bsams te/ mchod yen gyi snod blangs la sbreng zhing 'di skad du/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /bdag la mchod yon bzhes su gsol/ /mchod yon bzhes nas de nyid du/ /mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /A
13a4(rgyud 'grel): ha ra A ha ra/ sarba bi dya d+ha ra pU dzi te swAhA/ zhes brjod pas/ 'phags pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par rig pa dang/ bar 'dir phyir 'breng ba'i bgegs bskrad/ a mri tas bsang/ yang na rtsa sngags sam bskrad sngags kyis so/ /lag pa
13a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung gi sen mos mthe bong mnan te/ lhag ma gsum nas do tsam gyis ma reg par byas te/ rdo rje'i tshul du byas nas bstan pa ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te/ de'i sngags la/ oM shang ka re mahA sa ma ye swAhA zhes brjod nas/ gdan de la
13a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa khro bo yi rgyal po phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kyi khyad par las byung ba/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba mdog sngon po yid tsam khro ba/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rgya gram las rwa phyogs gcig med pa bsnams pa phyag g.yon pa bkur brten cing 'gyid ba/ dbu
13a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rtse bran can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bza' stong g.yogs dar la sgang g.yogs tshigs su bsgams? pa/ 'khor rigs kyi lha dpag tu med pa dang gshegs par dmigs shing/ rtsa ba'i phyag rgya lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug ste/ phan
13b1(rgyud 'grel): tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad 'byung bar byas la/ gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo dkug la nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas te/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gzhibs pa ni rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa rtsa ba'i phyag rgya
13b2(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad byed do/ /de'i sngags la/ oM badzra dzwa la na ye swAhA/ de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga rim bzhin du dbul te/ dang por byug spos dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyang ba yi/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i byug spos 'di/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la
13b3(rgyud 'grel): dgyes par mdzod/ /A ha ra A ha ra sarba 'di d+hya d+ha ri pu dzi te swAhA/ de nas me tog dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar skyes pa yi/ /lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'di/ bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas bdug pa dbul te/ shing gi khu ba
13b4(rgyud 'grel): yid du 'ong/ /dri yis rgyas pa bdug pa'i mchog /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /bshos dbul te/ sman rnams khu ba yi gar 'ong/ /dri yis rgyas pa lha yi zas/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas
13b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /'di yan chad kyi sngags ni gong mar smos pa gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i 'og tu mar me dbul te/ gnod rnams 'dzoms shing bkra shis la/ /dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i zhugs mar 'di/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul
13b6(rgyud 'grel): lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /A lo ke A lo ke sarba bar bya d+ha? ra pu dzi te swAhA/ /de nas gdon rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs
13b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal sbyar de dag la ni gsol ba 'debs/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig/ /sems can gang dag ri
14a1(rgyud 'grel): rab steng gnas dang/ /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yul gang gnas dang/ /gang dag shar nub nyi ma'i khyim gnas dang/ /chu bo kun dang chu'i dogs rnams dang/ /rin chen gnas su 'ang gnas ni
14a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dang/ /rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma ltang lteng dang/ /khron pa dang ni ngam grog chu mig dang/ /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer nags tshal dang/ /khang stong dag dang lha yi gnas dag dang/ /lha khang mchod rten 'dug gnas
14a3(rgyud 'grel): bsti gnas dang/ /mu stegs gnas dang glang chen khang pa dang/ /gang dag rgyal po'i dkor khang gnas pa dang/ /srang dang khyams dang lam kha'i bzhi mdo dang/ /gang dag shing gcig po dang lam po che /dur khrod chen po nags
14a4(rgyud 'grel): tshal chen po dang/ /gang dag seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas/ /'jigs pa'i sa dang 'brog na gnas pa dang/ /gling bzangs rnams su gnas ni bcas pa dang/ /gang dag lhun po dur khrod gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu thugs
14a5(rgyud 'grel): dgyes bri dang phrang ba dang/ /bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod bus 'bul/ /'di dag bzhes nas bsnams dang gsol mdzod la/ /bdag gis las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las
14a6(rgyud 'grel): kha phye ste/ bkan pa ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags la srin po rnams la/ krang ke ri/ sha za rnams la/ mi tsi mi tsi/ 'byung po rnams la/ gung gung/ thams cad la/ na ma:sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hya:/
14a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba(rgyud 'grel): ta ta khaM ud ga te/ spha ra Na hi maM/ ga ga na khaM swAhA/ de ltar gdon rnams la gtor ma byin nas ni phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las/ sor mo dbus ma gsum
14b1(rgyud 'grel): bkyed de/ pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o/ /de'i sngags la/ dbang ldan phyogs su ru tra ya swAhA/ dbang po'i phyogs su shag kra ya swAhA/ me'i phyogs su aga ne ye swAhA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su be ba sa ta ye swAhA/ bden bral phyogs su rak+Sha sa a ti pa ta ye
14b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ chu lha'i phyogs su mi ga a sha na ya swAhA/ rlung lha'i 'og gi phyogs su ba ya be ye swAhA/ ku be ra'i phyogs su yag sha b+hyid d+ha re swAhA/ stang gi phyogs su a did dya yE swAhA/ nyi ma'i 'o/ /zla ba'i tsan+t+ra ye swAhA/ 'og gi phyogs su pri
14b3(rgyud 'grel): thaM bya ye swAhA/ sa'i lha mo yi'o/ /de ltar phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod de/ /bzlas brjod bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas su/
14b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig /ces 'byung ba'i don ni de ltar 'phags pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad la mchod pa byas nas/ bum pa'i nang du 'phags pa spyan drangs pa de nyid kyang srog
14b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa lta bu dmigs te/ de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa la yi ge'i phreng ba rnams bkod de bzlas so/ /lha'i sku dang/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ yi ge'i phreng pa la dus cig tu dmigs pa ni 'jig
14b6(rgyud 'grel): rten na za 'og la sogs pa'i gding ba khra'o lta ba dang 'dra'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chung du'i nang du yi ge'i phreng ba ji ltar mang ba ji ltar bkod ce na/ sems goms pa rnams la mi rung ba med de/ chu nyung du shin tu dang ba'i nang
14b7(rgyud 'grel): du nyi zla dang/ gza' skar la sogs pas brgyan pa'i nam mkha' thams cad snang pa bzhin no/ /rgyal po zhes pas 'dzin du zang de/ gzhan yang khrus kyi sbyor ba bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog
15a1(rgyud 'grel): chags dag ni thams cad kyi/ /mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kun/ /de dag thams cad zhi bar blta/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar zhes gsungs te/ de ltar
15a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod kyi grangs tshang nas phyogs bcu'i lha rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa yang bsgrag par bya ste/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas
15a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /mi ste sreg bya za ba'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje be con
15a4(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba'i lha/ /ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon kyi bdag /sna tshogs bcas
15a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs bcas pa/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha/ /bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgying cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang
15a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i lha/ /chig bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgying cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin lag na be con thogs/ /nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa
15a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gi klu ste sa yi lha//
15b1(rgyud 'grel): sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste/ /dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang/ zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang/ /gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing
15b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de nas shu ti dang ba'i rnam lnga chu dang sbyar ba la bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa btab ste/ khrus byed pa'i lus bkrus te dril nas khrus byas te gos sar pa bgos nas dkyil gyi sgor? 'dug ste/ de la
15b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba chen po bya'o/ /da nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byin te/ dkyil 'khor bskor du bcug la/ gus pas phyag byas la/ cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rtswa ku sha bkram pa'i steng du bde bar 'dug la/ gsang
15b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlos pas bum pa blangs te/ gzungs sngags bzlas shing khrus byed du bcug la phyi nang gi dri ma thams cad ma lus par dag par bsam mo/ /shin tu bde legs dang bkra shis dang/ rgyal bar gyur cig bya ba'i tshig
15b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rol mo'i sgra skad rab tu swan? pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dang/ zho dang dur ba dang/ li khri dang/ me long dang/ dung dang/ bil ba'i 'bras bu dang/ 'gi wang rnams kyang slob ma'i nang du ras khri'u bting ba'i nang du
15b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhag ste/ res bkra shis 'don pa'i lag tu bzhag nas rdzas de rnams re re nas blangs shing sbyin no/ /de nas byab pa bya ste/ rma bya'i steng du zla ba'i steng du gzungs rings bsams la/ des bya bcing gzungs rings brjod pas bshams
15b7(rgyud 'grel): la che ge mo'i sarba bya ti la sogs pa sbyar ro/ /de nas bsrung ba bya ste/ skud pa la bsrung ba byas la gdags/ gzungs rings bris la de la rab gnas byas pa gdags so/ /de nas yang bsrung ba bya ste/ rdo rje phyed de'i lag tu byin nas zhi ba
16a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dga' ba'i sems kyis long zhig ces bya ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje phyed po de la bzung nas gdon thams cad las thar nas ldang ste/ zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin gyis gzung pa las thar ba bzhin
16a2(rgyud 'grel): du lus sdig pa dang bral ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed/ /rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste/ /dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /sems can dbang po nyams pa dang//
16a3(rgyud 'grel): tshe zad pa dang tsho nyams dang/ /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang/ /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang/ /mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang/ /bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang/ /phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang/ /nor 'gribs
16a4(rgyud 'grel): pas ni gnod pa dang/ /mya ngan ngal las gnod pa dang/ /'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang/ /gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang/ /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang/ /mya ngan mngal las byung ba yi/ /rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang/ /cho
16a5(rgyud 'grel): ga 'di yi phan yon gyis/ /de dag las ni thar bar 'gyur/ /zhes dgongs pa'o/ /de nas 'byor na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang gzhan du na 'di ltar bya'o/ /byams pa che dang snying rje che/ /mnyam par ldan par byas kyang rung/ /de yang
16a6(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar shes bya ste/ /nang gi sbyin sreg dam pa yin/ /'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi chog slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho ga zhes
16a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra Na maN+Da la sh+rI bi d+hi na ma(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo /sdug bsngal la sogs
16b1(rgyud 'grel): dag par mdzad pa ste/ /rnam par 'joms pa khro bo rnams kyi rje btsan nyid/ /dpal ldan yid khros log lta gcod pa'i dpal/ /rdo rje bsnams pa las 'joms 'jig byed pa'i/ /le'u yi grangs las nges pa'i snying po ste/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi
16b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bar 'di gsungs thog ma'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor cho ga las kyi rim pa nyid/ /'di nyid du ni rnam par bshad par bya'o/ /sa yi cho ga go rims ltar/ /gzhan gyi las kyi rims par dbye/ /sa stegs 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /phyogs mtshams
16b3(rgyud 'grel): ma nor legs par mnyam/ /'khrul pa med pa'i blo yis bya/ /dpangs su chag gang brtsigs par bya/ /srad bu mnyam ldan gsum bsgril las/ /byin gyis brlab te g.yas nas gdab/ /cha chen cha bran mkhas pas dbye/ /tshon sna lnga yi phye
16b4(rgyud 'grel): ma la/ /byin gyis brlab la legs par dgod/ /dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /gnyis pa'i cha la 'khor lo brgyad/ /mu khyud rdo rje rwa ba dang/ /gru chad snam bu gnyis pa dang/ /sgo dang sgo khyud ldan pa bri/ /de nyid kha dog nges par ni/ /pad+ma dkar po 'khor
16b5(rgyud 'grel): lor dmar/ /mu khyud gzhi ma dkar po la/ /rdo rje rnams ni lcags dang mtshungs/ /gru chad gnyis ni ljang gu la/ /snam bu dang po ser po ste/ /de bzhin gnyis pa dkar po che/ /sgo bzhi so so'i rigs dang sbyar/ /lha rnams so so'i phyag mtshan ni/ /so so'i
16b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su dgod par bya/ /de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/ /dgos pa dag ni tshang ba la/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rdzas nyid ni/ /seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pa/ /bzhi pa phyogs kyi bzlas pa bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyis ni ngos bzhir gdab/ /tshon sna lnga yi
16b7(rgyud 'grel): skud pas sgrel/ /gser dngul zangs lcags bum pa nyid/ /tshad dang ldan pa dag pa la/ /gtsang ma'i gas? kyis dkris shing dgang/ /'bras bu 'dab mar ldan pa yi/ /kha brgyan ldan pa lnga nyid la/ /so so'i mtshan ma btab la bzhag /las kyi bum pa 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i/ /rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no/ /sgrub pa bdag nyid mdun du yang/ /mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsham/ /nya dang bu ram sran chung 'bras/ /khre dang tshe la sogs pa yi/ /gtor ma gsum ni g.yas nas bzhag /de
17a2(rgyud 'grel): nas phyi nang khrus byas te/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni rab gon la/ /dri zhim rdzas ni mur bzhin du/ /sems bskyad pas na gzhan don mchog /bdun po yongs su dag par bya'o/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo nyid/ /ji ltar dmigs pa mkhas pas
17a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /dri chab byin gyis brlabs la bzhag /hUM hUM zhes pas rngam pa dang/ /oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM zhes pas/ /g.yas brkyang ba'i gar gyis ni/ /g.yon brkyang stabs kyis g.yon nas bskor/ /bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /phyogs bcu'i khro bo ti
17a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /nga rgyal ldan pas bsrung dang bcing/ mtshams la sogs pa mkhas pas gcad/ /de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba'i ste/ /hUM yig sngon po'i 'phro 'du las/ /mchod dang don gnyis rdzogs par byas/ /'dus pas gtso bo'i phyag mtshan
17a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i ngos gcig med/ /dbus su rnam par bsam par bya/ /de rjes sngags 'di rnam par brjod/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta/ b+ha ku la bi sho d+ha na ya swAhA/ zhes pa lan gsum brjod pa yis/ /rnam 'joms nyid kyi sku ru 'gyur/ /de
17a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dam tshig phyag rgya ni/ /lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las/ /gung mo gnyis ni bzhibs nas bsgreng/ /gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya ste/ /bsangs sngags 'di yi legs par ni/ /byang shar mtshams su gshin rje'o/ /oM a man ta ka ya swAhA/ /yang snying lag
17a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sor mos dgod/ /snying gar rtse mo sprad pa yang/ /oM a nan te swAhA/ /zhes pas shar du mdza' yas bskyed/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bsten pa/ /g.yas pa nu ma'i thad dkar bzung/ /oM a mri te a mri te/ /ba re hUM zhes pas shar lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil ba
17b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bong sbrel? byas la/ /oM suM b+ha ni ki ra ban d+ha ri swAhA/ zhes pas lhe ru gnod mdzes bskyed/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag mnan/ /gung mo sor mo mthe'u
17b2(rgyud 'grel): chung bsgreng/ /oM b+hi na te badzra kro d+ha na kro d+ha swAhA/ /zhes pas lho nub sngon mthon bskyed/ /snga ma'i phyag rgya lta bu la/ oM ha ya grI ba swAhA/ zhes pas nub du rta mgrin bskyed/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yas pa'i khu tshur gnyis sgrengs? la/ /oM a
17b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ri dza ta sa ti swAhA/ /zhes pas nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub skyed/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mthe bong mthe'u cung gung mo ni/ /gshibs te so sor bsgrengs byas la/ /oM badzra pA Ni b+ha na pa ti swAhA/ zhes byas byang du gtum po'i/ /de nas so so'i
17b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bskyed/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa dang/ /g.yas pa bcangs te spyi bor bzhag /lag gnyis khu tshur snying gar rtseg /g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung g.yon pas gcang/ /lag gnyis brdegs pa'i tshul du bya/ /de ltar rim pa nges pa yis/ /gru chang la
17b5(rgyud 'grel): ni go rims ba bzhin/ /sngags 'di rgyal chen bzhi rim par gsal bar bskyed par bya'o/ /o Dh+ri? Ta ra Ta ye swAhA/ oM bi ru Dta ka ye swAhA/ oM bi ru b+hAk+Sha ye swAhA/ o bi tsa ra ye swAhA/ zhes pa rgyal po bzhi ru bskyed/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la/ /bkra shis lha
17b6(rgyud 'grel): mo brgyad po'o/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la/ /phyogs skyong ba ni de bzhin no/ /sgo bzhir sgom gzhan dang mthun/ /de dag sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ /gtso bo'i sku mdog ljang ser la/ /g.yas pa rgya gram phyogs de ni/ /thugs kar bzung ste g.yon pa yang/ /bum pa sku
17b7(rgyud 'grel): la brten pa'o/ /yang na phyag gnyis bum pa ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes kha bcang la/ /phyag gnyis bzung ste thugs kar 'dzin/ /mdza' yas zhal gsum sku mdog mthing/ /phyag drug nges med mtshon cha la/ /g.yon gyi 'og ma rtse dgu ni/ thugs kar 'dzin la
18a1(rgyud 'grel): nges pa'o/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku mdog dmar/ /zhal dang phyag gnyis sngar 'dra la/ /'og ma rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin/ /gnod mdzes mdog ser sngar bzhin la/ /'og mas tho ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /mi g.yo ba ni ljang gu la/ /rdo rje dbyug
18a2(rgyud 'grel): tho thugs kar 'dzin/ /rta mgrin dmar po pad+ma 'dzin/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sngon po la/ /rin chen 'bar ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /gtum po smug nag rtse dgu 'dzin/ /gshin rje sngon nag zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug nges med mtshon cha la/ /'og ma gnyis pos be
18a3(rgyud 'grel): con 'dzin/ /de nas gru chang rgyal po bzhi/ /dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu la/ /be con pi bang chu srin dang/ /rin po che'i ngong? rtse'o/ /lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni/ /gsal byed ma ni sngon mo la/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpal be'u 'dzin/ /dbyangs can ma ni
18a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo la/ /rang rtags g.yas pa 'khor lo'o/ /mdangs can ser mo pad+ma'o/ /'od ldan mthing? ga rgyal mtshan no/ /skyes chen dmar mo gdub bu 'dzin/ /dri med ma ya dmar mo la/ /rang rtags g.yas pa bum pa 'dzin/ /yang bzang ljang gu bud dung
18a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /yid gzhungs ljang ser g.yung drung 'dzin/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyi sku mdog ni/ /brgya byin dkar la rdo rje gdengs/ /me lha dmar po rin chen phreng gshin rje mthing ga dbyug tho rnams/ /bden bral ljang gu ral gri'o/ /chu lha dmar po klu
18a6(rgyud 'grel): zhags bsnams/ /rlung lha dud kha be con 'dzin/ /gnod sbyin ser po rin chen 'dzin/ /dbang ldan dkar ser tri shul/ /nyi zla dkar po u dum 'bar/ /sa yi lha mo ser mo la/ /phyag na rin chen bum pa bsnams/ /sgo ma'i phyag mtshan sku mdog ni//
18a7(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dkar la lcags kyu 'dzin/ /zhags pa sngo la de bzhin zhags/ /lcags sgrogs dmar mo lcags sgrogs 'dzin/ /dril bu ljang ser dril bu nyid/ /de ltar sku mdog gsal sgoms la/ /ye shes dbang bskur dgug gzhug stim/ /de
18b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar gzhal yas gsal dmigs la/ /snying po rgyas dang bsdus pa dang/ /shin tu bsdus pa gang mos la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du dbul bar bya/ /de rjes mchod pa lnga yang dbul/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su dmigs pa gsum/ /legs par brtags te mnyes
18b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sgrub pa bum pa nyid la'o/ /de nas bstod pa dngul pa'i phyir/ /chos kyi dbyings nas lha rnams ni/ /spyan drangs bum pa'i nang du bstim/ /bskul tshig 'di skad brjod par bya/ /na mo sems ni rgya che mchog tu rab bskyed de/ /ma lus 'khor dang bcas te
18b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /chos dbyings mngon 'gyur ye shes sku brnyes te/ /sku gsung thugs su legs par 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gsung rab bcu gnyis 'phags lam rgyal ba'i bka' / /bcom ldan shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /rnam dag dbyings kyi dam
18b4(rgyud 'grel): chos gshegs su gsol/ /sa bcu'i rgyal tshab chos la mnga' brnyes shing/ /snying rje chen pos brtson 'grus go gyon pa/ /shes rab thabs kyis khams gsum 'dren mdzad pa/ /rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/ /mi mjing 'jig rten 'dzam gling 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir/ /dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas khang/ /bla med mchod pa brgyan bshams te/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan bshams nas/ /spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol ba ni/ /bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /nams kyang rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' ba'i/ /lus
18b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid gsum nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/ /'gro 'dul thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/ /bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yang/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /sems can nyon mongs gshin rje'i dra ba la/ /yi
18b7(rgyud 'grel): shes thugs kyi gshed dang dra ba 'joms/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa 'byung ba yis/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed po yang/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /nam mkha' i mdza' ma mdza' yas thugs pa bzhin/ /'gro ba'i las
19a1(rgyud 'grel): dang nyon mongs mdza' yas la/ /thugs rje'i byin brlabs sprul pa mdza' yas kyis/ /ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'joms mdzad pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po yon tan mdza' yas kyang/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes//
19a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can dug gsum nad kyis gdungs pa la/ /thugs rje'i byin brlabs bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ /thabs la mkhas pa mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can ma lus dbyings su sbyor mdzad pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rtsi thabs sbyor yang/ /'dir
19a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /rnam thar gsum gyi mnga' mdzad yi shes stobs/ /nyon mongs dug gsum ma lus gnod mdzad phyir/ /phyag mtshan rdo rje tho ba 'bar ba bsnams/ /mdzes pa'i sku mdog gdul thabs cir yang ston/ /khro bo'i
19a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po gnod mdzes stobs po che/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /dbyings las mi g.yo 'khor ba'i mdza' mi g.yo/ /mdza' la mi gnas thugs rjes 'go don mdzad/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i mdza' gcod cing/ /sems can
19a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dpal dang mgon gyur pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon po yang/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /ye shes thugs kyi 'khor ba'i mdza' yi bar/ /thugs rje myur bas rta gdong phrin las mdzod/ /'gro don mdzad pa'i ngo
19a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshar mnga' ba yang/ /rtag tu rta mgrin rgyal po gsung du sbrul/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dbang gi rta gdong yang/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku/ /mdza' gnyis ma yengs dbyings la dbang sgyur?
19a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /thugs rje'i phrin las dbyings su 'dus ma mdzad/ /sku yi yon tan rdzogs pas dbang phyug che/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dbang phyug gtum po yang/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /rin chen las grub ri rab ngos bzhi nas/ /bsod namS
19b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ldan dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi/ /gling bzhi gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du don mdzad pa'i/ /dpal ldan rgyal po chen po 'khor bcas kyang/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /dus ba ni tshad med bzhi
19b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mi 'jigs bzhi ldan ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/ /mchod pa mang po'i sbrin dang bcas nas ni/ /mchod pa'i lha mo mang po gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje dang ni rin chen pad+ma dang/ /sna tshogs las grub rdo rje rgya gram 'bar/ /phyag rgya chen pos
19b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud bzhi zil gyis mnon/ /phyogs bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po gshegs su gsol/ /zhi ba dkar po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /pad+ma dkar po phyag na dpal be'u bsnams/ /'joms byed dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su
19b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /lho phyogs rgyas pa ser mo'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /rgyas pa sngon mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /'od ldan mthing ga phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /gnyis med 'gre'o/ /nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dkar sham dmar mo phyag na gdub bu bsnams/ /mdangs
19b5(rgyud 'grel): can dmar mo phyag na bum pa bsnams/ gnyis med/ byang phyogs phrin las drag po'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /yid gzhungs ljang gu phyag na bud dung bsnams/ /yid bzangs ljang ser phyag na g.yung drung bsnams/ /gnyis med X/ phyogs skyong bcu dang 'jig rten dbang ldan dang
19b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dgyes par che/ /brgya byin dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa yang/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /sbyin sreg bdag po dka' thub ral pa can/ /drang srong brtul zhugs spyod pa kun gyi rje/ /me'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa
19b7(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'go ba'i don X/ bdud gcod bdud las mnga' mdzad bdud kyi rje/ /bdud gcod 'chi bdag mang por kun gyi gtso/ /gshin rje'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang/ /bstan X/ 'gro ba'i X/ thod rgal 'jigs pa chen po'i skyabs
20a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /nad gtong mdangs 'phrog srin po kun gyi rje/ /srin po'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang/ /bstan pa X/ 'gro ba'i X/ char sbrin lo tog chu la dbang byed pa/ /lha chen chu lha snyem pa kun gyi rje/ /chu lha'i rgyal po/ bstan pa X/ 'gro ba'i X
20a2(rgyud 'grel): srog 'chang dbugs kyi bdag po dbugs kyi gzungs/ /srog 'chang rlung lha rigs 'dzin kun gyi rje/ /rlung lha rigs 'dzin/ /bstan pa/ /'gro ba'i/ /nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba/ /gnod sbyin gter 'chang mang po kun gyi rje/ /gnod sbyin rgyal
20a3(rgyud 'grel): po/ /bstan pa/ /'gro ba'i/ /bgegs la mnga' mdzad dngos grub mchog ston pa/ /log 'dren tshar gcod lha rnams kun gyi rje/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po/ /bstan pa/ /'gro ba'i/ /'od chen 'jigs rten gling bzhir snang mdzad pa/ /gza' skar stong gi lha mang kun gyi
20a4(rgyud 'grel): rje/ /lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi rje/ /bstan pa/ 'gro ba'i/ sa la mnga' mdzad sa bdag kun gyi rje/ /sa'i lha mo bstan ma yang/ /bstan pa/ 'gro ba'i/ gnyis med don la rig pa shar mdzad cing/ /thugs dam rgyud bskul lcags kyu phyogs bcur 'bar/ /
20a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba bdud bzhi 'dul mdzad dkar mo'i sku/ /'gro ba'i yon tan rgyas pa gser 'od 'od ser 'phro/ /log 'dren bgegs 'ching zhags pa phyogs bcur 'phen/ /yon tan tshogs rgyas 'ching byed zhags pa ma/ /'gro ba'i/ thams cad dbang sdud dmar mo
20a6(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog sdom/ /grub pa bdud cing 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sdom/ /khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i lag sgrog ma/ /'gro ba'i/ sna tshogs las la grub pa'i ljang gu dgyes/ /bde gshegs mchod pa'i tshogs brnyes mchod pa'i dril bu 'bar/ /las
20a7(rgyud 'grel): dang nyon mongs bdud 'dul thal byed ma/ /'gro ba'i/ /dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): ehya hi b+ha ga bAna/ mahA ka ru Ni ka ya dri sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ badzra aM gu sha dza badzra pA sha hUM/ badzra spho Ta baM/ badzra g+haN+De ho/ de nas gnyis su med par bstim pa dang/ /ye shes
20b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbyer med bsres/ /brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ hUM rin chen sna bzhi grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /ma chags pad+ma 'bum gyi gdan bting ste/ /rin chen khri dang nyi zla gsal ba'i rgyan/ /dngos su 'byor dang yid kyi rnam sprul te/ /bdag cag dang
20b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yid kyis sngon sprul te/ /rim bzhin bde yangs nyid du bzhugs su gsol/ /badzra tiSh+Tha/ phyag btsal ba ni/ e ma'o phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs ni rab tu rgya che ste/ /'gro ba kun la khyab mdzad rdo rje rnam 'joms nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ phyogs
20b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i khro bo rgyal ba rnams/ /nyon mongs dug gsum sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzir ba'i 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /phrin las drag po'i dregs pas 'dul mdzad pa/ /phyogs bcu'i khro rgyal rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o phyogs bzhi dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi/ /
20b4(rgyud 'grel): srid rtse rin chen mdza' yas nas/ /dri med bdud rtsis chang 'bebs pa'i/ /phyogs bzhi yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ /phyogs kyi lha mo bkra shis brgyad rnams kyis/ /thugs mchog 'gro don ma lus bdud las rgyal/ /thugs rjes dbang
20b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur chos sgra shes rab thabs/ /mi mthun phyogs la yon tan bkra shis pa/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ phyogs bcu 'dul ba'i dbang phyug sku sprul pa/ /phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams mang po tshar gcod cing/ /mtho ris gnas nas
20b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sgyur mdzad pa/ /phyogs skyong chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ /tshad med bzhi po mthar phyin lhun grub rtags/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du thugs rjes sprul/ /'gro drug sems can gnas nas sprul mdzad pa'i/ /sgo skyong 'khor dang bcas la phyag
20b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /de nas mchod pa lnga phul te/ slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid/ /cho ga ji ltar 'dod bzhin brtsam/ /de rjes dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/ /bstod pa nyid ni 'di skad dbul/ /hUM bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms/ /thugs rje nyi zla'i 'od pas
21a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tsher/ /ngan song thams cad rnam par spyod/ /de nyid sgrib pa sel mdzad pa/ /pad+ma 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs ma brgyad/ /nang gi snying po rdo rje gtso/ /dpa' bo thub pa bzhugs pa yis/ sku gsung thugs
21a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi byin brlabs dang/ /phrin las bzhi yi khyad par gyi/ /pad+ma 'khor lor bcas pa la/ /rol mo'i sil snyan rnams kyis mchod/ /rin chen stegs bu 'di dag ni/ /gru bzhir ldan zhing sgo bzhi 'dod/ /dbus kyi pad+ma ge sar la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms//
21a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'bar/ /rgya gram phyogs med thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /shar phyogs gtso bo mdza' yas ni/ /sku mdog mthing khan 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te/ rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin
21a4(rgyud 'grel): de la bstod do mchod pa 'bul/ /shar lho khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te/ /rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la 'gre'o/ /lho phyogs khro bo gnod mdzes ni/ /sku mdog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od?
21a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te/ /rdo rje tho ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la/ lho nub khro bo mi g.yo mgon/ /sku mdog ljang ku 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag drug /rdo rje dbyug tho thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la/ nub phyogs khro bo rta mgrin ni/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer
21a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar/ /pad+ma rtsegs pa thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la/ byang phyogs gtum po dbang phyug ni/ /sku mdog smrag nag 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag X/ /rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la/ /byang shar gshin rje gshed po ni/ /sku mdog sngo nag 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag /be con
21a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la/ /shar phyogs rgyal po yul 'khor srung/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na ne le snams/ /de la/ /lho phyogs rgyal po 'phags skyes po/ /sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag
21b1(rgyud 'grel): na pi wang bsnams/ /de la/ /nub phyogs rgyal po spyan mig bzang/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na chu srin bsnams/ /de la/ /byang phyogs rgyal po rnam thos sras/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od 'bar ba/ /phyag mtshan phyag na dong tse brtsegs//
21b2(rgyud 'grel): de la/ /shar phyogs lha mo dkar sham ma/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od 'bar ma/ /phyag na bkra shis gdugs 'dzin cing/ /de la shar smad lha mo dbyangs mkhan ma/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na bkra shis 'khor lo bsnams/ /de la lho stong lha mo mdangs
21b3(rgyud 'grel): can ma/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsnams/ /de la/ /lho smad lha mo 'od ldan ma/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na bkra shis rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /de la/ /nub stong lha mo skyes chen ma/ /sku mdog dmar la
21b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na bkra shis bum pa bsnams/ /de la/ /nub smad lha mo dri ma med/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na yid bzhin nor bu bsnams/ /de la/ byang stod lha mo yid bzangs ma/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na bkra shis bud dung bsnams//
21b5(rgyud 'grel): de la/ /byang smad lha mo yid gzhungs ma/ /sku mdog ljang la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gser gyi nya mo bsnams/ /de la/ /shar phyogs dbang ldan brgya byin ni/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams/ /de la/ /shar lho drang srong me lha ni/ /sku mdog
21b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na rin chen phreng ba bsnams/ /de la/ /lho phyogs gshin rje'i rgyal po ni/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gshin rje'i dbyug tho bsnams/ /de la/ /lho nub srin po bden bral ni/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na ral
21b7(rgyud 'grel): gri rnon po bsnams/ /de la/ /nub phyogs chu lha'i bdag po ni/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na klu yi zhags pa bsnams/ /de la/ /nub byang rlung lha dbang ldan ni/ /sku mdog dud kha 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na rin chen bcon bsnams/ /de la/ /byang phyogs gnod
22a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin ku be ra/ /sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gnod sbyin dbyug pa 'dzin/ /de la/ /byang shar gnod sbyin bgegs kyi bdag /sku mdog dkar ser 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gnod sbyin dbyug pa 'dzin/ /de la/ /byang shar dbang ldan
22a2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyi bdag /sku mdog dkar ser 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na dri shul rtse gsum bsnams/ /steng phyogs nyi zla tshangs pa ni/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na utpal 'bar ba bsnams/ /de la/ /'og phyogs sa yi lha mo ni/ /sku mdog ser la
22a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams/ /de la/ /shar sgo'i rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na lcags kyu bsnams/ /de la/ /lho sgo rdo rje zhags pa ma/ /sku mdog sngon mo 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan
22a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /de la/ /nub phyogs rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams/ /de la/ /byang phyogs rdo rje dril bum / /sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na dril bu
22a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams/ /de la bstong de mchod pa 'bul/ /de las dbang bskur cho ga las/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i dbang rnams sbyin/ /bzod gsol smon lam gdab pa nyid/ /de nas lha rnams so so yi/ /thugs ka'i sa bon las bsdus te/ /gshegs gsol dmigs med
22a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas btab la/ /de nas dga' ston dbugs phyung ste/ rig pa'i las dang gzengs kyang bstong/ /de nas gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /mgon po'i gtor ma btang ba ni/ /sngags kyis spyan drangs ye shes bzhug /paM las 'byung ba so so yi/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan
22a7(rgyud 'grel): so sor dmigs/ /de nas 'dzab dang bsnyen pa dbul/ /de yi sngags ni 'di dag bzlas/ /rdo rje lce las yang dag phyung/ /oM e hye hi ha na ha na b+hin d+ha badzra hUM phaT/ oM e hye hi badzra na la b+hind+ha na maN+Dal bud d+ha sarba b+hasmiM? ku ru sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ oM e hye hi badzra kA la
22b1(rgyud 'grel): daN+Da ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM e hye hi badzra ki ri tistaM rak+Sha sa d+he ba ta ye swAhA/ oM e hye hi nA ga badzra A na ya sarba d+ha na d+ha n+ya/ sarba na ma ni/ mug tA laM ka ra d+ha sarba nA gan nA nI? tsa/ badzra d+ha ra ya/ sa ma yA ma nu sma ra a ga d+ha a ga d+he/ band+ha band+ha/ ha ra ha ra/ sra na Na mahA tshtshaid hUM phaT/ oM
22b2(rgyud 'grel): oM? hye hi badzra a ni la mahA bai ga /A na ya sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ oM e hye hi ku be ra yak+ShAM d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ oM e hye hi d+hid+hu b+hin badzra shU la swAhA/ oM hye hi na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha? naM oM phri nyi b+hya swAhA/ oM e hye ha ni ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha naM/ he shorya prato dzyo ti ra ma ya swAhA/ /lha rnams so so'i phyag
22b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya yis/ /mchod yon la sogs gtor ma la/ /sngags ni bdun tsam gcig dag gis/ /nges par dbul dang btab par bya'o/ /de nas mgon po mnyes pa yi/ /tshig 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o/ /hUM lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lta 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab
22b4(rgyud 'grel): bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang/ /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa yang/ /bdag gi pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol ba 'debs/ /gsan nas phan
22b5(rgyud 'grel): gdags phyir ni 'dir sbyon cig /dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshigs bcas la/ /mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me ste sreg bya za ba'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar lho/ mchod par/
22b6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha/ /ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /lho phyogs/ mchod par/ bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /lho nub/ mchod par/ zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha/ /klu yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /nub/ mchod
22b7(rgyud 'grel): par/ rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /rigs 'dzin rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /nub byang/ mchod par/ gnod sbyin lag na dbyug tho thogs/ /nor srungs rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /byang/ mchod par/ dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi
23a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag /byang shar/ mchod par/ steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang/ /nyi ma zla ba gza' chen po/ /gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la/ /mchod par/ 'og gi klu ste sa yi lha/ /sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste/ /dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la/ /
23a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod par/ shar gyi phyogs nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag /chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang/ /dbang ldan 'byung po'i bdag po lha dang ni/ /steng gi nyi zla tshangs
23a3(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po dang/ /lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang/ /ri yi lha rnams gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas/ /so so so sor phul ba 'di dag kun/ /so so so so'i phyogs su bzhes nas kyang/ /sde dang dpung bcas bu smad 'khor bcas dang/ /gtor ma bdug pa me
23a4(rgyud 'grel): tog bdug spos rnams/ /rab tu dgyes nas bzhes te bsnams nas gsol/ /de nas 'byung po bgegs la yang/ /gtor ma dag ni sbyin par bya/ /hUM 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng na gnas pa dang/ /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi yul gnas dang/ /shar
23a5(rgyud 'grel): nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang/ /ri rnams kun la gang dag gnas pa dang/ /chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang/ /rin chen gnas na gang dag gnas pa dang/ /rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma lteng ka dang/ /khron pa dang ni dam 'brog chu mig dang/ /grong dang phyugs
23a6(rgyud 'grel): lhas grong khyer nags tshal dang/ /khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang/ /gang dag gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang/ /mu stegs spyi gnas drang srong sde gnas dang/ /gtsug lag khang chu glang chen khang pa dang/ /rgyal po'i dkor khan dag na gang gnas dang/
23a7(rgyud 'grel): srang dang khyams dang grong gi mdun sa dang/ /gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig dang/ /dur khrod dag dang nags tshal chen po dang/ /seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas rnams dang/ /dgon pa nags chen rab tu 'jigs pa dang/ /gling ma bzang po dag na
23b1(rgyud 'grel): gang gnas dang/ /rab tu dgyes shing go go gnas rnams su/ /me tog phreng ba byug spos bdug pa dang/ /stong dang mar me gtor ma gus 'bul bas/ /'di dag bzhes nas so sor gnas nas gsol/ /bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de nas rig drug so
23b2(rgyud 'grel): so'i gtor ma btang/ /dbang rdzogs bkra shis smon lam gdab/ /dkyil 'khor bsdu ba mkhas pas brtsam/ /khrus kyi cho ga ji lta bar/ /khrus byas rol mo'i las bya'o/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa
23b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi bzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs
23b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer/ /byang chub spyod mchog bdag gis spyad par bgyis/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par
23b5(rgyud 'grel): shog /bum pa slob ma lhag gnas bya/ /maN+Dal dag la rnam lngas byugs/ /de nas me tog rnam lnga dgod/ /mchod dang 'byung pa gtor ma bsham/ /rin chen bum par bco lnga blugs/ /gang yin mtshan bris ras mgul cing/ /dri zhim 'bras bcas shing gis brgyan//
23b6(rgyud 'grel): baM las rin chen bum pa bsam/ /de mgrin nyi zla rang sngags bsam/ /de las 'od 'phros bdud rtsi gzhug /de nas ci rigs par ni bzlas/ /slob ma khrus byas bshags sogs bya/ /de ni lhag par gnas pa'o/ /zhag gi don ni 'di lta ste/ /maN+Dal byugs la mchod pa
23b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gtor ma bsham pa snga ma bzhin/ /de nas maN+Dal dag la ni/ /lha gang yin pa'i mtshan ma dgod/ /bdag nyid bskyed nas dkyil 'khor mtshan/ /gang yin lha ru bskyed par bya/ /de la mchod dang bstod pa bya/ de nas sngags kyang ci rigs bzlas/ /de nas
24a1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa gong bzhin no/ /de nas slob ma khrus byas la/ /rigs mthun dar gyi gdong yang gdab/ /slob dpon la ni phyag kyang bya/ /yol ba'i nang du rdo rje drang/ /de la me tog gtor du gzhug /gdong g.yogs dkrol la chu dbang bskur/ /de nas sngags
24a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bsgom pa'i lung/ /byin la mchod dang gtor ma btang/ /lha gshegs mtshan ma bsdu bar bya/ /de ni sku yi dbang bskur ro/ /pad+ma badzra bdag gis mdzad/ rdzogs so// //rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig
24a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i nges pas ni/ /mi smra ba dang mi bya nyid/ /sba ba dang ni de bzhin mchod/ /tshim bya yid la rnam par bsgom/ /mkhas pas bsad bya rmongs bya nyid/ /brgyad po 'di dag bsrung byas na/ /dam tshig tu ni yongs su grags/ /ci zhig smra zhe na ni/ sngags dang rgyud
