67b7(rgyud 'grel): thob kyi nang du bsgrub bya'i gos bum bu 'am dri chen dri chu rjes sa la sogs pa gang rnyed ba dang/ bag zan bsres la de'i khong du ra'i khrag gis bsgrub bya'i ming rang ? dang yul dang sa khyim dang/ pha chan dang dur ming bris la dur khrod kyis ras ma la sna tshogs rdo rje dur khrag?
68a1(rgyud 'grel): gis bris pas dril la yugs sa mo'i skra skud phyin ka log gis rgya gram sgril la bzhag go /de'i nang du spre'u'i khrag dang/ mdze khrag dang/ ra reg po'i khrag btig /lcags phye dang/ dur khrod kyi rdo phye dang/ yungs nag dang/
68a2(rgyud 'grel): dug sna tshogs la klu brgyad kyi snying po 'bum phrag bdun bzlas shing brug /skabs su klu rnams la bstod cing gtor ma sbyin/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab bo/ /klu'i snying po'i gzhug la a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT ces gdags so/ /de nas rgyud rdzogs pa brgya
68a3(rgyud 'grel): bklags la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la klu'i pho brang du mnan pa byas na bsgrub bya de zla ba lnga nas gdon mi za bar brlag par nges so/ /de yang rgyal rigs la gtad na mthe thong? kyis bya/ rje'u rigs la glang dmar po'i rwa g.yas pa bram ze la rabs dang
68a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi thod pa rnam rigs la sbal pa'i lus por bya/ rdol pa la phag nag po'i thod par bya/ blung dang chu gter ci mang du btang de/ /bsgrub bya rnams kyi byang du bzhug pa'i cho ga sreg gcod kyi spu gra zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mched? pa rdzogs ?
68a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsgrub bya rnams tsha ba'i rims kyis rmugs shing myos par byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas maN+Dal gru gsum par ?  dmar po'i khrag gis byugs pa'i sbed du bum pa tshad ldan la khrag sna
68a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs byugs la/ de'i nang du tsha ba'i sman sna tshogs dang/ dug sna tshogs blugs la gtso bo la mchod pa la sogs pa byas la bum pa'i nang bsgrub byed bkug cing che ba sna tshogs la sngags 'di 'bum phrag bdun bzlas la bum par blug do/ /na ma:tsaN+Da?  badzra pA Ni a
68a7(rgyud 'grel): mu ka mA ? ces las sbyor gyi dus na bum pa'i khrag dang/ tshul sogs pa ste/ bsgrub bya'i khang pa la gtor na tsha ba'i rims babs te/ /bsgrub bya ma rungs par 'gyur bar nges so/ /tsha ba'i rims kyis dgra bsad pa'i ral gri'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ slob
68b1(rgyud 'grel): dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsgrub bya myos pa'i las rmugs shing dran pa nyams par 'dod na/ shi ri kha d+ha'i khu pa la snying por bsdus pa stong phrag lnga bzlas nas/ da tu
68b2(rgyud 'grel): ra'i lo ma brdungs pa'i khar ba'i khu? ba dang sbyar nas snying po'i gsham la che ge mo myos par gyis shig ces bza' btung gang yang rung ba la sbyar nas byin na/ myos par 'gyur ba la the tshom bya mi dgos so/ /grong khyer tsam myos shing rmugs par 'dod na/ bsnyen pa
68b3(rgyud 'grel): snga ma ltar byas la bil ba'i shing la me sbar la/ grong khyer gyis mdza' ma bskor cing grong khyer che ge mo'i mi rnams myos par gyur cig swAhA/ zhes bzlas pas nyin zhag bdun du rmugs shing dran pa nyams pa la the tsam byad med do/ /yul khams tsam rmugs par
68b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na shing sna bcu bdun gyi du bas mdza' ma bskor cing yul che ge mo'i mi rnams rmugs par gyur cig swAhA/ zhes bzlas pas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du rmugs pa la the tshom med do/ /sems can thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i las kyi mdza' gzi?  dangs ?
68b5(rgyud 'grel): me zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal bskyed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs la/ bum pa kha
68b6(rgyud 'grel): dog dkar por byas la mtshal lam sind+ha ra'i mtshan mas btab la/ rdo rje rnam 'joms rang yang kha dog dkar por bsgom/ gnas khang gi nang thams cad kyang dkar por byas la/ dar dkar po'i yol ba bya/ de nas bum pa'i nang du baM las ye shes kyi mtsho/
68b7(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od ? pas baM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma'i snying po dkar po/ 'od zer dkar po dang/ ser po'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phro ba/ de'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba de nyid bar du A li dang kA li g.yas bskor dang g.yon bskor gyi bar nas sngags
69a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi rang sgra de'i 'od la hUM/ rdo rje rnam 'joms de la dza:dgug /baM gi gzhug /hUM gis bcing/ ho(rgyud 'grel): dgyes shing mnyes par byas/ ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i nyi zla bar gyi yi ge'i phreng ba gnyis po la dmigs la
69a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas so/ /de nas bum pa 'od kyi mer gsal ba la blo bzhag pas sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan/ de nas dmigs pa gsum rang dag pa ni sgra mdza' dag gi bsam gtan/ de ltar rdzogs pa la dmigs nas sngags rdzogs pa'i tshe bud med bu 'dod
69a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ zhag gcig gam zhag gsum bsnyung bar gnas par byas la/ gos gsar pa byin la khrus nas bton la sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur la de'i rjes la rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bsrung
69a4(rgyud 'grel): skud gdags so/ /de ltar byas na dpal nges par bskyed do/ /dpal bskyed pa bkra shis bskyed pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba dpal kun gyis ni brgyan pa'i mdza' / slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par
69a5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po nyams pa gso bar byed pa'i las kyi bye brag ni/ dang po mig gi nang las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ khrus kyi cho ga nas ji ltar 'byung ba'i khrus bya ste/ gos gsar pa gyon pa dang bsnyung bar
69a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas khrus lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las gzugs lha dpag tu med pa spros te/ 'phags pa mchod la sems can gyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs
69a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus par byas nas bdag gi mig la thim pas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sbyan dri ma med pa thob cing yongs su dag par mkhyen pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dmigs shing/ utpa la sngon po dang/ skyer khaN+Da la snying po rgyas bsdus kyi sngags
69b1(rgyud 'grel): ci rigs par bzlas shing byug go /tshag pa la ni spangs ma la bzlas shing byug go /rab rib can rnams la ni a ru ra'i khu ba la sngags te byug go /ling thog can rnams la mtshal dang cong zi'i khu ba la sngags la byug go /sha mdzer dang zug che ba rnams
69b2(rgyud 'grel): la ka ra dang mi'i 'o ma la bzlas la byug go /de ltar byas pas gdon dang nad gang yin yang zhi bar nges so /mig gi dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga gsal pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
69b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rna ba'i dbang po nyams shing rna ba gso bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ zhag gsum bsnyung par gnas shing gos gsar pa gyon la khrus kyi cho ga brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ de'i rjes la bdag
69b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang gur dmigs la bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod sems can gyi don byas pas/ phrin las bzhi'i 'dod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas pas/ de nas yang 'od 'phros
69b5(rgyud 'grel): pas sngar dang 'dra/ de nas 'od 'phros sgra'i lha mo grangs med pa 'phros te/ de dag re re las kyang sprul pa'i lha mo dpag tu med pa 'phros te/ snang ba thams cad sgra'i lha mo zhal nas sgra snyan ba sna tshogs pa brjod pas/ phyag na sgra snyan pa'i 'byung khungs pi wang
69b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gling? bu dang/ rdza rnga la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsnams shing de nyid kyi sgras sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du mchod pa'i bye brag sprin rnam par byed pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod nas/ slar ye shes kyi 'od phung?
69b7(rgyud 'grel): po gcig tu gyur nas bdag nyid la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim nas de nyid thim pas lus dag khro bo rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du dmigs la tshogs rdzogs par bya/ de nas yang 'od 'phros pas lha mo de dag
70a1(rgyud 'grel): gis gong ltar sems can gyi don byas nas/ yang ye shes kyi 'od phung po gcig tu gyur nas/ bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la bstim pa snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /de nas lan gcig 'phros nas don gnyis rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi
70a2(rgyud 'grel): rna ba la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan rnam par dag pa dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba ye shes kyi mkhyen pa rdzogs par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas so/ /rna ba na ba rnams la khug chos chen po che'i phye ma dang rtsi mar
70a3(rgyud 'grel): la bzlas te blug /'on zhing sgra mi thos pa rnams la 'bru mar dang ru rta la bzlas te byug go /zug che zhing gzer ba rnams la mar sna tshogs dang sbrang rtsi la bzlas la rtsa rnams la byugs te nyi ma la bsreg go /rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa dang de'i nad gso
70a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chog /sgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad ba rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sna'i nang gso par byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ khrus kyi
70a5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga len grangs brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du gnas pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od snga ma ltar 'phros pa las don gnyis byas pa'i tha ma dri'i lha mo rnams bdag nyid kyi sna la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs
70a6(rgyud 'grel): dri ma med pa yongs su dag pa ye shes tshogs pa'i phung po las grub pa mkhyen pa'i go ma bgegs pa sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa dang ldan par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas so/ /de ltar sna tshub pa rnams la 'bru mar la bzlas la blug go//
70a7(rgyud 'grel): khrag pa bab cing dbugs stong pa bkab na tsanda dkar po la bzlas so/ /zug che? ba rnams la gi wang 'o ma la sbyar ba la bzlas shing sna phug du blug go /sna'i dbang po nyams pa dang na ba gso ba dri ma dang bral ba'i sbyong byed ces bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes
70b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lce'i dbang po nyams shing na ba gso par 'dod pa'i bsgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gos gsar pa gon te/ bsnyung bar gnas par byas la khrus kyi cho ga
70b2(rgyud 'grel): lan? nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ de nas rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ snying ga'i sa bon las 'od snga ma ltar lan gsum du 'phags pa mchod pa dang/ sems can gyi don byas pa'i gzhug lo ra'i lha mo 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ra sna tshogs
70b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa rnams bdag nyid lce la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ljags ring zhing yangs pa ye shes 'dus pa las byung pa mkhyen pa ma 'gags par gsal par dmigs shing snying po rgyas sdus ci rigs par bzlas pa bya'o/ /de ltar yang skrangs pa rnams la
70b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya? tsha la bzlas pa bya ste byug go /brda mi shes pa rnams la shing kun la bzlas so/ /tsha zhing zug dang ldan pa rnams la 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang ga pur gyi chu la bzlas so/ /grang zhing ser ka dang ldan pa rnams la tshab gsum dang tsan dan gyi tshul bzlas so/ /
70b5(rgyud 'grel): lce'i dbang po nyams pa gso pa'i cho ga pad+ma rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus kyi dbang po nyams shing na ba gso pa'i cho ga byed par   ?pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gos gsar pa dri ma med pa bgos te zhag gsum bsnyung bar gnas te/ lus kyi dbang po gang la yang khrul/ lan grangs bdun nam bcu gcig ga ma/ nyer gcig gam sum cu rtsa gnyis sam/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam
70b6(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag gcig gam khri phrag gcig la sogs pa na ba'i rigs dang sbyar la bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i nga rgyal du byas te/ rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phrin las bzhi gang mos pa'i kha dog tu 'phros pas reg bya'i lha mo kha dog
71a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dang mthun pa/ phyag na reg bya'i lha mo bye brag dpag tu med pa 'phros pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dpag tu med par mchod pa'i sbrin gyis btibs nas mnyes par bya ste/ ye shes kyi 'od phung po chen po gcig tu gyur
71a2(rgyud 'grel): nas slar bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsdus/ de nas yang 'phros nas lha mor gyur pas sems can gyi don byas nas yang snying gar 'od du gyur nas thim mo/ /de lha mo spros nas lha mo de dag yang bdag gi
71a3(rgyud 'grel): lus la thim pas/ yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi lus su song ste/ sangs rgyas sku'i mkhyen pa rdzogs par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus la ci rigs par bzlas so/ /de yang lus kyi stod na na chu la ?
71a4(rgyud 'grel): sbad na na dri chu la bzlas so/ /tsha na ? haM la bzlas so/ /brang na na bu ram gyi khu ba la bzlas so/ /mgon na rdo rgyus la bzlas so/ /ske dang mjing pa nan nya'i mkhris pa la bzlas so/ /lag pa nan steg tsher ra la bzlas so/ /po mchin na ma bden bca' sga? la bzlas
71a5(rgyud 'grel): so/ /blo snying ma bden bcu gang rgya mtsho gser gyi bye ma la bzlas so/ yig 'chus na se 'bru dang gur kum la bzlas so/ /sbos na rgyam tsha la bya'o/ /bshad gci che chung 'dom na sdig srin la bya'o/ /sgyu ma na na skyer pa'i khan d+ha la bya'o/ /mkhal ma na na gser gyi phung
71a6(rgyud 'grel): bu la bya'o/ /pus mon na tsan dan bde gul bya'o/ /rkang pa na na li shi la bya'o/ /'khru na sbrang rtsi dang utpal la bya'o/ /skyug na na le sham gyis bya'o/ /gzer ba la chu dkyil gyi rdo ba grang mo la bya'o/ /rtsibs logs na pa la lag ma'i la g.yon pa la bsngags shing
71a7(rgyud 'grel): blon/ /gre? ba na brgun 'brum la bzlas so/ /chu so na na don kha dang lan tshwa la bzlas shing dugs bya'o/ /rims la chu dang tsan dan dkar po la bzlas nas bya'o/ /'brum bu la ga pur dang seng ldeng gi khu ba la bzlas so/ /glad gzer la a ka la'i khu ba la bzlas so/ /
71b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes zin pa la ni gu gul dang b+ha sa li dang 'bras kyi thal ba la bzlas so/ /gdon drag pos zin pa rnams la smag shad kyi lcug ma dang/ bal po se'u'i lcug ma dang klu shing gi lcug ma la bya'o/ /'bras la tshil chen gyi khu ba bsres la bya'o/ /mtshon
71b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis btab pa rnams la pa la sha'i lo mas bya'o/ /skrangs pa la tsha sna dang lum bu'i phye mas bya'o/ /shu ba dang dur byid dang shu dag la bya'o/ /zha 'brum dang rgur po la seng 'phrom dang tsha ba'i yungs mo la bya'o/ /lhog pa dang phol la rab gnas byas pa'i tsha
71b3(rgyud 'grel): tsha rnying pa'i sa dang/ dug sna tshogs la bzlas so/ /chu rgyus kyi nad la mar sna tshogs pa la bzlas te sku mnye bya'o/ /snying rlung dang 'dar ba rnams la ta ma la'i 'bras bu la bzlas so/ /lba ba la seng ldeng gi phur pa la bzlas la bya'o/ /sbrid cing rengs pa'i nad
71b4(rgyud 'grel): la tsha ba gsum la bzlas pa bya'o/ /yan lag gi tshogs na ba rnams la khrag sna tshogs la bzlas pa bya'o/ /dbugs mi bde ba rnams la/ A li kA li'i 'bras bu la bzlas la bya'o/ /khrag nad la glang po'i shas bya'o/ /so nad la bram dkar mo'i rtsa ba las
71b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas so/ /mchu nad la ni a ru ra'i phags pa la bzlas so/ /sgal pa na ba la 'bru mar la bzlas so/ /lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dang lus na ba gso ba'i cho ga rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
71b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can tshe zad pa bsrings pa'i cho ga /sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la/ bum pa gcig la dpa' bo chen po'i phyag mtshan btab la der rdo rje mig gis
71b7(rgyud 'grel): bltas te bgegs bskrad la rang lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can a dkar por bsdus la de nyid las 'od 'phros pas lha mo dkar mo lag na tshe'i bum pa thog pa grangs med pa spros la de la mchod pas mchod la 'chi
72a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ltas byung ba'i 'gro ba de la bstims pas mdangs nges par 'jug go /de lta bu byas nas ni lo gcig tu che bsring bar nges so/ /tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga rgyun gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa
72a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can tshe 'das pa'i sdig pa kun las thar par 'dod pas/ sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa rdzogs par byas la/ bcom ldan 'das
72a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la/ bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa kha dog tshon gyis bsgyur la/ lha so so'i phyag mtshan btab la lha rnams kyi nang du bzhag go /lha bshos dang mchod pa lnga lha'i
72a4(rgyud 'grel): grangs dang mnyam par bsham/ gtor ma yang de dang 'dra'o/ /phyogs skyong rnams dang bgegs rnams kyi gtor ma yang bsham mo/ /de nas ro de khrus nas bton la rgyan cha lngas brgyan la khro bo chol pa'i gang bya'o/ /de nas yam shing dbus su bcug ?/
72a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba dang/ g.yon brkyang mnyam pa'i gar gsum hUM sgra dang bcas pa'i bskor ro/ /sbyin sreg nas byung ba ltar me lha spyan drang ba dang/ dgug gzhug byas la cho ga'i las rim pa ltar spyan drangs pa dang/ bstod pa la sogs pa sngags dang phyag
72a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang/ tshigs bcad rnams kyis rgyas par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar zer te lho phyogs su ngan song rnam par dag par byed pa'i maN+Dal le'u tshe drug pa legs par bkod la/ /rigs drug nas drang ba'i cho ga ni dri ma le tshe nag por bzhag ste/ hUM mnar
72a7(rgyud 'grel): med las kyi mnar ba'i semS can khyod/ /sngon nas sbyangs pa bral ba mnar med 'khor/ /sdug bsngal chen po bzod par dka' bas ma/ /sdug bsngal bzod med che grang bor gyis la/ /bzod chen ye shes chu rgyun 'di long la/ /yid ldan sgo lnga longs spyod gnas 'dir
72b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyon? /bum chus dbang bskur ro/ /oM na ra ga sa man+ta hUM/ de nas yang/ 'dod pa rang rgyud bcad pa'i sems can khyod/ /rku 'phrog las kyis bsags pa'i 'bras bu las/ /yid 'dod ngoms med 'bras bu sdug bsngal las/ /yid 'gyur 'dod chen spyod pa'i
72b2(rgyud 'grel): las bor? la/ /yid bzhin gter dang ldan pa 'di lor? la/ /rmugs spyod dran rig 'tshol pa'i gnas 'dir sbyon/ /oM pre ta pre tsa sa ti hUM/ de nas dud 'gro'i gnas su drang pa ni/ /hUM shes rab ma rig par mnar sems can khyod/ /thos bsam bral bas sems
72b3(rgyud 'grel): las log par mthong/ /rmuD pa ma mthong bag chags ma yal bas/ /mun pa rang rig bral ba'i gnas bor la/ /shes rab dag pa'i dri med 'di long la/ /bde sdug bsags pa 'khor pa'i gnas 'dir sbyon/ /oM tirya ka mahA bi le hUM/ de nas mi'i gnas su
72b4(rgyud 'grel): drangs? ni/ hUM bde sdug 'tshol? par sbyangs pa dor ba khyod/ /rang sems ma rtogs 'khor bar 'khyams pa yi/ /dug gsum lam brten thar pa'i skad dang bral/ /sems rgyud zhen pa gcod pa'i gnas bor la/ /dri ma med pa'i 'dod bral khrims long la//
72b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsub 'gyur 'jigs su rung ba'i gnas 'dir sbyon/ /oM pa laM d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ de nas lha min gnas su drang ba ni/ hUM rtsub 'gyur las kyi skal ba'i sems can khyod/ /'jigs spyod go mtshon zhe sdang lam la gnas/ /'dod pa'i rgyun lon dags pa'i dung?
72b6(rgyud 'grel): por nas/ /bsam gtan mi mchog chu po 'di long la/ /longs spyod dga' bde ldan pa'i gnas 'dir sbyon/ /oM pra b+hi sa ma ya li na ma sa man+ta hUM/ de nas lha'i gnas nas spyan drangs pa ni/ /hUM dga' bde las kyis bcings pa'i sems can khyod/ /bde ?
72b7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi le los g.yengs pa ste/ /rang rgyud chags pas bcings pa'i gnas bor la/ /mi 'jigs dbung dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus chu long la/ /'dzin med skye shi med pa'i shar sgor sbyon/ /oM de bA pa tsa sarba at+ma ya hUM/ de nas skabs 'dir nas
73a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gnas dang/ mtshan nas bton la der song zhig ces lam bstan to/ /de nas mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor te/ /phung po'i gnas lngar ram las ye shes kyi me 'bar bar
73a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs la/ me spar te dgang gzar dang blugs gzar thogs la sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o/ /hUM ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hoM khung nas/ /rnam dag ye shes lnga rdzogs yam shing las/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das bdag
73a3(rgyud 'grel): tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dzwa la raM/ /srid pa rgyun gcod 'khor lo'i hoM khung nas/ /rnam dag phung lnga sbyar ba'i yam shing las/ /khro brgyad phyags na gnas pa'i me byung bas/ /tshe 'das rnam shes brgyad la dzwa la raM/ /bar khyams rin chen mnyam pa'i hoM khung
73a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /mi mthun rkyen rnams yaM shing las/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das rnam shes brgyad la dzwa la raM/ /gru chad rang bzhin dag pa'i hom khung nas/ /gnyis med ye shes bzhi'i yam shing las/ /rgyal chen stobs ldan bzhi'i me
73a5(rgyud 'grel): byung bas/ /tshe 'das 'byung ba bzhi po dzwa la raM/ /sna tshogs 'od ldan 'dod pa'i hom khung nas/ /khams gsum 'dod pas grol ba'i yam shing las/ /phyogs skyong shugs ldan bcu yi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das phyin ci log bzhi dzwa la raM/ /sgo bzhi rang
73a6(rgyud 'grel): gdangs dgyes pa'i hoM khung nas/ /log lta 'joms byed tshogs rdzogs yam shing las/ /sgo skyong sgo ma bzhi yi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das phyin ci log bzhi dzwa la raM/ /zhes nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi sa bon rnams bsregs te/ sa bon gyi
73a7(rgyud 'grel): ? tsam yang ma lus par byas so/ /tshig de dag brjod la lha so so'i sngags nas brjod cing dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyis bka' zhing dbul lo/ /rdzas ni zhi rgyas gang la mos pa la sbyin sreg gi cho ga ltar bya'o/ /shi ba'i sems can sdig
73b1(rgyud 'grel): pa las thar bar byed pa'i ro bsreg pa'i cho ga dug sbyongs gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar sdig pa
73b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa byas nas/ lhag ma'i rus pa la tsha tsha 'debs par 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dang po stong pa nyid kyi ngang nas raM zhes yongs su gyur pa las sa'i nyes ba'i skyon rnams ye shes kyi mes sbyangs/ de nas baM yongs su gyur ba
73b3(rgyud 'grel): las ye shes kyi chu rgyun dbab/ de nas yam zhes pa gyur pa las/ ye shes kyi rlung gis bskyod/ sam zhes pa gyur pa las/ ye shes bzhi 'dus pa'i sar dmigs la skabs der bdun rnam par dag pa'i las bya'o/ /tshogs rdzogs par byas la/ 'di
73b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di? bya ba'i sngags ni/ oM mahA ba le be ga ran hUM zhes brjod cing/ ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang gi rgyur byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas tsha tsha gdab pa ni snying po rgyas bsdus gang la mos pa bzlas shing gdab bo/ /de ni sa la 'debs pa'i lugs so/ /me la 'debs
73b5(rgyud 'grel): na raM gyi sa bon la bskyed la/ chu la baM rlung la yaM/ nam mkha' la a las mchod rten du bskyed do/ /mchod rten de dag kyang sa la kha dog ser po/ /chu dkar po/ me dmar po/ rlung ljang gu /nam mkha' mthing khar dmigs so/ /de ltar btab la ye shes kyi mchod
73b6(rgyud 'grel): rten spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bstim mo/ /de nas bskal pa ji srid gnas pa'i yun la rigs lnga'i mchod rten du dmigs la/ rab tu gnas pa byas la mchod pa lnga phul la bzhugs su gsol ba 'am/ yang na chu bo chen po la bskur ro/ /mchod?
73b7(rgyud 'grel): rten la gdab pa shi ba'i sdig pa byang bar byed pa/ rang byung 'jigs bral zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'dzoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshe dang dpal bskyed par 'dod pa'i sgrub
74a1(rgyud 'grel): pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa kha dog ser po lte ba sngon po mu khyud ljang gu sgo bzhi'i rigs dang 'dra ba bris la de la lha'i mtshan mas btab la/ bum pa
74a2(rgyud 'grel): tshad dang ldan pa la lha lnga'i mtshan mas btab la/ 'bru gtsang ma'i bye ma tshe bshos zla gam pa la mar la sogs pa'i ro mchog rnams kyis brgyan la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas gzungs thag btags/ snying po rgyas bsdus gang la mos pa'i gzhug la/ oM
74a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra hUM 'bruM/ oM bud+d+ha oM 'brum/ ratna swA bruM/ pad+ma A(rgyud 'grel): bruM/ karmA hA bruM/ zhes bzlas la rdo rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog dkar po che'i rgyun 'bebs pa/ khams gsum gyi tsha nyams pa gso bar byed pa/ ye shes tshe la longs spyod par skyed la/ de'i thugs ka'i zla ba
74a4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs la sngags bzlas so/ /khams gsum che'i bcud bum par bsdus par dmigs la/ lha lnga'i mtshan nas brjod cing che ge mo'i cho khug zhes brjod cing bstims la dbang bskur ro/ /sems can tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga bsgrub pa pad+ma dbyig sgrub ces bya ba//
74a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byor pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ ril pa spyi blugs kyi nang du chu dang 'o mas
74a6(rgyud 'grel): b? la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i lugs ma'i spyi bo nas sbreng cing gong ltar shin tu snying po bsdus pa la brgya phrag bzlas shing skya rengs dang po shar ba'i dus na byas pas rang gi 'dod pa dang 'byor ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sku
74a7(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar por dmigs la yi dam du byas te/ gzhan gyis ma mthong par rang ras byas na nyin re la gser gyi dong tse bdun brgya bdun brgya sbyin par byed do/ gtso bo'i mdun du rnam thos sras mdog dang cha lugs legs par dmigs la bya'o/ /dal 'byor chen po'i sgrub pa
74b1(rgyud 'grel): bcud kyi len pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon gyi lan chags kyi dbang gis tshe 'di la phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba rnams ni/
74b2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i las byed par 'dod pas rin po che'i snod rgya che la gting zab la dag cing dri ma med pa chag pa dang gas pa dang zhom pa la sogs pa med pa/ 'bras chen nam/ 'bru phye ma rab tu gtsang bas gtams la/ sha dang mar dang 'o ma dang khur ba la sogs
74b3(rgyud 'grel): las bran la chu rab tu gtsang zhing dri ma med pas bran la/ sngon du stong pa nyid sgom de nas tshad med pa bzhi sgom/ de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyis baM zhes brjod pas bdag/ gis mdun du sdod po shin tu rgya che ba spangs mtho ba sum brtsegs pa gcig la/ de
74b4(rgyud 'grel): yang steng gi pad+ma la kha dog dkar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa dbus dmar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa 'og sngon po dpag tu med pa dmigs so/ /de'i rjes la paM ka ma la hUM dza zhes brjod pas/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad spyan
74b5(rgyud 'grel): drangs/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can thams cad steng gi pad+ma'i steng du 'dus shing 'khod par bsam/ dbus su gzugs khams 'og tu 'dod pa khams kyi sems can 'dus shing 'khod par dmigs la/ de nas de'i 'og tu gtor ma'i stong de
74b6(rgyud 'grel): ci yin kyang rin po che'i snod rgya khyon dpag tu med par dmigs so/ /de'i 'og tu hUM las rdo rje phyed chung gi rgyed po/ de'o 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam gcig bskyed/ de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa/ de'i steng du rgyed bo'i steng du
74b7(rgyud 'grel): bruM las rin po che'i snod khor khor yug tu bcas pa dmigs shing de'i nang du khaM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho/ de nas bdag nyid kyi yaM yaM yaM zhes brjod pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las rlung g.yos/ raM raM raM zhes brjod pas/ rlung g.yos pas me'i dkyil 'khor las
75a1(rgyud 'grel): me sbar/ bruM bruM bruM zhes brjod pas 'og tu me 'bar bas snod rin po che'i snod du zhu/ khaM khaM khaM zhes brjod pas me 'bar bas snod dros pas rdzas rnams zhu bas/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor 'khyil/ de nas oM zhes brjod pas snod kyi
75a2(rgyud 'grel): nad dam tshig gi bdud rtsi de sku'i bdud rtsir gyur/ A zhes brjod pas gsung gi bdud rtsir gyur/ hUM zhes brjod pas thugs kyi bdud rtsir gyur/ de nas yang raM zhes brjod pas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i nyes pa rnams bsregs/ yaM gis gtor khaM gyis
75a3(rgyud 'grel): bkrus nas de nas sku gsung thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i bdud rtsir gyur pa'o/ /de nas bsrung ba chen po'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad/ de nas badzra zhes brjod pas zla phyed rdo rje las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs te/ rnam par dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen po'i
75a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho chen por gyur te/ de nas oM ba li b+hu dza b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha i daM kha kha khA hi/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma naM adya nud pan na twAd/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pas gzugs med pa rnams la yid bzhin nor bus dbul/ /gzugs khams rnams
75a5(rgyud 'grel): la dpag bsam gyi shing/ 'dod pa rnams la rang rang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du thob par mos bar bya'o/ /de nas tshig bcad kyang 'di skad brjod do/ /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gtor ma 'dis/ /dkon mchog mchod gnas bla'i zhing gyur dang//
75a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pas bsdus pa yi/ /mgon btsun grogs byed chos skyong srungs ma dang/ /rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa'i rigs rnams dang/ /lan chags 'dod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ /gnod byed 'phral gyi rkyen du byed la bsngo//
75a7(rgyud 'grel): lan chags dang bral bar byed pa gtor ma'i las dpag bsam gyi sdod po zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa ma
75b1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa phun sum tshogs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ bdag nyid kyi mdun du zangs la sogs pa'i snod bre bco brgyad shong ba gcig bzhag la/ de'i nang du rin po che'i sna gang yang rung ba las byas pa'i dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms
75b2(rgyud 'grel): pa mtshon gang pa 'am/ mtho gang pa 'am/ khru gang ba la sogs pa ji ltar 'grub pa'i lugs ma byas la bzhugs su gsol/ zangs la sogs pa'i snod khyor ba gang shong pa gcig tu chu gtsang ma srog chags med pas bkang ste/ 'bru 'am zan thed skyur
75b3(rgyud 'grel): bcug la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN Da badzra kro d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ pand+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri te hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun bdun brjod la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog gser bcom lta bu la dmigs la dbul lo/ /mchod sbyin gyi phyag se ge'i gyi sgra
75b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas snod chen po khengs pas dbul/ 'bul dus su kha dang yan lag bshal la dbul lo/ /de ltar phul bas nyi ma re la kar sha pa ne lnga stong lnga stong thab par nges so/ /de ltar ma chag par nyi ma ri rtse la shar ba phan chad dang/ lto ba'i gong du rdzogs
75b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de ltar nyi ma re la yi dam du byas pas 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs par nges so/ /longs spyod dang ldan par nges pa'i dpal tshogs kyi gtor ma rin po che legs phreng zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
75b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed ba'i sgrub ba po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ mchod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnam par rol par bya'o/ /dbus su 'bru sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag go /shar
75b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su khams blud sor bzhi pa brgya la gdugs brgya/ lhor ba dan brgya/ nub tu rgyal mtshan brgya/ byang du dar dbyangs brgya/ de dag lan bdun bdun byas na 'byor ba phun sum tshogs par nges so/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed
76a1(rgyud 'grel): pa las tshogs stong rgyas zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gyi lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa la lha chen
76a2(rgyud 'grel): po brgyad kyi cho gas lha mnyes par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la gtor ma la sogs pa snga ma ltar bshams la/ lha chen po brgyad kyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ de re re la dar blud song bzhi
76a3(rgyud 'grel): pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskor la/ tshon gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgyur la dkyil 'khor gyi mdza' mar bzhag go /de nas lha chen po rnams spyan drangs pa ni/ hUM ri rab chen po'i yang stengs nas/ /'jig rten stobs ldan lha chen rnams/ /drag shul ldan
76a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /dbang phyug grags pa rnams bskyed pa/ /legs pa'i lam yang ston pa ste/ /lha chen brag po 'khor dang bcas/ /'dir spyan? legs pa'i lam ston cig /sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): de nas bstod cing gtor ma dbul ba ni/ /hUM shar phyogs lha
76a5(rgyud 'grel): chen dbang phyug ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog sngo skya 'jigs byed pa/ /skra rjes spyan yang 'bru tshugs lta/ /dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /g.yas na tri shul rtse gsum bsnams/ /g.yon na thod pa khrag 'dren pa/ /de la bstod de
76a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma 'bul/ /lho phyogs lha chen rgyal chen ni/ /sku mdog ser la zhal gcig pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i phyag gnyis pa /g.yas pa rdo rje gsum pa bsnams/ /g.yon pa rus pa'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /nub phyogs lha
76a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang tshangs pa ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ /skra brdzes mche ba gtsigs pa la/ /'jigs pa'i da ro 'brug ltar sgrog /g.yas pa dung chen g.yas 'khyil bsnams/ /g.yon pa pad+ma mdzes pa 'dzin/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /
76b1(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs lha cher khyab 'jug ni/ /zhal dgu phyag gnyis sku mdog dud/ /mgo lus spyan gyis khengs pa ste/ /ro smad sbrul nag 'khyil pa la/ /g.yas pa phyag na dbyug tho 'phyar/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul//
76b2(rgyud 'grel): shar lho 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog smug /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ha ha hi hi cher sgrogs pa/ /g.yas pa mda' ste g.yon pa gzhu/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /lho nub tshogs kyi bdag po ni/ /zhal
76b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag /sbrul gyis lus brgyan 'jigs rung ba/ /rab 'jigs dbang can kun gyi gtso/ /glang sngon sna la mche ba gtsigs/ /g.yas pa glang chen mche ba bsnams/ /g.yon pa glang ko rlon pa 'dzin/ /de la bstod de gtor me 'bul/ /nub
76b4(rgyud 'grel): byang nag po chen po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag /skra g.yengs so mnan khrag gis brlan/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /de la bstod pa gtor ma 'bul/ /byang shar smin drug dbang phyug bu//
76b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang/ /'jigs byed chen po'i zhal gdengs nas/ /rab tu rdam pa'i nga ro can/ /phyag gnyis mdud thung gsor byed cing/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /lha chen brgyad pa 'khor dang bcas/ /mchod dang gtor mar phul ba
76b6(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /'jig rten lha rnams mnyes byas te/ /bdag dang 'dod pa'i don rnams ni/ /nges par 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la/ /ri'i rtse mo la sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang ldan par byas la bskyal la/ dkyil 'khor
76b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdu zhing bkra shis gsol/ 'jig rten kyi lha mnyes par byed pa/ don grub pa zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsgrub bya la mdza' bo dang ces pa 
77a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi lte 'bab par 'dod na/ sa sna bdun nam bcu gcig la bsgrub bya'i gzugs khru gang pa byas te/ snying gar gro ga lar khrag gis ming rus bris te gzhug go /de'i spyi bor e gru gsum brus la/ tsher ma sna tshogs
77a2(rgyud 'grel): ? nyag ma ro gzugs so/ /mgo la ltas ngan sna tshogs sgros brgyan/ lus la gze ma mang po gtsugs la dur khab kyis btur/ de bdag gi mdun du bzhag la gtso bo la mchod bstod ci rigs par byas la sran ma rnams dang sgeg skya dang/ bra ma'i
77a3(rgyud 'grel): 'brum bu dang/ kye ba dang/ bse shing gi 'bras bu la sarba sha hUM hUM phaT ces 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te/ thun gyi skabs su brabs te/ mi chen po rnams kyi lce nyams pa 'di la phob cig ces brjod cing/ ri gsum 'dus pa'i rtsal sran ma'i sbyin sreg
77a4(rgyud 'grel): lan nyer gcig byas la thal ba de rlung la skur te/ bsgrub bya'i khang pa la khrag gis gtor na nges par mdza' sdug rnams kyis lce 'bab par nges so/ /skye bo sdang ba'i las myur byed chen mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
77a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyi lce 'bangs pa dang/ sdang ba zlog par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te cho ga rdzogs par byas la/ bdag nyid sdig pa
77a6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa yongs su dag par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ /gtor ma re re'i nang sdang ba rnams ya hi ga rdza zhes gro gal dris la gzhug /snying po shin tu bsdus
77a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags brgya phrag sum cu so lnga/ spru dang mkhan pa dang glang ma dang shug pa'i lo ma la bzlas la gzhan gyi du bsam sleb par yul kun tu du ba chen po btang/ tshon rtsi lnga'i phye ma la sngags bzlas la rlung chen po byung dus su yul kun khyab par
77b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ro/ /des ni gzhan gyi lce 'bab pa rgyan 'chang ngo/ /gzhan gyi lce 'bab bzlog pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad ba rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdza' bo bdag la sdad?
77b2(rgyud 'grel): ? ma rungs par byed pa'i las ni dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris la/ lte bar che ge mo mA ra ya dza zhes pa bri/ mu khyud la kA li/ rtsibs la khro bo lnga'i sngags bris la cho ga rdzogs par byas nas dur khrod du mnan mdza' bo sdang ba ma rungs par
77b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /sdug gu bdag la sdang ba dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na/ snying po bsdus pa la stong phrag lnga bzlas la dpral bar tsan dan gyi lcags kyu bri/ lag mthil du gi wang gi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa res bris la/ che ge mo'i nor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur cig
77b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes brjod pas dbang du 'gyur ro/ /skye bo gang sdang ba dur khrod du gsang ba'i sbyor ba lan bdun brjod na 'chi bar nges so/ /sdang ba gsum gyi las thor bu ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje
77b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bran dang bza' mi bsrung bar 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dur khrod kyi shing leb kyi steng du dkyil 'khor bzhengs la khri'i steng du bzhag la/ 'og tu chu'i snod chen po bzhag go /de'i shar du gang
77b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba de rnams khrus nas brten la bzhag la/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la mdud pa bor la mgul du gdags so/ /rgya shog la 'khor lo rtsibs lnga pa la shin tu bsdus pas 'khor lo gi wang gis bris la/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu
77b7(rgyud 'grel): gdags so/ /shar du kha bltas la phyag btsal ba dang/ de ltar lha dang nub dang byang rnams su phyag 'tshal du bcug la dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi chus brab pa dang/ brdeg pa dang/ 'thor 'thung byas la dkyil 'khor gyi 'og nas shar nas nub tu bton
78a1(rgyud 'grel): cing ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de 'od kyi phung po zhi bar 'dod na dkar po/ rgyas par 'dod na ser po/ dbang du 'dod na dmar po/ tshar bcad par 'dod na ljang gur bzhu/ lha rnams gshegs su gsol la 'od zer de gang bsrung
78a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i spyi gtsug tu bstims la/ de nyid kyang 'od kyi kha dog ci 'dra bar gzhu bar dmigs la/ phyogs skyong dang sgom rnams de nyid la mchod par dmigs so/ /de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs kyi
78a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhir 'gyur ro/ /bran dang gza' mi gdon gyis gtses pa bsrung ba'i cho ga chen mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mthun pa'i
78a4(rgyud 'grel): 'thab pa dang rtsod pa rnams zhi bar 'dod pas nags stug po'i khrod du song ste/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bzhi ba'i kha dog tu bzhengs la lha rnams spyan drangs pa dang/ bzhugs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste/ bkra shis bum pa
78a5(rgyud 'grel): la lha rnams dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bya ste/ bum pa de nyid la mchod cing bstod pa byas la snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la zhag bdun nam bcu gcig tu bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa skra brdzes la stod
78a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs gzar la/ sdigs mdzub bsgreng la g.yul 'gyed ba'i khrod de'i bar du phyin na g.yul 'gyes so/ /mi mthun pa'i sems can rnams la yungs kar la bzlas nas bton na mthun bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang mthun pa'i sems can
78a7(rgyud 'grel): la gnod bar sems pa las ka ra pi ra'i me tog la bzlas nas/ de'i gdong du gtor na gnod pa byas pa dang/ bsam pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dur ba la dur khrod kyi thal ba la bzlas nas gtor na 'phrog ma'i sems zhi bar 'gyur ro//
78b1(rgyud 'grel): mdza' bshes dang mdza' bo mi mthun pa la ni go la 'am shing gang yang rung pa la bzlas nas byin na mdza' zhing bcugs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po 'am yon tan can dang/ mi mthun pa la ni bya nag mo'i sgo nga dang/ mu zil bzlas la me byas la rlung
78b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su 'phyar ba tsam gyis mthun sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mi mthun pa zhi bar byed pa'i rtsi sbyor dbyig gi nor bu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa
78b3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor 'grib par 'gyur ba slar 'gugs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas shin tu ma phongs pa'i khyim nas blangs la zhing bzang po'i sa dang bsres la stegs bu bya ste thig btab la de nas mtshon dgye ba ni/ dbus
78b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po khyams gnyis dang sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya'o/ /lte bar rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i mtshan ma gdab bo/ /shar du rigs ldan bum pa lhor stobs bzangs kyi bcon/ nub tu mtshon chen gyi bse kha sbyor/ byang du rnam
78b5(rgyud 'grel): thos sras kyi dong tso bris la/ gtor ma bzhi/ bshos gtsang bzhi/ mar me bzhi/ bdug pa bzhi/ me tog bzhi/ dri'i dud chos bzhi bsham seng ldeng gi phur ba bzhi sgo bzhir btsugs la me tog gi phreng bas sbrel lo/ /tha mar rin po che sna tshogs pa dang
78b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bru sna tshogs pa'i chom bu dgod/ de'i phyi rim du shing me tog dang lo ma dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa sna tshogs pa btsugs te/ dkyil 'khor mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de'i phyi rim rnams su dri sna tshogs pa'i chag chag gdab ste/ rtswa ku shas 'khor bar dgram mo//
78b7(rgyud 'grel): steng du dar sna tshogs pa'i yol ba dang/ 'phyang ma 'phyang gis khebs par byas so/ /logs rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ris su bris pa dang/ 'bur du bstod pa dang lugs su blug pa la sogs 'khor bar dgram mo /de nas bza' 
79a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang btung ba dang myang ba dang/ bldag pa la sogs pa kha zas kyi bye brag ji ltar 'byor pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mdza' mar bzhag la/ mchod g.yog pa gnyis sam gsum gyis mchod brgyun ma chad par bya'o//
79a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon bdag bstod g.yogs pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang/ dbu rgyan la sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la ku sha'i steng du khrus bya/ rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan la 'khor dang bcas te bzhag go /de'i phyi logs na
79a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba'i stobs kyis g.yas skor du hUM zhes bgegs bskrad de nas log ste/ byang shar nas g.yon brkyang ba'i stobs kyis g.yon skor du oM badzra yak+Sha hUM hUM zhes brjod pas/ bdag dang yon bdag gi nor 'grib par byed pa'i bgegs de
79a4(rgyud 'grel): dpag tshad brjod kyis mi lang bar byed zhing dengs par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga zhag gsum du rgyun ma chad par bya/ bdag nyid kyi snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la ci nus su bzlas/ yon bdag gi sems bskyed pa dang/ sdig pa
79a5(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ 'dod pa'i don la sogs pa la gsol ba ci nus su byed du gzhug /de nas nub gsum gyi tha ma kha zas longs spyod pa dang/ yon bdag gza' bran 'khor dang bcas pa la dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams
79a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal la dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur ro/ /rnam thos sras la gtor ma chen po gcig byin la nor gyi bdag por mnga' gsol/ yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pas kyang/ byang phyogs kyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi bu 'khor dang
79a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas do nub nas bzung ba phan chod nor gyi bdag po mdzod la bdag cag gi nor dang zas mi 'grib par 'phel bar mdzad du gsol zhes dus la brjod do/ /de nas gtor ma btang sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang ldan pas btang ngo/ /de nas
79b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bkra shis gsol/ bsod nams kyi tshogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsag cing bla ma la yon dbul lo/ /nor 'grib pa dgang ba'i cho ga dpag bsam shing rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
79b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i las 'dod pa'i don thams cad rab tu sbyin pa longs spyod sgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par maN+Dal zlum po shin tu mnyam pa
79b3(rgyud 'grel): me long gi nges lta bur byas te/ kha dog sngon po khru do'i tshad tsam byas la de'i par bu sngon po gtso bo'i yi ges 'khor ba nang du tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po gser las bris pa dang/ ras sngon po la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la rab tu gnas pa
79b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la dar sna tshogs pas dril la de'i nang du gzhag go /spre'u'i snying gi nang du gser sa byung ma dang/ rin po che rnyed tshad dang/ sha sna rnyed tshad de maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhugs la glang po che'i spu dang/ spre'u'i spu bsgril ba'i gzungs thag gdags/ de'i steng
79b5(rgyud 'grel): du tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan gsal bar bsgom/ bdag nyid rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du byas la gzungs thag bzung la/ na mo rat na tra yA ya/ oM ga swAhA/ /zhes stong stong gzhan kyis bar mchod par bzlas shing tshogs
79b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bdag nyid la longs spyod ji ltar 'dod pa byin par bsam mo/ /yar ngo'i brgyad pa 'am/ yang na mar ngo'i brgyad pa la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma shin tu bzang po sha sna tshogs dang/ mar dang/ khur ba dang/ ro mchog sna tshogs dang ldan pas
79b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ gzhan gyis mthong du mi rung ngo/ /tshogs bdag gi bsgrub pa dbul ba'i gter sbyin zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa nor dang zas 'dod pa rnams kyi dam pa rdzogs so// //
80a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la stong phrag lnga bzlas nas bye ma la bzlas nas rgyal po'i
80a2(rgyud 'grel): gdong du gtor na rgyal po'i chad pa las thar par 'gyur ro/ /me'i 'jigs pa zhi bar 'dod na shing gcig gi drung du song ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa rdzogs par byas la snying po rgyas bsdus la snga ma ltar bzlas nas/ rke che la bzlas nas me la gtor
80a3(rgyud 'grel): na zhi? bar 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa las se byi'i sha phye mar btags pa las bzlas te phog par gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gcan zan khro bos 'jigs pa rnams la stag gi spu la bzlas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mkha' 'gro mas 'jigs
80a4(rgyud 'grel): na ce spyad gi khrag dang bsres nas bdag gi lus mgo mjug du byugs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gdug pas 'dzin na/ mu zi dang glang rtsil bzlas nas mgul du btags na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dug gis 'jigs na rma bya'i khris pa dang/ bu khye'u'i
80a5(rgyud 'grel): ro tshon dang sbal pa bse ru'i sha la bzlas nas lto stong la sbu zos na/ de'i 'og tu rang gi dri chu 'thungs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa brgyad las thar ba'i sgrub pa sbal ba'i ga'u zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs
80a6(rgyud 'grel): so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zag gza' dan pa'i dus las zlog par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
80a7(rgyud 'grel): su bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ kha dog sngon po gtso bo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bzhag la/ de la gtso bo'i bsnyen pa brgya phul la bzhag go /dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams su phur pa brgyad la dar dmar po'i cod pan btags la khro bo
80b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad du bskyed la bzhag go /mar me la sogs pas gtso bo dang gza' brgyad mchod do/ /gza'i gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad phyogs gtor dang bgegs gtor yang bsham mo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas rnams su bag zan la gza'i gzugs
80b2(rgyud 'grel): byas la tshon gyis bsgyur la bzhag /de dag re re'i mdun du sbrang rtsi dang/ 'o ma la sogs spyan gzigs kyis kyang 'khor bar bzhag go /khyams rnams su rgyu skar gyi gzugs byas la bzhag go /de nas gtso bo la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la/
80b3(rgyud 'grel): gza' rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs te/ tshigs bcad kyis kyang spyan drang ba 'di skad do/ /hUM hUM hUM rnam dag ri rab legs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /gza' brgyad rgyu skar 'khor dang bcas pa spyan 'dren na/ /sngon gyi dam tshig dbang gis
80b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /e hi hi dza(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin mi mnyam rnam dag gzhal yas la/ /mnyes par bris shing spras pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /gza' chen 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs su gsol/ /sa ma yA hUM zhes so/ /so so'i snying po brgya rtsa
80b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bzlas so/ /sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams gsal bar bsgoms la/ mchod pa dbul ba ni/ hUM phyogs bcu kun nas rnam dag rdzas kyi mchog /mdzes par bltams pa'i yon chab 'di/ /gza' rnams 'khor dang bcas la dbul//
80b6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /phyogs bcu mdzes par bltams pa'i me tog 'di/ /snang gsal 'di/ gza' rnams/ gdug /sbos/ gshos gtsang/ sil snyan/ gza' rnams dam tshig dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /de nas gza' rnams
80b7(rgyud 'grel): la bstod cing gtor ma dbul ba ni/ /hUM shar phyogs gza' chen pa ba sangs/ /sku mdog dmar po mdzes pa la/ /na bza' dang dkar stod g.yogs can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag mtshan phyag na spu gri bsnams/ /de la bstod cing 
81a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma 'bul/ /hUM lho phyogs gza' chen phur bu ni/ /sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa la/ /glog gi phreng ba'i 'khor yug can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ser po dar gyi stong g.yogs can/ /phyag mtshan phyag
81a2(rgyud 'grel): na glegs baM bsnams/ /zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /nub phyogs gza' chen zla ba ni/ /sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa la/ /na bza' dar dmar stod g.yogs can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag
81a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /ngang? pa dag la zhon pa la/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /byang phyogs gza' chen lag pa ni/ /sku mdog ser po mdzes pa la/ /na bza' zangs kyi thor cog gsol/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan phyag mtshan phyag
81a4(rgyud 'grel): ? gri? bsnamS sprul gyi steng nang ? pa la de la bstod? de gtor ma 'bul/ /lha chen gza' chen sgra gcan 'dzin/ /sku mdog dung kha mdzes pa la/ /na bza' sprul gyi bskyed bcings nas/ /mgo lus thams cad mig gis khengs/ /phyag mtshan phyag na mda' gzhu 'gyengs//
81a5(rgyud 'grel): ? smad sprul du 'khyil pa la/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /nub byang gza' chen nyi ma ni/ /sku mdog dmar po mdzes pa la/ /na bza' thog lcags gu zu can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag mtshan phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /rta'i steng na
81a6(rgyud 'grel): zhon? pa la/ /de la bstong de gtor ma 'bul/ /byang shar gza' chen spen pa ni/ /sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa la/ /na bza' dar dmar thul ba gsol/ /rin chen mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag mtshan phyag na ral gri bsnams/ /'brug gi steng na
81a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa la/ /de la bstong de gtor ma 'bul/ /gza' chen 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te/ /so so'i rgyu skar 'khor bcas la/ /me tog gtor ma gus pas 'bul/ /'di dag so sor bsnams nas ni/ /las 'di'i 'bras bu grub par mdzod/ /ces
81b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dbul/ /phyogs skyong dang bgegs rnams la yang bstod cing gtor ma dbul lo/ /gza' ngan pa bzlog pa'i cho ga rgya mtsho sprin zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par
81b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang dag gza' rnams kyis zin pa las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bris la/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su chu dang khrag dang 'o ma bsres pas snod zangs
81b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bkang la/ gza' gang gis zin pa'i gzugs bag zan la zhi dkar sa'i phye ma bsres pa la khru gang pa tshon sna tshogs pas ri mo dang/ thig ler byas la bzhag go /de'i lus rnams ltas ngan sna tshogs pa'i spu dang/ stag gzigs gi
81b4(rgyud 'grel): ras? dang/ snyug ma gtsang ma la gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan kyang phyar ro/ /de nas gzugs de chu'i steng du khri byas la dar dmar po'i yol ba bres la bzhag go /dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad/ spos
81b5(rgyud 'grel): dang mar me dang bshos dang ldan pa bsham mo/ /stag pa 'am shug pa khru gang pa gcig la khram nyi shu rtsa gcig bstod la/ rma bya'i sgro dang bal tshon dang/ dar tshon lnga yis byas pas gzas zin pa'i lus mgo mjug bya ba ste/ chu dang gzugs la
81b6(rgyud 'grel): bstim mo /sngags pa gtsang sbra ldan pas dmar po'i gos gyon mgo la dmar po'i thod bcings la/ me long lnga btsugs la gza' gang giS zin pa'i snying po la 'bum phrag gcig khram shing la btab la khram phyis byang bkrol shad gtor zhes brjod cing nang pa'i
81b7(rgyud 'grel): lus las gza'i sgo'i ngos su bya ste/ gzugs la bstim/ gtor ma tshar gyin gza' la mchod pa dang/ bstod pa bya/ lhag ma bdun pa'i snying po la snying po stong phrag re chu la bzlas shing gzas zin pa'i lus la byab bo/ /dpung shig tshogs khyed dar?
82a1(rgyud 'grel): brtul/ dmag? song zhes brjod brab po/ /de nas 'dru mar dang rtso mar la sogs pa ? tshang la snying po rgyal bsdus gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nang pa'i lus mgo mjug tu bsku bsnye bya'o/ /de ltar lan cig las ma grol
82a2(rgyud 'grel): na nyis dang gsum dang bdun byas na gza' zin pa las mi grol mi srid do/ /de nas chu rung su bcas pa de rgya mtsho chen po'i gling? ngam/ ri brgyad 'dus pa'i rtse mo la pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pas bskyal lo/ /gtor ma brgyad po la
82a3(rgyud 'grel): yang phyogs mtshams ma nor bar btang/ de ltar phyogs ma nor bar btang/ de ltar cho ga rdzogs par byas nas gzas zin pa la yang gong gi gza' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur na/ dus thams cad du gza' rnams kyi dmag dpon du 'gyur? ro/ /
82a4(rgyud 'grel): gal te gza' gang gis zin pa'i dus ma phye na gza' brgyad car gyi gzugs byas la bsnyen pa 'bul phrag re bskyal la snga ma ltar bya'o/ /gza'i gdon las grol bar byed pa'i cho ga rin po che grol byed ces bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa
82a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'thoms? pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gza' rnams kyi las grub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bris la seng ldeng gi phung bu brgyad la gza' brgyad kyi
82a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po so sor bris la/ rtse mo la dug khrag gis byugs la so so'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gtor ma brgyad sha sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs kyi bsham mo/ /dbus su gtso bo'i bum pa la yab yum gyi mtshan ma btab pa snying po bsdus ba lan brgya
82a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad bzlas la sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal bar bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu'i gzugs 'dra ba byung ste/ gza' so so'i snying ga nas bzung ste rnal 'byor pa'i las kyi mdza' grub par gyis shig par mnga' gsol/ de nas gza'
82b1(rgyud 'grel): mchu 'grol ba la sogs pa gang byed pa la bsnyen pa brgya bzlas/ mchod bstod bya/ de nas sngags pa bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi nas rgyud rdzogs pa sum brgya blag ste/ brgya tshigs kyi mchod bstod bya zhing/ gtso bo yab yum la bdag nyid kyis ji ltar
82b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ de nas gza' brgyad kyi las ji ltar byed pa'i don khas blangs la gtor ma btang zhing rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzhung gi las la sbyar na 'grub par gdon mi za'o/ /gza' brgyad kyi las na grub pa rnamS grub par byed pa'i cho ga
82b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod? pa rab tu ci? ba zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dbang? rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu skar ngan pa zlog par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gnas khang yid? dang
82b4(rgyud 'grel): mthun bar dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la/ rgyu skar rnams thangs? dbab pa'i chog ni/ gtor ma dang mchod pa'i bye brag lha 'grangs dang mnyam par bsham par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gru bzhi dang dmar po'i gdugs dbub/ de'i nang du gza' brgyad kyi
82b5(rgyud 'grel): ? gnyis gnyis bzhang/ /bag zan la rgyu skar rnams kyis gzugs te/ /so so'i sku mdog dang mthun pa'i tshan gyis sgyur/ rgyu skar re re la ngar blung 'theb gang pa bcu gsum bcu gsum gyis bskor/ de nas kyang tshon sna tshogs pas bsgyur? ro/ /gtor
82b6(rgyud 'grel): ma re re'i nang du lta ba shos? de bya'o/ /de ltar byas la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sngags dang phyag rgyas gong ltar spyan drangs la ye shes sems dpa' dang gnyis su med par bstims la/ gtso bo la mchod bstod ci rigs par byas la de nas gza' rnams la
82b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ mchod pa lnga dbul de nas rgyu skar rnams ri rab kyi ngos la spyan drangs te/ hUM ri rab chen po'i ngos dag? nas/ /dus tshod kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /rgyu skar tshogs dang dmag dpung bcas/ /btsun mo g.yog 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /spyan 'dren mchog?
83a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'dir gshegs shig /a pra ti ha ta hUM/ de nas rgyu skar re re la mchod pa lnga lnga phul la/ brtan par bzhug par bya'o/ /de nas rgyu skar gyi tshogs la bstod de/ gtor ma dbul lo/ /'dir sngags ci rigs par bzlas so/ /
83a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bstod pa ni/ hUM shar phyogs skar ma smin drug ni/ /zhal gcig? pa la spyan yang drug /phyag stong 'od zer mdza' yas pa/ /sku mdog dkar la rin chen brgyan/ /phyag stong phyag na mdud dmar rnams/ /zhal nas bdud rtsa'i rgyun 'bab pa/ chibs su khyi
83a3(rgyud 'grel): ? mdzes pa chings/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /snar ma las kyi lha skar ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na mda' mo che/ /rin chen sna tshogS
83a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chi bas su nya la bcings pa la/ /tshigs gnyis 'gre /chu bdag rgyu skar mgo bo ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dkar smug 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na 'khor lo bsnamS/
83a5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su sre mo/ de la/ skar ngan/ lag pa kun tu rgyu ba ni/ /zhal gcig sku mdog ljang skya ni/ /phyag stong phyag na bdun shing bsnams/ /rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su sram la/ de la/ skar ngan/ bra? nye skar ma nabs so ni/
83a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig /sku mdog dkar la/ phyag stong phyag na phug /rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su ba lang/ de la/ skar ngan/ nyes pa spangs pa'i bkra shis rgyal/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog dkar ser/ phyag stong phyag na ral gri /rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs
83a7(rgyud 'grel): su khyud pa/ de la/ skar ngan/ shar smad rgyu skar skag ces pa zhal gcig /sku mdog sngo la/ phyag stong phyag na rnga yab/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su rta la/ de la/ skar ngan/ lho stod ngos kyi skar ma mchu/ zhal gcig /phyag stong phyag na med pung/
83b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su bya dkar/ de la/ skar ngan/ dre ni ma rungs las ston pa/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog sngo skya/ phyag stong phyag na chu rgyun 'bebs/ /rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su glang po che la/ de la/ skar ngan/ sbo ni mi sdug cho 'phrul can/ zhal
83b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig /sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag stong phyag nas dkyil/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su stag la/ de la/ skar ngan/ tsha ba las spyod me bzhi ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog dkar la/ phyag stong phyag na rlung 'dzin pa/ /rin chen/ zhal nas/ rin chen khri stengs bzhugs pa
83b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /de la/ skar ngan/ 'jigs pa chen po'i nag pa ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog gnag la/ phyag stong phyag na rgyal mtshan/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su g.yag rog /de la/ skar ngan/ dregs chen 'joms pa'i sa ri ni/ zhal gcig /sku mdog ser la/ phyag
83b4(rgyud 'grel): stong phyag na sbud pa/ rin chen zhal nas/ gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /de la/ skar ngan/ kun tu nyul ba'i sa ga ni/ zhal gcig sku mdog dud kha/ phyag stong phyag na rdo ljong/ /rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su sprul la/ de la/ skar ngan/ nub stod lha mtshamS
83b5(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid 'bar/ /zhal gcig sku mdog dmar la/ phyag stong phyag na rin chen/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su glog la/ de la/ skar ngan/ sa bog dbang po khron skyes ni/ zhal gcig /sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag stong phyag na bso'i? ga'u bsnams/ /rin chen/
83b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal nas/ chibs su dred la/ de la/ skar ngan/ pho nya'i las tshogs bsrungs chen ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog dmar ser/ phyag stong phyag na dngul phreng/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su rlung la/ de la/ skar ngan/ skyob pa chen mo'i chu steng ni/ zhal gcig/
83b7(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sngon po/ phyag stong phyag na zhags pa/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su 'brug la/ de la/ skar ngan/ chu smad khyab pa chen po ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog ljan sngon/ phyag stong phyag na ba dan/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su ce spyang/ de la/ skar ngan/
84a1(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og dbang ba khron skyes pa ni/ zhal gcig /sku mdog smug po/ phyag stong phyag na lcags kyu/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su seng ge /de la/ skar ngan/ srong la rku mkhas byi zhun ni/ zhal gcig /sku mdog dmar ljang
84a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag stong phyag na yol ba 'dzin/ /rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su wa/ de la/ skar ngan/ byang stong dbang ba mon gru ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog ljang khu la/ /phyag stong phyag na seng ge /rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su dom la/ de la/ skar ngan/
84a3(rgyud 'grel): stong 'joms pa ste mon dre ni/ zhal gcig /sku mdog mthing kha 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na wa seng/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su sbrin la/ de la/ skar ngan/ 'jigs pa'i las mkhan khrums stod ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog ljang ser/
84a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag stong phyag na byi la/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su dang pa dag la bcibs/ /de la/ skar ngan/ bstan pa'i las byed khrums smad ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog ljang sngon/ phyag stong phyag na glang sngon/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su ral/
84a5(rgyud 'grel): de la skar ngan/ bar snang dbang ba'i naM gru ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog mthing skya la/ /phyag stong phyag na bya rgod/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su bum pa/ de la/ skar ngan/ dpung ldan rags pa tha skar ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog ljang dmar/ phyag stong
84a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag na ri skegs/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su rnga mo bcibs/ /de la/ skor ngan/ nyes pa ston pa'i bra nye ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dus ser 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na rma bya bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/
84a7(rgyud 'grel): zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su spal pa khra bo bcibs/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod// //phyogs dang mtshams su 'gro ba la/ /'od dang kha dog yang dag ldan/ /'gro ba'i
84b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phel 'grib byed pa ste/ /rgyu skar chen po dpal ldan gzigs/ /so so'i g.yog 'khor bcas pa la/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes/ /las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /ces gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la gzugs dang bcas pa'i ri rtse la bskyal
84b2(rgyud 'grel): po/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsag /dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing/ yon bdag bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir lha mo brgyad kyi bkra shis sam/ /rigs lnga'i 'am/ lha mo bzhi'i bkra shis sam/ /gsum gyi bkra shis gang mos pas bkra shis
84b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /bgegs dang phyogs skyod gi gtor ma btang la/ /bgegs dang dbral ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /las dang las kyi bye brag gang 'dod pa'i dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas yi ge brgya pas bshags so/ /rnal 'byor pa'i tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba'i cho ga /'dud rtsi'i
84b4(rgyud 'grel): sprin zhes bya ba rgyas bsdus gang mos la bya'o/ /de nas yon bdag rnams khrus naS? gdon no/ /rgyu skar ngan pa bzlog par byed pa'i cho ga /dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
84b5(rgyud 'grel): skar ma rgyu ba rnams kyi las sna tshogs sgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rnal 'byor sngon du song ba zhi pI las byed par 'dod pas me bzhi la bya'o/ /rgyas pa'i las la rgyal/ dbang gi las khrums smad la/ drag shul
84b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyi las byed phar 'dod pas nag pa la bya'o/ /bskrad par 'dod pas lag la/ dbye bar 'dod pas sa ril/ bkar bar 'dod pas gro zhun la/ rmugs par 'dod pas mon dre la/ rengs bar 'dod pas nabs so la/ skrag par 'dod pas smin drug la/ 'gugs? par
84b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas byi tshun? la/ 'jil par 'dod pas snar ma la 'khrug?  par 'dod pas bra nye la/ rgyal bar 'dod pas lha mtshams la/ dpung dang ldan par 'dod pas/ sa'i las byed par 'dod pas khrums stong la/ chu'i las byed par 'dod pas chu stod la/ me'i las byed 
85a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pas nam gru la/ rlung gi las byed par 'dod pas mchu la/ sa'i sde pham par 'dod na khrums la/ chu'i sde pham par 'dod na khrums la/ chu'i sde pham par 'dod na chu smad la/ me yi sde 'pham par 'dod na sbo la/ rlung gi sde 'pham par 'dod na sa ga
85a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ ma grub pa grub par 'dod pa mon gru la/ grub pa chud mi za bar byed pa tha skar la/ 'dod pa'i don rab tu sbyin par 'dod pas bre la bya'o/ /bsgrub bya phung bar byed pas 'dod pas skag la/ nor sgrub par 'dod pas snron la bya'o/ /gzhan 'jig rten pa'i
85a3(rgyud 'grel): legs pa sna tshogs sgrub par 'dod pas rgyal la bya'o/ /pha rol la nyams pa sna tshogs btang bar 'dod pas bra nye la bya'o/ /de ltar dmag drang bar 'dod pa dang/ nor rnyed par 'dod pa dang/ tshong rgyal bar 'dod pas snubs? la bya'o/ /rtsa ra dang rkun ma'i
85a4(rgyud 'grel): las grub par 'dod pas tha skar la bya'o/ /'jigs pa brgyad las thar bar 'dod na mon gru la bya'o/ /bgegs bzlog pa dang mi mthong ba dang/ pha rol gyi dpung bzlog par 'dod pas lha mtshams la bya'o/ /skra bkru ba dang/ khrus byed pa dang/ dpal
85a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang/ rgyal sar 'don pa dang/ tshong bzang bar 'dod pas rgyal la/ bag ma btang ba dang/ skra bkru ba dang/ khrus byed pa dang/ gos dang sa bon 'debs par 'dod pas lag la/ ston mo dang/ 'du ba sdud pa dang/ mdun ma dang gros legs par
85a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas nam? so la bya'o/ /gzhan gnyen sbyor dang mkhar lan dang/ nyo ba dang/ mkho ba'i las gang yang grub par 'dod pas me bzhi la bya'o/ /de ltar na nye ba ston pa'i las sna tshogs la yang mkhas par spyad par bya'o/ /de ltar rgyu skar rnams dus nges pa
85a7(rgyud 'grel): las ma 'khrul bar byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub pa la the tshom med do/ /de'i phyir na rgyu skar rnams ni bzang po yin zhes bya'o/ /de nas so so'i phyogs kyi gza' rnams dang btub par nges par 'grub pa yin no/ /de ltar rgyu skar 'di dag gis ni legs pa
85b1(rgyud 'grel): dang nyes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi 'khrul 'khor sna tshogs ston pas gtso che'o/ /rgyu skar rnams kyi las sna tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa dus 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par
85b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol gyi byang stems las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dur khrod kyi ras la khyi nag po'i khrag gis 'khor lo rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris te/ lte bar che ge staM b+ha ya bri/ rtsibs rnams la khro bo bcu'i
85b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags nang du bstan pa bri/ mu khyud nang ma la A li mgo nang du bstan pa bri/ phyi ma la kA li mgo nang du bstan pa bris la bdag nyid kha lho phyogs su bstan pa bris la/ bdag nyid kha lho phyogs su bltas la /'khor lo rab tu gnas pa byas la/ khro bo bcu'i
85b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa stong brag lnga bzlas la/ de nas g.yul gyes pa'i sa dang/ dur khrod kyi sa dang/ grog mkhar gyis dang/ phung shul gyi sa la mchod rten khru gang pa rim pa lnga byas la/ de'i nang du yang gro kha la ling ga bris la lce phyir phyung la lce la dug gi phur pa rgya
85b5(rgyud 'grel): mdung nub par btab la/ che ge mo'i byang kha rnams bzlog /byol staM pa ya hUM hUM hUM zhes pas mdza' ma bskor/ mchod rten gyi bre'i nang du gzhug go /bdag nyid kyi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum pa brus la nang dur khrod kyi sol bas byugs la/ 'khor lo de phur bu bcu
85b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis brgyangs la de'i steng du nas nag mo dang/ sran ma dang/ yungs nag rnams bkram la/ de'i steng du mchod rten mgo mjug zlog la bzhag go /de nas nang rnams su dug shing gis tsher mas dgang ngo/ /kha dur khrod kyi g.yam pa la ri rab gling bzhi dang bcas
85b7(rgyud 'grel): pas mnan no/ /de nas lham 'dod? dang/ yugs sa mo'i zhabs ma bting las bdag las bdag gi zhal dbyung ngo/ /bdag nyid nyal ba'i tshe/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra che ge mo'i byan stems sha truM hUM hUM zhes khro bo bcu'i sngags la btags la/ ji ltar 'grub pa 'am/ ma chag par
86a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas so/ /dus bzhi gtor ma chung ba bcu phyogs bcur 'phang zhing khro bo bcu la smod btsugs cing mnyes pa'i rabs brjod/ 'jig rten gyi lha 'dre rnams la dam bdar zhing dpang gzugs la/ phyogs rnams su seng ldeng phur bu re la khro bo
86a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sngags bris la dpal che ge mo'i byad stems mA ra ya bzlog song byol/ zhes bris la bdag nyid kyi gnas khang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ steng 'og tu gdab po/ /phur bu de dag kyang khro bo bcur mnga' gsol la gtor ma re btang/ nya stong la phur
86a3(rgyud 'grel): bu gzi brjid bskyed do/ /gtor ma btang ba'i dus su yungs kar dang dug sna la sngags bzlas la phyogs mtshams su gtor ro/ /dur khrod du yang skabs su mnan pa bya'o/ /skabs su gtor ma dang bsgrub bya'i ling ga chu la bskur ro/ /skabs su me la
86a4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg go /de ltar byas pas gdon thams cad kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /byad stems thams cad rbod gtong byed pa de nyid rang la nges par bzlog par nges so/ /byang stems thams cad gcod pa dang/ phur kha thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir bzlog
86a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzongs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa'i sems can la phan thogs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig
86a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas/ klu chen po brgyad mchod par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bzhengs la ral gri dang/ mda' rnams kyi tha ma bskor la dbus su gtso bo'i bum pa btsugs la gzungs thag gi gdags/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi steng du klu so so'i
86a7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan bkod pa dang/ so so'i gtor ma dkar gsum mngar gsum dang/ rtsi sman sna tshogs dang ldan pa yang bsham/ dkon mchog dang klu rnams mchod pa'i lha bshos dang/ mar me la sogs pa mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byor pa rnams bsham
86b1(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /phyogs skyong dang bgegs rnams la gtor ma bsham zhing btang ngo/ /de nas klu chen po rnams so so'i gnas su spyan drang ba ni/ hUM rgya mtsho yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /mdza' yas 'jog po karko Ta/ /u li ka dang nor rgyas dang/ /pad+ma dang ni ba su
86b2(rgyud 'grel): na/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas/ /btsun mo rnams kyi mgul nas 'khyud/ /yab yum sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /'dir gshegs spyan 'dren mchod par 'bul/ oM phu na swAhA sa ma yA/ de nas bstod cing gtor ma 'bul ba ni/ hUM shar phyogs
86b3(rgyud 'grel): klu rgyal mdza' yas ni/ /sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang/ /sprul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /sprul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi'o/ /lho
86b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs klu rgyal 'jog po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smang sbrul/ /su mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang/ /sprul mgo bdun gyi gdengs kha can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de
86b5(rgyud 'grel): la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /nub phyogs klu dbang karko Ta/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog dmar la/ phyag /spyi gtsug /sbrul mgo /de la/ byang phyogs u li ka /zhal gcig /sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag/ spyi gtsug /sprul mgo /sbrul dang/ de la/ shar lhor
86b6(rgyud 'grel): klu rgyal nor rgyas ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog /ser skya/ phyag/ spyi gtsug /sprul mgo /sbrul dang/ de la/ lho nub klu rgyal dung skyod ni/ /zhal gcig /sku mdog sngo skya/ phyag /spyi gtsug /sprul mgo /sprul dang/ de la/ byang shar klu rgyal ba su na/ /zhal
86b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig /sku mdog dmar sngo/ phyag/ spyi gtsug /sprul mgo /sbrul dang/ de la/ so so'i yum gyi sku mdog ni/ /rang rang yab dang mthun pa la/ /rin chen phreng ba'i do shal can/ /g.yas g.yon yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud/ /kha rlangs dug tu 'khyil bar
87a1(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /de lang? de dag so so'i sras rnams ni/ /sku mdog 'di 'dra ma nges te/ mdzes shing sdug gu 'ong 'bar ba/ /la la chu srin kha nas 'byung/ /de bzhin sprul dang spal pa dang/ /chu glang chu rta kha nas 'byung/ /sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i
87a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rnams la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod par bgyid/ /gzhan yang klu bran 'bum gyi tshogs/ /byol song gzugs brnyan sna tshogs ston/ /'dab chags dang ni ltos 'gro dang/ /rkang mang dang ni rkang med dang/ /sdig srin gzugs brnyan sten pa la/ /
87a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing bstod nas gtor ma 'bul/ /bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu rnams /ji ltar 'dod pa ji bzhin du/ /khyed kyi 'dod don grub par mdzod/ /ces klu brgyad kyi snying po brgya rtsa bzlas la/ gtor ma btang zhing snying po rgyas bsdus kyi bum pa'i khrus bya'o/ /de nas
87a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing bkra shis gsol lo/ /klu chen po brgyad mchod pas/ mi bzad pa'i nad yams drag po las thar bar byed pa/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag
87a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /klu chen po rnams bsgrubs te mi bzad pa ci cI dzwa la'i nad las thar bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang dan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pa bzhin bshams la/ gtso bo'i bsnyen pa ci rigs par bzlas
87a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ mthod? pa dang bstod pa bya/ de nas klu chen po rang bzhin gyi gnas nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du spyan drangs la/ de la mchod pa dbul lo/ /de nas klu brgyad kyi gtor ma la baM las ye shes kyi chu rgyun babs te snga ma ltar phul la/ de nas
87a7(rgyud 'grel): klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor de bdag nyid rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas lag mthil gnyis su bsgoms pas/ de nas kha sbyar te phud ces pa lan 'bum bzlas te/ klu rnams la 'o ma rtsi sman sna tshogs pas mchod cing/ dug thams cad byung?
87b1(rgyud 'grel): zhig ces sman gyis mchod pa rgyas pas dbul lo/ /de ltar bsten pa rdzogs nas sgrub pa dngos ni klu chen po brgyad la sogs pa bag zan la klu'i gzugs sna tshogs pa byas te/ btsag rams la sogs pa bsgyur la kham phor kha sbyar du bcug ste/
87b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsi sman dang/ 'o ma dang ldan pas klu brgyad kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod stod pa ci rigs par byas la gang 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa sa'i gting du sra'o/ /de ltar byas pas klu rnams kyis legs par steng bar 'gyur ro/ /klu sgrub
87b3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dbyig sdug ces bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu rnams kyi gdon las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma
87b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bris la/ gtso bo'i bum pa la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsangs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag de nas bag zan la klu chen po brgyad kyi gzugs sor bzhi pa thal mo sbyar ba tshen gyis bsgyur te/ so so'i gnas su bum pa la kha bstan la
87b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su sprul nag po brgyad/ rtsangs pa dmar po brgyad/ spal pa ser po brgyad/ sdig pa sngon po brgyad/ nya ljang gu brgyad/ lcang mo dmar po brgyad/ rdom? nag po brgyad/ bya dkar mo brgyad/ glang dmar po
87b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ chu srin sngon po brgyad/ ra dkar mo brgyad/ sram sngo skya brgyad/ rta smug mo brgyad/ sgo bzhir/ shar du stag skya'o/ /lhor seng ge mgo can/ cub tu ba lan gi mgo can/ byang du byi la'i mgo can phyogs kyi kha dog dang mthun pa'o/ /mu khyud kyi steng du klu brgyad kyi
87b7(rgyud 'grel): chung ma ral pa can/ mdog khra bo brgyad bzhag go /mu ran rnams su byol song gi gzugs sna tshogs la tshon sna tshogs pas bsgyur la bzhag go /srog chags de dag ni gtsol bka' nyan pa'i tshul gyis blta'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su kham
88a1(rgyud 'grel): bong? gtsang ma'am/ rin po che'i snod du ba dmar mo'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang/ ka ra dang gu ram la sogs te/ mngar rnams dang/ na ga ge sar la sogs pa'i klu sman sna tshogs blugs te/ dar ljang khus phub la bzhag go /klu'i gtor ma nyi shu rtsa gcig
88a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gtor dang/ bgegs btor kyang gzhan dang mthun par bsag go /rin po che dang bal chon sna tshogs pa yang sogs su dbul lo/ /de nas dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): klu rnams gzugs brnyan la bcug ste de dag mchod par bya'o/ /me long gi nang du gzugs brnyan gsal bar byas
88a3(rgyud 'grel): la nad pa'i lus la rma byas byabs te/ me long gi gzugs brnyan dang dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas la 'o ma sbreng zhing skabs su dug 'don pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /snga ma bzhin bstod cing snying po bzhin tu bsdus pa'i gsham la klu brgyad kyi snying po bzlas so/ /de ltar brgya sor zhing chu?
88a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la sman dbul ba ni/ /kwa ye klu chen brgyad po tshur nyon dang/ /nga ni rdo rje rnams 'joms te/ /rig sngags grub pas yas ngor ste/ /klu rnams da yi bka' la nyon/ /nga yi bka' la mi nyan? na? /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'dis/ /klu yi snying la me sbar nas/ /mgo lus bye mas
88a5(rgyud 'grel): bsreg par byed/ /de bsang yi bka' nyon cig /hUM/ gdug pa'i nad pa'i nan rnams gdon ba'i phyir/ /klu rgyal rnams la mchod par 'bul/ /nag go sar bdud rtsi 'bul/ /nag pus pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /rgya mtsho sku ba'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /gla gor zho sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /
88a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhal? ma'o? sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /snying zho sha yi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /pu shel rtse yi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /kat+tha? ka ri'i bdung rtsi 'bul/ /mkhal sran the'i? bdud rtsi 'bul/ /bcu gang dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /gur gum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /'un? bu dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /
88a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang po lag pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /chu srin sder mo'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /rdo rgyus dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /thal ka rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /mngar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /zhes brjod cing klu rnams kyi snying po bgya tshor re
88b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ de nas klu gso ba'i cho ga ni/ hUM nag ge sar sman phul bas/ /klu yi klang nad sos gyur cig /klu yi klo nang sos gyur cig /na ga spus pa'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi mchin nang sos gyur cig /rgya mtsho sbu pa'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi dbugs nang sos gyur cig /gla gor zho
88b2(rgyud 'grel): sha'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi klang nad sos gyur cig /mkhal ma zho sha'i bdud rtsi yis/ /klu yi mkhal nad sos gyur cig /snying zho sha yi sman phul bas/ /klu yi snying nad sos gyur cig /spu shel rtse yi sman phul bas/ /klu yi spangs nad sos gyur cig /kaN+Ta ka ri'i sman
88b3(rgyud 'grel): pul bas/ /klu yi rkang nad sos gyur cig /mkhan spen? khra po'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi kha nad sos gyur cig /bcu gang dkar po'i sman phul bas/ /lu yi so nang sos gyur cig /gur kum dag gi sman phul bas/ /klu yi rgyu nang sos gyur cig /'o ma bu dag gi sman phul bas//
88b4(rgyud 'grel): klu yi khor nad sos gyur cig /dbang po lag pa'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi yan lag sos gyur cig /chu srin sder mo'i sman phul pas/ /klu yi sems nad sos gyur cig /rdo rgyus dkar po'i sman phul bas/ /klu'i chu rgyus nyams pa sos gyur cig /thal ka rdo rje'i
88b5(rgyud 'grel): sman phul bas/ /klu yi gsang nad sos gyur cig /dkar gsum bdud rtsi phul ba yis klu yi gzi mdangs nyams pa sos gyur cig /mngar gsum bdud rtsi phul ba yis/ /klu rnams lus shed rdzogs gyur cig /ces sman gyis lus nang rnams bsal nas/ klu'i skrag
88b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyung zhing gdon las dgrol ba'i chog mi /me long gi dkyil 'khor la rtsi mchod dbul ba ni/ rma byas dug byab cing 'di skad do/ /hUM nag ge sar sman gyi mchog /na ga ge sar 'di phul bas/ /klu yi nang rnams sos gyur cig /klu yi nad rnams sos pa bzhin/ /mi yi
88b7(rgyud 'grel): nad rnams sos gyur cig /klu yi nad rnams sos nas kyang/ klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig /klu rnams mdangs dang ldan nas kyang/ /mi rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig /klu rnams mdangs dang ldan nas kyang/ /klu yi dug rnams phyir phyungs shig /dug 'di sa'i nang? 
89a1(rgyud 'grel): du song/ /reg pa'i dug rnams phyir phyungs shig /kha rlangs dug rnams phyir phyungs shig /dug rnams sa yi nang du song/ /de bzhin chu dang me dang rlung/ /'byung ba bzhi la dug song zhig /ces brjod cing phung phung ces dug gi rlangs pa sngon dmar
89a2(rgyud 'grel): du byung zhing/ rma byas byabs? la me long la bstim mo/ /sman kun la tshig de kun sbyar/ de ltar snying po stong tshar zhing de ltar gdon dgrol gyi cho ga tshig tu brjod cing dug gdon no/ /nad pa'i lus mgo gzhug tu smag shad kyi lcags ma 'am/ bal bo se'u'i lcugs mas brdeg go
89a3(rgyud 'grel): rma dang shu ba yod pa rnams la khrus bya'o/ /de nas klu rnams la gtor ma rgya chen po btang ngo/ /bgegs dang phyogs skyong rnams la yang gtor ma btang ngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gzugs dang bcas pa de chu klung chen po 'am/ yang na sa'i gter du spa'o/ /de nas tshe
89a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur cing bkra shis gsol/ khrus bya zhing snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlos su gzhug /mi shigs ba lus thams cad rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs la bzhag go /klu'i gdon las grol bar byed pa sprul 'dzin gsang ba zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad
89a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdon bsrung bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam 'joms pa'i nga rgyal dang dus thams
89a6(rgyud 'grel): cad du mi 'bral bar byas te/ rgyal po'i rigs kyi gdon gyis zin pa la rgyud rdzogs pa la 'bang par bya zhing rtag tu khrus bya'o/ /rje'u'i rigs la snying po bsdus pa la 'bad par bya zhing rtag tu dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa la snying po bsdus
89a7(rgyud 'grel): pa la 'bad pa bya zhing rtag tu sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /rmang?  rigs kyi gdon gyis zin? pa la rgyud 'khrug pa bzlas shing / 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhug cing dbang bskur ba'o/ /rdol pa'i nad kyis zin pa rnams la ni rgyud dum bur bzlas shing gdon dgrol gyi chog rtag tu
