110b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod de dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje stong pa nyid las paM las a mi de bar bskyed/ bkug la mchod de gyur pa las rdo rjer byas la sbyin no/ /oM badzra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi zhes pas lag tu sbyin no/ /de nas dril bu stong pa nyid las don yod grub
110b4(rgyud 'grel): par bskyed pa dang/ bkug la mchod de slar dril bur byas la/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu gtong la/ oM a ti pa ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi zhes bdag po'i dbang sbyin no/ /de nas dril bu gnyis slob ma'i mgor bsnol te gzhag nas/ ming gi dbang rnam par snang
110b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi rang bzhin chos kyi rnam par snang ba'i bdag nyid sbyin par bya ste/ oM badzra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra na ma a b+hi She ka ta/ zhes byin la kye dpal che ge mo zhes lha gang la me tog babs pa'i zhabs kyis mtshan ba'i ming gi dbang bskur ro/ /'di ni rig pa'i
110b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang lnga'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin bar bya ste/ bdag gzhan don ni rdzogs byed pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang yin te/ /thugs rje bdag po stsal du gsol/ /zhes zhus pas de nas hUM las rdo rje sems dpar bskyed la mchod de slar rdo rjer bskyed
110b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag nyid bdag /phyag na rdo rje'i skyes bu'o/ /zhes brjod nas rdo rje sbyin no/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes
111a1(rgyud 'grel): rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad/ /rtag par khyod kyis gzung ba yin/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub mchod par gyis/ /zhes dril bu g.yon par sbyin no/ /srid pa'i ngo bo nyid las dag /brjod la/ dkrol lo/ de nas lhag par lha'i
111a2(rgyud 'grel): sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa sbyin te/ /srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung/ /sdug bsngal chen po zhi bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed/ /ces brjod la gzhal yas khang dang lha'i rnam par dag pa bstan te/
111a3(rgyud 'grel): gdams ngag lag bzhin no/ /de nas rjes gnang sbyin pa ni/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor lo dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi bar du btang
111a4(rgyud 'grel): ngo/ /de nas dngos grub kyi rtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug /rtag tu khyod kyis bzung bar gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /de nas slob ma sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i skud bskyed la
111a5(rgyud 'grel): bla? gos gyi mdza' ma lag pa g.yon pas bzung ba'i khu tshur snying gar bzung la/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la/ lung bstan par bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /phags pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu/ /rdo rje 'dzin par lung bston
111a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /shes rab kyi lung bstan sbyin no/ /de nas gsang ba'i ye shes bslab pa ni/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum no yang sdig med do/ /de bas 'dod chags bral bar bya/ /khyod ni nam yang mi byed cing/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la
111a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /phyin cha dang gi ba yod min te/ /sdug bsngal bsris pas mya ngan 'das/ /srid la btang du dngos grub 'gyur/ /rang dog yongs su bor nas ni/ /dka' thub spyad par mi bya ste/ /ji ltar bde bar bsgrubs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par
111b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de ltar slob dpon dkyil 'khor ni/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi phrin las can/ /sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems/ /snying rje'i dbang gis sems can don/ /khyed kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga dag /brtson par bri dang rgyud la ni/ /nyan dang bsgrub pa dag tu gyis/ /zhes
111b2(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba sbyin no/ /dbang dag rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang/ bla ma la sgra sna tshogs dang/ rol mo'i bye brag gis mchod nas bskyod ba byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi snying gar bkod la/ /tshogs dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis tshim par bya'o//
111b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas yi ge brgya pa gdon/ bzod par gsol/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): sa gshegs su gsol lo/ /dkyil 'khor phyag la dman ma la sogs pa gtor ma dang rol mos chu ba chen por dor ro/ /bdag gis dkyil 'khor cho ga legs sbyar bas/ /bsgyur ba bsod
111b4(rgyud 'grel): nams gang thob pa/ /de yis khams gsum 'gro ba kun/ /dpal ldan gnas su 'gro bar shog /nor par gyur na mkhyen pa rnams la bzod par gsol/ khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /rgya gar gyi slob
111b5(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po lho phyogs dpal gyi ri la bzhugs pa'i bla ma mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta phal po de ba bu rtsa ma ti dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gar chos kyi bzang pos bal po'i yung du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la yab bo/ /i ti/
111b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a pA ri sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed po sgrub pa'i thabs/ mgon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /klu la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis 'jigs/ /mgon pa gshin rje gsher phyag 'tshal/ de
111b7(rgyud 'grel): yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /bde ba'i stan la mnyam 'dug ste/ /tUM ni sngon po snying gar dgod/ /des bskyed mchod pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gus pas gtso bo yang dag mchod/ /byas nas de yi mdun du ni/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya/ /'gro kun
112a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid du gsal por blta/ /snying ga'i sa bon gyur tshon byung/ /zhabs kyi pad+ma g.yon brkyang zhing/ /khro gnyer g.yo bas 'jigs pa'i gdong/ /o ga ? mgo skyes ser la mdzes/ /zhal gsum lce ni
112a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gril pa la/ /'jigs byed mche ba gtsigs pa can/ /khrad gi mig can gsus po che/ /char sprin sngon po lta bu'i mdog /nyi ma'i dkyil du gnas pa 'di/ /ma he la ni gnas pas mtshon/ /me'u thung lta bu stag lpags bsnams/ /bde byed la sogs dregs
112a3(rgyud 'grel): ba 'joms/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer mdangs chen pos/ /nam mkha' lus kun tu 'gengs/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba drag po 'bar/ /'jigs pa'i bskal ba'i me lta bu/ /'khor lo ral gri gtun shing dang/ /gri gug ste re zhags pa bsnams/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa
112a4(rgyud 'grel): min pa yi/ /lha yi phyag drug rtag tu bsnams/ /'jigs mdzad khror bcas rab tu grags/ /bdud ni 'dul byed gshin rje'i gshed/ /gur ni hUM gis bkang byas pa/ /'jigs dang bral nas bsgom par bya/ /stong phrag nyi shu'i phyed du ni/ /sngags rnams
112a5(rgyud 'grel): sdangs? rig las rtag tu/ /bzlas te lus sogs ma yengs pas/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'di sngon bsnyen pa'i cho ga ste/ /gsang sngags grag par byas pa bstan/ /de ni shin tu mar ba'i phyir/ /las dang rjes mthun ma bstan te/ /de ni dngos grub
112a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod pas/ /rgyu dang bla ma'i man ngag las/ /las kun grub pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /dpa' bos 'bad pas shes par bya/ /bla ma bzhed pa'i cho ga rtogs pa las/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs byas pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /mngon bar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ? du ni//
112a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni thob par shog /'phags pa gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyu ba la gsungs pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //khro bo'i rgyal po'i klu rnams kyi/ /kha dog la sogs mi dran gang/ /de phyir de
112b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ched du ni/ /de dag kha dog dbyibs kyang bshad/ /dga' bo rigs ldan nag bo ste/ /skra ni bcings nas gnas pa yin/ /tak+Sha ka ni gser mdog ste/ /rna ba'i rgyan du 'bad pas byas/ /pad+ma chen po la lag gdub ste/ /gser ni bsregs ba lta bu'i mdog /mchod phyir
112b2(rgyud 'grel): thogs su byas pa ni/ /karko Ta ste dkar po yin/ /ba su ki ni ska rags te/ /pad+ma dmar po dri med mdangs/ /rkang gdub pad+ma dung yin te/ /kun tu ban du ka yi mdog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bA baM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsa ba dge slo/ tshul khrims rgyal las bsgyur cing
112b3(rgyud 'grel): zhus te btan la phab pa'o// //oM a kro d+ha kA ya man+ta ka hUM phaT/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ? di kri tA nan hUM phaT// //*/ /rta mgrin gyi sgrub pa bzhugs so/ //
112b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ha ya thI wa swA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs// 'phags pa rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde sbyin bcom ldan rta mgrin ni/ /g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/ /khams gsum rang bzhin gsum spyan gsum/ de la rtag tu phyag
112b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dang por sngags ni rab tu brjod/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA swa b+ha bi shud+d+hohaM/ /lan gsum brjod pas sna'i srod kyis/ /dngos rnams thams cad dag par bsam/ /khyad par rang lus shel sgong ltar/ /rang snying raM ser 'od 'phros pas/ /nyi dkyil stengs su
112b6(rgyud 'grel): h+ri dmar po/ /de las phyogs bcur 'od 'phros bas/ /zhags pa lcags kyu ltar 'phros pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rta mgrin bla ma la sogs pa/ /mdun du spyan drangs rang snying ga /h+ri las mchod pa'i lha mo ni/ /bdug spos ser mo phyag na spos//
112b7(rgyud 'grel): me tog ma ni utpal bsnams/ /sku ni rab tu mthing gang bzhugs/ /mar me ma ni sku mdog dmar/ /phyag na rin chen sgron ma 'dzin/ /dri chab ma ni ljang gu ste/ /lag pa gser gyi bum 'dzin ma/ /zhal zas ma ni sku mdog dkar/ /lag pa gser gnang?  bdud rtsis 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): gang/ oM badzra d+hU pe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM badzra puShpe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM badzra A lo ke A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM badzra gand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM badzra nai bi dyA A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ gang yang bdag gis dus kun tu/ /sdig pa bgyis par gang gyur pa/ /skrag nas rmi
113a2(rgyud 'grel): 'drar 'chags bgyid cing/ /de nas brtsams te 'byung mi bgyid/ /dge ba rnams la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ /thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /de thob lam la gnas bgyid cing/ /dam pa'i skyabs gsum la skyabs
113a3(rgyud 'grel): mchi/ /de rjes tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi bsgoms/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ lan bdun brjod bya ting 'dzin gyis/ /chos ni thams cad stong par bsam/ /de yi dang las mkha' dkyil du/ /raM ser 'od 'phros nyi dkyil du/ /de steng yi ge hUM las
113a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'phros 'dus? rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /rdo rje rab sa gzhi gur?/ /de yi dbus su nyi dkyil 'khor/ /de steng yi ge bruM dkar bsam/ /de bas 'od zer byung bas ni/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byad/ /dud dang bai DU rya dang shel/ /gser las grub pa rim pa bzhin/ /gru bzhi pa
113a5(rgyud 'grel): la sgo bzhi pa/ /gser gyi ka ba brgyad kyis bteg /rin chen du mas steng ni phub/ /rin chen du mas 'phyang ba'o/ /yang na thod pa'i gzhal yas khang/ /stong gsum stong chen rgya khyon btsam/ /steng ni zhing chen rab tu bkab/ /gru bzhi pa ni rab tu bkod/ /seng lder ka ba
113a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ni gnas/ /thod pa brgyad de kyis ka gzhu brgyan/ /phyi dang nang ni rab tu gsal/ /rang ni ri ser gcig tu bsgoms/ /raM las 'od zer 'phros 'dus pas/ /nyi dkyil du ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ de las 'od 'phros sems can gyi/ /don byas 'phags pa mchod
113a7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /slar yang 'od ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): la thim/ /de nyid zhu bas thog ma nas/ /bsags pa'i sgrib gnyis ye shes kyi/ /mes ni rab tu bsregs par bsam/ /ye shes me las 'od 'phros 'dus/ /sngar bzhin rab tu bsgom par bya/ /rang ni bcom ldan dpal rta mgrin/
113b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar/ /dbus dang g.yas dang g.yon dang ni/ /dmar dang kar dang nag po yi/ /spyan gsum dbu steng rta mgo can/ /ljang gu gsum ni rab tu 'thon/ /tshems gcigs zhal nas 'brug ni sgrogs/ /thod skam thod byas thod rlon brgyan//
113b2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag brang? 'gros rab tu brgyan/ /stag gi sham thab glang lpags gyon/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon na khrab/ /g.yas kyi gnyis pa gser zhags bsnams/ /g.yas kyi tha ma seng ldeng dbyug /g.yon gyi gnyis pa ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi tha ma sor mo las/
113b3(rgyud 'grel): bya khyung bye ba bye ba 'khyer/ /zhabs ni drug gis klu rnams mnan/ /bskal pa'i me ltar dbus na bzhugs/ /spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dkar dmar dang gnag snying ga'i rdo rje rtse lnga las/ /'od zer kha dog lnga 'bros pas/ /rnam snang mi 'khrug rin 'byung dag
113b4(rgyud 'grel): tshe dpag med dang don yod grub/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs la/ /oM dang hUM dang traM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): a/ spyi bo dpral ba rna ba g.yas/ ltag pa rna ba g.yon ba ru/ /bdud rtsi'i bum pas dbang bskur bsam/ /snying ga'i rdo rje rgya gram las/ /lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od 'phrom pas
113b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas grub pa'i rta mgrin ni/ /nyi dkyil bzhugs pas spyan drangs la/ /rgya gram ljang las 'od 'phros bas/ /lha mo lngas ni mchod pa dbul/ /rgya gram de yi chad pa la/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gsal/ /dza las rta mgrin spyan drang bya/ /hUM gis rab tu gzhug par bya//
113b6(rgyud 'grel): ? gis rab tu bcing par bya/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ni de la gzhug par bya/ /bsgom pas dub par gyur na ni/ /bzlas pa yang ni brjod bya ste/ /a tshad ka tshar bkod byas la sde tshan dang po bcu gnyis pa/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa brgyan/ /de nyid kyis ni gsum pa bzung/ /sde tshan
113b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'i gsum pa blang/ /sde tshan bdun pa'i gnyis par sbyar/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po blang/ /sde tshan dang po'i bcu gnyis pa/ /sde tshan bdun pa'i gnyis pa sbyar/ /sde tshan bzhi ba'i dang po bzung/ /drod kyi yi ge bzhi pa blang/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang po
114a1(rgyud 'grel): gzung/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa blang/ /mthar gnas yi ge gnyis pa sbyar/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa brgyan/ /mthar gnas bzhi pa bzung bar bya/ /drod kyi bzhi pa blang byas la/ /sde tshan po'i lnga pa sbyar/ mthar gnas gsum
114a2(rgyud 'grel): pa blang byas la/ /sde tshan dang po lnga pa sbyin/ /lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/ /drod kyi bzhi pa bzung byas la/ /sde tshan dang po'i drug pa sbyar/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyin/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i gnyis pa blang/ /sde tshan gsum pa'i dang po sbyin/ /sa bon yi ge 'od 'phros
114a3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /nam mkha' i mdza' gtugs rta mgrin du/ /bzlas pas dub na ye shes ni/ /sems dpa' mdun du spyan drangs la/ /lha mo lngas ni sngar bzhin du/ /yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya/ /de rjes bstod pa yang ni brjod/ /gshegs phyir dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum brjod/ /
114a4(rgyud 'grel): rang ? rta mgrin bsgoms pa yis/ /snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar po las phyogs bcu ru/ /phyi nang snod bcud 'od zhu bas/ /thams cad rta mgrin rang bzhin du/ /'od ni rang gi lus la bsdu/ /dam tshig ye shes sems dpa' la/ /de ni h+ri(rgyud 'grel): la rab tu
114a5(rgyud 'grel): ? dkar la yungs kar tsam/ /de ni rang tu dmigs mi bya/ /gsal la mi rtog gcig tu bsam/ lha yi bu dang lha klu dang/ /bdag gzhan sdug bsngal zhib dang/ /bgegs rigs gzhan ni 'dul ba dang/ /lha 'dre ma rungs 'dul ba dang/ /lha 'dre mthu
114a6(rgyud 'grel): chen klum? rungs/ /ser ba bsrung par 'dod pa yis/ /yungs kar brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /gtor ma gtong bar 'dod pa yis/ /rang ni yi dam lha ru gnas/ /snying gar h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar phyogs bcu yi/ /'od 'phros sems can rta mgrin bsgom/ /gter ma'i steng du
114a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs la/ /gtor steng baM? dmar po ni bsam/ /de las 'od 'phros baM la thim/ /gtor ma rnam par dag bya phyir/ /sarba ka ri lan bdun brjod/ /de nyid bdud rtsir bya ba'i phyir/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ /nyi shu rtsa
114b1(rgyud 'grel): gcag ces brjod la/ /yang na lan bdun tshan bzhi brjod/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon nA gardzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// /dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o// //
114b2(rgyud 'grel): rta mgrin? gyi sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ //rgya gar skad du/ ha ya grI ba sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pas dgongs shing rtogs pa'i phyir dngos po thams
114b3(rgyud 'grel): cad ni 'di ltar gdod ma nas ma skyes shing mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas ri rab lcog brgyad pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ de'i dbus su dpag tshad stod gi tshad tsam gyi 'od kyi phung po der nye bar gnas la/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs
114b4(rgyud 'grel): ba sngon du 'gro bas lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas nam mkha' khyab pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sprul la/ de nyid du hUM yig 'bar ba'i rnam pa bsam bar bya'o/ /de nas/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra NAM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa 'di phyogs bcu
114b5(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa ye shes kyi rnam pa spyan drangs la bzhugs so/ /yang gnyis pa la hUM yig gis rta mgrin bskul zhing spyan drangs la bzhugs so/ /gsum pa la hUM yig
114b6(rgyud 'grel): gis bdag nyid rdo rje rta mgrin gyi rang bzhin can te/ sku mdog dmar po 'jigs par mdzad la/ spyan gsum pa/ sma ra dmar ser can/ drag po/ gsus pa 'phyang ba/ mche ba gtsigs shing tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba dang ral pa'i cod pan
114b7(rgyud 'grel): ca ca?/ 'od dpag med spyi por bzhugs pa/ zhal gnyis pa/ rta zhal sngon po hI hA'i yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ srid rtse'i mthar thug pa'i tshangs pa'i sgo ba'i rtse? zhal gyis mnan pa/ sbrul brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ me'u thung gi rnam pa can/ stag gi phyags? pa'i sham
115a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs can/ rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin thams cad sdig pa dang dbyig pa 'chang ba'o/ /sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyi kha dog spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bsam par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bsgoms pa las yid
115a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu dang/ bum pa bzang po dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang bcud len pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyis sgrub pa mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /rtog pa bdun brgya pa nas gsungs pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
115a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar pA ra NA? si'i paN+Di Ta pu ru Shod+ha? ma'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos nyang ro 'khris kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ha ya grA ba sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/
115a4(rgyud 'grel): rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngar gsungs pa'i cho ga sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la ye shes hi yig dmar po las skyes pa'i 'phags pa rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po zhal gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ spyan gsum pa /
115a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dang gcig shos kyi zhal ni sngon po dang dkar po'o/ /sbrul gyis brgyan cing 'gyid bas bzhugs pa/ zhal dang po khro bo'i mig gis blta ba/ g.yas kyi zhal ni ljags 'dril ba/ g.yon gyi zhal ni tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ stag gi grags? pa'i 
115a6(rgyud 'grel): sham thabs can no/ /g.yas kyi phyag bzhin rdo rje dang/ dbyig pa dang/ phyag rgya dang/ mnga' o/ g.yon gyi phyag bzhi yis sdigs mdzub dang/ rang gi nu ma la reg pa dang/ pad+ma dang gzhu'o/ /cod pan la mi bskyod pa bsam mo/ /'di ni rta mchog ye shes
115a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /oM haM ha ya grI ba swAhA/ zhes pa ni bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon tsan+t+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar yul bA ra Na si'i paN+Di ta pu ru ShoTTa?
115b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bla ma dam pa'i bkas gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du legs par bsgyur ba'o// /rgya gar skad du/ ha ya grI ba sA d+ha naM nam(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/
115b2(rgyud 'grel): rta mgrin kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rta mgrin gyi ni sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /dang po re shig sngags pas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bdud rtsi lngas byugs la ji ltar 'dod pa'i stan pa nye par
115b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug ste/ rang gi snying ga'i hUM yig gi 'od zer 'phros las bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ sdig pa brjod pa la sogs pa byas te/ oM swab+hA ba shud+hA sarba
115b4(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+hohaM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes yang dag par brjod do/ /'di'i sngags kyis rang dang gzhan stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i lte ba'i steng du zla ba'i
115b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la thod pa bdud rtsi dang bcas pa der bsam par bya'o/ /der hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las bsam par bya ba'i sangs rgyas ni drag po'i zhal bzhi pa zhabs bzhi pa/ g.yas pa'i zhabs brkyad ba/ g.yon pa'i zhabs bskum pa'o/ /dpa' bo
115b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag brgyad pa/ lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba/ gang 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi bdag nyid/ bdag nyid chen po rta mgrin ni/ /sku mdog dmar po mche ba rno ba gtsigs pa spyan gsum pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal ni dmar po dang/ sngon po dang/ dkar
115b7(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /spyi bo'i rta'i zhal gyi rnam pa de'i kha dog ni shing pa lA sha bzhin no/ /thod pa khrag dang sha chen pos gang ba sngags rnams kyi dbang bskur ba rab tu sbyin par bya'o/ /rta zhal la sogs pa'i dbu la rgyan thams cad rdzogs pa/ mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i//?
116a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyis lcags kyu dang/ mnga' dang/ thod pa dang rdo rje'o/ /g.yon pa bsnams na zhag pa dang/ gzhu dang/ kha TAM ga dang/ dril bu'o/ /'dir sgrub pa pos de 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das su bsgom par bya'o/ /mchod
116a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid bdud rtsi lngas yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /mdun du bzhugs pa'i lha mo rdo rje tra ma 'jigs ma chen mo h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig las yang dag par byung ba zhal gcig ma/ phyag bzhi ma g.yon na gzhu dang thod pa bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'o//
116a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi mda' dang/ rtse gsum mo/ /sna tshogs pa'i sku yid du 'ong ba'i gzi brjid can/ rgyab tu bzhugs pa'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma haM las yang dag par byung ba/ /g.yon na kha TwAM ga dang/ zhags pa chen po 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas na thod pa
116a4(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis gang ba dang /dbyig pa'i brtul zhugs 'chang ba'o/ /ka pA la'i gdan gyis dbus na bzhugs pa sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ma chen mo mtshan ni phag mor brjod do/ /g.yas su ni rdo rje khros mthong ba'i gdan la yang dag par bzhugs ma/
116a5(rgyud 'grel): ? las yang dag par byung ba'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ g.yon na dug gis gang ba'i thod pa dang/ zhags pa'i rgyal mtshan no /g.yas su Da ma ru dang/ dpyig pa'i brtul zhugs 'chad ba'o/ /g.yon du bzhugs pa'i
116a6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo kha dog dkar mo phyag na rdo rje can te/ 'dab ma bzhi rnams la bzhugs pa'o/ /rta mgrin 'khor bcas la mchod par bya'o/ /lha mo thams cad kyi dug dang/ dri chu dang bcas bas so/ /zhabs 'od kyi phreng ba la bzhugs shing mgo bos brgyan
116a7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /spyan gsum pa mche ba rno ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par mdzad pa/ gang 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi bdag nyid can ne/ /sngags kyi rgyal bo rjes su dran na der 'di'i sngags ni/ oM ha ya grI ba h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a haM a ha aM aM hUM hUM swAhA/ sngags ni bsam
116b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /rtag tu bzlas la rjes su dran pas/ 'bum phrag gnyis dang bye ba phrag gcig gis de nad med par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang sngar bsgags pa'i sdig pa 'joms pa dang/ dus thams cad du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di
116b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi lha mo rta gdong ma ni brtan pa sa'i dngos po dang/ byams pa 'phro ba'i sems dang me long lta bu'i rnal 'byor ro/ /g.yas g.yon gyi lha mo ni chu dang/ snying rje dang mnyam nyid dang me dang dga' ba dang/ so sor tog pa'i rang bzhin no/ /lha mo glang gdong ma ni
116b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dngos po dang btang snyoms kyi sems su ngan zhing bya ba rjes su grub pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /sna tshogs pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs pa'i tshul du brjod do/ /kha dog sngon mo ni gnyis su med par byed pa chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa sdigs par mdzad ba'o/ /kha dog
116b4(rgyud 'grel): ser mo ni dri ma med par rtogs so/ /kha dog dmar mo ni chos rnams la chags pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /zhabs bzhi'i rnam dag ni 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o/ /rta'i gdod pa ni gzhan pa med pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'di chos
116b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba dang/ lam rnam par dag par gzhol bar mngon par brjod do/ /rgyu'i de nyid gang la lta ba dang/ 'bras bu'i de nyid kyi phyag rgya ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thar pa la spyan gsum gyis gzigs pa'o/ /thog ma med pa'i ye sheS
116b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems dud 'gro'i zhal du bstan te/ /yid spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas ri ltar rtag tu gnas par bya'o/ /rgyud thams cad kyi snying po bla na med pa rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ paN+Di ta pta b+hA ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
116b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar yul bA ra Na si'i paN+Da ta pu ru Shot+ta ma'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te/ lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bla ma dam pa'i bkas gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur ba'o// /
117a1(rgyud 'grel): sa stengs su nyi zla ltar longs spyod par shog cig/ //'phags pa rta mgrin bsgrub par 'dod pas thog mar sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba'i shud+d+ho haM zhes lan
117a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum mam bdun brjod pas snang srid kyi dngos po 'di thams cad dag par bsam mo/ /khyad par du bdag gi lus shel gong dag par bsam mo/ /de nas rang gi snying gar raM ser po gcig las 'od 'phros shing 'dus pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
117a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h+ri dmar po gcig bsam mo/ /de las 'od zer zhags pa lta bur dang lcags kyu lta bu phyogs bcur 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dpal rta mgrin dang bla ma la sogs pa mdun du
117a4(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs la rang gi snying ga'i h+rI las mchod pa'i lha mo bdug spos ma phyag na spos thogs pa dang/ me tog ma phyag na utpal thogs pa dang/ mar me ma phyag na rin po che'i sgron me thogs pa/ dri chab ma gser gyi bum nang du ga pur gyi chus bkang ba thogs
117a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ zhal zas ma gser gyi gzhod? pa'i nang du bdud rtsi ri rab tsam thogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dpal rta mgrin dang bla ma la sogs pa la mchod la sngags 'di rnams brjod do/ /oM badzra d+hu pa A hUM swAhA/ oM badzra puShpe
117a6(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM badzra A lo ke A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM badzra gand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM badzra nai bi dyA A(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ de nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ gang yang bdag gis dus kun tu/ /sdig pa bgyis par gang gyur pa/ /skrag nas rmi 'drar 'chags bgyid cing/ /
117a7(rgyud 'grel): dang nas brtsams nas 'byung mi bgyid/ /dge ba rnams la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ /thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /de thob lam la gnas bgyid cing/ dam pa'i skyabs gsum la skyabs mchi/ /de nas
117b1(rgyud 'grel): byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas rnams rims kyis bsgoms/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes lan gsum brjod la ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur stong par bsam/ de nas nam
117b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i dkyil du ri ser po las 'od 'phros pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhig bsam/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM mthing kha las 'od 'phros paS rdo rje lnga pa cig bsam/ rdo rje lnga pa de las 'od phyogs cur 'phros pas rdo rje'i ra ba dang dra bas gzhi gur du bsam/ rdo rje'i sa
117b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhi'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge bruM dkar po cig bsam/ de las 'od 'phros pas shar phyogs su dngul las grub pa/ lho bai'u rarya las grub pa/ nub shel dmar po las grub pa/ byang gsar las grub pa/ sgo bzhi yod pa/ gser gyi ga ba
117b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad gyis bteg pa rin po che bai DUrya'i sgron shing gis steng phug pa/ rin po che'i 'phan du ma 'phyang ba'i gzhal yas khang du bsgom pa 'am/ yang na thod pa'i gzhal yas khang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya khyon+tsam/ steng zhing chen
117b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis g.yang gzhis bkab pa/ sgo bzhe yod pa/ seng ldeng gi ka ba brgyad la thod pas ka gzhu byas pa'i ka ba brgyad kyis bteg pa/ phyi nas bltas nang gsal ba/ nang nas bltas ni phyi gsal ba'i gzhal yas khang cig tu bsgom ma/ /sgrub pa po rang gi
117b6(rgyud 'grel): sems yi ge ri gcig tu bsgom/ raM ser po de las 'od 'phros shing 'dus pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor cig bsgom/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang h+ri dmar po cig tu bsgom/ h+ri dmar po de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas sems can gyi don
117b7(rgyud 'grel): byas/ 'phags pa mchod nas slar 'od de yi ge h+ri la thim pas h+ri de nyid 'od du zhu ba las tshe thog ma med pa nas nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad ye shes kyi mes bsreg par bsam/ ye shes kyi me 'od 'phros pa dang/ 'dus pa las bdag
118a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dmar po/ dbus dmar ba/ g.yas dkar po/ g.yon mthing ba/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu gsum gyi steng na rta mgo ljang gu gsum yod pa/ tshams gtsigs ba zhal re re
118a2(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang 'brug stong stong 'dir ba/ thod pa skam po'i thod can/ thod pa rlon pa'i phreng bas se ral khar brgyan pa/ sbrul dkar nag gis yan lag brgyan pa/ stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs byas pa/ glang po che'i ko rlon gis su gyon pa/ phyag drug la g.yas pa dang
118a3(rgyud 'grel): po rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na dud chen khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa/ g.yas gnyis pa na gser gyi zhags pa bsnams pa/ g.yas tha ma na seng ldeng gi dbyug tho bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis pa ral gri /g.yon gyi tha ma na song mo ldang pa mthe bo me
118a4(rgyud 'grel): nas bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bya khyung ga ru Da dkar po bye ba 'gyed pa/ mdzub mo nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi mthing kha bye ba 'gyed pa/ gung mo nas rin po che'i rigs kyi ser po bye ba 'gyed pa/ srin lag nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi dmar po bye ba 'gyed pa/ mthe chung nas las
118a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs ljang gu bye ba 'gyed pa/ zhabs drug gi klu thams cad brdzis pa/ rdo rje'i gshog pa re re nas kyang khyud ga ru Da bsam gyis mi khyab pa bye ba 'gyed pa/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i ye shes kyi klong dkyil nas bzhugs par bsam/ yang na bcom
118a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas na seng ldeng gi dbyug to/ /phyag g.yon pa la sdigs mdzub 'phyar ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa phyag mtshan bsgom/ lce rdo rje rtse lnga par bsgoms la/ sarba ka ri zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru
118a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga pa la dgod/ snying ga g.yon par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsam/ snying ga g.yas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rgya gram ljang gu cig bsam/ spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du oM dkar po cig bsam
118b1(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po cig bsam/ snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM mthing kha cig bsam/ snying kha'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa las 'od kha dog lcags kyu lta bu 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad dang/
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrug pa dang/ rin chen 'gyur ldan dang/ tshe dpag med dang/ don yod grub pa de rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis oM zhes pas bdud rtsi'i chu spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bsam/ hUM
118b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas mi 'khrug pas dpral ba nas dbang bskur bar bsam/ traM zhes pas rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rna ba g.yas pa nas dbang bskur bar bsam/ h+ri(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa snang ba mdza' yas kyis ltag pa nas dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /a zhes pas rna ba g.yon pa
118b4(rgyud 'grel): nas don yod grub pas bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /snying ga'i rdo rje rgya gram las 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu 'phros pas ye nas grub pa'i rta mgrin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa cig spyan drangs la/ rgya gram ljang gu las 'od 'bros pas mchod pa'i lha

118b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas bcing/ ho(rgyud 'grel): las 'od 'phros pas ye shes sems dpa' dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs par bsam/ sku la gtad la bsgom pas dub na sa bon gyi yi ge la gtang la sngags 'di bzlas so/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hUM phaT ci mang du bzlas so/ /
118b7(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gyi yi ge la 'od 'phros pas nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pa thams cad 'phags pa rta mgrin du gyur par bsam/ bzlas pas dub na ye shes pa mdun du bton la lha mo lngas snga ma bzhin du mchod do/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir
119a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgya ba bzlas/ 'phags pa rta mgrin la bstod pa/ hUM sku mdog chags med nub kha'i dmar thag 'dra/ /'bar ba'i dbu la ral ba gyen du brdzes/ /ma rig tshangs pa kha sbub gnon pa'i lha/ /pad+ma rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye sheS
119a2(rgyud 'grel): ha ya grib rta chog dpal/ /zhal nas 'brug stong di ri ri/ /tshems gtsigs tsam na tshems nang nas/ /gdug pa'i me rtag kham kham 'bar/ /khro rgyal dbang gi rta skad tsher tsher 'tsher/ /zhes bstod/ mkhyen par gshegs par bya ba'i phyir dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gsum

119a4(rgyud 'grel): tu zhu nas kun rta mgrin gyi ngo bor bsam/ 'od de dag thams cad rang gi lus la bsdu/ dam tshig sems dpa' ye shes sems dpa' i rta mgrin dmar po la bsdu/ h+ri dmar po thig le dkar zhing 'tsher ba yungs kar tsam cig la bsdu/ yungs kar tsam po de
119a5(rgyud 'grel): yang mi dmigs par bsgom ste gsal la mi rtogs pa gcig tu bsgom mo/ /lha'i bu'i bdud 'dul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod pa bya/ lha klu mthu bo che thams cad dbang du sdud par 'dod na dud chen thogs pa'i phyag la mchod pa bya/ /
119a6(rgyud 'grel): lha 'dre mthu bo che bdag der gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar 'dod na zhags pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod pa bya/ byis pa'i gdon bco brgyad dang/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang/ lha 'dre ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar 'dod na ral gri thogs pa'i

119b1(rgyud 'grel): ru byung? pa bzlog par 'dod na/ seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad pa la rta mgrin gyi sngags sngon du 'bum bsnyen pa byas la las kyi dus su yang 'bum byas te btab na chu'i rgyun blog? par 'gyur ro/ /shwa bzlog par 'dod na zangs dang lcags la 'brug gi gzungs

119b4(rgyud 'grel): byugs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang phyugs nad dang/ yams kyi nad la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pa la sngags stong phrag bdun bzlas la phyogs bzhir btsugs la snga dro'i dus su chu gtsang ma la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khar thog nas gtor ma
119b5(rgyud 'grel): yams nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gtor ma gtong bar 'dod pas bdag nyid dpal rta mgrin du bsgoms la snying gar h+ri dmar po las phyogs bcur 'phros pas sems can thams cad rta mgrin du bsgoms la/ yang rta mgrin gyi thugs ka nas 'od

119b7(rgyud 'grel): rang rta mgrin du bsgoms pa'i snying ga'i h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar po de'i nam mkha' la 'phros pas/ h+ri dkar/ dmar ser bsngo/ gnag 'od byung bar bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun babs pas gang bar bsam/ de nas gtor ma rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sarba ka ri zhes lan bdun brjod
120a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /gtor ma nyid bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ /nam(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM saMb+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod bar bya ste/ yang dag sngags bdun tshan bzhi brjod chul gdab po/ /ye shes

120a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /gnas der bsam gtan khang pa shin tu yid 'thang par/ /'og gi sa gzhi shin tu 'thas ba kho na la/ /sa la ma lhung lci ba dri bzang rnams dang ni/ /bsres pas legs byugs gzugs brnyan 'char ba lta bur bya/ /dri zhim me tog dag gis gtor la
120a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams bre/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu zhugs shing dam tshig la gnas pa 'am/ /so sor thar ba la gnas pa 'am byang chub sems bskyed pas/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas bdun po rnam par dag par byas/ /des rjes tshad med bzhi yis bdag blo legs par 
120a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs/ /shAn+ya ta'i sngags kyis stong pa nyid du bsgom/ /bdag nyid rnam shes ngo bo yi ge baM du lta/ /baM de yongs su gyur pas pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /pad+ma'i lte bar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de steng pa las nyi ma de steng hUM bsam bya/ /de las rdo rje'i lte bar hUM
120a7(rgyud 'grel): gis mchin pa bsam/ /de las 'od 'phros sa gzhir ba gur du gyur/ /rdo rje hUM bcas de las gzhal yas khang ba bskyed/ /de nas rdo rje hUM bcas las/ /bdag nyid rta mgrin skur gyur te/ /dmar po zhal gsum phyag zhabs bzhi/ /dbus dmar g.yas sdo
120b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dmar ba/ /dbus ma'i gtsug nas rta mgo ljang/ /gyan du kha bltas rta skad 'byin/ /dang po rdo rje pad+ma bsnams/ /tha ma gnyis kyis mnga' gzhu 'gengs/ /rigs lnga'i bdag nyid dbu la'o/ /dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rab tu brgyan//
120b2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag drug la sbrul gyis brgyan/ /sku smad stag gi pags pas g.yogs/ /zhabs bzhi yis ni 'jig rten gyi/ /lha chen bzhi ni rab tu mnan/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil na bzhugs/ /shar du rdo rje las phyed ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sngon mor bsgom/ /
120b3(rgyud 'grel): lho ru gshin rje las byed ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis nag mor bskom/ /nub tu klu yi las byed ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar mor bsgom/ /byang du gnod sbyin las byed ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ser mor bsgom/ /g.yas pa kun la gri gug ste/ /g.yon
120b4(rgyud 'grel): pa kun la thod khrag bsnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs nas ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' bkug la gzhug /lha yi 'khor lo bsdom byas la/ /las rnams 'dod pa bya/ /oM ha ha hi hi h+ri h+ri h+ri h+ri hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bsten pa grangs bzhin bzlas nas ni/ /las
120b5(rgyud 'grel): byed rnams kyi mtshan sngags bzlas nas ni/ badzra sho na sa ma ya/ ya ma sho na sa ma ya/ nA ga sho na sa ma ya/ kha rag sho na sa ma ya/ rgyal 'bod? rgyal tshe la ma sha dom/ ro la khrag 'thung la snying khrag badzra sa du sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): badzra dza:/ tig rog ta 'byung bo mA ra ba snying
120b6(rgyud 'grel): khrag dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra aM gu sha dza(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bo'i tshel ma sha dom/ rol khrag 'thung/ snying khrag 'thung/ snying khrag 'byung po 'byung mo pra ti dre mo'i tshel ma sha dom/ ngo la khrag 'thung snying khrag ma lA ma lA yes yes b+hyo b+hyo kroM kroM swAhA/ oM badzra bo d+ha ta ya grI ba hu lu hu lu
120b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM Ta ki tsa ti bi tsa ti/ hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ pu ru te pu ru te hUM phaT swAhA/ nya sha sgog bcod/ spangs pa yi/ /gtor ma lnga 'am bzang po dbul/ /ji ltar 'dod don gsol ba gdab/ /dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po dpal mer me mdzad ye
121a1(rgyud 'grel): shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //'phags pa yi g.yo pa'i sgrub thabs bla ma gser gling pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AryA tsa la sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub
121a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /thugs sprul khro rgyal mi g.yo mgon/ /phyi nang bar chad sel mdzad lha/ /sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /brtse ldan nyid kyis 'gro don du//
121a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dang bla ma'i man ngag la/ /brten nas yang dag bsrung ba'i rim/ /khro rgyal mi g.yo'i sgrub thabs bri/ /dang po skyabs 'gro so sor thar/ /byang sems rig 'dzin sdom pa rnams/ /legs par thob bsrungs sngags pa yis/ /dben pa'i gnas sogs
121a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' 'am/ /khang bzang gtsang sbrar byas pa'i nang/ /maN+Dal la sogs mchod pa dgram/ /sku gzugs la sogs de bzhin du/ /gtsang ldan yo byad gang 'byor pa/ /tho rangs khrus sogs chu sbyin bya/ /ku sha la sogs stan la bsdad/ /ha hUM h+ri dang haM
121a5(rgyud 'grel): maM la sogs/ /bsngags brjod khro bos bar chad bsal/ /bla ma yi dam dkon mchog rnams/ /dag pa'i gnas su gdan bzhugs la/ /phyag dang mchod pa sdig bshags dang/ /rjes su yi rang skul gsol dang/ /byang chub bsdos la skyabs su 'gro/ bsam
121a6(rgyud 'grel): gtan ting 'dzin mos pa bya/ /byang chub sems kyi rgyun spel phyir/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms tshad med rnam pas ni/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya/ /'gro rnams bde la dgod pa'i phyir/ /byang chub chen po'i sems rgyun bsgom
121a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs dang/ /mi 'bral dad pas bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya dang bcas sngags 'di brjod/ /na ma:sa man+ta badzra naM d+harma d+hA tu ya swa b+hA wa at+ma ko haM/ rdo rje skyil krung rab bcas te/ /snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i/ /sa bon 'od sgra'i spro bsdu
121b1(rgyud 'grel): las/ /chos kun nam mkha' lta bu la/ /mdza' bzhi las grol rnam par bsgom/ /de nas stong nyid dang las ni/ /skad cig sgyu ma'i lus su blta/ /'od kyis thams cad hUM la bsdu/ /de nyid stong par brtan par bsgom/ /de'i dang las nam mkha' i 'od/ /'dra ba'i gyur ba?
121b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis sa bon ni/ /sems kyi bdag nyid bsal bar blta/ /de 'og gaM spros tshogs bdag ste/ /paM spros sna tshogs pad+ma da lta/ /de steng raM las rta bdun pa/ /der ni hUM nyid blta bar bya/ /de las byung ba shes rab kyi/ ral gri sngon po'i 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha' ma lus 'gyengs
121b3(rgyud 'grel): par? blta/ /de las khro bo chen po ni/ /dri ma med pa gzhon nu'i sku/ /bdud la sogs pa rab 'joms pas/ /rnam rtog thams cad 'joms par bsgom/ /gzhon zhing sku rgyas sku mdog gnag /'od kyis nam mkha' ma lus 'geng/ /dbu skra dmar ser bcings shing 'phyang//
121b4(rgyud 'grel): sku ni 'gyid bag rab tu g.yo/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas ni cung zad bskum/ /spyan gsum nyi zla bzhin du dmar/ /steng 'og phyogs bcur blta bar mdzad/ /mche ba rno dkar rab tu gtsigs/ /ljangs ni glog ltar rab tu 'gyu/ /smin ma khro gnyer rab tu bsdu/ /phyag gnyis ral gri sprul
121b5(rgyud 'grel): zhags bsnams/ /stag dang sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /mi bskyod la sogs dbu rgyan can/ /ma rungs 'dul ba'i 'gro don mdzad/ /khro rgyal sna tshogs sku la spro/ /ji ltar 'dod pas yongs su bskor/ /thugs kar pad nyi'i steng du ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' rang 'dra bsgom//
121b6(rgyud 'grel): yang de'i thugs kar nyi ma las/ /hUM ni 'od dang bcas par blta/ /khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni/ /sku mdog nag po 'khor lo 'dzin/ /rdo rje chags chen sku mdog dmar/ /chags par byed pa'i mnga' gzhu 'dzin/ /rdo rje rnon po ljang gu ste/ /'dzin pa'i bdag nyid lcags kyu
121b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'bar ba dkar po ste/ /'joms byed rdo rje'i brag 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje khro bo zer? po ste/ /phyag na ral gri 'bar ba bsnams/ /rdo rje gtum po ljang nag ste/ /sprin gyi zhags pa phyag na bsnams/ /rdo rje thabs bdag dud pa'i mdog /bya ba byed pa'i rdza rnga bsnams//
122a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje stobs chen mthing ga ste /gnam lcags 'khor lo rab tu 'dzin/ /rdo rje sgyu stobs dmar nag ste/ /rdo rje be con phyag na 'dzin/ /rdo rje rab 'byed sna tshogs mdog /'joms byed rdo rje rtse gcig bsnams/ /sa bcu'i yon tan
122a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid can/ /sku 'od me las 'phro bar bsam/ /hUM las ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /rang dang 'dra ba sbyin drangs la/ /dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bzhis/ /dgug gzhug bcing dang dges pa bskyed/ /oM dang A dang hUM dang gsum/ /dkar dang dmar dang nag po yis/
122a3(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ni/ /sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ /sa bon las 'phros 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa la/ /dbang bskur yid kyis gsol ba gdab/ /thugs las sprul pa lhag pa'i lhas/ /rin chen bum pa bdud rtsis
122a4(rgyud 'grel): bkang/ /spyi gtsug dbang bskur rigs bdag mtshan/ /'gro drug sems can thams cad la/ /byams pas blta bas blta ba'i phyir/ /mig tu hUM ni ser po dgod/ /srog gi nang du mi nag po/ /spyi bor haM ni rab tu dgod/ /lus kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bca' / /dag
122a5(rgyud 'grel): tu sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badzra NAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha sha Na hUM phaT/ 'di yi rkyen gyis ma rig pa/ /'jig cing ye shes skur byin brlab/ /de ltar rab rdzogs gsal bar bskyed/ /de nas sgyu ma lta bu'i skur/ /ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bsgom/ /de naS
122a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la gnas pa'i/ /hUM las byung ba'i sngags phreng gis/ /de nyid la ni g.yas bskor la/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sngags 'di bzlas/ /na ma:sa man+ta badzrA NAM/ tra thA a mo ka tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na na/ spho Ta yA hUM/ kra sa yA kra sa yA/ a krA ma ye a krA na/
122a7(rgyud 'grel): ye hUM/ pra ta haM maM zhes pa'am/ yang na oM tsaN Da mahA ro Sha Na hUM? phaT/ a ci? la ka na tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ na ta na ta/ ma tra ta ma tra ta/ mo tra ta mo tra ta/ sha ta sha ta/ Ta ta Ta ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ ma ha sarba pA paM ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badzra ha sa ya
122b1(rgyud 'grel): mo ka ka ru/ ta ma ha sa/ marta marta/ gardza gardza/ band+ha band+ha ha na ha na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a b+hi sha ye/ a b+hi sha ye/ mahA man tra pa la ka /d+hu na d+hu na/ ti ni ti ni/ kha na kha na/ sarba big+ha nan/ sA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba tuSh+Ta na/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba big+ha nan/ ku ru ku ru/
122b2(rgyud 'grel): ma ?/ sarba pA paM/ mahA badzra/ sphe Ta ya sphe Ta ya/ tri pa li ta rA ga na ta ka /hUM hUM maM maM haM haM/ na ma:sa man+ta b+hu ta nan/ tsaN Da mahA ro Sha Na ya/ a mo ka he hi/ a mo ka he hi/ a dra ti ha ta a tsal tse d+ha/ a naM ta ka ni/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsa ru tsa ru/ ta Di ta Di/ Ta ta Ta ta/
122b3(rgyud 'grel): big+ha na b+hA ta ya/ ma ra ya/ kha ta ya/ spho Ta ya/ sha truM tsa le/ a nud band+ha/ a tsa ku ru/ a ha sa/ a d+ha na gra/ ka tra Ta ka Tra Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ haM haM/ a ti b+ha la i hi/ mahA gu na b+hi Sha na/ na Ta ta na Ta ta/ a bi sha yA/ a tsa la tsed+ha/ sarba ta Ta a nu da re/ a tse Ta ta Ta ta/
122b4(rgyud 'grel): Da ma Da ma/ haM haM/ maM maM/ phaT phaT/ hUM hUM/ na ma:sa man+ta badzrA NAM/ tra thA a mo sha /tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ spho Ta ya spho Ta ya/ hUM hUM/ tra ma ya tra ma ya hUM/ tra ta haM maM/ oM b+ha li ta/ ti dza ma li ni swAhA/ na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+ha nI/ tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ a tsa la ce d+ha spho Ta ya
122b5(rgyud 'grel): spho Ta ya hUM/ a sa lan trik trA hA/ mahA b+ha la shad ta/ pa ra man tra/ aM aM hAM hAM/ Shud d+ha tre la kya hu she tu badzra/ a pra ti a ta b+hya li b+hya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): dzwa la ya tra ta/ a ta sa na/ maM tAM swAhA/ zhes pa 'bum la sogs par ni/ /man ngag cam gyis bzlas pa bya/ /das ni
122b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe ba la sogs pa'i/ /mi mthun phyogs rnams zhi bar 'gyur/ /mchog dang thun mong dngos grub rnams/ /ji skad bshad pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas chos dbyings rang bzhin las /yongs su gnas pa bsgom bar bya/ /de las skad cig lhar dmigs la/ /rin chen
122b7(rgyud 'grel): snod du gtsang ma'i rdzas/ dkar gsum la sogs rtsi sman bcas/ /cha lnga 'am bdun ni bsham par bya/ /de nas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /oM sarba d+harma ta badzra sa ti hUM?/ lan gsum brjod pas dag par bya/ /lus kyi mchod sbyin phyag rgya bcas/ /'bru gsum sngags
123a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlab/ /oM a mri ti oM hUM h+ri zhes brjod 'dod pa'i don du brlab/ /yang ni mchod sbyin phyag rgya bca' / /dag nas sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /oM na ma:sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu khe b+hya/ sarba ta da khaM ung ga te /
123a2(rgyud 'grel): ? da ni nyi maM ga ga na khaM/ /lan gsum brjod pas spel bar bya/ /yang na rab gnas dbul ba 'am/ /rje btsun phyogs skyong 'gro drug bcas/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs la/ /byin gyis brlab la mchod pa ni/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga tA a ba lo ki te/ oM
123a3(rgyud 'grel): saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ zhes pa lan bdun sngags kyis ni//bcom ldan 'byung po khor bcas mchod/ /oM a ka ro mu kham sarba d+harma naM/ a dya nud pan na twad twa/ oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ chos bshad bstod la bden stobs brjod/ /bdag gis bsam pa'i stobs
123a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin stobs dang/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs rnams kyis/ /sems can kun la phan gdags phyir/ /don rnams bsam pa gang dag kun/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /de dag thams cad ci rigs su/ /thogs pa
123a5(rgyud 'grel): med par 'gyur 'gyur shog /gang 'dod phrin las gzhol bar bya/ /lus kyis thal mo sbyar byas te/ /sngags 'di brjod pas dam tshig gso/ /oM na ma:sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a sa me tri/ sa ma ya mahA sa ma ya/ sarba pA paM shud d+ha swAhA/
123a6(rgyud 'grel): badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): yis ye shes gshegs/ /dge rtsa bsngos la smon lam gdab/ /spyod lam dag ni thams cad du/ /lha yi nga rgyal gsal bas bya/ /thun bzhi ru ni brtson pas bsgrub/ /sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa/ /ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig rnams/ /lus
123a7(rgyud 'grel): dang srog la mi lta bar/ /yang dag par ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsnyen pa tshad dang ldan pa yis/ /bsrung ba bdun sogs las rnams 'grub/ /rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sphu Ta sphu Ta mahA kro d+ha hUM phaT /dzhi ti dzhi ti sgo? Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces pas klu la mngag par bya'o/ /
123b1(rgyud 'grel): mA ra ya dza dzA ya ti thum thum/ rbad rbad/ shag shag /tshal tshal/ tsi tra ta ra/ tsi ta gri ha na/ tsi ta phyung/ d+ha bo dam tsag sa ma ya phye/ snying sa ma ya phye/ rbad rbad phye/ snying la yaM/ sa ma ya tre te/ snying la gzer/ du kha phye/ pa phye/ oM sphu Ta sphu Ta/ mahA kro d+ha hUM/ dzha ti dzha
123b2(rgyud 'grel): ti/ spho Ta ya spho Ta ya/ hUM phaT swAhA hUM phaT/ /ces pas srog sngags so/ /ming 'jug gsum bzhi drug dgu /gnyis po dag la yang dag sbyar/ ma ngan song song/ mar na bying bying/ ma ran rmuD rmuD /ma ra na ha la ha la/ ma ra na dun dun/ ma ra na smyogs smyogs/ ma ra ya thum ril ril/
123b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ra ya dza/ man gag dzi bzhin bzlas pa bya drad? sngar dbru? btus brdebS pa ni/ bru bsdebS gsum dang de bzhin rdub/ /du dang kun thub gzugs brnyan can/ /band+he sha yA band+he sha yA/ ha ha/ staM b+ha yA staM b+ha yA/ ma ra yA dza dzA/ thum ril ril/ man ngag bzhin du las la
123b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /ting 'dzin bsrung ba thab mo ni/ /lus kyi gnad chan bcu gsum du/ /pad zla'i gdan la hUM las ni/ /rdo rje rgya gram re re bsgom/ /dpyi bo dpral ba mig gnyis dang/ /rna ba gnyis dang sna gnyis dang/ kha dang dpung pa gnyis dang ni/ /snying ga gsang ba lte ba
123b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bshad sgo pus? mo gnyis po dang/ /rkang mthil rnams su gnas pa'o/ /de nas gsang sngags gang rung bzlas/ /me yis phyi nang gang chad gsal/ /bza' btung sngags kyis byin brlabs sbyar/ /ngag nas rdo rje rgya gram ni/ /gser las grub pa'i byin gyis
123b6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs/ /ngag dang yid kyis bzlas pa yang/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bzlas par bya/ /nang gi sbyin sreg blu la bya/ /mi ldog rtags kyis klu rnams mnan/ /mahA kA las bstan pa bsrung/ /'khor lo rbas pas klu la sbyar/ /rnal 'byor bsrung phyir ral gris ?
123b7(rgyud 'grel): yul khams bsrung dang sri'u gso/ /nad chen gso dang 'byung po bskrad/ /rtsar shing ltar bya ba dang/ /dbang du bya dang rmongs pa dang/ /ral gri dum pa sa spyod dang/ /rkang mgyogs mkha' spyod mig sman sogs/ /las rnams the tsom yod ma yin/ /'di bkod dge ba gang
124a1(rgyud 'grel): yin des/ /bar chad sel shing tshogs rdzogs nas/ /'gro rnams 'bang? pa chung du yis/ /bla med byang chub myur thob shog /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bla ma gser gling pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
124a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon dri paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nya nas rang 'gyur du mdzad nas/ /dge slong dbang phyug rgyal mtshan la gnang ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ /A rya a tsa la kro d+ha rA dza stot+tra/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi g.yo ba la
124a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi gso zhes bya'i khro bo ni/ /ral gri zhags pa legs par thogs/ /spyi bo'i zur phud g.yon du 'khyil/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor 'od la bzhugs/ /klu chen la sogs thams cad de kyi/ /rgyan rnamS
124a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis rab tu brgyan/ /byis pa'i gzugs can 'gying bag can/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan nang na thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir phyi rol khro tshul ston/ /chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing nag zhal/ /bcom ldan mi
124a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rjes dbyings nas bzhengs pa'i sku mdog ni/ /ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rdam pa'i sku/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang
124a6(rgyud 'grel): bskum bgegs chen du ma gzir/ /stag dang sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lha dang lha min skrag mdzad phyag g.yas na/ /shes rab ral gri 'bar ba 'debs pa'i tshul/ /'byung po skrag mdzad phyag g.yon bsdigs mdzub ste/ /thugs rjes lus
124a7(rgyud 'grel): can mi gtor rdo rje zhags/ /skye shi rtsad gcod rno dkar mche ba gtsigs/ /spyan gnyis dmar zlum thugs rjes phyhogs bcur gzigs/ /thugs rjes khros pas dbu skra gyen du 'khyil/ /mi bskyod la sogs rigs lngas dbu la brgyan/ /ma rungs 'dul
124b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'gro don rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /sprul pa'i khro rgyal sna tshogs sku las 'phro/ /'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing/ /bde ba dag la rim gyis 'god mdzad pa/ /'gro ba'i mgon po shin tu thugs rje can/ /khyod nyid dus gsum sangs rgyas thams
124b2(rgyud 'grel): cad lags /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad khyod lags pas/ /khro rgyal ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'jigs byed drag po'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gnyis med rtse gcig thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag kyang khyod ltar 'gro
124b3(rgyud 'grel): don bgyi slad du/ /rtse gcig sems kyis khyod bsgom gsang sngags bzlas/ /dus rnams rtag tu khro rgyal khyod bsten na/ /thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs mdzad de/ /ye shes sku mchog mngon sum stsal nas kyang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub
124b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la gsol/ /sgrub la bar chad byed pa'i bdud dgra rnams/ /pha rol 'joms pa'i stobs kyis med par mdzod/ /dus 'di nas gzung byang chub snying po'i bar/ /lha mchog khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /dus rnams rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung du gsol/ /
124b5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/ paN+Di ta di paM ka ra dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Ti ta de nyid dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phag pa'o// /
124b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya A tsa la kro d+ha rA dza sto t+trA?/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid khro rgyal brtan pa'i sku/ /brkyang bskum thabs las byung ba'i khro rgyal dang//
124b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas te nam mkha' i dkyil dkyil na zhugs/ tshangs pa la sogs 'bum ni skrag byed pa/ nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams dang ni/ /klu dang gnod sbyin sha za yi dags sogs/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams ma lus skrag mdzad pa/ /khro rgyal khyod la bdag ni skyabs su
125a1(rgyud 'grel): mchi/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/ /phyag g.yas ral gri 'phyar ba ma rungs 'bul/ /rnam rtog 'joms shing rab tu grims pa'i sku/ /sku mdog mthing nag char sprin nag po 'dra/ /dbu skra ardza ka'i 'bras bu 'dra/ /sku ni
125a2(rgyud 'grel): shing mchog yongs 'dus brtol 'dra/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang brkum kyang kyis khros khros 'dra/ /lha mchog khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /spyan mig pa la sha'i me tog 'dra/ /mche ba gtsigs pa zla ba tshes pa 'dra/ /ljags 'gyur ba ni nam mkha' i
125a3(rgyud 'grel): glog dang 'dra/ /smin ma'i khro gnyer ? shi'i lo ma 'dra/ /ral gri zla tshes mtshor lhung 'od dang 'dra/ /sbrul gyi zhabs pa rgya mtsho'i rnga rlangs 'dra/ /sku yis phyogs skyong dbang sdud ma rungs 'dul/ /khro rgyal mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs dang log
125a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dren ma lus zhi mdzad cing/ /'byung po'i 'khrugs sogs nad rnams ni mdzad pa/ /mi dang mi min mtshon chas 'joms mdzad pa/ /dus min 'chi dang sdig pa rnams las grol/ /dbus dang phyogs bzhir rigs lnga'i mi g.yo ste/ /mtshams bzhi nas ni
125a5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bzhi po dag /gru chan phyogs mtshams lha mo brgyad ldan pa'i/ /bcom ldan mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku las sprul pa'i khro po bcu bo ni/ /rdo rje shugs can sku mdog mthing nag ste/ /da dang dang 'dzin gnam lcags 'khor lo bsnams/ /bgegS
125a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs skrag bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprul ba'i khro rgyal rdo rje chags chen ni/ /gdul bya'i don du sku mdog dmar po ste/ /chags dang chags pa'i don du mda' bzhu bsnams/ /ma rungs 'dul bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprul pa'i khro rdo rje ?
125a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bya'i don du sku mdog ljang gu ste/ /'dzin cing 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid lcags kyu bsnams/ /'gro ba 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprul pa'i khro po rdo rje 'bar ba ni/ /sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra/ /mi shes mi shes 'joms pa'i brag
125b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ ma rungs 'dul bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje khro bo sku mdog ser po ste/ /khro dang khro ba'i bdag nyid ral gri bsnams/ /rnal 'byor bar chod rab tu zhi mdzad pa/ /khro rgyal stobs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gtum chen sku mdog ljang nag
125b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /tang snyoms btang snyoms 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /phyag mtshan phyag na sprin gyi zhags pa bsnams/ /'gro ba 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje thabs bdag ni/ /sku mdog ser nag du ba'i mgo 'dra ba/ /bya dang byed pa'i bdag nyid rdza rnga
125b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdams?/ /sgra chen sgrogs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje stobs chen ni/ /sku mdog mthing ga sku gsum rang bzhin can/ /sman pa'i rang bzhin gnam lcags 'khor lo bsnams/ /nyon mongs sel ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyu'i stobs  ni dmar gnag ste/ rten 'brel rten cir 'brel pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /ma rungs 'dul phyir phyag na be con bsnams/ /bdun rnams skrag par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rab byed sna tshogs phrin las kyis/ /'dod chags thams cad thabs las grol ba yi/ /
125b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje rtse gcig bsnams/ /rdo rje rab byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig bstod pa 'di yis bstod byed na/ /bcom ldan mi g.yo mgon po 'khor bcas kyis/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub kun/ /bstod dang bsgrub pa rnams la
125b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar 'gyur/ /'di bstod 'di ni mchod byed na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
125b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ /lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tsaN+Da la hA ro Sha na sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ khro chen gtum po'i sgrub thabs/ khro chen gtum po la/
126a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar bde ba'i stan la 'dug cing/ rang gi snying gar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM nag po rnam par sams te/ de'i 'od zer gyis
126a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i phyogs su bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ 'chad par 'gyur ba'i khro chen gtum po 'gugs shing yang dag par mchod cing/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ phyis mi byed par sdom pa dang/ gsum la
126a3(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bdag dbul ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms la/ 'gro ba
126a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos med kyi rang bzhin gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba/ sgyu ma dang/ rmi lam lta bur rtogs shing stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes so/ /de'i rjes la nam mkha' 'dri ma med pa'i phyogs su pad+ma 'dab ma
126a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM nag po las skyes shing/ yu ba la hUM gis mtshan pa'i ral gri de'i 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa bkug cing rab tu bzhugs so/ /de nas hUM las byung ba bskal pa dpag
126a6(rgyud 'grel): tu med pa'i me 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ bdud gdul bar dka' ba nam par 'dul bar byed pa sprin sngon po chen po lta bu'i lus can rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po ches spras pa'i cod pan gyis gtsug phud lngas gsal bar byas
126a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ gzhon nu ma bsdigs pa rol par gyur pa'i me tog kun da lta bu'i ya sos ma mchu mnan pas gdug pa la bsdigs pa dang/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs kyi dpal dang ldan pa/ khro gnyer dang/ mtho ba lta bu/ spyan gnyis kyis cig car sa bla
126b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sa 'og 'jigs par byed pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la g.yas pa'i pus mos mnan pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la 'dug pa'i zhabs g.yon pas bzhengs par 'dod pa/ phyag g.yas pas dkyil du hUM gis mtshan pa'i ral gri sngon po 'bar
126b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bsnams pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par byas pa'i khyab 'jug dang/ 'phrog byed dang/ gser gyi snying po la sogs pa dang/ nyon mongs kyi tshogs kyi dgra dpag tu med pa 'khrugs pa bcings pa la rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gser gyi zhags
126b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams pa/ 'gro ba'i 'dod pa mdza' yas pa phun sum tshogs pa sbyin pa la ro gcig pa dpal ldan khro chen gtum po bsgom par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das khro chen rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i snying gar pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM las byung zhing dkyil du hUM
126b4(rgyud 'grel): gis mtshan pa'i ral gri yongs su gyur pas khro chen gtum po gnyis pa snying gi nang na gnas pa bsam par bya'o/ /yang de'i snying gar pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas shing hUM las skyes pa'i ral gri nag po dkrongs pa dkyil du hUM gis mtshan pa bsgom mo/ /de'i 'od kyis
126b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' bkug cing dam tshig sems dpa' bzhin du bltas la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): yig gis dgug cing/ zhal bsil ba dang/ bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas/ hUM yig gis de kho nar rab tu bzhugs te/ baM yig gis bcings la ho:yig gis dgyes
126b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /chul chu bzhin du gcig tu gyur ba'i 'dren pa po bsgom par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gnyis dang/ snyan gnyis dang/ shangs gnyis dang/ zhal? dang/ dbu dang/ thugs rnams la go rims ji lta bar rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi bskyod pa
126b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ bdag med ma rnams yan lag drug la bskyed par bya'o/ /snying la gnas pa'i hUM las spros pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo'i tshogs bkug cing/ bdud rtsi
127a1(rgyud 'grel): lngas gang ba'i bum pa rnams kyis khrus bya ste/ spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsgoms la/ lha mo rnams kyis gang dang rol mo la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis dgyes par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
127a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das gzhan don la brtson pa po sems can thams cad chags sdang dang/ gti mug la sogs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ 'phrog byed dang/ gser gyi snying po dang/ 'dod lha la sogs pa dang/ gti mug ched po dang/ chags pa'i dra bas kyang ma rig
127a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mun pas srid pa'i 'khor lo 'khor du 'jug pa de dag blta bar bya'o/ /de nas snying la gnas pa'i sngags las spros pa'i khro chen rgyal po rnams kyis bdud kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pa/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ du bar gyur pa
127a4(rgyud 'grel): skyabs med pa/ rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings shing bkug ste bsdus nas phye mang byas la/ ral gri rnon pos dum bur bcad la/ byams pa'i sems kyis yang sprul nas chos la dgod pa'i ched du rang gi rkang pa'i phyogs su bzhag la/ bsgo ba las ngal
127a5(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur na smin mtshams kyi bar du sems bzhag la sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /sna tshogs gcig tu gyur pa'i sku can khro chen gtum po sngon po'i sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis/ gdul dka' 'dul ba dang/ 'gro ba dbang du 'gyur ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ ?
127a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ 'phel ba dang/ dgyes pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ de bzhin du bskrag pa dang/ 'gugs pa dang/ bsod pa dam bsdigs pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /khro chen gtum po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon pra b+hA ka ra gir tis mther pa sgrogs?
127a7(rgyud 'grel): so// /thugs rjes chen po'i rgyud gsum pa/ /mkhas rtogs 'jom zhing yi dam mthong/ /spobs pa brtsod pa snyan dang mkhas/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims kyi rang 'gyur// //rgya gar skad du/ tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na/
127b1(rgyud 'grel): swa d+ha naM? nA ? bos skad du/ khro bo gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pus mos la btsugs shing g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri bsnams/ /de las gzhan pa'i phyag ni sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang 'brel
127b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /gra zhing mkhregs pa'i sku mnga' nyi ma lta bur gtum pa'i spyan/ /bgegs rnams 'joms pa'i mi g.yo srid bgegs zhi byed shog /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshogs bcas pa/ /de la me tog la sogs pa'i/ /
127b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog pa la sogs blos byas nas/ /sems can sdug bsngal las bskyab phyir/ /bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar bya/ /dge ba 'phel phyir dag ba sngags pa yis/ /sdig pa dag ni bshags par bya'o/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs
127b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi? slob mi slob sogs sems can gyi/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song zhing/ /byang chub tu ni sems brtan nas/ /rim pa bzhin du tshangs pa'i gnas/ /bzhi po yang ni bsgom par bya/ /de yi mtshan nyid bral ? stong pa ste/ /
127b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud med pas na mtshan ma med/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dngos po rnams/ /smon pa rang ni bsgom? par bya/ /de nas pad+ma nyi dbus su/ /hUM las byung pa bsgom bya ste/ /dpa' bo spyan gnyis rab dmar zhing/ /phyag gnyis rin chen cod pan can/ /de ma thag tu sdig 'joms mgon/ /?
127b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'dod pa rdzogs byed cing/ /a tra si i me tog mtshungs/ /dri med sangs rgyas 'od 'phro zhing/ /tshems kyi mche bas ma mchu mnan/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan cing/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan/ /phyag g.yas 'bar ba'i ral gris brel/ /pus mos la
127b7(rgyud 'grel): btsugs pa ni/ /'jigs pa'i spyan rtsa bzlog pa yis/ /'jigs pa yang ni mdzad pa'o/ /dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu yis/ /ye shes sems dpa' cher 'bar bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar bsngags pa yis/ /mtshan ma sa bon bcas pa bsgom/ /skyon gsang sngags  
128a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas bya ste/ /lha yi rnam par sbyor bas so/ /de nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni/ /'thob pa nyid du the tshom med/ /de la 'di ni gsang sngags rgyal/ /oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ bdag gis bris pas gang thob pa/ /dge ba byang chub sgrub byed pa/ /
128a2(rgyud 'grel): de yis 'jig rten ma lus 'di/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed shog /khro bo gtum po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta su na ya sh+rI dang/ lo tsa ba glog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyis bsgyur pa'o// //
128a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ shu kla tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gtum po dkar po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ /gtum po khro bo chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags pas re
128a4(rgyud 'grel): zhig thog mar stong pa nyid bsgoms te/ de'i dang las sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar po rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ /phyag g.yas pa ral gri spyi bor 'byar? ba/ g.yon pa sdigs
128a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas pa'i zugs? pa snying gar 'dzin pa/ zhabs g.yas pa tsog? pur gzhug shing/ g.yon pa'i spus mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu btsugs pa/ lha'i na bza' gos su gyon pa/ snying gar sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dbus su yi ge hUM la yi ge dbus
128a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i mdun du de dang kha sbyor zhing yang de kho na dang 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das gnyis pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su rang gi snying ga'i sngags las 'phros pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba rang gi kho? nas
128a7(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du zhugs shing de'i lte ba nas rang gi lte bar zhugs shing yang rang gi snying khar 'thon nas de kho na bzhin 'khor bar bsgom par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i tshe rang gi snying ka'i hUM gis 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
128b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang/ zla ba dang/ skar ma dang/ sman dang/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nus pa dang/ rig pa la sogs pa la mkhas pa'i yon tan dang/ gzhan zil gyis mnon pa'i rtsod pa dang/ snyan ngag la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa bkug nas rang
128b2(rgyud 'grel): gi snying kha'i hUM la rab tu thim zhing/ bdag nyid rig pa lnga la mkhas pa'i paN+Di ta yin no snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i spobs pas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas snyan ngag mkhan chen por 'gyur ro/ /gtum po khro bo chen po'i shes rab blo 'phel
128b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Ti ta dA na shI las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AryA tsal sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs 'phags
128b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thogs mar sngags pas gsum la skyabs su sor zhing/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed byas rjes su/ /skad cig tsam gyis stong par rab dmigs nas/ /rab dkar pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor blta/ /de stengs mgon po mi g.yo sku
128b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar/ /g.yas g.yon phyag gis ral gri sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /zhabs gnyis pus mo mthil gyis rab bzhugs pa/ /rin chen dar gyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya/ /lhag pa'i khro rgyal de yi mdun du yang/ /de nyid ji lta'i bcom ldan 'dra bas bya/ de dag thugs
128b6(rgyud 'grel): kar pad+ma nyi ma la/ /hUM la gzhan gyis bskor ba dmar ba blta/ /de nas yi ge 'bru bcu bzlas bya ste/ /sngags phreng kha nas khar zhugs ye shes dgug /lte ba nas 'thon der zhugs bdag nyid kyi/ /snying gar bslan pa 'khor lo bzhin du bsam/ /de ltar zhag grangs nyi shu
128b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gcig tu/ /thun? gsum nyid du bsgom pa gang yin des/ /bka' dang bstan bcos kun gyi tshig dang don/ /bltas pa tsam gyis khong du chud par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang kun la mi 'jigs spobs pa 'phob/ /snyan dngags? bstan bcos thogs med brtsom nus shing/ /de yis 
129a1(rgyud 'grel): smra ba sus kyang bzlog mi nus/ /de phyir 'di 'dra gang yang brnyed par dka' / /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las rang 'gyur du
129a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o// //legs par grub par byed pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs? bsdus pa blob dpon byang chub mchog gi mdzad pa bzhugs so/ //rgya gar skad du/ su sid+d+hi na ra saM gra ha sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ legs par grub par byed pa'i thabs bsdus
129a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sgrub pa pos 'gro ba mdza' bag la phan pa bsgrub pa dang/ dngos grub bla na med pa 'dod pa legs par grub par byed pa zhes bya ba/ rigs gsum spyi'i sgrub pa'i cho ga
129a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gsal bar brjod par bya'o/ /de la re zhig dang po slob dpon gyi yon tan dang rjes su mthun pa'i slob dpon gyis sgrub pa po bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba/ rgyud las gsungs pa'i sgrub pa po'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gsang sngags kyi
129a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid legs par tshogs pa/ dngos grub las kyi bye brag la mkhas pa mthun pa'i dus kyi dbye ba shes pa/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i cho ga rig pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid dang mthun pa'i sngags g.yog dang ldan pas sgrub pa'i yan lag gis yo byad thamS
129a6(rgyud 'grel): cad bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas gsang sngags yongs su bzung ba'i chogs gang la mngon par dad pa'i gsang sngags mnos te/ gsang sngags dang rjes su mthun pa'i yul ji skad bstan par dngos grub dang 'tsham pa'i gnas ji skad gsungs pa dag tu
129a7(rgyud 'grel): ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gnas bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen pa brtsam par bya'o/ /de la nyin gcig la zhin du dus gsum du 'di ltar bya ste/ nang par mal nas langs te rigs gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig gsum
129b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgya ni thal mo bkan pa las mdzub mo gnyis cung zad tsam bkug ste mgo la bzhag pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ oM ta thA ga tong b+ha bA ya swAhA/ thal mo sbyar ba pad+ma la phye ba'i tshul du bya ste/ snying gar
129b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ oM padmo ta b+ha bA ya swAhA/ lag pa thal mo bzlog ste sbyar la mthe bong gnyis dad mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar nas lte ba'i thad kar bzhag ste 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ oM badzrod?
129b3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha bA ya swAhA/ de nas phyogs bcu mdza' yas mu med pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du dmigs la gsang sngags 'dis phyag bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsi tat badzra pra Na me na sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsi t+ta badzra pA da bandA naM ka ro mi/ de nas
129b4(rgyud 'grel): de dag la bdag dpul bar bya ste/ phyogs bcu mdza' yas mu med pa na bzhugs ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du dus thams cad du yong ye 'bul na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
129b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po rnams kyis bdag la bzhes su gsol/ /bdag la dngos grub bla na med pa stsal du gsol zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ byang chub bar du bdag skyabs mchi/ /bdag dang gzhan don
129b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub slad du/ /bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' gson/ /bdag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir/ /de nas byang chub sems bskyed do/ /de nas khro bo mnol ba med pa 'am/ /bdud rtsi thabs
129b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor dam/ /yang na rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i tshogs bsrung bar bya'o/ /de la mnol ba med pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la ha na da ha ba tsa/ bi d+hwan sa ya u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT lag pa gnyis sor mo phan tshun bsnol te/ khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis
130a1(rgyud 'grel): bshibs te bsgred mdzub mo rtse mo sbyar ba'i glor mthe bong gnyis btsugs pa ni khro bo mnol pa med ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ni bshad par bya'o/ /rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa nyid las khong du chud
130a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ngo bo ma zhes bya ba dang/ mgo bo la mi g.yo ba'i ngo bo ha zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug bar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harma sra b+hA ba shud+d+ha
130a3(rgyud 'grel): haM zhes bya bas rang bzhin gyis dag par mos par byas la/ de nas phyir byung ste so shing bca' ba la sogs pa bya ste/ lha'i khang pa la sogs pa bstar bar byas nas khrus byed du song shig /gzhan yang phyi rol gyi sar bshad gci byed pa'i dus dang/
130a4(rgyud 'grel): zan za ba'i tshe 'ang khro bo mnol ba med pas bsrung bar bya ste/ de nas skye bo 'du ba dang 'jigs pa la sogs pa spangs pa'i 'jug dogs su song ste/ gnas gtsang ma nas sa blangs la cha gsum du bgos te/ /gnas gtsang mar bzhag par bya'o/ /sa
130a5(rgyud 'grel): blang ba'i sngags ni/ oM ni kha na bai su d+he swAhA/ lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo phyi rol du bsnol te/ bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis bshibs te bsgreng/ mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du bzhag go /'di'i sngags pas sa la gtug cing blang bar bya'o/ /dang por dam
130a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la de nas blang bar bya'o/ /rigs gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bstan zin to/ /de nas bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o/ /de'i phyag rgya ni mthe bo'i dos kyi mthe chung gi sen mo mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams
130a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du bya ste bsnol nas dpung par bzhag ste/ ya sos ma mchu mnan la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing gsang sngags brjod par bya'o/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya nama(rgyud 'grel): shatsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ tadya thA/ oM
130b1(rgyud 'grel): hu lu hu lu tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri te hUM phaT/ de nas lus la bgegs bsal ba'i phyir khu tshur gnyis nang du bcings te/ mdzub mo gnyis phyung nas bsgrengs nas mgo nas rkang pa la thug gi bar du brab bar bya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ oM ha na ha na a
130b2(rgyud 'grel): mri te hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje go cha bya ste/ thal mo bkan pa las mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol ba'i bar du srin lag gnyis bkug ste bzhag/ /gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgrengs la de'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo dkug ste/ mthe bong sbyar nas mthe bod gnyis dbus su
130b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go /gsar sngags la/ oM badzra agni pra dI pa tA ye swAhA/ de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bskyed nas rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya'o/ /na mo tat na tra yA ya/ oM hUM kha kI li hUM phaT/ de dag la sogs pa 'am yang na sngags dang phyag rgya gzhan gyis kyang
130b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyi mgo bo dang/ dbung mgo gnyis dang/ snying ga dang/ mgrin pa rnams su go cha bya'o/ /de nas sngags dang phyag rgyas sa 'am chu la gtugs te thams cad du bsal bar bya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gnyis mthe bos mnan la/ mdzub mo dang mthe'u
130b5(rgyud 'grel): chung gdu bu'i tshul du bya ste/ sor mo dbus ma'i tshigs dbu mar gzugs so/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum rdo rje'i tshul du bya ste/ rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag pa ni bsal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ oM ha na d+hu na ma tha bi d+hwa na sa ya ud sa
130b6(rgyud 'grel): da ya phaT/ de nas chu la gsang sngags gdab bo/ /dkon mchog gsum dang byag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM hUM ha na ha na badzra badzro Na ha/ de nas chu la kI li kI la sngags dang phyag rgyas gdugs te sa la bsang gtor gtor bar bya'o/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i ngos kyis
130b7(rgyud 'grel): mthe'u chung gi sen? mo mnan la sor mo lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa ni kI li kI la'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags la oM kI li kI la badzra hUM phaT/ de nas sngags 'dis lan bdun sngags so/ /oM badzra ha ra hUM de nas sa'i cha gcig blangs te chu'i nang du lte ba nub tsam du
131a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs te/ khrus ras dang bcas par khrus bya'o/ /de nas sa'i cha lhag mas lag ba bkrus te/ dbyangs can gyi phyag rgyas nye reg bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo bkan pa las mdzub mo mthe bo'i drung du bzhag ste/ mthe bong yang mdzub
131a2(rgyud 'grel): mo'i tshigs dbus mar byas ba'i dbyangS can ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ oM sh+rur ti smri ti d+ha riNi hUM ha/ de nas sngags 'dis bsrung ba ste/ gtsug pud bcod par bya'o/ /oM su sid+d+hi ka ri swAhA de nas sa blangs te gsang sngags 'dis sngags shing g.yas nas bskor te/ nyi
131a3(rgyud 'grel): ma la bstan nas lus la bsku bar bya'o/ /oM b+hu dza hUM phaT/ de nas gsang sngags 'dis chu la dkrug par bya'o/ /na mo rat na tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): shtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye mahA yak+Sha sen pa ta ye na mo badzra kro d+hA ya daSh+TaM tka Ta b+hai ra bA ya tadya thA oM a mri ta kuN+Da li kha kha
131a4(rgyud 'grel): khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza bi spho Ta ya bi spho Ta ya/ sarba big+hA na ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzi bi tA na ta ka rA ya swAhA/ phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo bkan pa las gung mo dang srin lag bkug ste/ mthe be'i rtse mos mnan la mdzub mo dang
131a5(rgyud 'grel): mthe'u chung cung zad bkug ba ni chu dkrug ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /da nas sngags 'dis chu khyor ba gsum dkon mchog la dbul lo/ /oM re te ra te bud d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas gsang sngags 'dis rang gi mgo bor snyim pa gsum blugs so/ /oM a mri te hUM phaT/ de nas
131a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags dran bzhin du lci bas khrus bya'o/ /de nas khrus zin nas lag pa bkrus te/ gsang sngags de nyid kyis chu snyim pa gsum gyis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi lha nyid yid kyis spyan drangs te pad+ma'i gdan la
131a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs su bsol nas gsang sngags 'dis sku bsil lo /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mri Ta swAhA/ de nas gal ta lha khang du bzlas brjod byed na ni/ de'i tshe chu'i nang du bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsang sngags bzla bar bya'o/ /ci ste chu yi nang du zlos
131b1(rgyud 'grel): ? ni de'i tshe ske nu btsam man/ brla 'am/ byin pa nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs la mgo nas bzlas brjod kyi cho ga ji ltar byung ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ /dngos grub rab dang 'brid dang/ tha ma rnams kyi phyir lho nas rims kyis drung du phyin pa dang rkang pa bkrus
131b2(rgyud 'grel): te nye reg byas nas lha'i gnas su zhugs te/ lha rnams mngon sum du dmigs la phyag byas nas dam tshig la 'jug pa 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /oM bi ra dza ba'i dza mahA badzri/ sa ta sa ta/ sA ra te sA ra he/ tra yi tra yi bi d+ha ma ni saM b+ham dza ni/ ha ra ma ti sid b+ha
131b3(rgyud 'grel): a gre te swAhA/ de nas lus la bgegs bsal ba'i gsang sngags dar phyag rgya bstan pa bzhin du bya ba 'am/ yang na ci shes pas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ste/ de nas bsal bar bya'o/ /sngar bstan pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'am yang na rigs gsum gyis las
131b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'am/ bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis spos chu la yongs su bzlas nas thams cad du byas nas bsal bar bya'o/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di dag yin te/ oM Sh+ToM ban d+ha swAhA/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las thams cad pa'o/
131b5(rgyud 'grel): na mo mahA sh+rI yA ye oM sham me sa ma ye/ so mo sid d+hi/ id d+he sA d+ha ye/ sha be sha bad kA ri shAd kA ri/ a b+ho ha/ sarba artha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ pad+ma rigs kyi'o/ /oM kI li kwi la badzra hUM phaT/ rdo rje rigs kyi las thams cad ba'o/ /na mor ta na tra yA ya/ na ma:
131b6(rgyud 'grel): ShtsaN Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ tadya thA oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ oM a mri te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi thabs sbyor ro/ de dag nyid kyis me tog la sogs pa'i yang bgegs bsal bar bya'o/ /de nas de dag
131b7(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bdag po'i gsang sngags sam/ rigs kyi snying pos bsang bar bya'o/ /yang na lag pa g.yon pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas thams cad bsad bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa byin/ bskyed par bya ste/ bsal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las g.yon pa'i
