149a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /'dir yang glang po che'i sen mo dang mig sman sngon po kun darya'i sngags gyi cho ga bzhin du bsregs nas/ de'i 'og tu ? spos dang/ ru rta dang/ a ka ru nag po dang bcas pa phye mar byas la/ snga ma bzhin bkab ste/ lan stong phrag
149a6(rgyud 'grel): ? bzlas la mig sman byas na 'gro ba ma lus pa dbang du bsdud par 'gyur ro/ /oM Sh+TaM ban d+he zhes bya ba'i mig sman gyi ni du bas nges par dbang du byed/ 'od zer can gyi man ngag gis/ rta rmig bkang ste bskyod par bya/ zhes bya ba la/ sngags ni/ oM Sh+TaM
149a7(rgyud 'grel): ban d+ha swAhA/ 'di 'od zer can gyi mar gyis rta'i rmig pas snod bkang la/ rta'i rmig pas zhan gyi steng nas btab pa la du ba de bzung nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug gtor 'khor los sgyur ba'i mdun du mchod pa byas te/ sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /man
149b1(rgyud 'grel): tra ba ri zhes bya ba'i/ /yi ge thog mar yang dag ldan/ /nyin mtshan bzlas pa'i yang dag gnas/ /'jig rten gsum yang bran du 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ sngags ni/ oM man+t+ra ba re a mu kaM me swAhA/ da na ne sa pa ri pa ba sa ma na ya swAhA/ zhes
149b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa de mdun du bsams nas bzlas na bran du 'gyur ro/ /mi mgor skyes gnyis skud pa gnyis/ /gtum dbang rkang pa skrar bcas sdud/ /d+hu nan tsan da sgrar ni bcas/ /nyin mtshan tsha bas thebs par 'gyur zhes bya ba
149b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ sngags ni/ oM hUM nan tsa na da a mu ka na dzwa re na ma ra ya hUM phaT/ ces so/ /mi'i mgo ni mi'i thong pa'o/ /skyes gnyis skud pa ni bram ze'i skra'i skud pa'o/ /gtum dbang ni lha chen po ste/ de la phul ba'i me tog bzung ngo/ /rkang pa ni bsgrub bya'i
149b4(rgyud 'grel): rkang rjes kyi rdul lo/ /de dag mi'i thod par bzhag la/ /mi'i rje bar gyi rus pa'i srubs shing bram ze'i skra'i skud pas btags la/ sngags zlos bzhin du der sgra dang bcas par bsrubs na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skyes bu chen po yang rims tsha bas thebs?
149b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /dang po tha mar yang dag ldan/ /gnod sbyin ma yi yig bdun brjod/ /b+hak+ke buk+ke zhes bzlas bya/ /'bum phrag bzhi yi skal bzang 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la sngags ni oM b+hak+ke buk+ke swAhA zhes bya ba ste/ sngags 'di sran ma ma sha'i kha zas za?
149b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ 'bum phrag bzhir bzlas brjod byas na/ 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i yugs sa mo rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /chu skyor drug bzlas gnod sbyin dang/ /gnod sbyin mo yang mngon sum mthong/ /grong gi byang du n+ya gro d+ha'i/ /yam shing mngar
149b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum sbags pa bsreg ces bya ba la/ /dang por snga dro'i dus su nang du byung ba'i nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan chu skyor drug bzlas pa dang byin la/ /grong khyer gyis byang du n+ya gro d+ha'i yam shing mngar gsum la sbags pas sbyin bsreg byas na gnod sbyin
150a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gnod sbyin mo mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags ni/ oM b+hak+ke buk+ke swAhA/ zhes sngar bstan pa yin no/ /grub nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro/ /nags tshal chu 'gram ri ljongs su/ /sngo tshong
150a2(rgyud 'grel): 'thul zhing gnas par bya/ /dpa' bos rgyal bar byed pa dang/ mkhar gnas 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ /dpa' bo ni/ a khaM bI ra'i sngags te/ nags tshal la sogs pa'i gnas su sngo tshod 'thung zhing dpa' bo'i sngags
150a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po 'di bzlas na/ g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa dang/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i rgyal srid ster par 'gyur ro/ /oM ru tri ni swAhA/ zhes bya ba/ u mi'i snying po'i yig 'bru bzla/ /pri yang ku'i me tog bsreg /yid kyi re ba bskor
150a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /ga Na bo ya tshogs bdag snying/ /phyag 'tshal ga Na gsal bar bcas/ /yi ge 'bum phrag bzlas nas su/ /sngags pas rtag tu gu gul bsreg ces bya ba la/ /tshogs thams cad kyi nad nas rgyal bar byed pas na ga Na
150a5(rgyud 'grel): dza'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshogs bdag snying po'o/ /ji ltar rgyal bar byed ce na/ gu gul zhes bya ba smos te/ gu gul gyis sbyin sreg byas na'o/ /sngags ni/ oM ga Na ma ga Na dza ya swAhA zhes bya ba'o/ /dge ba'i 'dod 'jo'i rnam par
150a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'o/ /slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// ?/rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mgos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
150a7(rgyud 'grel): gtsug gtor dri ma med pa'i gzungs bklag cing mchod rten rtsa brgyad dam lnga gdab pa'i cho ga slob dpon po d+hi satwa sa mdzad pa bzhugs so// //'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba'i gzungs bklag cing mchod
150b1(rgyud 'grel): rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las bsdus pa/ gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs bzlas shing mchod rten gdab pa'i thabs la der gtogs pa thams cad phyi'i khrus
150b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang bya/ mgo mjug kun tu gnod sems dang/ brnab sems dang/ ma dad pa dang/ le lo dang/ gnyid la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon dang/ sems ma 'dres par bsdams shing gnod pa dang 'tshe ba'i las ma shor bar bya/ dkon
150b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum gyi yon tan gyi mthu'i khyad par dang/ mdo sde'i phan yon la yid ches pa dang/ dad cing gus pa cher bskyed/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje cher bskyed do/ /khyim pa zhig na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims bzung la/ de nas
150b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten gdab pa'i yo byad rnams bshams la/ 'jim pa brko ba nas btab cing dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i bar du mchod rten gyi cho ga bzhin du nang par snga dro thebs par bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga dang yo byad bsham pa yan chad legs
150b5(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ mchod rten 'debs pa'i zla la chos kyi sbyin pa dang/ 'phags pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskul bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ gser 'od dam pa dang/ rin po che'i tog dang/ gtsug na rin po che dang/ gtsug tor dri ma
150b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i gzungs kyi mdo sde tshar phyin rgyun mi 'chad par bklag /yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs rnam gnyis kyi 'dzab gra gcig kyang bzlas/ mdo sde dag kyang mchod cing chos kyi sbrin pa bsngo ba dang/ spyan drang ba la sogs pa sna la bgyis nas bklag
150b7(rgyud 'grel): go /mdo sde de snyed ma lhogs na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gzungs tshar gang byung zhig tu snying po bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mchod rten thebs/ mchod pa bsham/ gsung rab rdzogs nas bar skabs der cung zhig bsangs te /
151a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas snga dro dge 'dun sbyir tshogs nas mchod pa la sogs pa rim bzhin bgyi'o/ /mchod pa bshams pa'i thabs 'byor pa'i stobs ci nus pa dang sbyar te/ spos kyi maN+Dal chen po'i dbus su tshon phye 'am/
151a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog rin po che sna lnga'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bris pa'i dbus su pad+ma chen po'i steng du mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad shong ba'i an seng ge'i khril pad+ma bzhag la/ re'u chen po brgya dang/ ngos bzhi'i dbus su re'u gnyiS gnyis
151a3(rgyud 'grel): su bgyi ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad bsham pa'am/ mchod rten lnga pa zhig na 'tsham par sbyar te de la bzhugs su gsol/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gcig kyang dbus su bzhugs/ bar gyi snam bu gcig gam gnyis la pad+ma
151a4(rgyud 'grel): mang po dgram zhing 'phags pa gdan 'jom pa'i gdan du bshom zhing/ gzungs chab kyi bum pa kha rgyan can bzhi yan chad du 'byor pa ngos bzhir bzhag /de'i phyi rol gar 'os par bshos dang/ mchod yon la sogs pa mchod pa rgyas
151a5(rgyud 'grel): par dgram/ steng du bla re dang 'phan dang ba dan mang po brgya rtsa brgyad man chad rgyas pa dgram/ grwa bzhir pog phor a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang/ gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug go /sgo bzhir mchod rten bzhi bsham/ gzhan yang mchod pa ci nus
151a6(rgyud 'grel): su rgyas par bgyi'o/ /bum pa'i khar yungs kar dang bye ma yang bzhag cing bzlas la dur khrod dam/ phyogs kun tu yang gtor ro/ /dang por mchod pa bshams la dge 'dun tshogs nas phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag bgyi/
151a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ci nus kyis bsgom/ ting nge 'dzin las langs nas chos thams cad don dam par de lta bu yin la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid thugs su chung pas/ sku dang
151b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung dang thugs nam mkha' dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ sgrib pa mi mnga' zhing mthu dang byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go 'phang brnyes pa yang rung na/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni chos kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs te rmongs pas nyon rmongS
151b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang sdug bsngal mang pos gzir cing nyam thag pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyang thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas 'gro ba brgyud pa rnams su bdag gi gnyen bshes drin gyi zhing du ma gyur pa gang yang med cing/
151b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis kyang dang po byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed de 'gro ba mang po'i don dpag tu med pa bsgrub par dam bcas pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad bdag gis blangs zin pas/ 'di lta bu la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yal
151b4(rgyud 'grel): bar? dor ba ni/ mi rigs na 'di dag ji ltar sdug bsngal nas gdon/ bde ba la ni ji ltar dgod par bya snyam du snying rje dang/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson pa'i sems drag tu bskyed par bya'o/ /yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni dus
151b5(rgyud 'grel): ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dang mthu dman pa yin pas/ bdag nyid gcig pus 'phral du don rlabs po che 'di lta bu mi lcogs kyis/ ston pa bde bar gshegS paS sngon lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la rjes su thugs brtse nas kun
151b6(rgyud 'grel): nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang snying po la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs la brten te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang/ dam pa'i
151b7(rgyud 'grel): chos skyod ba thams cad gdan 'dzom par spyan drangs la mthu brtan pa dang dpung gnyen du gsol te/ da ltar ni 'phags pa'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis 'gro ba rnams la phan pa bsgrub par bya la/ phyis ni bdag nyid gcig
152a1(rgyud 'grel): pus gzhan la bltos pa med par yang thabs mkhas pa'i sgo sna tshogs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bla na med pa yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o snyam du bsam mo/ /de ltar snying rje dang/ byamS
152a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'og tu tsha tsha thebs nas bya ba'i rim pa la/ dang por bden pa bdar zhing gnas byin gyis brlab/ de nas spyan drang/ de nas bstod phyag bya/ de nas bsu ba'i arg+ha gsol/ de nas gdan la bzhugs su gsol/
152a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas sku khrus gsol/ khrus kyi smon lam bya/ de nas mchod pa dbul/ de nas yon chab sol/ de nas rang byung dpa' bos bstod/ gtor ma bsngo ba zhar la bya/ de nas sdig bshags/ de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba kun la rjes
152a4(rgyud 'grel): su yi rang bar bya/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba gdab/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs par gsol ba gdab/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ shis pa brjod pa/ sems can dang 'phags pa'i
152a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs la bsod nams bstab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bas skabs 'dir mchod rten gyi skor ba'i chigs su bcad pa dang/ de'i phan yon dang/ smon lam la sogs pa ci nus kyis rgya cher bklag/
152a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas bskor ba bdun yan chad bskor bar bgyi/ de nas bshags shing bzod par gsol/ de nas gshegs su gsol pa bgyi/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i pho? brang dang/ mchod pa'i tshogs
152a7(rgyud 'grel): bshams pa bden pa bdar zhing yid kyis bsngo ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po
152b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dog cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis/ deng kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dam tshig la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs kyi
152b2(rgyud 'grel): mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa'i gnas 'dir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'jom
152b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis bsgrub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ bcom ldan
152b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i zhing gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ tha gru che ba yangs pa reg na 'jam zhing bde ba/ dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba/ tsan
152b5(rgyud 'grel): dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bsung? dang ldan pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa/ mdza' rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs shing/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ mu tig gram bu brdal ba/ utpa la dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma
152b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gying? zhing ldem pas khebs par gyur cing/ chu bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dga' zhing 'phyo la lding bas brgyan pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka dag gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i
152b7(rgyud 'grel): dang? bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang/ lha'i nor bu dang/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang/ rin po che sbyangs pa dang/ me tog gi mgo lcogs dang/ 'bras bu mdzes par chags pa g.yur za zhing ldem la gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha 
153a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrol ba las dam pa'i chos kyi sgra 'byung ba dang ldan pa tshar du bsgrangs pas legs par brgyan pa'i sa gzhi la/ gzhal yas khang chen po rgyu rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams
153a2(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa rgyas par khengs pa'i 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnams par phye ba mdza' yas par rnam par gnas pa/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das
153a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i spyod yul/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang skyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu
153a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa mdza' yas pa rnam par rgyu ba/ chos
153a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi ro'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba chen pos brtan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yang dag par sgrub par byed par nye bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa/
153a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa'i gnas dran pa dang/ blo gros dang rtogs pa chen pos des par 'byung pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po bzhon pa yin pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
153a7(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po'i yon tan mdza' yas pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten pa'i gzhal med khang chen por gyur pa'i dbus su pad+ma'i gdan chen
153b1(rgyud 'grel): po seng ge'i khri'i steng na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i mchod rten rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa/ rgya dang tshad dpag tu med pa/ mchod rten gyi rnam pa'i bye dag dang/ legs pa'i khyad par thams cad dang ldan pa/ stobs
153b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi tshe ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi bdag nyid 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal zhing du gyur pa grangs med pa zhig rom me dkrigs par bzhugs par gyur ba'i mdza' 'khor bar gzhal med khang chen
153b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i nang du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ 'phags pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom pa'i gdan khri/ 'phags pa so so'i smon lam khyad par can gyi mnga' thang dang 'tsham par grub pa mdzes pa sha stag 'byung bar gyur cig /phyi nang
153b4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu yang cha rigs dang 'tsham par lha dang mi'i yo byad dam pa zhal zas dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ rol mo la sogs pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs pa/ phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang/ bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las 'byung ba'i
153b5(rgyud 'grel): sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhig rgyan klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /'phags pa thams cad gdan 'dzom nas de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig zhes lan gsum bzlas/ yang dkon mchog
153b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi bden pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis de
153b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du gyur cig ces lan gsum bzlas/ spyan drang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos chen po'i sku gdud ring bsrel dang/ sku gdud gi mchod rten dang/
154a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku'i mchod rten gzugs kyi tshul du rnam par bzhag pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ ang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/
154a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang/ bsrung ba med pa gsum dang/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
154a3(rgyud 'grel): stobs bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ thugs rje chen po dang/ ye shes la sogs pa yon tan bsags pa'i mchod rten dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ snying po dang/
154a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang/ 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten 'di lta ste/ lum bi'i tshal du bltams pa dang/ rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang/ mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang/ ba ra Na sir chos
154a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ rgyal po'i khab tu glang po che nor skyod btul ba dang/ lha las babs par lha yul nas gshegs pa dang/ yangs pa can du spre'us sbrang rtsi phul ba dang/ gyad yul du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po
154a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa dang brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdud gi gzugs dang/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po mdzad pas zhing khams 'di nyid mchod rten du gyur pa dang/ dpal ldan skyid pa'i gnas la sogs par dpal phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor
154a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po mdzad pa dang/ dbang po'i brag phug la sogs par mdo yang dag par bsdus pa dang ka ni ka'i mchod rten du sku gdud 'dus pa la sogs pa dang/ 'jam bu'i gling dang/ gling bzhi dang/ stong khams na mchod rten khyad par can ji snyed
154b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ gzhan yang sa bla dang/ bar snang dang/ lha yul dag na mchod rten ji snyed bzhugs pa dang/ phyogs bcu thams cad na mchod rten khyad par can 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed bzhugs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang/
154b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs thams cad na bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par bgyi ba dang/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams su deng dkon mchog dang/ mchod rten khyad par can dang bcas pa spyan drang ba'i gnas 'og
154b3(rgyud 'grel): min la sogs 'bar snang dang/ sa bla'i lha'i gzhal med khang dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen po ji lta ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs ba 'dir/ mchod pa kha na mtho ba med pa yongs su dag pa rgya chen po rnam pa
154b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang/ longs spyod pa las byung ba'i bsod nams spel bar mi mdzad kyang/ btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yongs su spel ba'i slad du na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gnas ma la dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ bsnyung
154b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rkyen dang/ sman gyi yo byad dang/ mchod rten la 'os pa'i bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bstabs shing spyan 'dren gyis mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis rnams par 'phrul ba mdzad de/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i tshul
154b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis gshegs shing bzhes par gsol/ dkon mchog dang/ mchod rten khyad par can dang bcas pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa thams cad spyan drang ba/ lha'i 'jig rten mtho ris na 'phags pa gang dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad
154b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi de kho na nyid rtogs shing gzigs pa dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa gsal ba/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang du gyur pa thams mkhas pa'i
155a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa dang ldan pas/ lha'i dbang po'i cha lugs kyis lha mang po dag la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing bzhugs pa dang/ lha mang po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa ste 'phags pa'i lam la gnas
155a2(rgyud 'grel): shing/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis bsal ba/ dran pa bsal zhing ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos thams cad kyi
155a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog bla na med pa'i chos dkon mchog dang/ tshogs thams cad kyi mchog bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la sngon bsnyen bkur mdzad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa/ 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyis chos dkar po'i phyogs rtag tu
155a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya cher sgel zhing bsrung ba/ sems can rnams kyi 'thab mo dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ phyi dgra dang/ nang 'khrug dang/ gnod pa dang/ nyam pa? ba dang/ mi bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ nang dang/ rims nad dang/
155a5(rgyud 'grel): mi ngas dang/ phyugs ngas dang/ mu ge dang/ lo nyes dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sngon sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po'i tshe/ theg pa chen po'i mdo ste dang/ 'dul ba dang/ chos mngon pa
155a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gzugs sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya la sogs pa zab cing rgya chen po bshad pa'i tshe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe nga'i bstan pa dam
155a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnam bzhi dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ rigs bzhi chos dang ldan zhing chos spyod pa thams cad dang/ lha yul dang/ yul 'khor dang
155b1(rgyud 'grel): grong dang/ grong khyer la sogs pa 'byung po'i tshogs dge ba rnams srungs shig ces zhal gyis bka' stsal cing/ de dag gis kyang dam tshig ma nos te lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ phyag bya ba'i gnas/ bkur sti bya ba'i gnas/ bla
155b2(rgyud 'grel): mar bya ba'i gnas/ btsun par bya ba'i gnas/ 'di lta ste/ 'og min na lha'i dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma gzhan gyi ris kyi lha dang/ bsam gtan bzhi pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ gnyis pa dang/ bsam gtan dang po'i ris kyi lha dang/
155b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'thab bral dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rim kyi lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/

155b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i chos spel par dam bcas pa/ tshangs dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ phyogs skyong bcu dang/ gza' chen po brgyad dang/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ phyogs kyi glang po che dang/ sde dpon dang/ lha mo dang/

156a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen chen mo dang/ lha sras gzhon nu dang/ klu sras gzhon nu dang/ rig sngags 'chang gzhon nu dang/ drang srong gzhon nu dang/ 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin gzhon nu dang/ ti ra ka la sogs pa dang/ gzi brjid chen
156b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i gzhon sde thams cad dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang/ lha'i gzo bo las thams cad pa dang/ bgegs kyi rgyal po log 'dren dang/ gtsug lag khang gi srung mar zhal gyis bzhes pa gnyug mar gnas pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas mthong ba/

156b4(rgyud 'grel): dang Da bsod nams bstab pa'i gnas dpal lha mo tsan po'i sku yon dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ pha ma dang gzhan yang mchod pa'i gnas sam/ drin bsab pa'i gnas sam/ snying rje 'i gnas gang yang rung ba dang/ bdag cag la

156b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhal mer ? chen po ji lta ba de lta bur g+hsegs par gsol/ bstod pa dang phyag 'tshal ba/ ye shes tshogs kyis bskyed pa'i sku/ /ming dang gzugs las rnam par grol/ /rtag dang spros las rab 'das kyang/ /bsnyel ba mi mnga' i rang
156b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can/ /dngos dang dngos med mdza' las dben/ /bsam brjod yul las shin tu 'das/ /ye shes rnams kyi gnas gyur ba/ /rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed ba'i sku/ /dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog ma/

157a3(rgyud 'grel): bar/ /cho 'phrul cig car so sor ston/ /cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad byung ba/ /lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ston pa mchog bzhugs gzhal med khang/ /dbyibs legs rnam par phye bas mdzes /kha dog sna tshogs spel legs su/

157a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang/ /de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/ de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /skar ma rab rib mar me dang/ /sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang/ /rmi lam glog
157a6(rgyud 'grel): dang sprin ste bur/ /'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya/ /mkhas pa gang dag rab tu sems dang zhing/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la go ma 'dor na/ /dzam bu chu bo gser gyi srang tshad ni/ /stong phrag brgya yang de dag mnyam pa min/ /mchod rten mchod

157b7(rgyud 'grel): par/ /ting 'dzin mi g.yo mnyam gzhag cing/ /dge ba'i dgongs pas gdan la bzhugs/ /gtsang gdang gdan khri yangs pa la/ /thogs med dog med pa'i sku/ /mnyam nyid tshul gyis bder bzhugs shing/ /bde bar sbyar ba ba zhes su gsol/

159a3(rgyud 'grel): chen 'od chags 'bar bas sku brgyan cing/ /byang chub phyogs kyi rgyan gyis mdzes lags kyang/ /'jig rten bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du/ /rin chen phreng ba se mo do shal dang/ /rgyan gyi dam pa khyad par mchog phul bas/ /byang chub

159a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ba dan ting 'dzin 'phan/ /lha dang mi yi mchod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzas pas rab brgyan pas/ /bla re 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan rol mo brjid/ /bdug smos dri zhim sil snyan spyin tshogs mdzes//

159b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ? du pad+ma las skyes te/ /ting 'dzin chos dang zas la longs spyod shog /'bru dang sman dang spos dang snying po dang/ rin po che sna lnga dbul ba/ bde gshegs mgon po dpag bsam 'khor dang bcas/ /bsod nams ye shes sku lnga mthar phyin pa//
159b2(rgyud 'grel): tshal kyi longs spyod bstod sti tshul tsam du ? 'bru lnga spos lnga spos lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga/ /snying po ldar bcas rgyal bar rab bsngags pa/ /bdag gzhan don gyi snying por 'di phul bas/ /'gro la phan phyir tshul khrims mchog ldan te/ /rin chen gter las
159b3(rgyud 'grel): ? la phan 'dogs shog /bde gshegs kun bzang mngon par sangs rgyas te/ /rdo rje gdan la mngon par bzhugs pa na/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gyis gus bcas pas/ /sngags grub rgyal pos yungs kar phul ba ltar/ /deng 'dir ston pas bdud
159b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi tshar gzad nas/ /skye rgan 'chi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /bdag dang mdza' yas 'gro ba kun bsgral nas/ /rdo rje gdan la mngon par sangs rgyas shog /bkra shis shing zhal dri zhing byin phebs zhing 'jig rten du yun ring por bzhugs su
159b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba/ bde gshegs kun bzang mthong bas bkra shis ltar/ /rgyal ba 'khor bcas deng 'dir bkra shis shog /ngan sdig log pa'i tshogs rnams bcom gyur nas/ /rgyal sras rigs 'dzin tshogs rnams 'phel dar zhing/ /zhal mthong
159b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis bde ba'i mchog brnyes nas/ /nyi ltar zhal dro zla ltar 'od gsal zhing/ /bdag dang 'gro la zhal dro byin che nas/ /bskal pa mthar thug bar du bzhugs su gsol/ /spyan dbye ba'i smon lam du gsol pa/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags
159b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dkon mchog gsum phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs su gsol te/ chu gtsang dang/ sug chab dang/ 'o ma dang/ spos chu dang sman chab kyis sku khrus gsol bas bdag
160a1(rgyud 'grel): dang mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma dang/ dus gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dag nas rnam par dag pa'i sku dang ldan par gyur cig /arg+ha gsol bas bdag dang
160a2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thob par gyur cig /dri chab kyis sku la gtor te byugs pas bdag dang mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ting nge
160a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyi chu yis g.yeng ba'i dri ma thams cad rnam par bsam te bde zhing tshim par gyur cig /spos gsol bas bdag dang mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag ste/ yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig/
160a4(rgyud 'grel): me tog phul bas bdag dang mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me phul bas sems can thams cad ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang
160a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan par gyur cig /bshos dang zhal zas gsol bas sems can thams cad bkres pa'i sdug bsngal bsal nas yid bzhin gyi zas skom dang ldan pa 'gyur cig /'bru rnam pa lnga phul bas sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi lo
160a6(rgyud 'grel): tog 'phel zhing dge ba'i lo tog dus kun tu rgyas par gyur cig /spos lnga gsol bas sems can thams cad tshul khrims rnam par dag ste/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig /sman lnga gsol bas sems can thams cad
160a7(rgyud 'grel): nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i sdug bsngal dang bral nas thugs rje'i sman gyis dus gsum gyi nang las thar bar gyur cig /rin po che sna lnga gsol bas yid kyi nor bu rin po ches sems can thams cad kyi dgos dgu yid bzhin du bskongs
160b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /snying po lnga gsol bas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur cig /rgyan dang na bza' gsol bas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub
160b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i ngo tsha mkhyen pa'i na bza' dang ldan pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig /bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang gdugs la sogs pa phul bas bdud bzhi lals rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang ldan nas
160b3(rgyud 'grel): theg pa bla na med pa la gnas par gyur cig /yungs kar gsol bas 'jig rten ji srid gnas pa'i bar du 'jig rten na bzhugs shing sems can gyi don mdzad nas mchod pa'i don du gyur cig /bkra shis phul bas mi dge zhing bkra mo
160b4(rgyud 'grel): shis pa thams cad bsal nas bu gcig pa'i ma ltar byams pa chen po rgyas nas bkra shis byin che bar gyur cig /'phags pa'i sku gdung rin chen ring bsrel snod/ /rnying bcos byi dor bgyis shing mchod pa dang/ gsar brtsigs mchod
160b5(rgyud 'grel): cing khrus chab gsol ba dang/ /bstod dang skor dang gus pa bgyis pa dang/ /smon lam zab mo sems yid dang btab pa'i/ /byin brlabs yon tan khyad par chen po'i mthus/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad dang/ /dad mos grogs byed
160b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang rnams/ /smon lam mthu stobs khyad par chen po yis/ /dang ba'i yid kyis mchod pa 'di brtsigs pas/ /des na bdag cag sdig sgribs byang gyur te/ /bla med byang chub bdag cag myur thob shog /shes rab mchog gis bdagmed
160b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs chung de/ /ye shes chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i chos sku spos med pa/ /so so rang rig de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba'i don du dka' ba rnams mdzad de/ /bsod nams chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi
161a1(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs sku gang snang ba/ /yon tan mdza' dag rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das pa'i sngon rol nas/ /sems can don du byang chub thugs bskyed de/ /spyod pas
161a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don la rab brtson pa/ /bla med 'bras bu brnyes la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs kyiS spyod pa mdzad pa mthar phyin cing/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen yongs bskor nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul ni rab bstan pa/ /sku gdung bzhag pa dag la
161a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sku gdung phra mor gsil ba'i ring bsrel snod/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa chos kyi tshul/ /sems can rnams kyis mchod pa bya ba'i rten/ /gzugs brnyan nyid kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sngon gyi smon lam chen
161a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i rgyun mnga' bas/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun te/ /bang rim bum pa srog shing tshu la bstan pa/ /rgyu yi chos su bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ma 'dres chos/ /thugs rje chen po tshad med
161a5(rgyud 'grel): rab mnga' bas/ /'khor lo char khabs lta bu'i tshul bstan pa/ /'bras bu'i chos su bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mi 'jigs bsrung ba med dang bdud las rgyal/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan mngon par mkhyen mnga' bas/ /rdo ring them
161a6(rgyud 'grel): skas? rgyal mtshan dril bu tog /chos sku'i rten du bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos kyi grags pa ye shes bzhi la sogs/ /yon tan ngo mtshar rmad kyi tshogs rdzogs shing/ /gang gi chos kyi rgyal por mtshan gsol pa/ /bdag nyid chen
161a7(rgyud 'grel): po dag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rang bzhin rnam dag chos dbyings de bzhin nyid/ /spros pa'i dri mas ma gos dkar ba la/ /rin chen sbras pas mtshan mchog rdzogs pa'i sku/ /'gro don legs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de
161b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sku gdung dbyibs bcas chos sku dang /gang gis mthod thos dran nam reg kyang rung/ /mtho ris dpal dang thar mchog bde thob pa/ /yon tan rmad tshogs mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa dbul ba/ ye shes tshogs rdzogs
161b2(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum lhun gyis grub/ /bzhi bcom drug ldan mi gnas mya ngan 'das/ /thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor ba'i 'dam bskams pa/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /dri med bdud rtsi 'khor ba'i nad rnams 'joms/ /don
161b3(rgyud 'grel): dam dmigs med bde gshegs 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /ye shes nyi mas ma rig mun 'joms pa/ /'phags pa'i lam gyur chos la mchod pa 'bul/ /byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms tshul/ /bde gshegs rin chen padmo las
161b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rtags/ /rin chen bzhi las mngon du gyur pa'i sku/ /rigs bzhi'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /lho phyogs 'dzam gling rin chen dkyil 'khor na/ /ye shes dpag yas thugs rjes 'brel ba'i sku/ /rang 'byung sprul pa'i mchod
161b5(rgyud 'grel): rten chen po dang/ /yid bzhin lhun gyis grub la mchod pa 'bul/ /nub phyogs bde ldan pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor na/ /thabs kyi bye brag ring bsrel bskur bstan pa/ /dpe med bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang/ /rmad grags chos kyi
161b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings la mchod pa 'bul/ /byang phyogs bsam yas yid bzhin dkyil 'khor na/ /thabs dang shes rab gsal zhing mchod pa'i gdung/ /yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang/ /khams gsum bde rgyas sgron la mchod
161b7(rgyud 'grel): ba 'bul/ /shar phyogs lus 'phags ye shes dkyil 'khor na/ /byams pa 'khor ba 'dren mdzad ring bsrel sku/ /byams ldan bsod nams gter gyi mchod rten dang/ /mthar legs g.yung drung rdzogs la mchod pa 'bul/ /dri
162a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phang dang po dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi/ /lus sems tshor dang chos rnams rjes su dran/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid mngon rtogs pa/ /rig pa'i shes rab bskyed la mchod pa 'bul/ /khri 'phang gnyis pa yang
162a2(rgyud 'grel): dag spyod ba bzhi/ /sdig pa mi bskyed mi dge'i chos spong zhing/ /dge ba'i chos bskyed tshogs gnyis rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rtog pa'i bag chags bral la mchod pa dbul/ /khri 'phang gsum pa rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi/ /'dun dang sems
162a3(rgyud 'grel): dang dpyod dang brtson 'grus rnams/ /spong ba'i 'du byed ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /thogs med 'gro don mdzad la mchod pa 'bul/ /khri 'phang bzhi pa snang ba'i dbang po lnga/ /dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin dbang po dang/ /shes rab dbang po
162a4(rgyud 'grel): chos la dbang sgyur ba/ /'dod dgu dge rtsa spyod la mchod pa 'bul/ /'gyur med bum rten 'degs pa'i stobs lnga ste/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin stobs/ /shes rab stobs kyiS nyon mongs zil gyis gnon/ /mthu dbang mngon
162a5(rgyud 'grel): du gyur la mchod pa 'bul/ /bum pa mngon 'phags byang chub yan lag bdun/ /dran dang chos 'byed brtson 'grus dga' ba dang/ /shin tu sbyangs dang ting 'dzin btang snyoms kyis/ /'grub 'gyur thogs pa med la mchod pa 'bul//
162a6(rgyud 'grel): la khyil 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /lta dang rtog dang ngag dang las gyi mdza' / /'tsho dang rtsol dang dran dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /'phags pa'i lam nas 'jug la mchod pa 'bul/ /srog shing mkhyen pa bcu yi bdag nyid de/ /
162a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rtsal mchog gis/ /dam chos bdud rtsi 'dzin pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /shes rab don kun rig la mchod pa 'bul/ /'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer bzhag gsum/ /shes rab spyan ldan thabs
162b1(rgyud 'grel): chen mngon gzigs te/ /shes bya'i bag chags sbyangs pas thogs pa med/ /ye shes phun sum tshogs la mchod pa 'bul/ /char khabs skyab chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid de/ /gdul bya'i dus dang sems kyi rgyud mkhyen nas/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs
162b2(rgyud 'grel): rab brtson pa/ /phyi mthar yun rings bzhugs la mchod pa 'bul/ /dang brtson shugs kyis lus ngag sems btud de/ /brtson 'grus drag po'i rin chen sna lnga dang/ /'byung ba lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang/ /sku gdud ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa 'bul
162b3(rgyud 'grel): sku gdung thugs la sprul pa'i rgyal pa'i sras/ /rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis phyi mthar gzhan don mdzad/ /skye 'gag med pa'i don gyis blo sbyangs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /rnam grol thar lam mchog tu rab brtson pa/ /zur bzhi ya
162b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rig pa'i skyes bu'i tshogs/ /rten 'brel don kun rig pas rang sangs rgyas/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun chags la mchod par 'bul/ dge ba bcus bskyed skal ldan sangs rgyas zhing/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis ngan song mdza' spangs shing/ /rdzu
162b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul shugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /'jig rten srung ma'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul/ /rdo ring them skas chu srin rgyal mtshan dang/ /gdugs dang ba ngan dar gyi cod pan dang/ /pad+ma nyi zla sil snyan lha rdzas kyis/ /tshangs pa'i
162b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs ltar dmigs pa dag par mchod/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus bsgyur ba/ /yon chab bdug spos mar me dri chab dang/ /me tog dam pa bshos gtsang mnyes pa'i mchog /mchod yon rnam lnga'i tshogs kyis mnyes
162b7(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ /dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa yi/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten grub pa'i rdzas/ /kun bzang rnam dag mchod pa'i sprin phung gis/ /nam mkha' gad? bar dmigs te mchod par bgyi/ /srid gsum 'khor ba'i 'dam las
163a1(rgyud 'grel): drang ba dang/ /'gro don mdzad pa'i thugs dam bskad blad du/ /ye shes nyi mas mtshan pa'i skyon spangs te/ /byams pa'i thugs rjes mchod pa bzhes su gsol/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod 'os bla ma'i rnams/ /spyan
163a2(rgyud 'grel): drangs phyag bgyis bstod dang bkur ba'i mthus/ /sngon gsags las kyi sgrib bkun byang nas/ /'gro drug tshogs rdzogs mngon par sangs rgyas shog /'phags pa'i mchod rten la mchod yon arg+ha gsol ba ni/ mch+d rten sku yi cha lugS
163a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'og gi rmang bting ye shes bzhi/ /gyen du khri 'phang rnam thar gsum/ /chags med pad+ma'i gdan steng du/ /bum pa zlum pos chos kyi rje/ /gser gyi bre phul 'od zer 'phro/ /srog shing drang srong bla na med/ /'khor lo bcu gsum ye shes
163a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ /'bar ba rdo rje ye shes lnga/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /chu po gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /arg+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad do/ /sku yi mchod rten thams cad la/ /bkra shis
163a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ /mchod rten gsung gi cha lugs ni/ /man ngag sngags kyi snying po brjod/ /bzlas brjod gsung rab bcu gnyis brjod/ /don dam sgra skad yul las 'das/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs
163a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas 'dir/ /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /arg+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /gsung gi mchod rten thams cad la/ /bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'du la na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /mchod
163a7(rgyud 'grel): rten thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /dpe med bsam yas nam mkha' che/ /ting 'dzin yin pas cir yang gsal/ /ye shes yin pas sna tshogs rtogs/ /shes rab yin pas mkhyen par rtogs/ /thams cad mkhyen pas lhun gyis grub/ /don dam sems rtogs yul
163b1(rgyud 'grel): las 'das/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /arg+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /thugs kyi mchod rten thams cad la/ /bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs
163b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bzhes su gsol/ /bla med mchod rten cha lugs ni/ /rin chen ? pa'i srid rtse nas/ /tsin d+ha ma Ni ye shes bzhi/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /chu po gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /arg+ha'i rgyun yang mi
163b3(rgyud 'grel): 'chad de/ /bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /yid kyi mchod rten cha lugs ni/ /nam mkha' i dbyings dang rgya mtsho'i 'jing/? /byang chub sems kyi mchod rten spyi/ /snang zhing stong la stong zhing gsal/ /yid kyi mchod rten
163b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /arg+ha'i rdzun yang mi 'chad de/ /bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol /rang bzhin mchod rten ye shes sku/ /thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po che/ /mtshan ma'i sdug
163b5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal yongs gsal bas/ /sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /arg+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /rang bzhin mchod rten thams cad la/ /bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul
163b6(rgyud 'grel): na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /sprul pa'i mchod rten ting 'dzin sku/ /byams shing snyoms pa kun gyi mgon/ /thugs rje chen po skyo dub? med/ /nub byang rgyal po mig nad sel/ /dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas 'dir/ /chu bo
163b7(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /arg+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /sprul pa'i mchod rten thams cad la/ /bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /gzugs brnyan mchod rten shes rab sku/ /bdud kyi sde dang gshin rje'i
164a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor/ /srin po'i tshogs dang lha ma yin/ /gnod sbyin ma rung thams cad kyi/ /gzi byin mdangs stobs 'joms mdzad cing/ /gnod sbyin mang po'i rgyun sreng gcod/ /gzugs brnyan mchod rten bzhugs dgu la/ /
164a2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyu bzhin du/ /arg+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /'phags pa'i mchod rten la bstod pa/ /rang 'byung
164a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dren pa dpa' bo lha yi lha/ /bcom ldan shAka thub sku gdung ring bsrel snong/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mchod gnas mchog bzhugs pa/ /bang rim ri rab lta bu'i khri 'phang la/ /bum rten pad+ma bum bzang snying po ni/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs
164a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'bras bu yid bzhin sku/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pas brgya byin lus dag cing/ /mthar gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku thob pa/ /yon tan tshogs kyi sku gdung mthu chen bzhugs/ /bum pa dbyibs legs srog shing drang brtan la/ /'khor lo
164a5(rgyud 'grel): gdugs phreng rim pas 'gebs pa'i steng/ /'od stong nyi dbyibs char khabs gdugs bris te/ /zla ba dril bu cod pan 'jig rten skyong/ /phreng ba them skas rgyal mtshan ba dan brgyan/ /rgyan la rgyan bkod 'jig rten kun gyi rgyan/ /chos bzang
164a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam snang rnam pa thams cad zhal/ /gzugs kyi khyad par blta bas mi ngoms khyed/ /ye shes tshogs rdzogs chos kyi sku lags te/ /rnam rtog bral bas yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /dran pa nyer gzhag rmad gi khri 'phang brtan/ /brtson 'grus 'phang
164a7(rgyud 'grel): dag khro 'phang gnyis pa legs/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi khri 'phang? gsum la dge /dbang po lnga yi khri 'phang bzhi pa bzang/ /bum pa byang chub yan lag bum rten stobs/ /bre legs 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ srog shing shes
164b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu stobs bcu gdugs phreng bcu/ /gdugs phreng ma 'dres dran pa nyer gzhag gsum/ /thugs rje 'phags pa'i chos kyi char khabs lding/ /bla med go 'phang gdugs kyi gnam 'phang mtho/ /'jig rten mun sel ye shes zla ba bsal/ /tshangs pa'i gsung
164b2(rgyud 'grel): gi dril bu sgra stan 'khrol/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub dar gyi cod pan 'phur/ /bden bzhi phan 'dogs 'jig rten skyong bzhi btsun/ /tshul khrims phung po me tog phreng ba bzang/ /skyon bral bsrung ba'i ngos kyi them skas mdzes/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i
164b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ngan su/ /'dud bzhi 'joms pa'i chu srin rgyal mtshan grags/ /mi 'jigs bzhi yi rdo ring seng ge brjid/ /'di 'dra'i dam chos ngo mtshar rmad kyi rnams/ /thabs mkhas thugs rjes mchod rten tshul du sprul/ /nam mkha' i khams la mtshon bkye ji bzhin
164b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ /yon tan khyad par kha dog dbyibs su bsgyur/ /dpal gnas rin chen 'byung gnas chen po ba/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung tshul/ /dpal 'byung ka ni ka dang rab 'gyur tshul/ /bsod nams phung pos yul khams byin chags shing//
164b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sprul pa'i phrin las rdzogs par mdzad/ /sa bcu'i rgyal tshab byams pa'i gtsug gi rgyan/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid chen po la/ /ri lung nags tshal chu klung mkha' gnas pa'i/ /lha tshogs dad pas gnam sa kun nas dkrigs/
164b6(rgyud 'grel): sdom brtson rgyal sras 'khor bzhi khyim bdag dang/ /dbus mdza' i rgyal khams mi tshogs kun 'dus nas/ /me tog phreng bas spel legs mdzes pa dang/ /tsan dan dra bshos mar me'i rol mor bcas/ /bkra shis glu dbyangs bstod pa'i
164b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan lhab lhub rgyan/ /lus ngag yid gsum dang bas mchod pa bgyi/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi la mchod cing bstod pa/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor bsrung/ /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po 
165a1(rgyud 'grel): nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang/ /byang phyogs na ni ku be ra/ /rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag /'jig rten skyod pa grags ldan pa/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyod? bar byed/ /sde po che la stobs po che/ /pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'jomS//
165a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mi thub thul par dka' / /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang/ /lha yi g.yul yang myong par byed/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal//
165a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po bzhi po? bdag nyid chen po dam tshig can sangs rgyas mthong ba/ chos thos pa/ dge 'dun la brten pa bstan pa bsrung ba/ lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde
165a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon dang bcas/ mdag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog tu bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu dkon mchog gsum gyi zham 'bring mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam pa'i chos spel ba/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma
165a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams bzhi dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ rigs bzhi dang/ yul dang/ yul phyogs dang/ grong dang grong khyer dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ mchod rten dang/ skye dgu'i tshogs
165a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ /sba ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung pa dang/ yongs su bskyad pa dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spangs pa dang/ mtshon cha spang pa dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/
165a7(rgyud 'grel): dug bsad pa dang/ mtshams bcad pa dang/ sa bcing bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya dag tu 'tsho bar shog/ ston brgya dag ni mthong bar shog /phyogs skyong ba bcu la bstod cing mchod pa/ dbang po rdo rje 'chad ba'i lha/ /lha'i rgyal po gdon gyi
165b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me ste sreg bya bzhes pa'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /brnab sems gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje
165b2(rgyud 'grel): be con thogs pa'i lha?/ /ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /lho phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /
165b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha/ /bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /tshig bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste//
165b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung mtshams phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin lag na pe con thogs/ /nor bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /byang phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang dang
165b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /dbang ldan gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gi klu dang sa yi lha/ /sa 'dzin dang ni lag chen dang/ /dam tshig shes pa'i lha rnams la/ /mchod
165b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang/ /zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang/ /gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /phyogs skyong bcu po bdag nyid chen po dam tshig can sangs rgyas mthong ba/ /chos
165b7(rgyud 'grel): thos pa/ /dge 'dun la brten pa/ /bstan pa bsrung ba/ lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ bu dang bcas pa/ tsha bo dang bcas pa/ spun dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa/ sde dpon dang bcas pa/ mngag pa dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa
166a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum gyi zham 'bring mdzad cing/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam pa'i chos spel ba/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i
166a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam bzhi dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ rigs bzhi dang/ yul dang yul phyogs dang/ grong dang grong khyer dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ mchod rten dang/ skye dgu'i tshogs thams cad bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ sba ba dang yongs su
166a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spangs pa dang/ mtshon cha spangs pa dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug bsang pa dang/ mtshams bcad pa dang/ sa bcing bar mdzad du
166a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ lo brgya dag tu 'tsho bar shog /ston brgya dag tu mthong bar shog /lha klu sde brgyad dang 'byung po'i tshogs dam tshig can thams cad la mchod yon arg+ha gsol ba/ 'khor du gtogs pa'i sde brgyad po/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang//
166a5(rgyud 'grel): dri za lha min nam mkha' lding/ /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /rigs nas rigs kyi gtso mdzad pa/ /mchod 'os gyur pa thams cad la/ /rim gro gus pa mchog bskyed nas/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs/ /sa
166a6(rgyud 'grel): chu bar snang gnas bcas pa'i/ /byams sems ldan pa thams cad la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dang/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing/ /nyin
166a7(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog /'di na rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis/ /shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde bar shog /de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /sdig pa bshags pa/ khams gsum
166b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro lnga skye gnas bzhi/ /'khor ba'i rgyud du gtogs kun dang/ /rigs mthun skyes pa bdag cag gis//dug gsum dbang gis sgro gsum nas/ /las dang nyon mongs skye ba'i rgyu/ /mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga/ /mi dge bcu dang log pa bzhi/ /
166b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa rnams dang kun sbyor dang/ /de yi rgyu dang 'bras bu dang/ /yun ring 'khor zhing mi khom brgyad/ /mtho ris thar pa'i lam 'gog cing/ /bdag dang gzhan la yongs gdud pa'i kha na ma tho ci bgyis pa/ /chos dbyings phyogs bcu dus gsum
166b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rigs rnams kun la rab zhugs pa'i/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams la/ /ma lus bshags shing bsdam par bgyi/ /rjes su yi rang pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras bcas dang/ /rang rgyal nyan thos thams cad dang/ /'gro
166b4(rgyud 'grel): kun bsod nams ye shes kyi/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad dang/ /skyon rnams spong zhing yon tan thob/ /phyogs bral mnyam gzhags dang ni /de yi 'bras bu'i khyad par dang//dge pa'i bshes dang dam chos 'dzin/ /byang chub sems
166b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog skyed byed cing/ /bdag gzhin smin par byed pa dang/ /lam dang 'bras bu thob pa dang/ /bla med go 'phang mchog thob pa/ /de dag kun la yi rang zhing/ /bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa yis/ /'gro ba kun la bde slad du/ /'khor gsum dag pa'i
166b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis bsgrub/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /bde gshegs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /rigs 'khrungs lung bstan dbang bskur ba/ /byang chub
166b7(rgyud 'grel): rim par sangs rgyas pa/ /dam chos btsun par mdzad pa dang/ /gdul ba'i don la gzhes pa dang/ /rgya che zab pa rtogs dka' bas/ /bskul ba'i don la gzhes rnams las/ /chos kyi snang ba rgyas pa dang/ /'gro ba kun la bde ba dang/ /rgyal?
167a1(rgyud 'grel): zab pa bstan pa dang/ /sngon gyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir/ /tshangs sgra? 'dra bar tshul bsgyur te/ /rim gro gus pas mchog bskyed cing/ /thal mo sbyar bar rab btud de/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /yongs su mya
167a2(rgyud 'grel): ngan las mi 'da' par bzhugs su gsol pa/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams na/ /bde gshegs bdud bzhi des bcom zhing/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas nas 'khor lo bskor/ /'gro don sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad/ /'gro ba gzhan dag
167a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba dang/ /'du byed mi rtag bstan pa dang/ /gdul bya brtson pa bskyed slad du/ /mya ngan 'da' ston bzhed rnams la/ /thal mo sbyar ba rab btud de/ /'gro ba kun la phan pa dang/ /bde ba bskyed par bya ba dang/ /chos tshul yun ring spel ba'i
167a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir?/ /chos dbyings bstan pa'i lugs bzhin du/ /mya ngan mi 'da' g.yung drung sku/ /stug po bkod pa'i bdag nyid rnams/ /bskal pa'i mthar yad bzhugs su gsol /ba med byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i
167a5(rgyud 'grel): sras ? dbang gyur spyan gyur tshad mar gyur/ /'gro don mdzad par dbang gyur pa/ /byang chub blo mnga' dgongs su gsol/ /ji ltar sngon g yi rgyal ba dang/ /rgyal sras dpa' bo de dag gis/ /'gro la phan dang bde slad du/ /byang chub snying por bzhugs
167a6(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ /dngos po kun dang bral ba dang/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /bdag med chos kyi bdag nyid kyi/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong nyid rang bzhin thugs bskyed ltar/ /bdag dang
167a7(rgyud 'grel): rim mthun? gzhan gyis kyang/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed bgyi/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad la shis par brjod pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi byin rlabs dang/ /'phags pa kun gyi thugs
167b1(rgyud 'grel): rje dang/ /chos nyid dag pa'i mthu dang ni/ /bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa yis/ /khams gsum rgyud lnga gnas bzhin/ /gzugs can gzugs can ma yin dang/ /'du shes me dang yod min dang/ /sems can ris rnams ji snyed pas/ /so so'i skye bor
167b2(rgyud 'grel): gtogs pa'i sa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad myur spangs te/ /'phags lam bde ba mya ngan 'das/ /nges par legs par rtogs gyur cig /'phags lam brnyes pa thams cad kyis/ /gong ma'i yon tan mchog thob cing/ /bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub
167b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /bde ba dag la gzhol gyur cing/ /sems can dang 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la bsod nams bstab pa/ 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang/ /da ltar dus dang phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams na gang bzhugs pa'i/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas
167b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis/ /bsod nams dad ni ye shes tshogs/ /de yi rgyu dang 'bras bu dang/ /sbyor ba dang ni dngos dang mjug /sems can kun la bstabs mkhyen ltar/ /bdag dang sems can kun gyis kyang/ /rang gi bsod nams ma lus pa/ /rdzogs sangs
167b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bde ma thob pa'i/ /sems can rnams la bstab par bgyi/ /sbyor ba dang ni mthong ba dang/ /bsgom dang mi slob lam brnyes pa'i/ /'phags pa'i tshogs? rnams kun la yang/ /de ngag rab tu bstab par bgyi/ /de dag gi? dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i
167b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu bsngo ba/ bla ma'i bla ma dkon mchog dang/ /mchod rten khyad par 'khor bcas la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing gshegs pa dang/ /yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba dang/ /skyabs gsol lus phul sems bskyed dang/ /shis pa brjod cing gsungS
167b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /gzhan yang dge bci bsags pa/ /thams cad bla med byang chub bsngo/ /des ni sems can thams cad dang/ /'phags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis/ /ye shes sa yi lam gyi mchog /'jug dang gnas dang 'phar ba dang/ /spyod pa nyid kyi?
168a1(rgyud 'grel): yul rnams ni/ /go rim bzhin du rab rtogs te/ /sku gsum mkhyen bzhi'i tshogs rdzogs shing/ /bla med sangs rgyas grub par smon/ /'di bris bsod nams ci mchis pa/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad dang/ /
168a2(rgyud 'grel): ? pa bdag gis sdig bgyis pa/ /thams cad ma lus so sor bshags// //'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang pa'o gzungs bklag cing mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ /
168a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa/ slob dpon chen po bo d+hi satwa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bi ma la uShti?  Sha'i gzungs dang/ rgyud dag las tso
168a4(rgyud 'grel): tya dang/ tsha tsha gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga /A tsArya d+harma kIrti dang/ badzra kIrti dang/ badzra bo d+hi la sogs pa las thos nas/ slob dpon de dag gis lung bstan te/ gtan la phab par byas pa'o/ /de la dang po tse tya gdab pa'i sa bzhi ni/ khang pa
168a5(rgyud 'grel): 'am/? yol bas bskor ba 'am/ rab la sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i nang bde bar dkyil 'khor du bya ba'i sa brtag pa ni /dkyil 'khor gyi zabs su khru gang brkos las rnag byung na bzang/ rus pa dang gyo mo la sogs pa byung na yang/ de dag ma lus
168a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsal te sa brkos pa de'i dbus su/ gser dang dngul dang zangs dang kham pa gang 'byor pa snod sbyar ma'i nang du rin po che dang/ 'bru dang sman sna lnga dang spos dag blugs nas/ kha bcad de bzhag las bzang pos bkad ste/ de'i steng du dkyil 'khor
168a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dom do gru bzhi 'phang du khru gang pa legs pa zhig byas la/ dkyil 'khor de'i ngos gcig kyang khru gang gru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor chung du gnyis gnyis mgo snyoms te/ dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'brel bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor de'i steng du?
168b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og dang/ ras la sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i bla re 'dom phyed dang gsum/ khru bzhi pa yan chad 'dom gang yan chad bre/ 'phan brgyad yan chad du 'byor pa gdags/ phyogs bzhir rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs/ bla re de'i dbus su dar ram ras sam shog /
168b2(rgyud 'grel): gu srid mda' gang zheng du khru gang lhag tsam grwa sbyar/ phyogs bzhir mchod rten dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ 'phang lo bdun dang/ ldan pa re res bres te/ de'i bum pa'i dbus nas thad kar bi ma la uSh+ThI? Sha'i gzungs sngags 'di gur kum gyis
168b3(rgyud 'grel): bri/ de'i sngags la/ oM na ma strai ya dzhwa kA nAM sarba ta thA ga ta/ h+ri da ya garb+he/ dzra la dzwa la d+harmA d+hA tu garb+he/ che ge mo/ saM hA ra A yu(rgyud 'grel): saM sho dah ya/ sarba pA paM/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ uSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he/ hUM hUM hUM hUM aM paM saM dza:swAhA/ de nas mchod rten de'i
168b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phang lo'i steng du/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'dir gdugs lta bur 'khyil bar gur kum gyis bri/ de'i sngags le/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ mahA tsin d+ha ma Ni dzA la na sba ga ra/ gam b+hI re A karSha ya/ A karSha ya/ A yundA? ra/ A yund+ha ra/ sand+ha ra/ sand+ha ra/
168b5(rgyud 'grel): kA na kA NA k+Shi Ni kSi Ni/ k+Shu N+Tu? k+Shu N+Tu?/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ye/ tiThTha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA b+hu ba na sA ga re/ saM? sho d+ha ya mA na/ sarba pA paM/ bi ma le/ dza ya dza ya/ dza ya la ba d+he/ sphu Ta sphu Ta/ spho Ta ya spho Ta ya/ big te A ba ra Ne/ d+ha ya ha ri Nai hUM hUM hUM/ mri dyu?
168b6(rgyud 'grel): daN+Da t+ta re/ a b+ha ye pra te/ uSh+NI Sha bya ba lo ki te/ sa man+ta mu khe/ sa man+ta bya ba lo ki te/ mahA mA ye/ mahA pA sha d+ha re/ a mo g+ha bi ma le/ A kar Sh+ya? a kar Sh+ya/ a kaD Dhya ya/ A kaDDhya? ya/ b+hA ra b+hA ra/ saM b+hA ra/ saM b+hA ra/ in dri ya/ be sho d+ha ni/ b+hU 'i?
168b7(rgyud 'grel): ta b+hu dze/ mahA mu drA baM? lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya/ sid+d+he? sid d+he shud+d+he shud+d+he bud+d+ha bo d+ha ni po d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni/ sam sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ma sarba pA bi?/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ku la phu dza/ sa ma ya tiSh+The/ pra sa ran tu?/ 
169a1(rgyud 'grel): ma ma pu N+yaM?/ bi na sh+yaM tu pA paM sarba ka la/ bi Sha ha re ma Ni bi shud+d+he sho d+ha ya/ bi ma le/ bi ka si ta pad me/ bi ka si ta b+hu ba ni/ ka ba tsi ta b+hu dze/ ShaT pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pu ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi lo ki te swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga
169a2(rgyud 'grel): ta gu hya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ oM A yur da de swAhA/ pu N+yad d+hi swAhA/ pu N+ya bi le ki te swAhA/ pu N+ye a ba lo te swAhA/ mri tyu daN+Da d+ha re swAhA/ ya ma daN+De swAhA/ ya ma dU te swAhA/ saM ha ra Ni swAhA/ saM b+hA ra Ni swAhA/ san d+ha ra Ni swAhA/ pra ti sa ra Ni
169a3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM dzyo ba ti swAhA/ te dza ba ti swAhA/ oM dza ya ba ti swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu dre a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ mchod rten de dang/ gdugs de las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa bri/ de bzhi'i dbus su dar ram
169a4(rgyud 'grel): shog shog gang 'byor pa las/ srid du mda' gang tsam zheng du khru gang lhag tsam la/ gzungs gnyis ka rdzogs par bri zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan par byas te/ dbus kyi mchod rten ring bsrel can de la me reg tu gdags/ de nas dkyil 'khor de'i
169a5(rgyud 'grel): steng lci ba gtsang ma dang/ tsan dan dang/ gur kum la sogs pas bskus la/ de'i steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ngos gcig la re'u bcu bcu/ re'u gcig la yang chag gang dang/ tshon do'i thang du brtsis te/ cha mnyam par byas la/ srang bu ring
169a6(rgyud 'grel): ? cha mnyam pa cig tshon? sna gcig gis thig btab ste/ re'u brgya dang ngos gcig kyang re'u gnyis gnyis yod pa dang/ /spyir brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar ba/ re'u re re'i steng du yang tse tya gzhag pa'i gzhi tsan dan dang spos chu gang 'byor pas dkyil 'khor
169a7(rgyud 'grel): zlum po re re bya/ de nas las kyi bye brag las shar phyogs la sogs par gong thabs gsum gding/ 'phan gdugs ci rigs par bres la/ stan dbus ma'i steng du tsaM tya su 'debs pa 'dug /de'i g.yas kyi stan la bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs
169b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags klog cing 'dug la/ de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor cig byas ba'i steng du mchod pa sna lnga dgram/ dbus su bum pa 'am/ bya gang 'byor ba gcig spos chus bkang la/ de'i nang du sman dang 'bru dang rin po che sna lnga bcug la kha bcings te/ de'i
169b2(rgyud 'grel): mgul nas srang bu gtsang ma gcig btags la sngags gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsam pa'i rgyud mnyam par bklag go /de la sman lnga ni sing ha dang/ bya gri dang/ ki ri kar ni ka dang/ sa ha dang sa ha de ba'o/ /'bru lnga ni til dang/ pal sran dang/
169b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras so ba dang/ nas dang gro'o/ /rin po che sna lnga ni byu ru dang/ gser sa le sgram dang dung dang/ mu tig dang shel dang ste/ ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las dngos su ma 'byor na/ gang 'byor pa de rnams las sna lngar sbyar ro/ /
169b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi stan la shes rab tshul brgya lnga bcu pa klog pa cig 'dug la/ yo byang gzhan ni gong ma bzhin sbyar la/ d+harma lan cig yan chad tse dya 'debs kyi bar du lhogs par bklag /dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tsai tya la sogs pa 'god pa'i
169b5(rgyud 'grel): pos dang/ 'bob gtsang mar gsol la/ khrus legs par byas pas dgod/ caitya? 'debs pas bdag nyid rang gis lha'i tshul du ting nge 'dzin me nyams pas byas te bi ma la u Shi Sha'i snying po 'am/ 'og nas tsa? tya gdab ba'i sngags rim
169b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'gyur? ba gang yang rung bde bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan par byas te brjod cing tsai dya gdab bo/ /tsai tya btab pa des thal byung du dkyil 'khor gyi steng bzhag ste/ dang por mchod rten lugs ma sha ri ram yod pa cig dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi
169b7(rgyud 'grel): thig rgya gram yod pa'i steng bzhag /gzhan gyi las kyi khyad par gyis 'god de/ zhi ba ni byang shar mtshams nas shar lho mtshams su phreng gcig rdzogs par bkod la shar nas nub tu bsgre'o/ /tsai tya gcig btab ste/ re'u dbus su bzhag pa dang?
170a1(rgyud 'grel): dar dang shog shog gang 'byor pa'i rgyal mtshan chung du chu srin gyi mgo 'am/ tog zlum po gang 'byor pa dang bcas pa dang/ 'phran 'phran chung du re re gzugs/ mchod pa sna lnga yang rim bzhin du dbul zhing dgram/ mchod
170a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam pa lnga ni bshos dang mar me dang/ spos chu dang/ bdug spos dang me tog go /de bzhin du tsai tya re re btab bcing mchod pa tshang bar dbul/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i steng mchod rten btab zin nas/ mdza' i tsai tya brgyad dang shar lhor bskor
170a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing byang gi bar du rim bzhin dgod/ de nas tsai tya 'debs pa de bstan/ dbus ma'i steng du 'dug ste/ bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams spyan drangs la/ /dung phor la
170a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i nang du rin po che sna ba dun dang/ sman dang 'bru sna lnga dang/ tsan dan dang/ ga pur dang/ gur kum dang 'di rnams las ci 'byor pa bcug ste/ arg+ha'i chu lan gsum du sbreng zhing bsam pa'i rgyud? dang ldan pas dbul/
170a5(rgyud 'grel): de la rin po che sna bdun ni byu ru dang/ gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags so/ /de nas kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung rnam par 'khrigs pa kun nas gang bar byin gyis brlab cing mchod do/ /de'i 'og tu tsai tye bdag thams cad shel
170a6(rgyud 'grel): sgong yongs su dag pa'i tshul du rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal te/ de dag gi dbus su sngags mang nyung gnyis ka 'am/ yang na rigs so so'i snying po gang gcig po yang rung ste/ kha dog gser bcom bzhin du/ /dang zhing 'tshor ba de
170a7(rgyud 'grel): las 'od zer sna tshogs byung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' i mthas klas pa kun tu khyad par sems can gyi don mdzad cing/ re ba skong bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ slar 'dus pas bdag gi spyi bor zhugs par dmigs nas/ bdag gi
170b1(rgyud 'grel): las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ste/ shel sgong yongs su dag pa'i tshul du bsam/ de bzhin du yon bdag gson gshin gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan du dmigs nas/ de'i spyi gtsug tu ye shes kyi 'od zer
170b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin tu 'phro ba dag /tshul gong ma bzhin du zhugs shing de'i las dang/ nyon mongs pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad rnam par dag ste/ shel sgong ltar rab tu gsal bar dmigs/ yon bdag ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor thams cad
170b3(rgyud 'grel): la yang dmigs shing byin gyis brlab/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nas nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can thams cad la tshul gong ma ltar byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i sngags kyi snying po nyi shu rtsa
170b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig yan chad 'dzab? cir na cig bya/ de'i 'og tu yon bdag dngos sam gzugs brnyan gang yang rung ba de tshul bzhin du lus pa srungs la/ bi ma la uSh+NI? Sha dang tshul brgya lnga bcu pa klags pa'i sngags tshab cho ga bzhin du btab cing
170b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba/ spyi bo nas blugs pa la bya'o/ /de dang dus gcig tu sngags mkhan cho ga shes pa cig yod na/ phyogs bcu'i mgon po yang tshul bzhin du dgug cing arg+ha gsol te/ mchod pa sna lnga la sogs pa dang gtor ma bzang du
170b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar la rim bzhin du phul te/ 'phags pa thugs dam can khyed kyis mchod pa 'di dag bsnoms la/ sbyin bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dag la khyed kyis bsrung bskyab pa dang/ don bsgrub cing byin gyis rlobs shig ces bsgo'o/ /de ltar sngagS
170b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhan cho ga shes pa med na/ mchod rten bskor zin pa'i 'jug la phyogs bcu'i gtor ma sbyin zhing bsngo'o/ /de nas rol mo sna tshogs kyis drangs la 'khor thams cad kyis mchod rten de dag la 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro? bar
171a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhing/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bsam pa'i rgyud mnyams par byas te bskor/ de ltar zin nas yang tsai tya 'debs pa'i cho ga shes pa des/ mchod rten de dag las 'od zer 'byung ba de bdag gi spyi bor zhugs pa
171a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi spyi bor zhugs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la/ bla na med pa'i mchod pa dang/ yon ci 'byor pa yang skabs 'dir 'bul lo/ /de nas arg+ha tshul bzhin du gsol te/ bsngo ba dang smon
171a3(rgyud 'grel): lam rgyas par byas la 'phags pa rnams dang/ mgon po dag slar gshegs par gsol lo/ /tsai tyi yo byad la sogs pa kha dog dbye ba ni/ las gang byed pa'i khyad par las kha dog dkar po la sogs pa bzhin du byas te de la zhi ba'i cho ga ni
171a4(rgyud 'grel): kha dog thams cad dkar por bsgyur ro/ /rgyas pa'i cho ga ni yo byad thams cad kha dog ser por bsgyur ro/ /dbang gi cho ga ni yo byad thams cad kha dog dmar por bsgyur ro/ /mngon spyod kyi cho ga ni yo byad thams cad nag por sbyar zhes so/ /tsai tyi 'debs
171a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ yon bdag dang/ tse tyi 'debs pa'i las mi thams cad skra bkru zhing khrus bya ba dang/ gos sar pa la sogs pa ci 'byor gyis zung du bgo bar bya'o/ /tse tyi 'debs pa dang/ bskor ba'i mi rnams la thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du/ gzhan
171a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis ma reg par bgyis shig /mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad bya ba rdzogs so// //mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshang ni khru gang gru bzhi pa yan chad la/ 'phang yang
171a7(rgyud 'grel): khru gang byas la/ de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bri ste/ de'i dbus su bzhag /tsi ti de'i nang du sha ri ram? dang rin po che ci 'byor pa yang gzhug go /mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga la /las
171b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu ni chur khru do zheng du khru gang/ 'phang du yang khru gang pa zhig byas la/ khru gang gru bzhi pa'i re'us bcad de/ de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa re re bris la de'i dbus su mchod rten gzhag /
171b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten de gcig gi dbus su bim? la uSh+NI Sha'i sngags mang nyung gnyis ka gur kum gyis bris te gzhug /mchod rten gcig gi nang du gzugs de gnyis ka yang gzhug pa'i steng du/ de'i bum pI nang du sha ri ram gcig bcug la dbyung du
171b3(rgyud 'grel): rung bar byas te mchod pa zin nas phyir yang dbyung bar bya'o/ /mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /mchod rten gsum gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong dang 'dra/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni chur khru gsum/ zheng du khru gang/ 'phang du khru
171b4(rgyud 'grel): gang byas la/ khru gang gi re'u? gsum thig gis bsnyams te/ de gsum gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa re re bris la/ de'i steng du mchod rten bzhag /de la bzhag pa'i go rims ni/ dang por dbus su bzhag go /mchod rten gsum gdab pa'i cho?
171b5(rgyud 'grel): ga'o?/ /mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi pa 'phang du yang khru gang pa zhig byas la/ de'i grwa bzhir yang de dang 'dra ba re re byas la/ dbus kyi stegs bu gru? bzhi
171b6(rgyud 'grel): dang tha ma'i stegs bu bzhi'i gru bzhi dang sbyar bar bya/ de nas stegs bu dbu ma'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa 'am/ bcu gnyis pa gcig bris te gru bzhi'i stegs bu'i dbus kyi pad+ma 'dab ma grangs bcu drug pa zhig na ni/ pad+ma 'dab ma bcu
171b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa bri/ dbus kyi bcu gnyis pa zhig na ni/ mthar brgyad pa bris te/ de'i dbus su mchod rten bzhag /mchod rten bzhag pa'i go rims ni/ dang po dbus su gzhag nas/ tha ma bzhi ni shar nas lhor bskor thabs su bzhag go /yang
172a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gzhan du na dkyil 'khor grwa ma sbyar bar phyogs bzhi ngos ngos sbyar te bya'o/ /grwa bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lhung bzed ri spos chus bkang ste/ mchod do/ /mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /mchod rten dgu

172a3(rgyud 'grel): bskor thabs su mdza' i bzhag par bya'o/ /mchod rten dgu gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /mchod rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga la/ sngag bye ba bris pa 'am/ phyag rgyar btab la mchod rten bye ba btab pa'i nang du bcug na mchod rten thams cad
172a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ro/ /de nas mchod rten gcig nas bye ba'i bar du snga phyir btab pa de dag mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste/ 'phan shing la 'phan rings bsgreng ba ni/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten
172a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phul ba zhes bya'o/ /mchod rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga ste/ mchod rten gdab pa'i cho ga'o// //mchod rten dang tsha tsha gdab pa yan chad nas bye ba gdab pa la sogs kun kyang/ bsam pa'i rgyud dang sngags ni 'dra ste/ dang por
172a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi cha byad/ phyag rgya dang sngags su ldan pas bdun yan chad nyi shu rtsa gcig man chad du chu la sngags te/ 'jim pa dang yo byad yan chad la gdab bo/ /de la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje bcings pa bsdams
172a7(rgyud 'grel): te mthe bong gnyis gzhibs pa bsgreng/ mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gzhibs te bcung zad kyis mi sbyar bar bya la/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba las mche ba'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /
172b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i? sngags la/ badzra yak+Sha hUM/ 'dis btab pas thams cad gtsang mar bsangs pa dang/ bgegs la sogs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /oM shud+hen du sho d+ha ya/ zhes 'dis btab pas/ thams cad gtsang mar bsangs par 'gyur ro/ /
172b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ba'i sngags la/ na ma strai ya/ d+hwi kA nAn/ dzi na nan/ ban d+he raM dra yA na/ shu ban ak+Sho b+hya amri ta pany+tsa ban de a haM/ a ba lo ki taM/ na mastrai? ya d+hwi/ nu ga ta nAn/ sarba ta thA ga twa nAM/ tadya thA/ oM su sme
172b3(rgyud 'grel): su sme ? ga te/ shan+te dan+te/ shi shi bi ni/ ra ku le/ ya she ya sha ba de/ te dze te dzo ba ti sarba bud d+ha/ d+hi shI te swAhA/ mu dra gdab pa'i 'jim pa 'am sngags bri ba'i tshe sngags lan bdun gdab pa'i sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a pra ti ha
172b4(rgyud 'grel): ta shA sa nA nAn/ oM badzra A yu:She swAhA/ 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags la/ oM badzrod b+ha ba swAhA/ tsedya phor bu dang/ sA tsa'i skor phor gyi nang du bye mas gdab pa 'am/ snum gyis bsku ba'i sngags la/ oM badzra d+hA tu garb+he swAhA/ tho bas brdeg? cing gdab
172b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags la/ oM badzra mu ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM/ tsi tyi 'phor bu nas dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harma ratne swAhA/ 'khor lo dang dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM pra mArda na ya swAhA/ ci ti dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha? badzra
172b6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ cho ga de ltar byas na tse tya gcig btab pas bye ba snyed btab par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gang na bskus na nad mdze'i rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs pa
172b7(rgyud 'grel): nad thams cad ma lus pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// //sangs rgyas kyi sku dang mchod rten gyi cha dbye ba bshad pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pI gad gA'i bye ma snyeng thams cad kyi sku ni rnam pa gnyis te/ tshe blangs pa'i sku dang
173a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku'o/ /de la tshe blangs pa'i sku ni yab yum las skyes pa'i yid mig dang yid tshim par byed pa/ dag par byed pa skrun par byed pa ste/ sku chigs re re zhing sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan la/ tshigs re re yang
173a2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa dang/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa mthong na/ blta bas cho ga mi shes shing mi mthun pa med pa dang/ blta bar
173a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba bla na med pa na bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshe blangs pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud
173a4(rgyud 'grel): par zad kyi/ rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu dag dang/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams man chad ni/ su yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par ji ltar byas kyang nus pa med de/ 'di lta ste/ dran
173a5(rgyud 'grel): pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag pa spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ byang chub kyi phyogS
173a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po'i chos 'di dag dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
173a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ lam bzhi dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ btang snyoms dang/ bsrung ba med pa gsum dang/ dkon mchog gsum dang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum dang rnam par thar
173b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo gsum dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang/ mi slob pa'i chos bcu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

173b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ sngon gyi
173b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ rtag tu gnas par bya
173b5(rgyud 'grel): ba drug dang/ ma 'dres par bsgom pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ smon nas shes pa dang/ shes rab kyi mthar phyin pa dang/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang/
