173b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang/ phung po lnga dang/ skye mched bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyad dang/ dbang po nyi shu gnyis rnams yin no/ /zab cing mchog tu zab pa'i chos 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs
174a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ gang rang rang gi mtshan nyid dang/ spyi'i mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs nas nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs su chud de/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams dang/
174a2(rgyud 'grel): mu stegs can sna tshogs dge sbyong dang/ bram ze gcer bu dang/ rgyu ba dang/ kun tu rgyu ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams la rgya cher yang dag
174a3(rgyud 'grel): par rab tu bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams btul nas 'khor grangs med pa khrag khrig brgya stong dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer du zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku bshad pa rdzogs so// //
174a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod rten gyi don bshad de/ bsags par bya ba yin pas bsags pa'o/ /yang na bsags su rung ba'i phyir yang bsags pa zhes bya'o/ /yang na don gyi skabs su/ 'dir dran par bya ba yin pa nas dran pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs
174a5(rgyud 'grel): pa chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam gyi yan lag dang/ ye shes dang/ stobs dang/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye par bzhag pa dang/
174a6(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i yon tan de dag yun ring po nas thabs kyi bye brag gi bsags pa dang/ sngon yang dag par ma bsgoms kyang/ don gyi skabs dag tu 'dul ba rnams kyis dran par bya ba'i phyir na btsags pa zhes bya ba 'am/ dran pa zhes bya ste/
174a7(rgyud 'grel): de dag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod rten zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o/ /de'i bang rim bzhi dang/ bum rten dang/ bum pa dang/ pu shu dang/ srog shing dang/ 'khor lo rtseg ma bcu gsum dang/ char kheb? rnams ni mchod
174b1(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi dbyibs yin no/ /de la bang rim dang po ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ 'di ltar lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ sems dang/ chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /bang rim gnyis pa ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/
174b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba'i phyir brtson pa dang/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson pa dang/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson pa dang/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnaS
174b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa'o/ /bang rim gsum pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ 'di ltar 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ dpyod pa'i
174b4(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /bang rim bzhi pa dbang po lnga ste/ 'di ltar dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /bum
174b5(rgyud 'grel): rten ni stobs lnga ste/ 'di ltar dad pa'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ dran pa'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs so/ /bum pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ 'di ltar dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
174b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ chos rnam par 'byed pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go /pu shu ni lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa
174b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i mdza' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /srog shing ni shes ba bcu ste/ 'di ltar kun rdzob shes pa dang/
175a1(rgyud 'grel): pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang/ chos shes pa dang/ rjes su rtogs par shes pa dang/ kun 'byung ba shes pa dang/ lam shes pa dang/ zad pa shes pa dang/ mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /'khor lo dang po ni gnas dang/
175a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo gnyis pa ni las bdag gir mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo gsum pa ni bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i
175a3(rgyud 'grel): stobs so/ /'khor lo bzhi pa ni/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo lnga pa ni mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo drug pa ni khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo
175a4(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo brgyad pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo dgu pa ni 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo bcu pa ni zag pa
175a5(rgyud 'grel): zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo bcu gcig pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na/ slob ma thams cad mthun par gus par nyan
175a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la dga' i sems mi 'byung ba'o/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na/ slob ma thams cad mthun par gus
175a7(rgyud 'grel): par mi nyan pa la khong khro ba mi 'byung ba'o/ /'khor lo bcu gsum pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum pa ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor rnams la chos ston pa la slob ma la la gus par mnyan la/ la la
175b1(rgyud 'grel): thus? par mi nyan pa rnams la dga' ba dang/ khong khro ba gnyis mi 'byung ba'o/ /char kheb ni snying rje chen po ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba'i rgyud smin pa dang/ ma smin pa dang/ da ltar smin pa rnams kyi don dpyod cing/
175b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku ma lus pa dus kyi khyad par dag tu yang dag 'dzin pa 'di ni mchod rten gyi rang bzhin no/ /de las gzhan pa'i rdo rings dang/ them skas dang/ chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan
175b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ dril bu dang/ gdugs dang/ zla ba dang/ dar gyi cod pan dang/ ba dan la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i rkyen du 'bab pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dag kyang yod de/ de la
175b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rings rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi bstan te/ 'di ltar zag pa zad pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams phyin ci ma log par bstan pa dang/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam phyin ci ma log
175b5(rgyud 'grel): par bstan pa'o/ /them skas kyis ni bsrung ba med pa bzhi bstan te/ 'di ltar sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa dang/ gsung gi phrin las yongs su dag pa dang/ thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag pa dang/ ? ba yngs su dag pas? chu
175b6(rgyud 'grel): srin rgyal mnyin? rnamS kyiS ni/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal bar bstan te/ 'di ltar lta'i bdud bsnyal ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud bsnyal ba dang/ phung po'i bdud bsnyal ba dang/ 'chi bdag gi bdud bsnyal ba'o/ /me tog gi phreng bas ni bla na med pa'i
175b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims kyi phung po bstan to/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bshad pas/ 'jig rten bzhi la phan 'dogs par bstan to/ /'di ltar so so'i skye bo la phan 'dogs pa dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa la
176a1(rgyud 'grel): phan 'dogs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba la phan 'dogs pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /dril bu rnams ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas tshegs chung dus stong gsum gyi
176a2(rgyud 'grel): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos bstan pa'i sgra skad kyis kun tu 'gengs pa'o/ /gdugs kyis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyi bor gyur par bstan te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rkang pa med pa dang/ rkang pa gnyis pa dang/ rkang
176a3(rgyud 'grel): mangs dang/ gzugs can dang/ gzugs med pa rnams kyi mchog ces bya bar gyur pa'o/ /zla bas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bskyed par
176a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /dar gyi cod pan gyis ni bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi cod pan thogs pa bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kun tu 'jug pa'o/ /ba dan rnams kyi ni bla na
176a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i chos kyi grags pa'i ba dan bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i grags pas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor non par gyur pa'o/ /mchod rten gyi cha dbye ba 'dul ba las byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
176a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam tshig srung ba'i sgrub thabs gtsug tor dri med mar me mdzad ye shes kyi mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya rak+Sha sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
176a7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bsrung ba'i sgrubs thabs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dri ma med pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa'i/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul la ni/ /dngos po
176b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rgyal sras thu bo rnams la yang/ /dngos kun phyag byas 'od zer gyi/ /dri med snying po sgrub thabs bshad/ /bkra shis yid 'od bde gnas su/ /khrus byas bde ba'i stan la
176b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dug /gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang/ /sdom bzung tshad med bzhi la gnas/ /rang snying a las 'od byung bas/ /bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /nam mkha' i ngos la bsam par bya/ /phyag 'tshal
176b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la sogs bya/ /de nas stod pa'i ngo bor bsam/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /de nas lam rjes dran par bya/ /a las zla ba rdo rjer bskyed/ /de yis ji ltar 'dod rgyal pos/ /bgegs rnams bskrad par byas
176b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /de dbus nam mkha' gru gsum zlum/ /gru bzhi ri rab rnam par bsam/ /gru bzhi sgo dang rab ldan pa/ /'od dang ldan pa'i khang par bsgom/ /lte bar pad+ma zla ba la/ /a dang maM mu h+ri:hUM las/ /a las nor bu 'bar bar bar gyur//
176b5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sna tshogs ma nges la/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyad dang ldan/ /g.yas pa skyabs byin g.yon nor bu/ /mtshan dang dpe byang tshogs pa dbus/ /g.yas su 'jam dpal rnon po la/ /rgyab tu shAkya thub pa nyid/ /g.yon du seng ge skra bsam bya/ /mdun
176b6(rgyud 'grel): du phyag na rdo rje bsgom?/ /mdun gyi nam mkha' ye shes bsam/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur bsam par bya/ /mchod bstod legs pa rdzogs pa dang/ /rtse gcig yid kyis bsgom par bya/ /de las skyon snying po bzlas/ /gtsug tu bzlas? dang smin phrag bzlas/
176b7(rgyud 'grel): snying gnyid du bzlas pa'o/ /nye ba'i snying po/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu dra a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ de nas gtor mas mchod nas gshegs/ /bdag nyid spyod lam nyid bya zhing/ /snang ba sgyu ma bzhin du sbyang/ /'di byas dal ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /'di byas dal
177a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdig pa dag /dri med 'khor lo'i skur gyur shog /de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi dam tshig bsrung ba zhes bya sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM sh+rI dz+nya nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
177a2(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// //de nas khrus byas gos gtsang bgos/ /spos kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya/ /mchod rten lnga btab gro gal/ /'khor lo bya ru rdzogs
177a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /ba dan gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sogs/ /me tog phreng bas brgyan pa ni/ /dbus dang grwa la bzhugs su gsol/ /bum pa gang ba bzhi la ni/ /byin gyis brlabs la phyogs bzhir bzhag /rma bya'i sgro lnga mu men dang/ /sgos gyi sdeng
177a4(rgyud 'grel): po snod pa'i dang/ /gra? la legs par gzhag par bya/ /mchod yon spos dang me tog chogs/ /mar me dri dang lta bshos dang/ /rol mo sna tshogs reg byas mchod/ /a las byung ba'i ngo mtshar mchog /thugs ni nam mkha' sangs rgyas nyid
177a5(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor dri med snying po'i mchog /yid bzhin nor bu khyod phyag 'tshal/ /shes rab mchog gyur 'jam pa'i mgon/ /a la la ho ngo bo'i ches/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog 'byung ba/ /'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de bzhin
177a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa shAkya thub/ /thugs rje'i mchog tu gyur pa ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs/ /shAkya thub la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /snying rje chen po'i mchog gyur pa/ /dri med dag pa'i snying po'i sku/ /'od zer 'bar bas gsung dag pa//
177a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud rnams 'joms pa'i rdo rje can/ /thugs kyi rdo rje yid bzhin tshul/ /nang rnams sel ba sman pa'i mchog /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang//
177b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor dong myang mi 'da' / /bsngo dang gsol gdab 'dod don zhu/ /gang 'dod pa yi las la 'jug /rgyun dang nar mar tshogs bsag bya/ dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dang por sems bskyed la
177b2(rgyud 'grel): gdal dmigs pa'i bsam rgyud dang bcas par bya'o/ /dang por bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ /gtsug tor dri ma med pa la sogs pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsams la mchod pa rgya chen po dngos su dbul lo//
177b3(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyis kyang bdag dang bum pa nad pa'am gang la sgrub par byed pa de la byin gyis rlob par gsol ba gdab pas byin gyis rlob par bsam mo/ /bum pa'i kha rgyan dang bcas pa de la rang yang khrus bya/ gso sbyong la sogs pa gtsang mar byas la
177b4(rgyud 'grel): gzungs tshang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /de nas gang la dmigs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par bsams la khrus bya'o/ /bsam rgyud dang bcas pas so// //bla ma rnams la phyag
177b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus byas la gos gtsang ma dgos/ /spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o/ /snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o/ /mched rten lnga gdab par bya/ /rig sngags 'di yang mchod byin gyi nang du
177b6(rgyud 'grel): gmugs? par bya/ mchod rten ni grwa bzhir gzhag par bya/ gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag bar bya/ shing bu btsugs te ba dan dmar po spyad bar bya'o/ /me tog gis gtor bar bya/ bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag /grwa bzhir pa go par
177b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang/ gu ru ka dang/ a ka ru dang/ gu gul gyi dud pas bdug par bya'o/ /spos kyi mchod yon gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya/ yid bzhin gyi nor pu rin po che'i sngags 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ /dkyil 'khor la
178a1(rgyud 'grel): bskor par bya'o/ /nad kyis btab pa/ gnod pa/ nang tshabs che ba/ tshe zad pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa/ rgyal po dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa/ bu 'dod pa rnams dkyil 'khor la mngon
178a2(rgyud 'grel): par phyogs par bzhag go /rma bya'i spro lngas byab par bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di lan cig byas na bskal pa 'bum du byas ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro/ /kun nas
178a3(rgyud 'grel): skor 'jug pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang/ dam gal rnam par blta ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bras la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug ro/ /mtshang rten gsar pa 'am/ rnying pa
178a4(rgyud 'grel): la? ces pa yang rung ste/ de'i nang du gzhug /spos dang byug pa yang dbul lo/ /gzungs kyi sngags zlos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bskor bar bya/ nyin zhag re la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o/ /de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs
178a5(rgyud 'grel): dang? spos? kyi dkyil 'khor bya/ nyi ma logs su me tog gis gtor ro/ /a ka ru dang/ du ru ka'i du bas bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btang?
178a6(rgyud 'grel): la rig sngags kyi snying po bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bcug /dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na gang+gA'i klung byed khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug par
178a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /snying po 'di bris la gzhug go /gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga /dang por
178b1(rgyud 'grel): ? rtsibs? las lhung? bas dkyil 'khor gru? bzhi pa byas la/ de la tsan dang gur gum la sogs pas gtor la/ me tog sil ma'ang gtor ro/ /de'i steng du gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i yang snying gur kum mam/ gi wang gis me tog dkar po
178b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i myu gus gro ga la bris la/ de la dkyil du bcug pa'i sat sa lnga 'am/ bdun nam dgu tsam byas la/ maN+Dal gyi me tog phung po'i steng du bzhag /de nas mchod rten re re la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga re re bshams la//
178b3(rgyud 'grel): manDal gyi steng du bskor ba ltar bzhag /yang maN+Dal gyi steng du bskor ba ltar gzhag /gser dngul la sogs pa rin po che'i bum pa bzhi tsam dang/ skyogs la sogs pa'i snod bzhi tsam a ka ru dang du ru ka la sogs pa dri bzang ngos?
178b4(rgyud 'grel): bka' la/ /phyogs mtshams rnams su bzhag go /de nas mchod pa bshams pa rnams sku gzugs dang satas la sogs pa dkon mchog la dbul zhing/ bsod nams kyi yan lag rnams tshang bar bya/ de nas mchod yon gcig bdag gis
178b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod ma dzin gyi bar du a ka ru la sogs pa'i spos dri zhim po bsreg du gzhug /bzlas pa'i dus su gtam gzhan dang ma 'dres par bya/ bzlas pa zin pa dang yang snying po 'ba' zhig bzlas shing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya/
178b6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar zin pa dang/ rin po che'i snod rnams kyi chu kun las cung zad bsdus la/ /nad pa la cung zad blud cing khrus bya/ de ltar byas na glo bur ba la sogs pa'i nang tshabs che ba las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro /tshe zad pa las ring du 'tsho bar 'byung?
178b7(rgyud 'grel): ro// las kyi sgrib pa chen po rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa phan yon dpag tu med pa ni de nyid kyi cho ga rgya chen po las shes par bya'o/ /cho ga gang byed kyang 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gsum mam bzhi btang
179a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi chog rdzogs so// //mchod rten gyi cha rnams par dbye pa bzhugs so// //
179a2(rgyud 'grel): gcan zan dang la sogs pa ni rgyu de phan gdags pa'o/ /kun nas sgor 'jug pa la sogs bas ni bzlas pa'i grangs gsungs te lan stong ni shi ba la phan gdags pa'i bzlas brjod kyi grangs so/ /khri ni 'chi ba blu ba'i chas brgya da nas nya'i par
179a3(rgyud 'grel): du dge slong la sogs ba gang zag bcus byed pa'i grangs so/ /'bum ni bsnyen ba'i bzlas brjod kyi grangs so/ /'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ces ba ni snying po 'ba' zhig gyur gum dang gi waM dang tsanda la sogs pas sngon
179a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bris na tsha tsha'i nang du bcug pa'o/ /'bum tshang nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste/ shing bu bsgreng zhing rgyan btags nas mchod do zhes pa ni 'bum gter chen po'i ring bsrel lo/ /de la mchod rten gyi rim pa ni/ ri 'am
179a5(rgyud 'grel): thang ngam ljongs gang dag /dur khrod la sogs yangs pa med/ yid 'ong gnas su rgyal ba yi/ /sku gdung mchod rten brtsig par bya/ /yang nas 'am rdo dag la/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin brko bar bya/ /sa 'am rdo 'am shing ngag gam//
179a6(rgyud 'grel): yang na tshogs pas brtsig par bya/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni khri 'phang bcu gsum yan chad/ sum cu rtsa gnyis man chad do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi dgu yan chad bcu gcig man chad de char khab dang tog kyang med do/ /dgra bcom
179a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khri 'phang bzhi yan chad do/ /'khor lo lnga pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i par gyi khri 'phang gsum kho na'o/ /'khor lo bdun pa'o/ /so so'i skye bo'i khri 'phang gnyis 'khor lo bzhi'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi sku
179b1(rgyud 'grel): gdung cha brgyad du bgos pa'i mchod rten chen po brgyad ni grong khyer ser skyar rgyal po zas gtsang gis yon bdag byas nas dpal lha las babs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs so/ /yul ma ga d+ha dbus 'gyur tshal du rgyal po ma skyes dgras yon
179b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag? byas nas byang chub chen po'i mchod rten brtsigs so/ /grong khyer rtsa mchog tu byang rnams kyi yon bdag byas nas cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten brtsigs so/ /yul bA rA Na se ru ser skya'i rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yon bdag byas nas
179b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten brtsigs so/ /yul yangs pa can du rgyal po li tsa byi gzhon nus yon bdag byas nas dpal ka ni ka'i mchod rten brtsigs so/ /yul mnyan yod du rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis yon bdag byas nas dpal
179b4(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis sgo mangs brtsigs so/ /yul chang ger rgyal po 'dun 'dzin ta las yon bdag byas nas dpal 'ong can gyi mchod rten brtsigs so/ /yul ti ka tsa shing rgyal po in+d+ra ba? mis yon bdag byas nas mchod rten pad+ma can brtsigs so//
179b5(rgyud 'grel): slan chad kyang de dag gi rjes su 'brangs te brtsigs par bya'o/ /de la byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyi tshul du brtsigs na/ sku gdung gi rmang yod na rmang rten ji ltar mtho ba bzang po rten med na bang rim dang po'i sum cha'i tshad do/ /de'i steng du
179b6(rgyud 'grel): dge bcu ni phyir bskyed pa dang rngams par rim dang po'i rngams phyed do/ /gnam 'phang phyi la bang rim dang po'i ngos tshang ngo/ /de yan chad srog shing ste bar rim dang po'i bzhi gsum gyi tshang do/ /bang rim bzhi 'phang mnyam mo/ /bang rim rnams
179b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyir tshang khri 'phang? hUM?/ /bum rten khri 'phang gi tshang ngo/ /bum ba ni bang rim dang po'i sum gnyis kyi tshang ngo/ /stod kyi skyed ni bang rim gsum pa dang mnyam mo/ /bre rten gyi rgya ni bang rim bzhi pa'i lnga cha gcig go /bre ni bang rim bzhi cha gcig go/
180a1(rgyud 'grel): de gnyis ka'i 'phangs ni bang rim gyi sum gnyis dang bang rim gyi phyed do?/ /bang rim bzhi shar dang lhor gsal khung bar rim nyid kyi brgyad cha'o/ /srog shing gi rtsa ba bang rim bzhi pa la reg go /'khor lo bcu gsum gyi
180a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phang du bang rim dang po'i bzhi gsum gyi ched do/ /'khor lo dang po ni bre'i zur bzhi la slebs so/ /de bzhi chas 'khor ba'i tshad ni 'khor lo bcu gsum pa'o/ /bcu gcig po yang de'i rim gyis gzhol ba'o/ /rtseg par thams cad ni ci
180a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes su bya'o/ /thugs rjes mdo gzungs 'phang lo chung ba dang mnyam mo/ /de'i smad du rngams kyi bzhi gsum ni 'jam po nyid stong du bzhi cha cig ni phreng ba'i sul bcu drug pa'o/ /de'i steng du 'khor lo bcu gsum pa nyid kyi shing phyed tshad yang
180a4(rgyud 'grel): rtse phra ba bang rim nyid kyi 'phang phyed do/ /yang srog shing 'phang du bre ched tsam steng du zla ba'i rtse mo gdugs dang mnyam sreg shing la bskor te rtse mo dgrang ngo/ /gdugs ni 'khor lo bdun pa dang mnyam mo/ /gdugs khabs 'khor lo drug pa dang
180a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam mo/ /zar tshags ni brel 'phang dang mnyam mo/ /yang sreg shing 'phang du bra'i sum cha'i tshad kyi steng du nyi ma zla ba las khyad g.yung tsam mo/ /nyi ma'i steng du tog gi ut pa la gsang pa'i tog bu 'dra ste ci mdzes nyi ma dang zla ba dang tog thams
180a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi zur la bya mi 'chags par bya ba'i phyir lcags kyi thur ma rnon po gzer bar bya'o/ /tog ni ser po nyi ma ni dmar po/ /zla ba ni dkar po/ gdugs khabs ni dkar po'o/ /gdugs ni sngon po gdugs kyi phyogs bzhir rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya dri'o?//
180a7(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i phul ni dmar po'o/ /thugs rje nyid dang shes bcu ni ser po'o/ /srog shing ni dmar pho'o/ /mchod rten kyang dkar po'o/ /dge bcu yang ser po'o/ /rmang dang rmang rten ljang khu'o/ /mchod rten brtsig pa'i rim pa'o/ /da ni mchod rten gyi
180b1(rgyud 'grel): bus steng du gdung ma bzhi rgya gram du bri bar bya'o/ /de ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zheng gi bzhi bri'o/ /de'i steng du rdo leg bam so btad pa'i so phag? legs par gzhib? bo/ /de'i steng du
180b2(rgyud 'grel): bkris pa'i rba? mun dza btubs pa dang/ bsres pa'i dri bzang po'i chus sprus nas gro phye dang shing bal bkal bas bsre bar bya'o/ /rgya ji tsam yod pa'i bcu drug gam brgyad kyi cha ni 'phangs su bya'o/ /gnyer ma dang sgo 'bur med pa'i gru bzhi par
180b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas thig gdab pa dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyud las/ skyon med ras bal 'jam pos ni/ /shin tu gtsang ba'i bu mos ni/ /shar du bltas nas dgu bsgril du/ /sngags 'di brjod cing bkal bar bya/ /oM a ni nya a nu ga
180b4(rgyud 'grel): te ya/ /sarba d+harma pa raM pa ra/ sarba d+harma a nan ta ya/ ma su par pa tha sarba d+harma hUM/ shar nub lho byang tshangs thig gdab/ /tshangs dang ngos dang gru chad gdab/ /nang gi phyed kyang phyed tshad gdab/ /rgyab tu phyed phyed tshad btab nas/ /lnga pa phyi nas cha re
180b5(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /drug pa dbus kar rgyab ma bkas/ /bzhi rgyab phyogs bzhir dbus cha bzhi/ /re re yang ni bzhi bzhir bsgo/ /des ni sgo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /pho brang ci bder sgrub par bya'o/ /de'i rgyab tu cha gnyis kyang/ /phyed cha re rer bskor ba ni pad+ma rdo
180b6(rgyud 'grel): rje 'ang phreng dang/ /mchod pa bgos pa'i sa gzhi ste zhes pa'i chul gyis thig btab nas sa tshon bkyebs gru bzhi sgo bzhi rtabs dang dra shar dang zla mdzes dang ba dan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa bri'o/ /phyi rol
180b7(rgyud 'grel): dur ba rim pa gsum ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba dang dmar ser me 'od 'bar ba thams cad du zlum po drang ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor de la lha'i rten dgod par bya ste/ ? 'am tsa ka li 'am phyag rgya 'am ming yig kyang rung ste/ 
181a1(rgyud 'grel): tshon ma lus par bris nas dgod par bya'o/ /de 'ang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnams par sel ba'i rgyud las/ phung po lnga dang bcwa brgyad khams/ /'byung bzhir bcas pa'i lus kyi ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bltas
181a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /mi de myur du grol bar 'gyur zhes so/ /de nas lus dkyil 'khor ci lta ba gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la'ang lha nyi shu rtsa bdun du nges so/ /de 'ang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs gtso bo yab yum la lha
181a3(rgyud 'grel): mo nyi shu rtsa drug gis bskor ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' o/ /gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor la lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo'o/ /'on kyang nyi shu rtsa bdun de dag kyang phyogs dang kha dog gi
181a4(rgyud 'grel): bye brag gi lha re re yang bzhi bzhir 'gyur la/ /de ltar na rigs 'dus pa'i lha brgya rtsa brgyad do/ /de nyi shu rtsa lngar 'du zhing dgu dang lnga dang gcig kho nar yang nges so/ /de brgya rtsa brgyad do dbang du byas nas dbus su rnam par snang mdzad chen po
181a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi phyag brgyad zhabs brgyad pa yum dang bcas ba'o/ /g.yas su nyi ma rnam par snang mdzad do/ /g.yon du zla ba rnam par snang mdzad/ shar du mi bskyod pa la rigs bzhi dang spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang/ gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs
181a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi dang/ la se la sogs pa bzhis bskor ba'o/ /de kho na bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang du yang shes par bya'o/ /de ni dbus kyi pho bring ngo/ /de yang bsgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud las/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/ /dkyil 'khor
181a7(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo rnam snang mdzad/ /mdog skya byang chub mchog gi rgya/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad do/ /rig pa kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog /zla ba nyi ma rnam snang mdzad/ /nyi ma zla ba 'chod ba'o/ /phyogs bzhi pho brang dbus su ni/ /rdo rje rin chen
181b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rigs/ /las kyi rigs rnams so sor yang/ /rang rig sangs rgyas sras po dang/ /spyan ma bdag mo gos dkar sgrol/ /gzugs sgra dri ro lha mo dang/ /sgeg mo gar phreng glu ma rnams/ /phyogs mdog rigs kyi phyag rgya can/ /g.yon pa
181b2(rgyud 'grel): rang rtags rgya 'chang ba/ /ldem bag zhi ba'i tshul du bsam/ /zhes pa dang/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sum bcu gnyis/ /lha'i snam bur dgod par bya/ /rig pa'i lha mo khro mo che/ /mos pas sgol dgod par bya/ zhes gsungs so//
181b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i rgyab tu lha rnams la/ /bskal bzang sems dpa' bcu drug go /sgo bzhir lha mo bzhi 'am khro bo bzhi dbus kyi gtso bo la yang gzungs kyi tshul du bsgrub pa la lha mo bzhi'o/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshul du bsgrub ba la rigs
181b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi nyid do/ /yang dbus su rigs lnga mtshams su spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang pho brang gi dbus su gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa bzhi dang sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa 'am yang na khro mo bzhi'o/ /sgo'i nang gi lha rnam la byang chub
181b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' zung re te brgyad do/ /rten dag bkod nas dkyil 'khor yol ba dmar po dang bla re sngon pos bya'o/ /cod pan dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan dang gzugs la sogs pa ngos re re yang brgyad brgyad mngon bar 'du bya ste legs par
181b6(rgyud 'grel): bgod/ de'i steng du khri bcas nas g.yon gyi bdag po gang de'i gos la sogs pa dang gzugs brnyan bzhag par bya'o/ /de ni dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'o/ /de ni dkyil 'khor de la mchod par bya ste/ lha'i grangs kyi mchod pas dkyil 'khor
181b7(rgyud 'grel): de yongs su bskor nas sgrub pa po phyogs bzhir bzhugs te/ ji ltar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang par lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa skad cig gis dmigs ? dang bzhin gyis lha bcug ste/ nam mkha' zla
182a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i oM yig las 'phrul ba'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod par bsam zhing/ gzhung gzhan du gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad dang sdags du mas mchod cing bstong par bya'o/ /sil snyan du
182a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tshogs bkrol zhing bkra shis kyi glu du ma dang smon lam du brjod par bya'o// //'byor ba rab kyis ni ro dang ro'i snod brgyan cing ro bcug nas ro'i lha'i phyogs su sa legs par bstar ba'i dkyil 'khor
182a3(rgyud 'grel): khru bzhi nas bcu drug gi bar du ci rigs par bya ste/ khru bzhi pa mtho gad nas khru gang gi bar du brtsig par bya'o/ /de la mkhas pas thig 'di ltar gdab bo/ /tshangs thig zur ngos legs btab nas/ /zur bzhi lo ma gdab par bya/ cha
182a4(rgyud 'grel): chen bzhi ru 'gyur ba yin/ de nas gsum gsum bgos nas ni/ /cha chen bcu gnyis 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas gnyis su bgos nas ni/ /cha chen nyi shu bzhi ru 'gyur/ /de nas cha bran bgos nas ni/ /tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis
182a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /cha chen dang po'i phyed du bgo /phyi'i cha phyed de bzhin bgo /cha chen gnyis pa'ang ched du bgo /nang gi cha phye bzhin bgo /cha chen gsum ba'i mdza' la gcig /cha chen bzhi pa'i phyi nang go /cha re btab cing lnga pa phyed/ /cha chen drug pa
182a6(rgyud 'grel): lha rnam 'gyur/ /cha chen bdun pa phyi nang gi /cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis bzhag /cha chen brgyad pa phyed du bgo /phyi yi cha phyed de bzhin bgo /cha chen dgu pa bzhi ru bgo /cha chan bcu pa phyi nang gi /cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis
182a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhag /cha chen bcu gcig phyed du bgo /cha chen bcu gnyis khor yug 'gyur/ /phyogs gsum duAng de bzhin no/ /sgo cig phyed na tshangs thig dang/ /phyogs gcig zur thig gdab byas nas/ /tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis su/
182b1(rgyud 'grel): cha chen lnga lnga bgo byas nas/ /cha chen bcu ru 'gyur pa yin/ /de nas gnyis su bgo byas nas/ /cha chen nyi shur 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas cha bran bgo bar bya/ /tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis kyi/ /cha chen dang po phyed du bgo /phyi'i cha phyed de bzhin bgo/
182b2(rgyud 'grel): cha chen gnyis ni phyed du ba'o/ /cha chen gsum pa'i mthar cha gcig /cha chen bzhi pa lha snam 'gyur/ /cha chen lnga pa phyi nang gi /cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis bzhag /cha chen drug pa phyed du bgo /cha chen bdun pa bzhi du bsgo/ /cha chen brgyad pa
182b3(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gi /cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis bzhag /cha chen dgu pa phyed du bgo /de nas bskor ba rim gnyis bya /gsum pa mdza' i cha phran bskor/ /cha chen bcu pa khor yug 'gyur/ /sgo gsum pa sogs byed 'dod na/ /phyi nang dkyil 'khor
182b4(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa'i/ /tshad kyi rim pas bya ba ni/ /cha phran dbri dang bsnan par bya/ /de nas blo dang ldan bas tshon snam lus pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa rim pa gnyis sam yang na rim pa gcig kho na bri'o/ /der sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor
182b5(rgyud 'grel): lha gang mos pa dgod par bya'o/ /gal te rim pa gnyis bris na bar khyams la 'jig rten skyong ba bcu dgod par bya'o/ /de yang brgya byin dkar po rdo rje 'chang/ /me lha dmar po me 'thab 'chang/ /gshin rje sngon po de tsan 'chang/ /bden bral
182b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon skya ral gri 'chang/ /chu bdag dkar po zhags pa 'chang/ /rlung lha ljang ser ba dan 'dzin/ /gnod spyin ljang sngon dbyug pa 'chang/ /dbang phyug ljang skye rtse gsum 'dzin/ /sa bdag mi ni bum ljang ser/ /nyi zla tshangs pa dkar ser ni//
182b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phro 'khor la 'dzin pa'o/ /lha de dag gi sngags sems phyag rgya 'am sku dgod par bya'o// //*/ /'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// /
183a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ A rya si ta ta pa tre a ba rA ji ta na ma no pe kA /bod skad du/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo//
183a2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo gdugs dkar can bsgrubs par 'dod pas/ gnas dben bar khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang skad cig gis lha mor bskyed pa'i oM gyi 'od kyis phags ma ri khrod ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs la phyag
183a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ mchod pa la sogs pa'i bdun rnam dag gis tshogs bsags nas/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsag par bya'o/ /de'i dang las snying ga'i oM las 'od 'phros don gnyis byas tshur 'dus pa las gdug/
183a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po oM gyis mtshan par gyur/ de las 'od zer sku phra mor 'phros 'dus pa las bdag nyid lha mo gdugs dkar can sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gnyis las byams pa dang/ snying rje'i 'od zer 'phro ba/ ?
183a5(rgyud 'grel): skyabs sbyin/ g.yon gdugs dkar po bzung ba/ pad zla'i gdan la zhabs skyil krung gis bzhugs shing sgeg pa'o/ /de dbu rgyan dang rna rgyan la sogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan du mas spras par blta'o/ /spro na ri khrod ma dang legs ldan gyis//
183a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor bas bsam mo/ /de la oM gyi 'od kyis ye shes pa dgug gzhug bcing dbang du bya'o/ /de nyid la dbang bskur la bai ro tsa nas dbu brgyan no/ /de'i thugs kar 'phags ma mtshan gang ba oM dang bcas par blta'o/ /de nyid las skyobs
183a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur na ye shes kyi lha mdun du bkug la phyag dang mchod bstong byas nas thugs ka gnyis su oM la sngags kyis bskor ba dmigs nas zhal dang lte bar mgal me 'khor bas rang gzhan thams cad kyi nad gdon la sogs pa bsregs tu
183b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas/ tadya tha'/ oM a na le a na le/ pi Sha de bi Sha de/ bai re bai re/ badzra d+ha ri/ band+ha band+ha ni/ badzra pA Ni phaT /hUM hUM phaT phaT hUM hUM band+ha phaT swAhA/ 'bum la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas thun mtshams su mdun gyi ye shes pa
183b2(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs pa'i mdo dang/ lha mo legs ldan la gtor ma btang nas/ sbyod lam gyi rnal 'byor bya'o/ /'phags pa gdugs dkar ma can gyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon tsan dra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
183b3(rgyud 'grel): lo tsa ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// /rgya gar skad du/ Arya sa ti te pa tra a pa rA dzi ta ba li ta bi d+hi d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can gyi gtor pa'i
183b4(rgyud 'grel): chog ches bya ba/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags ma thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/ /'byung bo kun la mnga' mdzad ma'i/ /khro mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal nas/ /stong zlog gtor ma bshad par bya/ /ba laM
183b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang bsam bri/ pho brang zlum bor bya ba mchog /sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram la/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyis bskor/ /de bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir ldan/ /kha dog 'jig rten pa dang
183b6(rgyud 'grel): mthun/ /sbo rgyun la sogs de bzhin no/ /de nas lha rnams dgong par bya/ /dbus kyi po brang zlum po dang/ /yum chen gdugs dkar 'khor lo dang/ /tshangs pa lha yi gtso bo dang/ /gsol kha'i pho nya las byed pa/ /srid mo ming por bcas
183b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i rwa bzhi la/ /rgyal chen bzhi po rim bzhin dgod/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po la/ /brgya byin gshin rje klu chen brgyad/ /gnod sbyin rnams ni rim pa bzhin/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu dgong par bya/ /me lha srin po
184a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung lha dang/ /lha chen brgyad rnams mtshams bzhir dgod/ /de bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la/ /'byung po dang ni gza' gdon dang/ /sa bdag dang ni lha ma yin/ /rim pa bzhin du phyogs bzhir dgod/ /mi 'am ci
184a2(rgyud 'grel): dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /ma mo'i tshogs dang nam mkha' lding/ /rim pa bzhin du mtshams bzhir dgod/ /lho 'phye dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /klu yi gdon dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir dgod par bya'o/ /de nas g.yos kyi
184a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa ni/ /rag sha dang ni bo de tso/ /lung thang dang ni lha yi mig /phreng ba za ba rnams la spyin/ /'bras 'chang rgyun chang la sogs pa/ /zas su sems 'phrog rnams la sbyin/ /'o ma zho dang kha ra ni/ /srog rnams 'phrog la sbyin par bya//
184a4(rgyud 'grel): shing tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /'bras bu za ba rnams la sbyin/ /bod rtsi zas skyags za la'o/ /bdug pa za ba spos sna tshogs/ /mngar gsum sbyar ba mngal za la'o/ /btsos dang rjen pa sha sna tshogs/ /sha za ba la sbyin par bya'o//
184a5(rgyud 'grel): sbrang rtsi mchil ma 'thung ba la'o/ /khur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/ /gtar ma za ba rnams la sbyin/ /lag pa na sbyin sreg za la sbyin/ /rkang dang rkang mar bcas pa ni/ /rkang za ba la rab tu sbyin/ /'bru ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /lo tog za ba
184a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la sbyin/ /thang skyes chu skyes me tog rnams/ /me tog za ba rnams la spyin/ /la phug sgog btsong la sogs pa/ /mi gtsang za ba rnams la sbyin/ /tshil ni rul dang ma rul ba/ /chi la za ba la sbyin par bya/ /bya mo'i sgo nga? 'byor
184a7(rgyud 'grel): thang ba/ /zas su snabs za ba la sbrin/ /sha rul yibs sums song ba rnams/ /rnag za ba la sbyin par bya/ /bya po las byung ngar sgong 'di/ /ngar snabs za ba rnams la sbyin/ /khrag rnag mang po ji snyed pa/ /zas su khrag 'thung
184b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la sbyin/ /sha rnams btsos pa'i zhag rnams ni/ /zas su zhag za rnams la sbyin/ /bu ram shing kun spyar ba ni/ /btsas pa zab rnams la sbyin/ /ga bur gur kum la sogs pas/ /zas su dri za ba la sbyin/ /kun gyis lhag ma bsdus pa ni//
184b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma za ba rnams la sbyin/ /chu sna mang po bsdus ba ni/ /stor khung 'thung ba rnams la sbyin/ /sha dang khrag dang sgog btsong rnams/ /bgegs rigs 'khor du gyur la sbyin/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu yi/ /rgyud kyi gdams pas gter ma sbyin//
184b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis nye bar mtshon po ni/ /kun la mkhas pas shes par bya/ /de la lag pa'i thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ oM swahA ba bi shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ zhes bas phreng ba'i dri ma sbyang ngo/ /lag ba'i thal mo sbyar la sor mo rnams rtse sprad de//
184b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig zur can rin po che'i sgrom bu ltar byas la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta de khaM ud ga te/ sA ra na hi maM/ ga ga na khaM swAhA/ phreng brgya chen por sprul la rnam pa ma 'gyur ba'i bdud rtsi'i zas phun sum tshogs bar bsam
184b5(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar ba phyir bskyed de mthe bo gnyis bsnol te kha phye la/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT kyis gang mos su 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur btsangs nas mdzub ma bsgreng ste/ nam(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/
184b6(rgyud 'grel): saM d+hu ra saM d+hA hUM gis 'dod yon la sogs pa thams cad long spyod nus par bsam mo/ /lag g.yas rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bstan la/ g.yon mchod sbyin gyis snod 'degs pa'i tshul du byas nas/ oM dz+nya na a ba lo ki te/ sa man+ta pa ra na ba smri te
184b7(rgyud 'grel): b+ha bas ma ya/ mahA ma ni du ru du ru/ h+ri da ya dza la ni hUM zhes brjod pas mgron rnams kyis so sor thob cing tsham par bsam mo/ /lag pa'i thal mo khong stong du sbyar la sor mo rnams nang bsnol te/ mthe bong gshibs nas brkyang la/ nam mkha' 
185a1(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM?/ gra he shwa ri dza la ni sa ma ya swA hA/ zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /de nyid dbang du bsdu'o/ /bstod cing phrin las la sbyar ro/ /gtor ma thams cad de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de nas rang las kyi lha
185a2(rgyud 'grel): mo'i thugs ka'i oM gyi 'od kyis gtso 'khor rnams sbyan drang bar bya ste/ hUM bcom ldan gdugs dkar 'khor bcas rnams/ /tshur gshegs 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol/ /mchod yon zhal bsil bzhes nas kyang/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs
185a3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ /na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+hyA nan/ ga ga na pra ba ra sad kA raM padmo le sa ma ya stwaM/ rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu/ /'byung po gza' gdon sa bdag dang/ /lha min mi'am mkha' 'gro ma/ /ma tshogs mkha' lding 'dir gshegs shing/
185a4(rgyud 'grel): lto 'phye che dang rnal 'byor ma/ /klu'i gdon dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /spyan 'dren mchod 'bul snyan gsan 'bebs/ /thugs dam rgyud bskul gshegs su gsol/ /oM e he hi lo ka pA la sa pa ri bA ra saM ya stwaM/ zhes pas dkyil 'khor gyi?
185a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig la bstim par bya'o/ /de nas gtso mo ri khrod ma legs ldan 'jig rten pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa la rnam pa lnga dang/ 'dod yon lnga lha mo brgyad la sogs pas khyad par mchod la/ rgyud kyi bstod pa bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gtor ma
185a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi phud kyis gtso mo la mchod de/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams la tshig 'di rnams kyis sbyin par bya'o/ /hUM 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa dang/ /de'i btsun mo tshangs ma dang/ /tshangs pa'i ?
185a7(rgyud 'grel): mo gtsug phud dang/ /dkar mo'i 'od dang mchog 'od dang/ /rin chen 'od dang snang ba'i 'od/ /sprin gyi 'od dang kun tu 'joms/ /tshangs pa sring pa 'dzin la sogs/ /tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bstod de mchod pa 'bul
185b1(rgyud 'grel): ched ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su phreng ba za ba la/ /rag? sha bo de rtse las ni/ /gzhi blangs pa yi gtor ma ni/ /'jig rten dkon pa'i sman rnams la/ /snying po la sogs sbyar ba 'di/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos shing
185b2(rgyud 'grel): tshim pas dgyes gyur cig /khyod la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ tsho srog 'phrog rnams bzlog tu gsol/ /nyes pa thams cad bzlog pa dang/ /tshe srog bar chad zlog tu gsol/ /sring mo bzhi dang ming po gsum
185b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal dang mi pham ma/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dril bum /rgyal bar byed dang sbrang rtsir byed/ /don kun grub dang rgyal byed ma/ /ming sring 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mc hod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i
185b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma 'di/ /zas su gcin 'thung zhes bya la/ /'bras chang rkun chang la sogs pa/ /'bru dang bcud du sbyar pa 'di/ /sring mo ming po 'khor bcas kun/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgos gyur cig /kyod la phrin las zhu ba ni/ bdag cag 'khor
185b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas thams cad kyis/ /bza' nyes ba dang bri nyes pa/ bsgom nyes pa la sogs pa yi/ /nyes pa ma lus zhi ba dang/ /tshe srog bsrung zhing rgyas par mdzod/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ shar phyogs
185b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung/ /btsan mo rdo rje yangs byed ma /dri za pho mo shug chen dang/ /utpal dang ni tsan dan sogs /zur phung lnga la sogs pa yi/ /dri za'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad
185b7(rgyud 'grel): ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su srog 'phrog zhes bya la/ /'o ma zho dang kha ra dang/ /sman dang bcud sbyar gtor ma 'di/ /dri za 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsgos? pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrim las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag
186a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /dri za'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang/ /tshe srog bar chod bzlog tu gsol/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ /lho phyogs rgyal po 'phags skyes po/ /
186a2(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo rdo rje 'dul mkhas ma/ /'khor ni grul bum mgul mdzes dang/ /mgul ngas dang ni ma nges dang/ /kun tu lha dang mngon shes ldan/ /bum lto can dang 'dod pa mchog /grul bum rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen
186a3(rgyud 'grel): bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su 'bras bu za ba la/ /shing tog sna tshogs gzhi blangs pa'i/ /'bru dang sman du sbyar ba 'di/ /grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur
186a4(rgyud 'grel): cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /grul bum gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang/ /tshe srog bar gcod bzlog tu gsol/ /rgyal po mig mi bzang 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ /nub phyogs rgyal po mig
186a5(rgyud 'grel): mi bzang/ /btsun mo rdo rje myos byed ma/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams lung dang/ /pad+ma chen po rgya mtsho dang/ /ma dros 'od zer rgyal ba dang/ /glog chen 'byin dang rin chen 'od/ /sog ma med la sogs pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod
186a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su skyugs pa zab la/ /sbrang rtsi la ni sbyar ba yi/ /rtsi dang bcud du sbyar ba 'di/ /mig mi bzang ni 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /
186a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /klu yi gdon tshogs zhi ba dang/ /tshe srog bar chad zlog tu gsol/ /rgyal po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo pa ni/ byang phyogs rgyal bo rnam thos sras/ /btsun mo rig ma phreng ldan dang/
186b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la nye seng ge /seng ge dal rdob ser skya dang/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su 'dug pa za ba la/ /
186b2(rgyud 'grel): lus sogs dri dang spos sbyar 'di/ /byang phyogs gnod sbyin 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi /gnod sbyin gdon tshogs zhi pa dang/ /nad dang sdug bsngal
186b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog du gsol/ /brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ shar phyogs dbang ldan brgya byin dang/ /dri za'i rgyal po gtum bu ra/ /yid 'ong yi dags 'od sbyangs dang/ /'jam mnyen dbyangs dang nyi zer dang/ /yid 'phrog gtso bo la sogs pa

186b5(rgyud 'grel): las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /dri za'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang/ /tshe yi bar gcod bzlog tu gsol/ /gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ /gshin rje long ba'i rgyal po dang/ /ded dpon rje mo srin mo dang
186b6(rgyud 'grel): ma mo dang ni lha ma srin/ /dus mtshan dang ni sha za mo/ /gshin rje rigs kyi gdon rnams la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma ni/ /zas su sha za zhes bya la/ /bcas dang sha chen gtor ma 'di/ /gshin rje
186b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas chim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /gshin rje'i gdon sogs bzlog pa dang/ /pha rol rig sngags bzlog tu gsol/ /klu rgyal 'khor par?
187a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ /klu rgyal dga' bo nyer dga' bo/ /mdza' yas 'jog po stobs kyi rgyu/ /rigs ldan dung skyong pad+ma dag /chu lha nor rgyas la sogs la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchi?

187a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /klu dug rig sngags bzlog du gsol/ /gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gnod sbyin rgyal ba ku bai ra/ /'phrog gnas mched lnga gang ba bzang/ /nor bu bzang dang lag brgya pa/ /lnga rtsen lnga brtsegs phyis la ser/ /gnod
187a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su gtor ma za ba la/ /khur ba sna tshogs bcud dang sbyar/ /spyan gzigs sna tshogs bcas pa ni/ /gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas?

187a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ drang srong me la byin za dang/ /gnas mchog gnas brtan a ko ta/ /'go'u ta ma thogs pa'i dpal/ /gar ldan dang ni phreng ba can/ /drang srong dpal sbyin la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ tshad ma mchis par?

187b5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su lo tog za ba la/ /'bras dang nas dang snyem dang/ /gang du 'bru gtsang gcas pa 'di/ /rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngas? pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni//

187b7(rgyud 'grel): phyug b+h+ring gi ri/ /tshogs? bdag gzhon nu smin drug dang/ /pa tra ba la nA na di kar/ /ma hA kA la sha ri sogs/ /de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su me tog za ba la/ /chu dang thang las skyes pa ? me tog rtsi

188a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlog tu gsol/ /'gyur? po'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dang/ /log 'dren sna 'dren mdung thung dang/ /gshol mda' can dang gtun shing dang/ /'khrus byed snyan drag yang dag 'gugs/ /'byung po
188a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas la sogs pas/ /de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su mi btsang za ba la/ /'byung po'i kha zas sgog btsong dang/ /la phug 'bras la sogs pa la/ /rgyu dang rkyen du sbyar ba 'di/ /'byung po

188a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ /gza' chen byi tri pa tra dang/ /zla ba nyi ma gza' lag can/ /pa ba sangs dang phur bu dang/ /spen pa dang ni mig dmar dang/ /sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa la/ /de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis
