188b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi/ /lha min gdon tshogs ni ba dang/ /lo sgag bla skeg bdud skeg dang/ /khram sgeg la sogs bzlog tu gsol/ /mi'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ /mi'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa dang/ /tshos ldan chos skyong chos ?
188b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lha min phung byed la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen dkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su dar snabs za ba la/ /de pho'i bar sgo bsgyur ba dang/ /mi'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /bsdos pas chim ? dgyes
188b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /gzhan gyi sbyor ba ngan pa dang/ /bsam ngan thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ /mkha' grom 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo dba ni/ mkha' 'gro ma tshogs de bir?/ /ha pad+ma? 
189a1(rgyud 'grel): su ka ri/ /bi ti bi dang bi ma ka /be bo ka dang kar tik /bkar ta dang mu ha ka /mkha' 'gro chen mo thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su khrag 'thung zhes bya la/
189a2(rgyud 'grel): khrag sna brgya'i gtor ma 'di/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /mkha' 'gro'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang/ /mdangs 'phrog thams cad bzlog
189a3(rgyud 'grel): tu gsol/ /ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la bsngo ba ni/ ma mo chen mo dza mi ka /rdo rje gzhon nu lu gu rgyud/ pad+ma'i mig dang rig gser phreng/ /rdo re shugs ldan rgya ldan ma/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i 'od phreng ma/ /ma mo'i gdon tshogs thams cad
189a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su zhag za zhes bya la/ /zhag dang bcud du sbyar ba 'di/ /ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las
189a5(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /ma mo'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang/ /srog 'phrog sdug bsngal bzlog du gsol/ /nam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ /nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po la/ /gser mig can dang yan
189a6(rgyud 'grel): lag 'du/ /rna bdud dang ni 'jigs par 'gro/ 'dab brgyad dang ni gtsug phung can/ /shugs ldan bzang dang yan lag ldan/ /nam mkha' lding gi 'khor bcas la/ /phyag 'tshal bsten bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma
189a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /zas su bcos pa za ba la/ /bu ram shing kun la sogs pa'i/ /bcud dang bdud rtsi sbyar ba 'di/ /mkha' lding rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas
189b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /mkha' lding gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang/ /tshe yi bar chod bskyab tu gsol/ /lto 'phye'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ lto 'phye'i rgyal po chen po ni/ /mgyogs chen dang ni du ba can/ /la ba can dang hu ta ka /shu bar ka
189b2(rgyud 'grel): sna sna bzangs dang/ /dpung bzangs dang ni 'jigs chen dang/ /lto 'phye'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su dri za zhes bya la/ /ga bur gur kum sug sme la dang//
189b3(rgyud 'grel): yi shi dzA ti la sogs pa'i/ /dri dang sman du sbyar ba 'di/ /lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyis gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /lto 'phye'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang/ /gdon gyi
189b4(rgyud 'grel): bar chad bzlog tu gsol/ /srin po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ rnal 'byor srin mo nag mo dang/ /sbal mig nag mo gnod sbyin mo/ /be tshon nag mo la sogs la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma
189b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /zas su lhag ma za ba la/ /kun gyi lhag ma'i tshogs sbyar 'di/ /srin mo 'khor bcas thams cad la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu pa ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /ma mo srin mo'i gdan
189b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang/ /mi nad phyugs nad bzlog du gsol/ /klu'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gang+gA'i lha dang sin d+hu'i lha/ /byams ldan lha dang dbyangs can lha/ /zla ba can dang ya mu ta/ /kun gyi lha dang mgyogs chen lha/ /mtsho steng lha la
189b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su stor khung bab 'thung la/ /chu sna brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni/ /bcud dang rtsi ldan sbyar ba 'di/ /chu klung sna tshogs 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim
190a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /chu klung gnas pa'i bgegs bdon dang/ tshe srog bar ched bzlog tu gsol/ /phyogs bzhi'i bgegs chen 'khor dang bcas
190a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la bsde ba ni/ shar phyogs khams kyi bdag pa dang/ /lho phyogs sprin gyi sgron ma dang/ /nub phyogs bgegs rgyal rdo rje dang/ /byang phyogs bi nA ya ka la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su
190a3(rgyud 'grel): mi gtsang za ba la/ /khrag dang sha sna sbyar ba ni/ /bgegs chen bzhi po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyod la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /phyogs bzhi'i bgegs tshogs zhi ba
190a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bsam sbyor ngan pa bzlog tu gsol/ /'byung po ma lus khyed rnams kun/ /so sor gtor ma phul ba 'di/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas su/ /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas kyang/ /rang gi bu smad mdzad? bshes
190a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyen bdun dang/ /nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas lan cig tu/ /gtor ma me tog dri dang bdug par bcas/ /'di dag gsol zhing legs par bsnams nas kyang/ /bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis bar mdzod/ /ces brjod par bya'o/
190a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas b+hyo 'bag bzhi byas pa'i mdun du skor zhi drang la/ de b+hyo sngags kyis bsngags te phyogs bzhir skyal? lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor bcas la mchod pa dang/ rgyud kyi bstod pa la sogs pas bstod nas bdag dang yon bdag
190a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas kyis me tog thogs la rgyal mtshan nam/ sku dang dkyil 'khor bcas pa la yang bstod pa byed cing bskor ba bya/ nad gdon zhi ba'i gsol ba gdab/ bzod par gsol ye shes pa gshegs/ /dam tshig pa bsdu/ gtor
190b1(rgyud 'grel): ma gnod byed kyi phyogs su gtang la/ bkra shis brjod par bya'o/ /de ni mi nang dang/ phyugs nad dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ byad ka dang/ phur ka dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /char chu yang dus su
190b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bab pa dang/ rtsi bcud dang/ lo tog la sogs pa'i 'bru thams cad rgyas pa dang/ mi phyugs thams cad 'phel ba dang/ mchog tu dge par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+d+ra go mis 'phags pa yi/ /rjes gnang dngos su thob gyur nas/ /gtor chog bshad rgyud la brten?
190b3(rgyud 'grel): brtsams/ /dge des 'gro kun bde thob shog /'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur pa'o// //
190b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya ta thA ga toSh+Na? Shi si tA ta pa tre nA mA pa rA dzi ta d+hA ra Ni sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi
190b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthong dang ma mthong la sgrol ba'i/ /gdugs dkar yum la phyag 'tshal te/ /bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i phyir/ /lo 'dab tsam zhig gsal par bya/ /de la 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can
190b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bar 'dod ba'i rnal 'byor paS/ gnas dben zhing yid dang mthun par dang po maN+Dal dang mchod pa bshams la khrus bya ste/ lus dris byugs nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ stan bde ba la gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar
190b7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i steng du oM dkar po bsams te / de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du
191a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms te stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar stong pa nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i oM dkar po bsams te/ de nyid la phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don bya ste/
191a2(rgyud 'grel): tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar po oM gyis mtshan par gyur te/ de las 'od zer lha mo'i sku dang bcas pas 'phros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nang dang sdug bsngal thams cad las dkrol te tshur 'dus pas/ 'phags pa ?
191a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa/ sprul pa'i dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba/ spyan bye ba phrag brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo/ /dbu la mi phyed rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can//
191a4(rgyud 'grel): sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa/ bdag dang gzhan 'jigs ba thams cad las skyob pa/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis kun nas yongs su bskyor te gnas par bsams te/ mchod pa'i tshogs rnams byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs par
191a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar khruM las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor pa'i rgyan dang ldan par bsgoms pa'i nang du seng+ge la sogs pa'i gdan rnams bskyed pa la/ spyan drangs pa ni snying ga'i oM gyi 'od kyis bskul te
191a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa rnams mchod yon gyis bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang/ sprul pa'i tshogs rnams gsal bar
191a7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs te/ gzhung las byung ba'i phyag rgya dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod do/ /de nas gsol ba btab ste bzlas pa ni bdag dang ye shes kyi thugs kar/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzlas pa'i yi ge
191b1(rgyud 'grel): ? dog po lta bur bsam te/ spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas bzlas pa'i skyon spangs te /bzlas pa bya'o/ /de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs shing sems can gyi
191b2(rgyud 'grel): don dran pas bzlas pa bya'o//de ngal lam gtong par 'dod na bzlas pa yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phul te/ bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ bzod par gsol zhing dge ba'i rtsa
191b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bsngos nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o/ /langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /rtag tu 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal par dmigs shing 'byung
191b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i kha zas spangs te bsgrub par bya'o/ /bsrung ba dang/ 'khrul 'khor dang/ bzlog pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba dang/ dmag dpung gzhom pa dang/ dngos grub bsgrub pa dang/ ser ba bsrung ba dang/ sre'u gso ba dang
191b5(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma btang ba dang/ mdze? nas gso ba dang/ 'jigs pa bskyab pa kun dang po'i phan yon las 'byung pa ltar thams cad bya'o/ /bdag 'dra blo dman so so skye bo yis/ /'phags pa mchog la chu yi thigs tsam bstod/ /'di las bskyed pa'i
191b6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams gang byung bas/ /bdag dang sems can kun gyi mchog thob shog /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ /
191b7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //de la rang ngam gzhan la bsrung bar 'dod pas/ dang por gro ga 'am ras sam shing shun la/ gur kum gyis rim pa bzhir gnas par bskor te dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs
192a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ba bkod pa'i lte ba la bsrung bar bya ba'i ming bsrung tshig dang bcas pa bris te/ rtsibs brgyad po dag la ni/ oM ri Shi gan nas aSh+Ta na ma'i bar du so sor bris te/ yang bsrung ba'i tshogs dang bcas par ro/ /gnyis pa la ni
192a2(rgyud 'grel): tadya thA/ oM nas hUM ban b+ha'i bar du sde tshan brgyad du dgod par bya'o/ /rim pa gsum par ni zhi bar byed pa'i rig sngags/ tadya thA/ hUM nas ma ma'i bar du dgod par bya'o/ /rim pa bzhi bar ni/ thams cad 'joms pa'i rig sngags oM a si tA na
192a3(rgyud 'grel): lArka nas bi sa na ya'i bar du bsrung pa'i tshig dang bcas par dgod par bya'o/ /de ltar bris pa de bum pa 'am maN+Dal steng du bzhag nas/ bdag nyid lta'i rnal 'byor rdogs par bya ste/ 'khor lo'i dbus kyi yi ge las 'phags pa gdugs
192a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo can 'khor bcas bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas mdun du gzhal yas khang bsams te/ ye shes kyi lha chogs spyan drangs mchod pa bya ste/ gzungs nas 'byung bas gsol ba btab la/ bzlas pa brgya 'am stong dam ci tsam 'tsham par
192a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas 'khor la yang mchod cing tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang legs ldan la sogs pa la gtor ma phul te/ gsol ba btab nas rang dam gzhan skyes pa 'am bud med phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas/ yungs
192a6(rgyud 'grel): kar dang bcas pas lus sam mgul du btags na mes mi tshugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan no/ /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'i bsrung pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so// //bdag
192a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid bsnyen pa thob pas 'khrul 'khor 'ching bar 'dod na/ dur khrod kyi ras la khrag dang dug dang lan tshwa dang/ ske tshe?  la sogs pa'i khu pas 'khor lo mu khyud gnyis la bskor ba bris te/ nang ma'i lte ba la bsgrub bya'i mings?
192b1(rgyud 'grel): bon gyi yi ge bris pa'i phyi rol du/ tadya thA/ oM nas hUM bruM? ban d+ha'i bar du bris pa 'am mthar che ge mo mA ra ya phaT ces bri'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la thams cad 'jos pa'i sngags/ mA ? dang bcas par dgod do/ /de nas grog mkhar gyis dang/
192b2(rgyud 'grel): ba lang gi lci ba dang/ dgra'i rkang rjes kyis bgegs kyi chu phar 'gram gyi sa la gzugs brnyan byas te/ de'i snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug ste dong gru gsum du gzhug go /de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya ste/ 'khor lo bsgrub byar
192b3(rgyud 'grel): bsams pa'i rten la phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa kun bkug cing bcug bar bsams la/ changs pa dang dbang po dang legs ldan drag po la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma byin te/ gsol pa btab nas/ bzlas pa ni phyag rgya'i tshogs
192b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas bsgrub bya bkug cing/ bkug nas bcings par bsams te/ de nas ling ga 'bul bi dang ldeg pa dang/ g.yo ba la sogs pa byung nas thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags kyis rig sngags bcad phur pas gdab par bya'o/ /thamS?
192b5(rgyud 'grel): sman ma rlung la 'char ba 'am mnan par bya'o/ /yang na ling ga la bzlas pa bya ste/ chu mig gam/ sbyin sreg gam/ sa gter ram/ ri rtser gtad bya'o/ /'khrul 'khor rdzogs so// //dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang/ ngag? bzlog
192b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas par bsgoms nas/ mdun du 'chi bdag gnas par bsgoms te/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de la bsnun pa'i sbyor ba bya ste/ tshur 'dus pas bdag ye shes kyi bdud rtsis lus
192b7(rgyud 'grel): la phan btags par bsams te/ thams cad 'joms pa bzlas par bya'o/ /ngag bzlog pa ni grog mkhar gyis dang/ ba lang gi lci ba la bsgrub bya'i ming gzugs byas la/ de'i snying gar sngar gyi 'khrul 'khor bris pa'i mthar che ge mo 
193a1(rgyud 'grel): mA ra ya ban d+ha ya nan bya ba bcug ste bkod nas bcug nas/ gzugs kyi khar thams cad 'dzoms ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang phur bus btab ste/ de nas mchod rten rnying pa 'am/ lha khang gi them pa 'am/ lam rgya
193a2(rgyud 'grel): gram? mam?/ bsgrub bya'i yul gyi phyogs su tsha tsha'i 'og tu 'am/ yang na rang gi mal 'og tu dong gru gsuM pa byas pa 'am/ 'og tu bzhag nas bye mas bkang ste/ g.yam pa la rdo rje rgya gram bris la mnan pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa dang
193a3(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin dang/ leg ldan drag po la gtor ma byin la/ 'chi bdag gzhom pa 'am/ che ge mo'i dag bcings shing che mo'i srung ma bdag gi dbang du gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /rang bsrung ba yang thun mong du lha'i nga rgyal gyis bzlas
193a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom rtag tu bya pa dang/ lus la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gdags so/ /bzlog pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //bgegs bzlog cing gzing pa ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ grog mkhar gyi sa dang/ dur khrod
193a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi thal ba dang/ chu bar 'gram tshur 'gram gyis la bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar bris ba'i mthar che ge mo'i 'byung po mA ra ya nan bya ba bkod de/ de'i snying gar bcug nas de la bdag gi thugs las
193a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i tshogs sbros pas bsgrub par bya ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnga mo la bskyon te/ bkug ste gzugs brnyan la bcug ste/ bcings nas la chas dril te dres mas dkris la/ thod pa 'am kham phor kha sbyar sar pa ru
193a7(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste/ tshangs pa dang dbang po dang legs ldan drag po la sogs pa la gtor ma byin nas 'byung po 'di bdag gi dbang du gyis shig ces bsgo la lha khang gi them pa 'am/ lam rgya gram mam/ mchod rten snying pa'i 'og dong
193b1(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum du bcug la/ bye ma 'am cher mas bkang nas/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan te/ bskal par mi thar bar bsam mo/ /bgegs gzir ba ni gzugs brnyan snga ma ltar ram/ 'jag ma la byas te/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar byas te/ de'i tha mar che ge
193b2(rgyud 'grel): so? mA ra ya btags te bris te/ gtor ma snga ma ltar byin te/ tshangs pa dang dbang po legs ldan la sogs pas gnod par byed pa'i 'byung po 'di chos shig ces bskul nas/ phyag rgya'i chogs kyis rang dbang med par snga ma ltar bkug bcingS
193b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags dang yungs kar/ phur bu dang ral gri dang bcas pas gzir zhing tha mar mnan pa 'am bsreg par bya'o/ /yang na tha mar mna' chu blud la btang bar bya'o/ /bgegs bzlog cing gzir pa'i thabs rdzogs so// /
193b4(rgyud 'grel): pha rol gyi dmag dpung gzhom par 'dod na/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas 'khrul 'khor mu khyud gnyis pa snga ma ltar ram/ ras dmar po lta bu la bris pa'i mthar che ge mo'i tshigs? dang/ de dag gi srung ma'i ming gi mthar pan d+ha? ya
193b5(rgyud 'grel): nan bya ba bris nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de'i bsrungs ma dang/ dmag dpung rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis btags nas bstims te/ bcings nas 'thab mtshams su snga ma ltar mnan par bya'o/ /yang na pha rol gyi dmag 'ong ba la de bzhin gsheD pI
193b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i gzungs rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro dang mchod pa bya ste/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam dgon pa'i gnas su gzugS?
193b7(rgyud 'grel): so/ /yang na rin po che'i byang bu 'am/ gro ga 'am/ shog bu la gzungs 'di bris te ltar bskyed cing spyan drangs ba dang/ mchod pa chen po byas nas skor ba bya/ tshangs pa dang dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa la gtor ma btang ngo/ /che ge mo'i dmag
194a1(rgyud 'grel): dpung choms shig ces pas kyang bskul te de ltar gzungs du mar bris te spyi gtsug tu gdags pa dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ dmag dpung gi mdun du bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ste/
194a2(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal dang ldan pa phyag rgya'i tshogs dang tshangs pa dang/ dbang po la sogs pas bskor te/ gnas par bsam shing phyar te 'gro bar bya'o/ /rtag tu mchod cing gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /des ni pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams zhi bar
194a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /dmag dpung gzhom pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na/ gnas yid dang mthun zhing bkra shis par gro ga 'am ras la gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa 'am/
194a4(rgyud 'grel): yang na rin po che'i sgrom du bcug ste/ maN+Dal gyi dbus su bzhag nas sam dngos grub kyi rten pa dmar ser gyi zho 'am/ mar khu 'am/ yang na chang 'am/ zan la sogs pa gzhag nas/ lha'i rnal 'byor byas te gsol ba btab la/ tshangs pa dang
194a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin te/ yang gsol ba btab nas dngos grub gsol bar dmigs te bsgom zhing bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam zhig na du ba dang/ dro ba dang/ 'bar ba kun byung nas 'thungs sam/ zos na tshe ring ba dang/ dbang
194a6(rgyud 'grel): che ba dang/ rigs rgyas pa dang/ nam mkhar 'gro ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na bu 'dod pa gang la las gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ skor ba dang/
194a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byed cing tshangs pa la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin te/ gsol ba btab na bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams kyi stobs kyang dpag tu med pa yang rnyed do/ /dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //
194b1(rgyud 'grel): yang 'jigs pa las sgrol bar 'dod pas gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags la/ grong ngam grong khyer ram skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyi mchod pa dang skor ba bya ste/ gsol ba btab nas tshangs pa la sogs pa la mchod pa
194b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gtor ma byin te/ gzungs 'di brgya 'am stong du bzlas brjod bya ba dang/ bris te lus sam mgul du brtags nas rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can yid la byed pa dang/ gsol ba 'debs shing bzlas brjod byas na rgyal po'i chad pas
194b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang/ lha'i gdon la sogs ba dang/ mdangs za ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ gdon thams cad kyis byas pa la sogs pa dang/ nad dang rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa dang/ rims thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro
194b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //ser ba bsrung ba 'dod pas/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar brgyad byas te/ tha mar ser ba'i 'byung po mA ra ya ban d+ha ya nan bya ba bkod nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas/ phyag rgya'i
194b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis bkug cing bcings nas/ kham phor ram thod par bcug nas/ bsrung bar bya ba'i yul gyi phyogs mtshams bzhir dong gru gsum snga ma ltar mnan te/ de gzungs 'di bris te mchod cing skor ba byas nas gzhag pa dang/ yungs kar la
194b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'bum la sogs pa bzlas te gzhag pa dang/ gzhan du yang skor ba dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa la gtor ma byin te/ gsol ba gdab pa dang/ snang srid kyi lha 'dre dang/ bar snang gi lha dang/ gnod sbyin kun dang/ yul de'i lha dang/ kru la
194b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma tshim par byas nas gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas gzungs la rtag tu mchod cing bzlas pa dang/ skabs su mchod pa dang gtor ma btang zhing/ sbin? la sogs pa byung ba'i tshe bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal byas te thams
195a1(rgyud 'grel): cad 'joms pa zlos shing yungs kar dang bcas pa nam mkha' thams cad phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis gang bas 'joms par bsam mo/ /ser ba bsrung ba'i thabs rdzogs so// //mdze la sogs pas bdag gi nad gso ba ni/
195a2(rgyud 'grel): dang po lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas la bsgrub bya 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo'i spyan sngar sems bskyed pa dang/ skyabs su 'gro ba bya ste/ gzungs bris nas gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ mchod bstod bya zhing mdun du
195a3(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i chogs kyis bskor bar bsams te/ rtag tu khrus bya zhing bzlas brjod bya ba dang/ thun mtshams su tshangs pa la sogs pa la gtor ma byin gsol ba gdab pa dang/ gnod par byed pa la yang gtor ma byin te
195a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par bya ba dang/ gdugs dkar mo'i bsrung ba gdags shing tha mar thams cad 'joms pa yis bskrad cing gzir ba dang kun sngar bshad pa bzhin bya'o/ /de lta bu'i gang zag la ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung
195a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ ro langs dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rims dang shu ba dang/ g.yan pa dang/ 'brum bu phra mo dang/ mdzed pa zhes pa la sogs pa gzhung gi phan yon de yang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs so/ /rkyen las gyur pa thams
195a6(rgyud 'grel): cad la/ phan yon ji ltar bshad pa bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad gdug pa can gso ba'i thabs rdzogs so// //gtor ma btang bar 'dod pas snod gtsang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i nang du zan dang/ khung? nga dang
195a7(rgyud 'grel): chan dang/ 'bru'i tshogs dang/ shing tog dang/ rin po che'i tshogs dang/ sman dang ldan par bya ste/ de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor pas a kA ros sbyangs te nam mkha' mdzod kyis spel la/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bsams te/ de'i phyogs
195b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams su h+raM?(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma'i tshogs bskyed pa la/ phyogs skyong ba bcu la sogs pa chos kyi bsrungs ma dang/ khyad par du tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang legs ldan la sogs 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang par bya'o/ /yang 'byung po'i gtor ma gnyis
195b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la lha'i gdon la sogs pa dang/ zas su mdangs za ba kun la sbyin par bya'o/ /de yang lce rdo rjer bsam zhing sbu gus bdud rtsi thams cad ngoms shing tshim par bya ba dang/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga char bzhin 'byung bar bsam mo/ /de nas
195b3(rgyud 'grel): tha mar bzod par gsol te/ gsol ba btab nas yi ge brgya ba brjod do/ /thams cad gshegs so/ /de yang 'byung po'i gtor ma ni mngal dang/ khrag dang/ zhag dang/ sha dang rkang dang/ bcas pa za ba la sogs ba la sbyin no/ /de yang 'byung po
195b4(rgyud 'grel): gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang/ gzungs kyi lha'i gdon dang/ bya ba nas zas su? mngal zal kun gyi sa sbyin no/ /gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya ta thA g toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre nA ma/ a pa rA dzi ta d+ha ra Ni sA d+ha
195b5(rgyud 'grel): naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog la zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthong dang ma mthong la grol
195b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /gdugs dkar yum la phyag 'tshal te/ bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i phyir/ /lo 'dab tsam zhig gsal bar bya/ de nas 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ gnas bden zhing yid dang mthun par dang? por?
195b7(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal? dang mchod pa bshamS nas khrus byas te lus dris byugs nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ stan bde ba la gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying kar zla ba'i steng oM dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od ser 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs
196a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin bya'o/ /de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms te/ stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas stong
196a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i oM dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don byas te/ tshur 'dus pa laS gdugs dkar po oM gyis mtshan par gyur te/ de las 'od zer lha mo'i sku dang bcas
196a3(rgyud 'grel): pa spros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad bgrol te/ tshur 'dus pas 'phags pa gdugs dkar po can/ sku mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa/ sprul pa'i
196a4(rgyud 'grel): dbu stong phyang? stong mnga' ? la? spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ /dbu la mi phyed 'bar pa'i mtshan rtags can/ /sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor mnga' mdzad pa/ bdag cag gzhan 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis kun
196a5(rgyud 'grel): nas yongs su bskor te gnas par bsam mo/ /mchod pa'i tshogs rnams byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar bruM las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor pa brgyan dang ldan pa bsdoms pa'i nang du/ seng+ge la
196a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i gdan rnams bskyed la/ spyan drang ba ni/ snying ka'i oM gyi 'od kyi bskul te dmigs pa rnams mchod yon gyis bzhugs su gsol bar bsam mo/ /de yang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar? mo
196a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor pa dang/ sprul ba'i tshogs rnams gsal bar dmigs te/ gzhung las 'byung ba'i phyag dang/ bstong pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod do/ /de nas gsol ba gdab ste bzlas pa ni bdag dang/
196b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi thugs kar zla pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzlas pa'i yi ge mu tig 'bru lta bur bsams te/ spros pa dang bsdu bas bzlas pa'i skyon spangs de bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal par
196b2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs shing sems can gyi don dran pas ? par bya'o/ /de nas ngal lam gtong bar 'dod na/ bzlas pa yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo la phul te/ bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ bzod
196b3(rgyud 'grel): par gsal zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o/ /langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal bar
196b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs shing 'byung po'i kha bas spangs te bsgrubs pas/ bsrung ba dang 'khrul 'khor dang/ bzlog pa dang sbyin sreg dang/ bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba dang/ dmag dbung gzhom pa dang/ dngos grub sgrub pa dang/ 'jigs pa skyob? pa kun
196b5(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i phan yon nas 'byung ba ltar thams cad bya'o/ /bdag 'dra'i blo dman so so skye? bo yis/ /'phags pa'i tshogs la mos pas chu yi thigs tsam bstod/ /de las skyes pa'i bsod nams gang byung ba/ /bdag dang sems can kun gyis kun
196b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob par shog /'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can gyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra? go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ma hA dza ma nyid kyi rang 'gyur yin gsung// //
196b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya? ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta ba tre na ma? d+ha ra Ni bi d+hi nA ma(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tong nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar
197a1(rgyud 'grel): mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor nus pa chung gyur cing/ /bsdus pa la mos sems can la/ /tsan+d+ra bdag gis legs bsdus te/ /gzungs kyi cho ga dgod par bya/ /dang por sngags pa dam tshig ldan/ /byang chub sems
197a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan rab sbyangs te/ /cho ga bsdus rgyas mkhas pa yis/ /maN+Dal chag chag btab stengs su/ /dri yi byug pa legs bsgos te/ /dang por dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab brgyad ge sar bcas pa bri/ /de yi phyir ni bcu drug pa/ /bris te sgo ni gcig pa
197a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de dbus rin chen khri stebs su/ /puM pa mtshan nyid ldan pa gzhag /rgyan dang dri yis chus gang bya'o/ /de nas mchod dang gtor ma bsham/ /dang po byang chub sems bskyed la/ /bdun bo rnam par dag pa yi/ /sngon 'gros lha mo bskyed par
197a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas bzlas dang gtor ma dang/ /mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya/ /bum pa mi dmigs bruM las ni/ /rin chen las grub gzhal yas khang/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga nas gsungs pa/ /rim pas bskyed pa rdzogs par bya/ /byin
197a5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs ye shes spyan drangs dbang/ /de rjes mchod pas mchod par bya/ /bstod dang gsol gdab bzlas pa bya/ /phar 'phros 'od kyis lha mchod la/ /tshur 'dus bdag gi sdig pa dag /ngo bo chu la rnam pa lha/ /yang na bzlog pa'i rnam par bya/
197a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas legs ldan chen po la/ /gtor ma rgyas par byin nas ni/ /slob ma khrus byas stan la 'dug /thun mong khyad par sdom pa kun/ /phog la lha la mchod bstod bya/ /de nas thams cad 'joms pa yi/ /sngags kyis slob ma bsrung
197a7(rgyud 'grel): bskrad la/ /de nas bum pa'i chu yis ni/ /slob ma'i mgo nas blugs pa dang/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod par bya/ /sdig sgrib dag ste rang gi ni/ /rigs kyis dbu la brgyan par bya/ /de nas me tog mchod pa dang/ /dbu rgyan la sog byas
197b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas/ /rang gi 'dod don gsol ba gdab/ /bla ma la ni yon phul la/ /rang gi dam tshig brjod par bya/ /bla mas dkyil 'khor la bsrung ba'i/ /dam tshig rgyas par bsgrags nas ni/ /byur bsal la sogs rdzogs par bya/ /de nas bsrung ba'i khor
197b2(rgyud 'grel): lo yang /cho ga ltar bris gdags par bya/ /mdor bsdus maN+Dal 'dab brgyad pa/ /byas te gong ltar cho ga bya/ /shin tu bsdus la bum par ni/ /lha mo nyid sku rdzogs par ni/ /byas te smon lam la sogs bya/ /de nas khrus sogs rgyas par bya/?
197b3(rgyud 'grel): des ni phyi nang gnod pa dang/ /sdig pa'i chogs rnams ma lus pa/ /thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gzhan yang las tshogs ma lus pa/ /kun kyang de las 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i
197b4(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar mo can gyi ngo? ga'i man ngag slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma zangs dkar lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// //lha mo gdugs dkar po can la
197b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pa rims bsrung bar 'dod na/ /dang po mchod pa dang gtor mas rims kyi 'byung po tshim par byas te/ /bden pa'i stobs kyis brjod pa dang gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs bris te//
197b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su de gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags te/ mchod pa dang/ gtor ma bshams/ rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ thun bzhir bsgoms bzlas bya'o/ /de yang nyin mtshan dus drug tu gdugS
197b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa la gsol ba gdab pa dang/ mchod bstod dang/ bskor ba byas te bum pa'i chus bkru zhing bsrung ba yang gdags bar bya'o/ /dpal tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang mgon po la yang gtor
198a1(rgyud 'grel): ma byin te gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas bsgrub bya gdugs dkar mo'i spyan sngar phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ skor ba thun bzhir bya zhing/ gdon gyi tshogs rnams la gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab bo/ /khyad par
198a2(rgyud 'grel): du rims kyi 'byung po la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /cho ga de lta bu dang ldan pas thun bzhir gzungs gdon par bya'o/ /tha mar yang 'phags pa la mchod pa dang srung ma'i tshogs la gtor ma rgya chen po sbyin no/ /rims
198a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //lha mo gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyugs nad bsrung bar 'dod pas/ dang por gor gyi 'byung po la mchod pa dang gtor mas tshims par bya ste/ de nas bsgrub bya rnamS
198a4(rgyud 'grel): la thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad cing gzir ba dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo btags te khrus bya ba dang/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar po can bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas mthar mchod bstod byas te/ gong
198a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i gsol ba gdab pa dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pas mchod pa dang gtor mas tshim par byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de yang bar skabs su gdugs dkar mo dang bsrung ma'i tshogs la gsol ba gdab cing ? pa sgyur
198a6(rgyud 'grel): te bsrung bar bya'o/ /khyad par du gor gyi 'byung po la 'byung gtor gyis mnyes par bya'o/ /de ltar thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rtag tu bsgoms pas mthar phyin pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pas mchod bstod byas te/ phyuD
198a7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams gnas dben par gnas par bya'o/ /de lta bus ni gor thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gor bsrung ba'i cho ga slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //rnal 'byor pa zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed
198b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pas/ dang por sa gzhi shin tu kha dog dkar ba dag pa la thab khung zlum po rgyar khru gang zabs su khru byed pa/ kha khyer sor bzhi pa dang ldan par bya ste/ de la dri dkar pos byug pa dang/ me tog dkar po gtor bar bya'o/ /de yang dbus su pad+ma'i steng
198b2(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rjes mtshan ba bris te/ kha khyer yang rdo rjes bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas thab tu bud shing brtsigs pa dang/ mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te/ zhi ba'i rdzas til dang mar dang/ ku sha dang dur ba dang/ nas dang gro dang dkar gsum mngar?
198b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum la sogs pa bsags te rang nyid khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ stan bde ba la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs sam/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis kha shar du bltas te gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rang nyid sgrub thabs las 'byung ba ltar lha'i
198b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor byas te/ de nas mahA shu n+yA? tA dz+nyA? nas/ thab dang rdzas rnams stong par byas te/ raM las thab khung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du bsams te/ de'i dbus su seng+ge nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du/ sngar bzhin du cho ga'i yan lag gsum gyis gdugs
198b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo can 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa bsang zhing byin gyis brlabs nas mdun du ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la/ sreg rdzas rnams gdugs dkar mo'i snying pos bsreg par bya'o
198b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzas de rnams re re la yang bdun nas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la 'bul lo/ /mthar yang mchod pas mnyes shing tshim par byas nas bzod par gsol te dge rtsar bsdos nas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol la/ dam tshig
198b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rang la bsdu'o/ /de lta bu'i zhi ba'i cho ga yang nad dang gdon la sogs pa zhi bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi'i gling pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
199a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo gdugs dkar mo'i mngon spyod kyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ dang bor sa gzhi yang gdug cing gas pa dang/ rtsub pa la thab khung zur gsum ngos re la khru re yod pa la zabs su khru phyed pa bya ste/ dbus su 'khor
199a2(rgyud 'grel): lo la rdo rjes mtshan pa/ /ba? yang rdo rjes bskor ba/ sa gzhi yang dug dang khrag la sogs pa nag por byugs te/ me tog nag po dang 'bru nag pos gtor ro/ /de nas drag po'i mched pa dang gtor ma bshams la/ drag po'i rdzas khrag dang
199a3(rgyud 'grel): dug dang/ ling ga dang/ ske cho dang/ rdo phye lcags phye/ zir bra'o nag bo/ sran ma nag po /de ltar rdzas bshams nas/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/ thab dang rdzas rnams stong bar bsams te/ dzaM las thab khung gru
199a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa bskyed pa'i nang du/ cho ga gsum gyis gdugs dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa drag po'i lhar bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol nas mchod pa
199a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bstod pa byas te/ bsreg rdzas rnams yum gyi sngags kyi tha mar mA ra ya btags te/ khrag dang dug la sogs pas lan bdun nas nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la bzod par
199a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba la sogs rnams bya'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang/ dam tshig sems dpa' bsdus nas rang nyid la bsrung bar bya'o/ /de lta bu de yang gang zhig tshar mchod kyi bar du lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa
199a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig gi bar du bya'o/ /mngon spyod kyi las slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //de bzhin du sa gzhi ser po la rdzas rnams yang las dang mthun bar bsags la/ thab khung gru bzhi
199b1(rgyud 'grel): bar rgyas pa'i spyin sreg bya'o/ /de bzhin du sa gzhi dmar bo la sogs par las dang mthun par rdzas bsags te/ thab khung zla gam byas te/ dbang gi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi'i man ngag go /sbyin sreg rdzogs so// //
199b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sgrub ba'i sgo nas sre'u gso ba ni/ bud med bu 'dod pa gang dag la la gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas de la mchod pa dang/ skor ba bya zhing/ tshangs pa
199b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na bud rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs la sogs pa yang rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i sgo nas sre'u gso ba slob
199b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor bas bzlog pa'i zor bya bar 'dod na/ dang por rdzas bsags ba ni/ khams pa'i mi mo'i gzugs bzhi 'am/ brgyad dam/ bcu bya'o/ /de nas sgo ? dang/
199b5(rgyud 'grel): mnga' 'ug pa ma skyer pa'i mde'u can bzhi dang/ khrag phor bzhir dug dang zor gyi sna du ma blugs pa'i snod bzhi dang/ dmar gtor cha bzhi dang/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga bsham mo/ /de rnams kyang grangs 'byor na bcu bcu ma 'byor na brgyad dam bzhi bsag
199b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ de nas sngags mkhan bcuAm brgyad dam/ bzhi 'am/ tha mar rang gcig pus lus la khrag dang sol bas byugs te/ gos nag po bgos nas khros ba'i yid kyis gnas te/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ thun drug gam/ thun bzhir
199b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'joms? par byed pa'i sngags rings dang/ 'byung po tshar gcod pa'i yungs kar dang/ tshe la sngags te/ de rnams la gzer nas bar bar du nang gdon thams cad la byo zhes bya bas gdab bo/ /de yang gdugs dkar mo can la thun
200a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'am/ drug tu mchod bstod byas te byo ba dang/ bzlog par gsol ba gdab pa dang/ lha ma srin sde brgyad dang/ yul lha'i gsol ba gdab par bsam mo/ /de ltar thun bzhi 'am drug tu bsngags pa de/ tshes
200a2(rgyud 'grel): grangs dang/ gza' skar brtsis te/ dus la phab? na skyes bu sngags dang ldan pa 'am/ cho ga dang ldan pas zor lam phye bar zor bskyal te/ de lta bu yang rang ngam/ gzhan shin tu nyen che na/ nar mar byas pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba
200a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ dgra dang bgegs bzlog par nges te/ byol? sngags bzlas kyang 'gal ba med do/ /bzlog pa'i zor bya ba'i cho ga slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ bi tI sA d+ha na bi d+hi
200a4(rgyud 'grel): kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thun mtshams las dang dang po yi/ /gang zag dag gis bsgrub pa yi/ /mchod rten cho ga mdor bsdus
200a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams pas dgong/ /dang po gnas khang byi der byas/ /mchod pa la sogs bshams de nas/ /rang gi lha yi bskyed rims bsgom/ /de nas bden pa'i tshig 'di yis/ /so yis bdag pos sa blang bya/ /bdag
200a6(rgyud 'grel): ni gzhan don bsgrub ba la/ /lha mos mchod rten sa blang gis/ /dgyes pas bdag la stsal du gsol/ /zhes bya brkos te bdag pa la/ /'od kyis sbyangs te rin chen bsam/ /de nas 'bi 'bi legs byas te/ /mar gyis brkus la
200a7(rgyud 'grel): skor bor stsal/ /legs bton lha mo rang du bsam/ de la mchod dang gsol ba gdab/ de nas thams cad bsgrub pa'i sngags/ /rtsa ba'i sngags nyid kho nas bya/ /de nas na bza' legs gsol la/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
200b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs kun/ bstims te mchod bstod legs bya ste/ /rten 'brel sngags kyis brtan par bya/ /de naS mchod la gsol ba gdab/ /yon? bdag la sogs smon laM gdab/ /de na dge 'dun mchod ston bya/ /'byung ba chu rlung nam mkha' dang/ /yid kyi bsgrub pa la sogs kun/ /bla ma'i
200b2(rgyud 'grel): gdams pa ldan pas gdab/ /de ltar mchod rten mchog ni/ /mdor bsdus pa yi cho ga las/ /grub pas sems can ma lus pa/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal thob nas ni/ /rim gyi gtsug tor lha mo yi/ /zhal rdzogs par ni mthong bar shog /

200b4(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can sbyin sreg gi cho ga /gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan don ? phyin lha mo ni/ /gdugs dkar can la phyag 'tshal te/ /lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg gis
200b5(rgyud 'grel): ni tshim par bya/ /dri zhim pa'i chus legs par khrus byas gos sar pa bgos te/ rgyan khyad par can btags la bgegs bsrung ba dang/ bsrung pa'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rgyud dag par bya ste/ phyag dang mchod pa la sogs

200b7(rgyud 'grel): nas stong pa tshad med bar bsgoms te/ oM badzra dzwa la sarba d+harmA badzra sarba d+harma si te hUM zhes pa'i sgas stong par bsgom mo/ /de'i ngang las 'byung ba ri rab dang bcas pa'i steng du h+rUM las me thabs gzhal las khang lta bu'o/ /der a dang zla ba las bon
201a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi yi ge las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa ldan pa 'phros shing 'dus pa las me lha dkar po rgyan kun rdzogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa ag tshoms ser la 'khyil ba/ gsus pa che la 'bar ba gzi brjid can/ g.yas rdo rje
201a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bgrang phreng bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis skyabs spyin dang/ kunde bsnams pa'o/ /thugs ka na raM dmar po gru gsum gyis mtshan pa'o/ /de nas de nyid dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ tshur spyon tshur gshegs 'byung ba

201a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhes nas kyang/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas yon chab kyis spyan drangs la/ bsang gtor byin te dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang phyag gis mchod de/ mar gyi dgang blugs phul te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon

201a6(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstong/ /bsang gtor phul la/ ag na ye ha dya? ka bya ba tan ga/ a ti pyA ti pya/ sarba pA baM shAn tiM ku ru zhes pa 'am/ oM badzra ag na le swAhA/ yaM shing 'od la go/ oM a ga na ye swAhA/ mar zhal du'o/ /oM
201a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ til dang yungs kar phyag du'o/ /sarba saM ba de/ zho dang 'bras chan phyag tu'o/ /a pra ti ha ta badzra ya ku sha gtsug tu'o/ /badzra A yu:She dur ba gtsug du'o/ /ma hA be ga ya/ nas zhal du'o/ /mahA g+hasma re/ gro
201b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal du'o/ /ma hA ba la/ sran ma zhal du'o/ /mahA puSh+Ta ye/ 'bras so ba zhal du'o/ /mahA sh+ra ya a ma po ti/ zhes bya bas/ dzA ti pha la dang/ starka dang/ bilba rnams zhal du'o/ /rdzas thams cad me lha'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o/ /u dum pa ra la
201b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs ming dang thog mar brgyan te bsreg par bya'o/ /dri dang me tog dang spos dang/ mar me dang mchod yon rnams ni so sor dbul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a na la mahA b+hu ta dzwa la ya sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+Ta na ma ma hUM phaT/ shan ti ku ru swAhA/ me lha gzi brjid

201b5(rgyud 'grel): chen stobs chen 'bar ba mo/ /bgegs chogs 'joms ma gshegs su gsol/ /bsang gtor phul te mchod yon gyi spyan drangs la sngags dang phyag rgyas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa 'byung ba'i rim pa brjod par bya'o//
201b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas gong ma bzhin du dgang blugs dang/ sreg blugs dbul lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM/ a mu kaM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti uSh+NI ShA ya shud d+he bi ra tsa pi ma la swAhA/ zhes
201b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sngags sam/ rdzas so so'i sngags rnams kyi khyad par gyis dkyil 'khor pa 'am/ lha rnams tshim par bya ste sdig pa sreg pa'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang/ bstod pa byas la smon lam gdab/ /bdag gis

202a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la nang kyi rigs su gyur pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang 'dus pa las gyur pa thams cad zhi bar mdzong cig /gdon gyi rigs su gyur pa gdon stong phrag brgyad cu las thar bar mdzod cig /'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa'i nang

202a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba dang/ cho ga nyams te lhag cad du gyur pa thams cad bzod pa chen po mdzad du gsol lo/ /de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs te/ rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /gtan du ?

202b2(rgyud 'grel): ji srid nus pas sreg par bya'o/ /bdag gi cho ga'i rim pa 'dis/ /lhag pa'i lha rnams mnyes bya ste/ /srid pa'i btson dar nyam thag pa'i/ /'gro kun srid mtsho brgal bar shog /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor

202b4(rgyud 'grel): nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ rje btsun phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam snang mdzad rigs gtsug tor grags/ /phyag stong spyan stong zhabs btud nas/ /gzungs kyi rim pa las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad
202b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /chu klung ngam/ nags tshal lam/ chu po'i 'gram mam/ re'i sul lam/ phug gam/ yid dang mthun pa'i yul dben pa bas mdza' i dgon par/ slob dpon gtsug lag mkhas pa chos la dga' ba bslab pa bsang ba 'grogs na bde
202b6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ snying rje can dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las la mkhas pa rmi lam du rtags dang mtshan ma thob pa/ sgrub pa'i grogS po rigs btsun pa chos spyod pa dad pa can snying stobs che zhing brtson 'grus can bsam
202b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzang zhing mi skyob gzhan gyis brid kyang 'phags pa'i tshul mi gtong ba'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ stan bad pa la 'dug ste/ sgrub pa'i yan lag ni rdzas me tog dkar po dri zhim pa dang/ rtsa ba dang sdong bu la sogs pa sbyar ba'i spos dkar
203a1(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ tsan dan dkar po'i dri dang/ 'dras dkar gyi bshos dang/ lug la sogs pa dkar ba las byung ba'i mar gyi mar me dang 'bras yos dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i arg+ha dang/ gtsug
203a2(rgyud 'grel): tor dkar mo'i nye ba'i snying po bzlas pa'i khrus byas la/ snying po sngags bzlas te/ stong g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgos nas/ gtsug tor nas byung ba bzhin tshogs sog pa'i lha mdun du spyan drangs la/ bdun rnam dag byas

203a6(rgyud 'grel): can/ rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ me'i phung po'i dbus na bzhugs pa bsams la/ de'i snying ga nas nye ba'i snying po'i sngags brjod pas shar la sogs pa'i khro mo brgyad sprul pa hUM druM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): Sh+ToM gyis bdag dang khro mo brgyad byin gyis

203b1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa nas 'byung ba bzhin bsgoms la/ mchod pra mchod? pa dang gtsug tor dkar mo'i gzungs kyis bstod pa dang/ bdag dang mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad bsrung du gsol zhes phrin las bcol la/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs skyong ba bcus
203b2(rgyud 'grel): bskor par bsams la/ gtor ma bcu dbul ba dang/ gdon thams cad la gtor ma gsum mkha' spyod dang/ sa spyod dang sa 'og na spyod pa'i dbye bas phye ba la mchod pa phul nas bzungs nas 'byung ba bzhin du phrin las bcol la gshegs su gsol
203b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nye? ba'i snying po'i 'khrul 'khor bris la rgyal rigs la sogs pa la gdags so/ /yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rngal gyi sgor btsugs te/ klog pa bzhi phyogs
203b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhir bzhag la mchod pa chen po byas la skor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya ba 'am/ yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal la skor ba bya'o/ /las 'di thams cad la snying po dang nye ba'i snying po 'dum sngon du bzlas?

203b7(rgyud 'grel): shAkya seng+ge yi/ /mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil ba'i sbyi gtsug nas/ /ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso/ /khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha/ /sku mdog gangs ri'i rtsel nyi
204a1(rgyud 'grel): shar 'dra/ /zhal mang stong la spyan mang bye ba brgya/ /srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam thag pa/ /dus gsum gzigs nas sems can grol mdzad de/ /zhal stong phyag stong spyan stong rnams kyis ni/ /kun la khyab mdzad khyod la

204a3(rgyud 'grel): nor pas bslus pa'i sems can rnams/ /rang gi las nyid rnam par smin pa yi/ /'du ba rnam bzhi'i rims nad mi bzad pa/ /zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la/ /thugs rje mchog gis
204a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro don nyer bzung nas/ /srid gsum 'jigs pa ? las bsgral gyur cing/ /sdug bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar/ /bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te/ /sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang/ /nad kyi bskal pas

204a6(rgyud 'grel): u pa de sha /bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung pa'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i nye bar bshad pa/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs dkar po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje
204a7(rgyud 'grel): chen pos sems bskyed de/ maN+Dal legs bar byugs te thig le dang me tog gi tsham bu bkram nas spyan drangs pa dang/ mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas legs pa dang ldan pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas maN+Dal la a
204b1(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba la oM bsams la/ 'od kyis spro ba dang/ bsdu ba byas pa las bcom ldan 'das ma gdugs dkar mo zhal gsum ma/ zhal gsum la sbyan gsuM gsuM yod pa'o/ /sngo ba dang dmar ba ni g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal la'o/ /rgyun sna tshogs paS
204b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas kyi dang po na gdugs dkar po/ gnyis pan 'khor lo/ gsum pa na lcags kyu'o/ /bzhi ba na gzhu'o/ /g.yon dang po na rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /gnyis pa na rdo rje dkar po'o/ /gsum pa na mda'o/ /bzhi pa na zhags
204b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ni g.yon na'o/ /khros pa'i stangs dang bcas pas ma rungs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /'od zer lcags kyu dang 'dra bas ye shes kyi stad gug pa gzhug pa dang bcing ba dbang du bya'o/ /dbang du bskur ba la pai
204b4(rgyud 'grel): ro tsa na'o/ /phyag dang mchod pa byas nas mngon du byas te dmigs pa bcu bzhis bklag par bya'o/ /legs pa dang ldan pa la gzungs kyi bstod pa bya'o/ /yang na mdun du dmigs te bstan pa ltar kun yid kyis bya ba yin no/ /dmigs pa bcu bzhi
204b5(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag gi dmigs pa dang/ thams cad bzlog pa dang/ ri khrod lo ma can nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang/ bdag bsrung ba dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i che ba dang/ 'jigs pa brgyad bzlog pa dang/ gdon chen po nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzlog pa dang/ rig sngags bcod?
204b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ ma mo brgyad dang/ dam tshig can bcu bzhi'i sngags dang/ thams cad bzlog pa dang/ nad thams cad bsrung ba dang/ thams cad bzlog pa dang/ lus la gdags pa dang/ 'di dang phyi mar phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bu srid dang g.yul zhi pa
204b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ khyad par du bdag bsrung ba dang/ char dbab pa'o/ /gshegs pa dang bsdu ba byas te/ ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /'phags ipa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i nye
205a1(rgyud 'grel): par bshad pa bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ si tA ta pa tre
205a2(rgyud 'grel): a pa rA dzi ta nA ma maN+Dal la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa/ /rgyal bI
205a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor las byung ba/ /sprul pa'i rang bzhin lha mo ni/ /sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra/ /phyag stong spyan stong brgya phrag stong/ /lha rdzas gos kyis yang dag brgyan/ /bkra shis che ba'i lha mo la/ /de la bstod de sgrub thabs bri/ /
205a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la phan gdags rim pa yi/ /gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor rnams gnyis las/ /yid kyi rnam pa bkod pa yis/ /bshad kyis nyon mongs ma dang min/ /yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu/ /sgrub pa dam tshig grogs bcas kyis//
205a5(rgyud 'grel): sa phyogs der ni bsham pa dang/ /bsag pa dum pa la sogs pa/ /nub dang sbyar yin de las gzhan/ /rigs dang mi rigs tshogs par bya/ /snying rje chen po rab dmigs pas/ /sems bskyed sngon du song ba yis/ /skad cig sku
205a6(rgyud 'grel): yis phyogs dang mtshams/ /bsrung dang sngags dang phyag rgyas so/ /snying gar zla stengs yi ge yi/ /'od kyi drang dang sprul nas ni/ /bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs pa dang/ /snyan tshig bdag gi stong pa dang/ /phyag 'tshal sngon du song ba yiS//
205a7(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed sdom pa bzung dbang bskur/ /lha rnams bsdus pas lus bsregs te/ /rang bzhin lus su blta bar bya/ /gnas su oM bsam 'gro ba sbyang/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs pa dang/ /'khor lo ma lus rdzogs par bya/ /dkar me
205b1(rgyud 'grel): chen mo phyag stong? ma?/ /dbu steng spyan drangs brgya phrag stong/ /lha yi rgyan dang chas rdzogs pa/ /bkra shis che'i lha mo'o/ /phyogs ni shar lho nub byang du/ /drag shul chen mo rab gtum mo/ /'bar ba chen mo stobs chen mo/ /blta dkar ser dang
205b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar ljang? sa?/ /g.yas g.yon mthun par phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur dkur? brten dang/ /bum pa bzung bas 'gying ba yi/ /nyi zla gdan bzhugs bsam par bya/ /de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ /shar phyogs 'khor lo rnam bzhi la/ /
205b3(rgyud 'grel): gos dkar po dang khro gnyer can/ /phreng ba'i pad+ma rdo rje ma/ /sor mo phreng ba utpa la'o/ /sngo bsangs ljang gu dmar mo'o/ /lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lor ni/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sgrog can ma/ /mchod mo gzi brjid chen mo ni/ /dkar dang ser nag
205b4(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu ma/ /rdo rje rin chen dbyug? pa ste/ /spos dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /nub tu stobs chen lu gu rgyud/ /rdo rje rigs 'dzin rigs gser 'phreng/ /dmar dang ser dang dkar ljang ma/ /rdo rje dang ni bgrang phreng bsnams/ /byang du rdo rje rin chen ma/
205b5(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor bsgyings ma gser can ma/ /dmar mo dkar dang ljang gu ser/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bgreng phreng can/ /sgrol ma dkar mo nam mkha' la/ /bsgyings pa skyabs sbyin bsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i spyan ni 'od du bsam/ /dkar mo rdo rje skyil krung pad+ma?
205b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang/ /yid tsam khros nas gtsol gzigs/ /sgo? ma mtshams kyi lha mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas rab tu gsal/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang/ /mi yi mtshams su gnas par bya/ /thams cad pa
205b7(rgyud 'grel): ni rdzogs pa ru/ /blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /gtso mo'i thugs kar sa bon las/ /de lta bu nyid bskyed pa yi/ /sa bon 'od kyis 'gro ba sbyangs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang/ /mdzad pa ma lus mthar phyin bya/ /ye shes
206a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ /mnyes dang tha dad med par bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs te/ /ma 'dres rab bsal bsgom par bya/ /gtso mo chang gis mchod pa dang/ /phyag sogs rdzogs nas bya ba ni/ /'dod pa
206a2(rgyud 'grel): kun la sbyar bar bya/ /gal te slob ma dbang bskur na/ /sngon bzhin du ni bsgom par bya/ /bum pa sbyang byas zla la oM/ /spro bsdu lha mo bskyed pa dang/ /dgug pa byas nas mchod sogs bya/ /de nas legs ldan mchod pa dang/ /bsgo dang las
206a3(rgyud 'grel): bcol de nas ni/ /sngon du lung de bklag par bya/ /bdun nam 'bum mam grangs med pa'o/ /legs ldan gzungs kyi bstod pa dang/ /mchod pas bsgo ba thams cad byed/ /lha mo 'od zhu bdud rtsi yis/ /khrus dang bkra shis brjod par bya'o
206a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus bzhag phyogs rnams bcings pa dang/ /skud pa lnga yi dra ba yis/ /tshon gyis bcad de dkri ba dang/ /rus pa 'am bong ba rdo ba la/ /dkris nas gtor te byur bsal bya/ /de nas gtor ma byas nas ni/ /bsrung ba lus sam mgul du gdag?
206a5(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa lus las dkri ba dang/ /phur bu bton nas gdab par bya/ /gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la/ /gur kum dri zhim 'on bu yis/ /skar ma rgyal la bab pa na/ /sngags pas bri ba rdzogs nas ni/ /btags pa tsam gyis bshad pa
206a6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /gnod pa ma lus pa las thar/ /dad ldan 'di du dbang bskur ba/ /bu 'dod yi dam bcas tsam gyis/ /rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams 'phel/ /bde ba can du nye bar 'gro /rgyal la bri ba rdzogs nas ni/ /rgyal mtshan rtsel btags nas ni//
206a7(rgyud 'grel): rim gro chen po btsugs byas na/ /mi nad la sogs zlog par byed/ /de ni char 'bab nad med pa/ /klu rnams kyis ni byin gyis rlob/ /'di dag bya ba kun la ni/ /mchod dang gtor mas legs ldan mchod/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod
206b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /dge bas sku gnyis rdzogs par shog /bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga'i rim pa/ slob dpon g+hi ri wa tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya sarba ta
206b2(rgyud 'grel): TA ga toSh+NI Sha si d+ha ta pa tre ? ma a pa ra sA d+ha d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong
206b3(rgyud 'grel): dge tshul dge bsnyen dang/ /rnal 'byor bde bzhi'i tshul ldan pas/ /sa gzhi bkra shis yid 'ong bar/ /maN+Dal ba yi rnam lngas? byugs/ /sa yi cho ga legs byas la/ /thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu pa/ /rdo rje'i phreng
206b4(rgyud 'grel): bas gru chad dang/ /snam bu dang ni gru bzhir bya/ /pad+ma sna tshogs phreng ba dang/ /rdo rje phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /tsan dang shug pa la sogs pa/ /zhi dang rgyas pa'i shing rnams la/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan ldan pa bcu dgu bya/ /de la sngags rnams
206b5(rgyud 'grel): di legs par dri/ /tadya thA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ oM? Sh+To? band+ha band+ha bdag la rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ oM hUM shToM? band+ha band+ha/ bdag la rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ badzra pA Ni hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ratna ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na a ba lo ki te/ marta ni te dzo rak+Shi hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/
206b6(rgyud 'grel): oM pad+ma dzwa la dzwa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi da ra ba da ra/ ts+tshinda ts+tshinda/ binda binda/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM karma sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM phaT swAhA/ rigS lnga'i gtsug tor ro/ /tadya thA/ a na le a na le/ kha sa ma kha sa me/ bai? ra bai ra/ 
206b7(rgyud 'grel): sau me sau me/ sar bud+d+ha/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM phaT swAhA/ hUM ma ma hUM ni swAhA/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo'i'o/ /oM ri Sha ga Na pra Sha ste sarba ta thA gA toSh+NA ShI si tA ta pa tre hUM druM/ dzaM b+ha na ka ri hUM draM?/ staM d+ha ni kA ri hUM hUM
207a1(rgyud 'grel): mahA bidyA/ saM b+hak+Sha Na ka ni hUM hUM/ ba ri bidyA saM b+ha k+Sha ? ka dri hUM druM/ sarba duSh+TA nA na stam b+ha na ka rI hUM druM/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra hA NO/ b+hi d+ha na sa na ka rI hUM druM?/ tsa tur shI tI nA na gra ha sa ha srA NA ma bi d+h+ran sa na ka rI hUM hUM/ aSh+Na bi sha tI nAn/ nA k+Sha tra NA ma/ pra
207a2(rgyud 'grel): sA d+ha na ka rI hUM druM/ aSh+Ta nAM ma hA gra hA NAM/ bi d+hwa na sa na ka rI hUM duM/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad gdan stengs su/ /rim bzhin gtsug tor bzhugs su gsol/ /gru? chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhin/ /sgo bzhi sgo pa phur bu bzhi/ /rig sngags phyed pas bskor te
207a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs/ /sgo bzhir ral gri me long dang/ /bum pa mda' dang rim bzhin brgyan/ /kha dog lnga yi rgyan rnams dang/ /yungs kar la sogs 'bru lnga bkod/ /de nas rig sngags gcod cing mtshams bcad/ /yan lag bdun pa'i smon lam gdang/ /
207a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad la/ /bdag la dbang bskur smon lam gdab/ /gnang ba thob nas sngags 'di brjod/ /oM mahA shun+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de yis thams cad stong pa'i dang/ /a yi 'od zer 'phre 'du hUM/
207a5(rgyud 'grel): de las yi ge 'bru gsum 'phros/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun/ /raM gyis bsregs te yaM gyis gtor/ /khaM gyis bkrus la dag par byas/ /de nas 'bru lnga 'di 'phros te/ /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chags/ /khaM las bdud rtsa'i? rgya
207a6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i? dbus/ /laM las gser gyis gzhi chags/ /raM las me yi dkyil 'khor 'phros/ /'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'du las/ /rin chen sna tshogs ri rab ste/ /b+h+ruM las sna tshogs gzhal yas khang/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje
207a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+mas bskor/ /dbus su b+h+ruM las 'khor lo ni rtsib bzhi rtsibS bcu nyi zla'i bar/ /baM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad de/ /ge sar dbus su bsam pa ni/ /rigs kyi gtsug tor lnga rnams dang/ /phyogs bcu'i gtsug tor bcu rnams dang/ /sgo bzhi gtsug tor chen po bzhi/ /
207b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yi ge b+h+ruM las bskyed/ /sems can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yid kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' ste/ /gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems/ /phyi nang snod bcud 'jig rten khams/ /'byung lnga ye shes lnga rang bzhin/ /thams cad stong gsal rang?
207b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin med/ /de las 'od 'phros zla ba'i gdan/ /de yi dkyil du yi ge a/ /de dag 'phros shing 'dus pa las/ /thams cad par phug seg shang gis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkar ste/ /slar 'dus bcom ldan shAkya thub/ /sku mdog
207b3(rgyud 'grel): gser 'od 'bar ba la/ /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu ste/ /thugs ni ye shes lnga dang ldan/ /de 'dra bde ba gshegs pa'i skus/ /nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi rnams/ /til gang bzhi?
207b4(rgyud 'grel): du gang bar bsgom/ /de dag dbu'i gtsug tor las/ /b+h+ruM las gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhi ba'i tshul/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dang po phreng ba rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /'og ma skyabs sbyin mnyam gzhag can/ /thugs
207b5(rgyud 'grel): kar bde gshegs gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog ser po dbu rgyan 'khor lo bsnams/ /shar phyogs rdo rje gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /lho phyogs rin chen gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog sngo skya rin chen nor bu bsnams/ /nub
207b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs chos kyi gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog dmar skya pad+ma buM pa bsnams/ /byang phyogs las kyi gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog ljang ser rgya gram lcags kyu bsnams/ /de lnga thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /b+h+ruM las gtsug tor chen po bcu/ /dkar sngo dmar
207b7(rgyud 'grel): ljang mthing ga dang/ /sngo skya dmar nag kha dog bcu/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis la/ /g.yas pa gtsug tor g.yon buM pa/ /re re 'khor yang bcu bcus bskor/ /'khor lo pad+ma'i lte dbus nas/ /brjid
208a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul du mnyaM gnas te/ /phyogs su rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur yi ge thig le bkod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ spyi bo lce dang snying ga dang/ /lte ba gsang ba'i gnas rnams gsol/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin
208a2(rgyud 'grel): las ldam/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul lo/ /oM hUM tri h+ri ha/ spyi bo rna ba g.yas g.yon dang/ /ltag pa dpral ba dag tu dgod/ /'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang/ /pad+ma rgya gram phyag mtshan sogs/ /rigs kyi bdag pos dbang bskur ba'i cho
208a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul lo/ /rdzogs pa'i sku mchog thugs ka nas/ /gsang ba'i yi ge 'bru bzhi 'phros/ /dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /tshad med sgo ba chen mo bzhi/ /byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms so/ /d+hA pa puShpe a lo
208a4(rgyud 'grel): ke/ gan d+he mchod pa'i lha mo bzhis/ /bde gshegs kun la mchod par dmigs/ /byams pa'i lha mos gdug pa 'bul/ /snying rje'i lha mos me tog 'bul/ /dga' ba'i lha mos mar me 'bul/ /btang snyoms lha mos byug pa 'bul/ /so so sku
208a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog tshim nas kyang/ /bskul don byas nas 'od zer 'dus/ /lha mo de dag thams cad kyi/ /mig dang rna ba sna lce lus/ /'dod pa'i lha mo lnga 'phros te/ /gzugs sgra dri dang ro reg bya/ /gzugs kyi lha mas spyan la mchod/ /sgra yi lha mos
208a6(rgyud 'grel): snyan la mchod/ /dri yi lha mos shangs la mchod/ /ro yi lha mos ljags la mchod/ /reg bya'i lha mos sku la mchod/ /thams cad 'phros te bdag la thim/ /gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo/ /de nas ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du
208a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan drang ba ni/ /phyogs bcu rab 'byams 'jig rten na/ /rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas/ /gtsug tor chen po 'khor bcas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/ /e hye hi b+ha ga bAn/ mahA kA ru Ni ka dri sh+ya ho/
208b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ pradz+nya pA ra mi tA sarba ta thA g+hoSh+Ni Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM/ rgyal ba 'khor bcas tshur gshegs gdan la bzhugs/ /rin chen stegs dang seng+ge'i khri/ /nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs pa'i gdan/ /ma nyams tshul khrims brten pa'i gnas 'dir bzhugs/ /pad+ma sa ma
208b2(rgyud 'grel): ya stwaM/ srid gsum ston pa mi dang lha yi lha/ /bcom ldan mgon po shAkya seng+ge yis/ /mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil pa'i spyi gtsug na/ /ya mtshan rmad byung gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku/ /srid gsum 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /de nas rnam lnga
208b3(rgyud 'grel): ril bzhin 'bul/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yi/ /dbu rgyan rin chen gtsug tor las/ /thugs rjes sprul pa'i gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku/ /zhal gcig mche gtsigs ye shes sdang mig can/ /phyag bzhi rigs bzhi nyon mongs bdud bzhi 'dzin/
208b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes dbu stong kha dog cir yang gsal/ /phyag ni 'bum phrag sprul pa'i phyag mtshan bsnams/ /thugs rje go cha tsis kyang mi thub bsal/ /'bar ba'i mtshan rtags thugs rje nyi ma ltar/ /thugs
208b5(rgyud 'grel): rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun la khyab/ /rig sngags drag po phra men tshogs 'joms shing/ /log 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /log pa'i skyon rnams sel la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shAkya thub pa ljags kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i
208b6(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i dbus su/ /b+h+ruM las 'khor lo'i rtsabs brgyad pa/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni legs par bskor/ /bsnyen pa 'bum phrag drug bya'o/ /tadya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bI re bi re/ badzra d+ha ra Ni/ band+ha band+ha/ badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT
208b7(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ hUM druM band+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod rnams/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni 'grub par gsungs/ /sngags re yungs kar re re sprul/ /bcad dam bskrad nas phur bus brdeg /rin chen lnga sogs bum pa la/ /khro bo'i lha
209a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsgom byas te/ /khrus kyi cho ga legs par bya/ /gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/ shar phyogs sgo nas phyag 'tshal bshags/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag
209a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
209a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa utpa la bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang
209a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
209a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha' kya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
209a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi
209a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
209b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
209b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /padmo'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo /glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzho nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra
209b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang
209b4(rgyud 'grel): srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang/ /phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'dzin grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po
209b5(rgyud 'grel): dang lhan cig pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed/ pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs
209b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis phyag byas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bum pa rgyan ldan lnga rnams la/ /gtso bo sngags rnams legs brjod cing/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya/ /dbang bskur bsrung ba'i tshig 'di brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
209b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mos/ dus thams cad du bdag la dbang bskur cing byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /oM dus gsum bde gshegs sprul pa'i sku/ /
210a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ? phreng zhes grags?/ /pad+ma
210a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshon/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje'i mkhar rnams 'joms pa mo/ /drag po'i lha rnams thams cad kyis/ /bdag la bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ /gzugs zhi
210a3(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid chen mo can/ /'phags pa sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje rigs gser 'phreng/ /le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags/ /rnam par
210a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang/ /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang/ /pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang/ /phyag rgya'i chogs de dag thams cad kyis/ /bdag la bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i
210a5(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor rnams kyis dbang bskur/ gsang sngags brjod/ oM ri Shi ga Na pra sha sta ya/ ta thA ga toSh+NA Shi si tA ta pra tre hUM druM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ phyi ma gong gis 'dre/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung
210a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdugs dkar mo can/ rdo rje gtsug tor phyir bzlog pa chen mo/ /phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ /dbu stong mnga' pa chen mo/ /spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen pos gsuM
210a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa/ kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ 'jigs pa chen po nyi shu las bsrung du gsol/ /gdon nyi shu rtsa gcig las bdag rgyal bar mdzad du gsol/ sha za'i gdon sum cu rtsa gcig las bdag
210b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung du gsol/ /gdon de dag thams cad kyi rigs sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags bcod do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ phyugs bdag 
210b2(rgyud 'grel): chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab po/ nag po chen po dang/ ma mo'i
210b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ mi'i thog bcan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ rgyal bar byed pa dang/ sbrang rtsir byed pa dang/ don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab
210b4(rgyud 'grel): sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+ring? gi ri ti dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po dang/ lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngagS
210b5(rgyud 'grel): gcad de/ /phur bus gdab bo/ dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rigs sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ gsang ba bI bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//?
210b6(rgyud 'grel): phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol lo/ /oM a si tA na lA rka pra b+ha phu Ta bi ka si tA ta pa tre/ dzwa la
210b7(rgyud 'grel): dzwa la/ kha da kha da/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ bi dar bi da ra/ tsitshanda ts+tshinda/ b+hin da b+hin da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+ha ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ ba ra pra dA phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba Na ka ra ya pha?/ sarba de
211a1(rgyud 'grel): be b+hya:phaT/ sarba nA ge b+hya:phaT/ sarba a su re b+hya(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba ma ru te b+hya:phaT/ sarba ga ru De b+hya(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba gand+har be b+hya(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba kin na re b+hya(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba ma ho rA ge b+hya:phaT/ sarba yak+She b+hya:phaT/ sarba rak+Sha seb+hya:phaT/
211a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba pra te b+hya:phaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+hya:phaT/ sarba b+hU? te b+hya:phaT/ sarba kumd+haN+De? b+hya:phaT/ sarba pu ta ka Ta ne b+hA(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba un ma de b+hya:phaT/ sarba a pasma re b+hya:phaT/ sarba osta rA ge b+hya:phaT/ sarba dur laM kaM te b+hyo:phaT/ sarba dur b+h+ra? k+Shi te b+hya:
211a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba dzwa re b+hya:phaT/ sarba kri dya karma Na ka khor de ka re Na/ b+hi ta tsi ta pre sha ka d+huts+tsha d+hi? te dur b+hug? te b+hya:phaT/ sarba ti ? ke b+hya:phaT/ sarba sh+ra ma Ne b+hya(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba bidyA d+ha re b+hya:phaT/ dza ya ka ra ma d+hu ka ra sarba artha sa d+ha ke b+hyo bi dyA tsa yai b+hya:
211a4(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ tsa dur b+hyo b+ha gi ni b+hya(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba ku mA ri bid tA pa ni le b+hya:phaT/ mahA pra phyag? re b+hya:phaT/ badzra sh+raM ka la pra tyaM gi ra rA dza ye phaT/ mahA kA lA ya mA tri ga Na na maskri ta le phaT/ baiSh+nebI? ye phaT/ brahma Ni ye phaT/ ag na ye phaT/ mahA kA
211a5(rgyud 'grel): lI ya phaT/ ka la daN+Di ye swA hA/ i na dri ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ kau ma rI ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ tsA mu Na DI yi phaT/ rA tri ye phaT/ kA la rA tri ye phaT/ ya ma daN+Di ye phaT/ ka pA la ye phaT/ oM ti mu ka ti shmA shA bA si nI ye phaT/ dkyil
211a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lha yi snam bu la/ /mchod pa rnam lnga brgya rtsa brgyad/ /phyogs bzhir nyi shu lnga lnga dgod/ /sgo khyud snam bu ljang gu'i steng/ /drag po'i dug shing sna tshogs la/ /phur pa tshad ldan brgya rtsa brgyad/ /lnga bcu rtsa drug rig sngags bri/ /phyogs dang?
211a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa lnga dgod/ /byad ma'i phyogs bcu gdon rnams kyi/ /gzugs ming gro ga la bris te/ /phyag rgya bzhis ni bkug bcug nas/ /phur bus gdab cing sngags kyis gdab/ /bskul tshig bcas pa'i bzlas pa ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du
211b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya/ /'jigs pa thams cad bzlog 'dod pas/ /yul phyogs bcas pa'i ming rus bris/ /cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab/ /bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas/ /dag cing gtsang mar khrus byas nas/ /zhi ba'i rgyan dang ldan par bya/ /gtsug
211b2(rgyud 'grel): tor snying po 'bum phrag brjod/ /byis pa'i gdon rnams phur bus gdab/ /yul dang grong khyer bsrung 'dod pas/ /phyogs bcu'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad steng/ /phyogs bcu gtsug tor bzhengs su gsol/ /mchod pa'i cho ga bcu bcu bya/ /gsang sngags
211b3(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod/ /grong khyer gtso bo dbus su ni/ /gtsug tor gtso bo lnga bzhengs te/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas par bya/ /gzungs kyang 'bum tshar gdon par bya/ /de ltar lan bdun byas gyur na/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams
211b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /thams cad gcod bzlog rig sngags 'di/ /ston pas sngon sangs rgyas tshe gsungs/ /gzhan yang 'di yi yon tan ni/ /bye ma snyed du brjod mi lang/ /ma 'ongs 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /bsod nams thams cad bskyed pa dang/ /rkyen?
211b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje? lta bu'i sgrub thabs 'di/ /shes rab ldan pas rtogs par shog /gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
211b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo'i dkyil chog bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha sI tA ta ba tre nA ma ya pa rA dzi ta maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdug?
211b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa'i brgyad la sogs pa las thar zhing/ /rang gi don las gzhan don gcod mdzad pa'i/ /bla ma
212a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga phyi yi don ltar brtsam/ /de la dang por bla ma ni/ /chos bcu la sogs ldan pa la/ /slob ma dang ldan lha la gus/ /rigs ldan de yis gsol gsum gdab

212a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar rigs pas bzlas par bya/ /yang na dus dang mtshan ma dang/ /nus ldan rigs pas sbyar bar bya/ /'khor gyi sngags kyang 'dus par bzhed/ /de nas bsnyen? pa'i cho ga'o/ /da ni sa chog bya ba la/ /dang por phyi dang nang dang ni/ /phyogs
212a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang/ /'byung khungs la sogs rigs kyis brtag /de nas 'jig rten rgyal po 'am/ /blon po bdag po ci rigs par/ /mngon pa bdag po tshig gis blang/ /mi mngon bar gyur pas gzhi ni/ /lha dang sa yi lha mo la/
