212a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bum pa'i chus/ /nyes pa ma lus dag par bya/ /yang na lha mo'i rang sngags kyis/ /dag par byas pas gdon dang ni/ /zug rdu'i nyes pa dag par bya/ /yang na 'byung ba rim brtsegs dang/ /rang gi sngags kyis bzung bar bya/ /rak+Sha'i spal
212b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma rang nyid ni/ /'phags mar? byas te gsol ba gdab/ /de nas cho ga rim pa yis/ /bskyed la phyogs bzhir slob ma yang/ /lha mo bzhi yi bskyed rims kyis/ /tshigs ni 'di skad gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun mchog la yang dag byung/ /'phags ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs/ zhes pa brjod par bya'o/ /yang na tshigs bcad brjod par bya/ de nas bla mas 'khor lo nam mkha' la bteg la rang nyid khros pa'i gzugs//
212b2(rgyud 'grel): maM taM las ni mig nyi zla/ /hUM las rkang pa rdo rjer bya/ /'gying bcas rdo rje gsor bar ni/ /gar gyi tshul gyis 'di skad brjod/ /lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun nyon cig /da ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /bsrung ba'i khor
212b3(rgyud 'grel): rab sbyar bas/ /gal te gang zhig 'da' 'dod na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus kyis ni/ /lus gsum las gsum dag bya ste/ /'di ni de gzhom gzhan du min/ /oM g+ha:g+ha:g+hA? ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta na phaT/ kI la ya/ kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/
212b4(rgyud 'grel): badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya bAk+tsit+ta hUM phaT ces brjod la/ bgegs med bya phyir bgegs dgra ni/ /phur bu'i gzugs kyis gdab bar bya/ /de nas lha yi tshogs dang ni/ /gtor ma mchod pas tshim bya ste/ /rang bsrung gnas
212b5(rgyud 'grel): su bsrung bar bya/ /de nas sa la lag pa ni/ /lan gsum brdabs pas lha mo ni/ /lang tsho ldan pas bsams te ni/ /byin brlabs ye shes gzhug pa dang/ /mchod bstod byas la 'di skad brjod/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
212b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i chul dang khyad par dang/ /sa dang phar phyin lam la ni/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang gyur te// shAkya seng+ge skyabs yis/ /ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi stobs/ /pham par bya ste 'khor lo bri/ /lha mos gsol
213a1(rgyud 'grel): te thim par bsam/ /de nas phyi? yi thig le dang/ /mchod pa la sogs rgyas par bya/ /rdo rje sum pa rnam pa drug/ gser dngul rin chen las byas pa 'am/ /sa las byas pa mgrin phra ba'o/ /lto ba che la nag po yi/ /nga? ri
213a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i ras kyis ni/ kha brgyan mtshan ma legs bris te/ /'bru dang rin chen sman lnga dang/ /ldan par byas te me 'dod ma/ /dri yi thig le'i steng du bzhag/ de nas slob ma rgyan dang ni/ /kha dog ldan pa'i rig bzang dang/ /bde gshegs gsang?

213a7(rgyud 'grel): du spyad par bya/ /de nas slob mas bla ma la/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /dga' chen khyod ni ston pa po/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems
213b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum po yang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i tshul mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni bzhugs par mdzod/ /ces lan gsum gsol ba gdab/ /de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod//

213b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM A:aoM gyis ni/ /rdo rje dang ldan thig les mchod/ /de nas rigs kyi sdom pa dang/ /bla ma sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba
213b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dus 'di nas nyid bzung nas su/ /byang chub snying po la gnas par/ /sems can ma lus pa yi don/ /rdzogs par bya phyir sems bskyed bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges gnas pa/ /tshul khrims rnam
213b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum sdom pa dang/ /dge ba'i chas ni bsdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims dang/ /so sor bdag gis bzung par bya/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par/
214a1(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /de ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig yin par rgyal bas gsungs/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon bdag kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /
214a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i
214a3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyang ma 'dus bzung/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims bslab pa la sogs dang/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshang spyod
214a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rang gi dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi/ /bdag gi bya ba'i las rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni bsgrub bya ste/ /sems can 'khor ba ni rgya mtsho las/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya/ /ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya/ /dbugs ma
214a5(rgyud 'grel): phyung ba rnams dbyung bgyi/ /thams cad bla med byang chub kyi/ /lam la myur du gnas par bya'o/ /lan gsum du ni zlos su gzhug /de nas gyur bsal sdig pa dbyung/ /me tog phul te sngags kyis ni/ /brtan par byas te las kyi sngags//
214a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal la sogs pas brjod par bya'o/ /so shing a shwad tha dang ni/ /u bum bar sogs mi 'khyog cing/ /srin dang gas chag mi sdug med/ /sor bcu gnyis pa mthe'u chung tshad/ /me tog ldan pa 'char bcug ste/ /byang shar bltas ?
214a7(rgyud 'grel): mi smra bar/ kha ko tsam byugs maN+Dal steng/ /ltos med rang gi mdun drang dor/ /de yi rtse mo bdag dang nye/ /bltas na mchog gi dngos grub yin/ /phyogs dang mtshams su ga bltas na/ /'bring dang zhi sogs las brgyad 'grub/ /thur bltas
214b1(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og 'grub pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor phyir ni dngos grub med/ /de nas dri yi chu ni bzang blugs ste skyor chu blung par bya/ /oM h+rI b+hi shud+d+ha sarba pA paM ni tsa saM sho d+ha ya bi kalpa a ba na ya hUM zhes lan gsum brjod la thung du gzhug/ ngag gi sgrib pa
214b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'byang/ /skud pa dmar po sum sgril ba/ /mdud pa gsum ldan rang lhar byas/ /sngags kyis btab la lag par bcing/ /hUM las byung ba'i ku sha yang/ /sngas dang stan du sbyin par bya/ /de nas mchad pa spro bas chos/ /legs par bshad par
214b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ste/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen pa/ /yu dam ba ra'i me tog ltar/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni rnyed par dka' / /gang gis mnyam med sems can don
214b4(rgyud 'grel): bla na med par byed nus pa/ /gnyis med zab mo'i spyod yul ni/ /sems can sangs rgyas thob byed pa'o/ /dang po bskal pa grangs med nas/ /bsags pa'i sdig pa gang dang gang/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di mthong bas/ /de dag thams cad zad
214b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /zhes pas kun la spro ba bsgreng/ /slob ma de rnams kun gyis kyang seng+ge'i nyal stabs ldan pas su/ /ku sha'i stan la nyal bar bya/ /nang par longs la skal ldan rnams/ /thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /grong khyer dam pa mthong bar 'gyur pa?
214b6(rgyud 'grel): dang? bar dus su langs nas ni/ /rmi lam mtshan ma dri bar bya/ /nges kyang bzang ngan mthong ba rnams/ /bla ma'i mdun du brjod par bya/ /mtshan ma bzang bas dngos grub 'grub/ /ngan pa bsrung ba me yi ni/ /las kyis sdig pa gzhom par bya/ /de
214b7(rgyud 'grel): yi che ga sbyin sreg bzhin/ /de nas nam mkhar bzhugs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod bstims la/ /mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya/ /bus mo g.yas pa sar btsugs te/ /lag tu bdug pa'i spos thogs te/ /'phags ma gdugs
215a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar lha mo mchog/ rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon po bri bar 'tshal lags na/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcoM
215a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ma bdag ni gus/ /de ni bka' drin mdzad par rigs/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo bya don gsol/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang/ /gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang/ /
215a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten skyong ba ma lus dang/ /'byung po byang chub nyer gnas pa/ /gang dag rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba'i/ /bstan la mngon par dga' ba kun/ /bdag ni rdo rje che ge ste/ /'phags ma gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji ltar nus pa'i yo byad
215a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /'gro ba'i don phyir 'dri lags na/ /thugs brtse bar ni dgongs nas su/ /deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la/ /dkyil 'khor lhan cig gyur pa kun/ /nye ba ru ni mdzad par rigs/ /lan gsum la sogs brjod par bya/ /slob dpon
215a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid bzang ldan pas/ /rnal 'byor rdzogs pas sngar langs te/ /sdig 'joms dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bteg la thig las bya/ /ras bal la sogs nyes med la/ /tshon lngas legs bsgyur rin chen snod/ /rigs
215a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i sa bon las bskyed de/ /byin brlabs dbang rnams rdzogs par bya'o/ /oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harma:pa ra sba ra a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA /a dyan ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA/ zhes brjod lnga po gcig tu bsgril/ /tshad ni nyis 'gyur la sogs
215a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba de nas dri bzangs kyi bcal te/ /ye shes thig ni mkhas pas gdab/ /bla mas slob ma dza yis sbyin/ /de nyid sum 'gyur gyis blangs te/ /thig sgras sems can don du ni/ /sangs rgyas mang po bskul bsam bya/ /bla ma nub ste shar bltas
215b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /slob ma nub bltas tshangs thig gdab/ /de ltar g.yas skor gnyis btab la/ /zur dang logs sogs thig gi cha/ /bla ma'i man ngag ltar bya'o/ /phur bu btsugs la bskor bar bya/ /mtshan min pas ni dngos min 'gyur/ /thig skud chang na bla ma
215b2(rgyud 'grel): 'chin lhag dang chang? las nang du 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul bas ni slob ma'o/ /zur bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi/ /do shal sogs kyis spras pa ste/ /sgo khyud rin chen rdo rje dang/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bur bcas/ /mchod pa'i shing dang bkra shis rdzas kyis
215b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /de ltar mdzes pas lhag chad yang/ /de nas tshon gyis las bya ba/ /rin chen lnga 'am 'byung khungs sa/ /yang na legs par byas pa yi/ /kha dog lnga ni rin chen snod/ /bzhag la rigs lnga'i sa bon snod/ /bskyed cing bstims la ye shes dgug
215b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum brlab cing mchod bstod la/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ /zhes sogs brgya la sogs pa bzlas/ /de nas bla mas dbang ldan la/ /sogs pa'i mtshams nas g.yas bskor du/ /mdzub re snyoms par drang bar bya/ /sngo dang ser dang dam ? dang
215b5(rgyud 'grel): ljang/ /dkar po nang du rim pas so/ /mnyam zhing mi yo mchad pa/ /bris te rin chen snod kyis dgab/ /me tog dor la slob mas kyang/ /ci rigs bar ni skyon spangs bris/ /sbom phras nad dang nor zad byed/ /chad na slob dpon slob ma 'chi/ /yon pos thams
215b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis sdang ba gyur/ /shar dkar lho ser nub dang byang du ni/ /ljang khu'i rnam pa shas che'o/ /dbus kyi pad+ma lte pa la/ /gdugs dang rdo rje bri bar bya/ /de yi phyir rim 'khor lo'i cha/ /dkar por gnas la shar rtsibs la/ /pad spong phreng ba'i rnams
215b7(rgyud 'grel): dgod/ /lhor ni rin chen dbyugs pa la /spos snod rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /nub tu rdo rje'i rnam pa la/ /byang du rgya gram dgod par bya/ /shar dang nub tu skyabs sbyin no/ /gru chad dmar mo la sogs te/ /sgo la lcags kyu la sogs dgod/ /lha yi snam bu dag la yang
216a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong mtshan ma rim pas so/ /tshon gyi rim brgyas par bya/ /de nas lha ni mnyes bya dang/ /slob ma'i sdig ba gnom pa'i phyir/ /gnon po'i tshogs sbyin sreg bya/ /gzar bu'i tshad dang thabs dang rdzas/ /de rnams gzhan las
216a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bzhin bya'o/ /de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa dang/ /lus bkrus dri zhim chus byugs te/ /rgyan ldan pas ni mchod rdzas thogs/ /skor ba byas la slob dpon ni/ /lha mor byas te hUM sgra yis/ /rdor dril ldan pas nad zhugs la/ /dbus naS?
216a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo yi rim pas su/ /dbye ba byas te bum pa sogs/ /rang rang gnas su dgod par bya'o/ /mchod pa'i tshigs kyang ma lus pas/ /mdzes byas bla ma dam pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed/ /gzhug dang byin brlabs dbang
216a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur gsol/ /byas la mchod bstod mthun pa'i ston mo bya/ /de nas rtsa ba'i lha dang ni/ /legs ldan la sogs lha rnams la/ /'thun pa gtor ma chen po rnams/ /cho ga man ngag ldan pas sbyin/ /de nas slob
216a5(rgyud 'grel): ma dbang 'dod na/ /lha las tha dad dbye byas te /slob ma 'jug tshul dbang bskur rim/ /dang po dpa' bos blangs bar bya/ /de nas slob ma rgyan ldan zhing/ /mdzes pa'i gdong yang dar gyis ni/ /bkab lte lag par me tog ldan/ /mkhas pas
216a6(rgyud 'grel): khrid nas yol pa'i bar/ /bzhag ste bla ma ku sha yis/ /bu khyod su yin ci la dga' / /dris te bdag ni skal ba bzang/ /gdugs dkar lha la bdag dga' o/ /de nas slob ma bla ma la// /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon mgon ?
216a7(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ /gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yi/ /lha rnams kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas/ /lha mo
216b1(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar kun gyis gnas/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams la/ /dad pas phyag ni bya ba ste/ /oM na ma ste hUM/ na mA mi hUM/ na mo na mo hUM swAhA/ /de nas slob ma khrus byas te//
216b2(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi sgo ru gnas pa la/ /de nas me tog bcas pa yis/ /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /zhes bya bla mas de la ni/ /sangs rgyas
216b3(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun sogs/ /gong du bshad pa'i sdom pa sbyin/ /oM sarba yo ka tsit+ta ut pa pha? yA mi/ /sems bskyed me tog dang bcas pa/ /snying gar bzhag ste sngags 'di brjod/ /oM su ra ste sa ma ya stwaM ho sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM/ /oM a khaM bI ra hUM
216b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste/ /slob dpon tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /deng khyod kha mo dang ri khrod pa rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur gyis/ des gdugs dkar mo'i sems bskyed par bya ste ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/
216b5(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar can dang ri khrod ma rnams kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur la/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de la 'khor lo gzhug bya ste/
216b6(rgyud 'grel): lag gis rdo rje sbyir bzhag nas/ /khyod ni su yang rung ba la/ /gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na/ /khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje yis/ /rang gi mgo po 'gas bar 'gyur/ /de nas bdud rtsi chu blugs te/ /'thung du bcug ste 'di skad brjod lha ? mo dang khyod kyi
216b7(rgyud 'grel): snying la yang dag de ring gzhug /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /zhes bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub//
217a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra u da ka Sha o A hUM/ /deng nas khyod kyi gdugs dkar can nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas bar ma byed cig /khyod ya
217a2(rgyud 'grel): nga ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do/ /de nas slob ma'i gtso bo des/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzod la/ /rdo rje ye sheS
217a3(rgyud 'grel): dbab du gsol/ /de nas bla mas slob ma la/ /lus ngag yid gsum 'byung ba yi/ /'khor lor 'doms su yi ge dzhaiM/ /dmar ba bsams te 'od zer gyis/ /lus kyi rdul dang mnyam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bgug? la stim de ni/ /oM
217a4(rgyud 'grel): bardze? A pi? sha ya a a a ces bya'o/ /yang na A be sha ya to Sha ya ra rar ra tsa la ya tsa la ya hUM ha a dzhaiM/ zhes brjod 'gying ba dang bcas pas/ /rdzas kyi bdug pas legs bdugs te/ /dril bu'i sgra dang a na le'i/ /sngags kyang cing/
217a5(rgyud 'grel): dag tu bzlas/ /babs gyur lce la yi ge a/ /dmar po bsams te dge mi dge /smros shig bu kun nyams myong zhing/ /dris la babs pa brtan bya'i phyir/ /tiSh+Tha badzra hUM zhes bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bring ? shar sgo nas ni ?
217a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /'dir ni bsod nams ji lta bar/ /rigs kyi rim bzhin 'di yi lha/ /'dis ni dngos grub gang yin pa/ /rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur/ /de yi bsod nams gang yin las/ /dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /slob ma?
217a7(rgyud 'grel): tog phreng ba de/ /pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ /zhes bas me tog lha la dor/ /lha ni gang la phog pa dang/ /'grub 'gyur sngags 'dis mgo la bcing/ /pra ti grih+Na sA mi maM sarba ma hA ba la/ /de nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ /mig gnyis su ni oM ba'i
217b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra Ne tra ya pa ha ra phaT laM h+rI?:zhes pas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzang
217b2(rgyud 'grel): po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni gdugs dkar rigs su gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /'gro ba'i phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /dngos grub kun khyod dngos su 'gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang/ gsang
217b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /de nas me tog ltung ba'i lha/ /bstan dang lha gzhan thams cad dang /dkyil 'khor de nyid rdzogs par bstan/ /de nas slob ma dang ldan pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te/ /yon dbul dbang bskur gsol
217b4(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab/ /gdugs dkar can gyi dbang bskur pa/ /'gro ba skyobs phyir rdo rje can/ /de ltar yon tan kun 'byung ba/ /de bzhin bdag la der gsol cig /ces pa byas te dbang sbyin phyir/ /yungs kar sngags kyis bgegs zlog la/ /khrus byas
217b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan ldan shar sgo yi/ /khri la 'dug la me tog ni/ /sngags kyis lha la dbul bar bya/ /oM pra tIts+tsha ho/ /blangs te mgor bcings sngags 'di brjod/ /oM d+harma kun da a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM zhes brjod do/ /me tog phreng ba'i dbang 'di ?
217b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod lha'i dngos grub myur rdzogs te/ /pad+ma can gyi zhing sogs su/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang mnyam par shog /rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas/ /las kyi bum par chu bsdus te/ /slob ma mi bskyod par byas la/ /glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang ni/ /mchod
217b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs kyi chu blug cing/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ lha mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi'i chu/ /bag chags thams cad dag byed pa/ /chu yi dbang bskur dam pa 'dis/ /nyon mongs thams cad dag gyur cig /lugs 'byung bris ba'i dbu rgyan la/ /rin chen
218a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan bcug nas ni/ /bskon la dar dbyangs gis bcings la/ /oM phaTTa? badzra a ra li ho/ /thor tshugs cod ban gyis brgyan pa/ /bde gshegs kun gyis bsngags pa dang/ /rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang/ /dar
218a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs dbu rgyan dbang bskur ro/ /gser sogs tshad ldan rdo rje la/ /snang ba mdza' yas bkug bstims te/ /slob ma'i lag gtad sngags 'di brjod/ /oM badzra a d+hi ba tistwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas/ /di ring khyod la
218a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /dril bu ldog pa'i tshad ldan la/ /don yod grub par byas nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon sbyin sngags 'di brjod/ /oM a d+hi pa tistwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tha bI ra sa ma ya/
218a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu cang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /de tshe dril bu sgra sgrogs te/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyi dag /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang
218a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /mchog gi srid pa byed bar 'gyur/ /kha cig ming dang phyir mi ldog /dbang yang sbyin par byed pa yod/ /de ni thun mong dbang yin no/ /khyad par dbang bskur bstan pa ni/ /gzungs dang 'khor lo phyag mtshan
218a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ legs ldan dbang dang bkra shis dang/ /rdzas dang rin chen nya rin chen/ /seng ge mda' gzhu ral gri dang/ /mthun par sku yi dbang yang bskur/ /de nas bya ba srung bya ba dang/ /tshon gyis brab dang srung skud gdags/ /phur bus gdab dang
218a7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa yi/ /snang ba sbyin dang bsrung 'khor gyi/ /cho gas legs par gdags par bya/ /mchod byas lha rnams gshegs bya ste/ /brabs pa'i lhag mchu bor dor/ /rnam lngas thig dbyi la sogs bya/ /rang giS legs par rtogs pa yi/ /gdugs
218b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di/ /bla ma'i drin gyis byung ba ste/ /bsdus byas rgyas pa ma yin pas/ /mkhas rnams lha la bzod par bya/ /de las byung ba'i dge tshogs zla ba'i 'od ltar bsil ba des/ /myos byed skye po'i tshogs rnams gdung ba
218b2(rgyud 'grel): bsil bar gyur nas kyang/ /rang gis 'dod pa'i lha mo nyi dang mtshungs pa'i blo mnga' rtogs gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon mkhas pa pad+ma'i lcags kyus mdzad pa rdzogs
218b3(rgyud 'grel): so// //bla ma zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du /Arya dzi ta d+ha ra sat+ta bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can gyi tsha
218b4(rgyud 'grel): tsha'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ /'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po'i las can rnal 'byor bas/ /lus ngag sgrib pa sbyang ba dang/ /khyad par bsgrub pa'i las brtson pas/ /tsha tsha bya ba'i rim pa bstan/ /dang po yid dang rjes su
218b5(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i sa phyogs su thang bu blta bar bya ste/ de ru spos dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags sam/ thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags zlos shing/ /gtor bas mi gtsang ba'i chogs thams cad byang ste rin po chings gzhir bgegs yod pa kun ?
218b6(rgyud 'grel): gi gnas su dengs par bya ste bka' bsgo ba yang bya'o/ /de nas dri bzang po la sogs pa'i chus skyang nul byas/ me tog so ma dpag tu med pa bkram la/ /mchod pa la sogs pa'i yo byad kun tshogs par bya ste/ gnas khang dang mchod pa la sogs
218b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bya ba'o/ /de nas bla mas khrus dang gtsang sbra bya ste/ sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs pas 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du bsams te/ tsha tsha'i sa brko ba der brtag pa dang/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa 'am/ bkra shis pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mos gang bar
219a1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad pa dang/ lha mo dang legs ldan la gtong ma byin la gsol ba gdab pa dangs? bdag la gtor ma byin la bka' slob? ste/ /de nas ji tsam brko ba'i sa de la med
219a2(rgyud 'grel): ldeng la sogs pa'i phur bus phyogs bzhir btab ste/ de yang bstod legs ldan nam/ lha mo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la smad phur bur 'dug par bskyed/ byin gyis brlabs la oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba duSh+Ta na hUM phaT/ ces lan gsum bzlas la
219a3(rgyud 'grel): gdab? bo/ /de nas bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i tshon skud rnam pa lnga rigs lnga'i rnam pa 'am/ rin chen lnga'i rang bzhin du bsams la/ oM badzra sU tra sa ma ya hUM phaT ces bya ste/ phur pa'i tha mtshon skud gyis bskor la rang gi rkang pa gar bzhag
219a4(rgyud 'grel): par rdo rjer lam lam song bar bsam mo/ /yang na sngags de thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bya'o/ /de nas thams cad 'dzams pa'i sngags zlos shing yungs kar gyis gtor ro/ /de nas sa gzhi de rin po cher gyur par bsams la rang ji tsam
219a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa brkos te/ de'i sngags kyang oM badzra kha na kha na ya hUM phaT ces bya'o/ /de nas phur bu dang tshon skud bsdus 'o mas bskus te bzhag go/ sa blang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas blangs pa rnams stegs bu la sogs par bzhag las brdung ba'i las ?
219a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ sngags kyang oM badzra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya A hUM phaT ces brjod cing rdo rje'i tho bas brdung ngo/ /de nas spos chu la sogs pa'i chu la oM a mri te hUM phaT nes bzlas la/ sbos chu dmigs pa las a dkar por bsam/ de las zla ba'i dkyil
219a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de'i 'od kyi spos chu thams cad khyab ste/ bdud rtsir gyur par bsams te sbru'o/ /de'i sngags oM badzra pra mdza ya bra marda ya hUM phaT ces byas la sbru'o/ /de nas 'dzim pa de bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgyas bcas la sngags 'di brjod de/ /oM
219b1(rgyud 'grel): suk+Sh+me suk+Sh+me nu ga te/ shAn+te da na te/ nir ku li/ ni ra bar Ne sarba b+hu ta b+ha ya nu ga te/ ya ba de ya sho dzi ni/ d+harma d+hA tu garb+he/ d+harma rA dza ya ba shi he/ sarba bud+d+hA ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA nA ya/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ zhes brjod pas rang thugs las ye shes 'od zer 'phros pas
219b2(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum sems can/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du byas/ tshur la rig sngags la sogs sangs rgyas mchod pas 'jim pa la thim/ zhu nas khyab pas rin po che rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam ste stegs bu la bzhag go /de ni
219b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jim pa'i bya ba'o/ /de nas 'bi 'bi bya ste/ de yang oM badzra badzrod b+ha ba ya swAhA/ zhes zlos shing bya'o/ /de nas rang gi thugs ka las 'od zer sems can gyi sgrib pa gsum sbyangs/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du byas/ 'phags pa mchod/
219b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pas 'bi 'bi la thim pas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi shel sgong dag pa'i rnam pa'i gzhal yas khang du bsams te/ de'i nang du yang gdan pad+ma dang seng+ge las 'phags ma gdugs dkar can dang phyag rgya'i lha mo la sogs pa bskyed//
219b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di tshig gsum gyis bskyed/ de nas oM las ye shes kyi 'od phyung la gzhal yas khang du byas te/ gdan nas lha rdzogs pa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ ye shes pa gzhug/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas so/ /de nas rang gis kyang sbyang? ba la sogs pa
219b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas 'bi 'bi rnams su oM a na le dang phyag rgya'i sngags sam sa bon rnams kyang gzhug/ gzhan srog shing brten pa'i gzungs la sogs pa ci rigs par gzhug /rten 'brel dang dri ma med pa la sogs pa yang gzhug go? /de la mchod pa dang
219b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par bya'o/ /de nas oM d+harmA d+hA tu garb+he dzwa la swAhA/ zhes brjod la/ de las lha mo rnams bskul nas slar yang bzhugs te sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa rdul dang mnyam pas bdag dang sems can sbyangs te bzhugs par byed?
220a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas mar byug pa ni oM a ra dze bi ra dze swAhA/ zhes brjod la byang chub kyi sems kyis bsgom par bsam mo/ /de ni 'bi 'bi bya ba'o/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par bzhugs par
220a2(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ skor phor du bcug ? oM badzra d+harma d+hA tu garb+he swAhA/ zhes bya'o/ de nas skor phor shes rab lag pa thabs su bsams te/ brdung ba ni de ni gnyis su med par bsrub par bsam ste/ oM badzra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM zhes pa 'am /rten 'brel
220a3(rgyud 'grel): lam/ snying po 'am/ nye snying la sogs zlos shing gdab bo/ /de nas chos kyi sku las sprul sku gnyis kyi sems can gyi don byed par chos kyi dbyings las 'byung bar bsam ste/ oM badzra d+harmA d+ha re swAhA/ /zhes brjod la 'byung ngo/ /de naS
220a4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya mahA su kha badzra su ra ta sa ma ya stwaM/ de las gzugs sku gnyis byung bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par bsam mo/ /de nas gzugs skus ji ltar rigs pa ste/ long skus dag pa'i
220a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don byed par bsams te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ho ka sa ma ya stwaM zhes bya'o/ /sprul sku ma dag pa dang po'i las can la sogs pa'i don byed par bsams la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni ra ma Na kA la sa ma ya stwaM zhes bya'o
220a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas tsha tsha gdab pa'o/ /de nas sku gsum gyi ngo bo dang rang don ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so/ /de la ye shes bstim pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa yang bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra phru shi swAhA/ zhes pas srog shing gzugs
220a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de nas sems can shes bcu ldan gyur cig /bstan pa yun rings gnas par shog /sems can lhag bsam dag pa yi/ /kun bzang smon lam 'jug par shog ces bya'o/ /de nas oM pra marda na ye swAhA/ 'khorh lo gsum
220b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor la/ khams gsum sems can ma lus pa/ /stobs dang ma 'dres chos dang ni/ /dran pa nyer gzhag rnam thar brgyad/ /ye shes bzhi sogs ldan gyur shog /ces bya'o/ /oM pa da ka laM pa swAhA/ zhes brjod la dar kyi cad phan phul? la/ semS
220b2(rgyud 'grel): can rnams ni ma lus pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la/ /dar dang lham lhub la sogs pa/ /byang chub bar du mchod par shog/ ces bya'o/ /de nas oM pa daM ka swAhA/ zhes bya ste/ ba dan phul la/ sems can rnams ni ma lus las//
220b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur bstan pa'i bdan gyis/ /'tshe ba med cing chos ldan pas/ /grags pas rgyas par 'gengs par shog ces bya ste/ de nas oM kum+b+hi ra d+hwa dza swAhA/ zhes bya'o/ /chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan phul la/ 'khor ba ma stongs bar du ni/ /bdud bzhi
220b4(rgyud 'grel): dag las legs rgyal nas/ /ston pa'i bstan pa zab mo dang/ /mi thub rgyal mtshan thob par shog/ ces bya'o/ /de nas oM pra ma na ye swAhA/ zhes pas gdugs phul la/ /khams gsum sems can ma lus pa/ /nyon mongs chod? pas
220b5(rgyud 'grel): gdungs pa la/ /thugs rje byang chub sems kyi gdugs/ /phub pas bde bas tshim gyur shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM ratna ma le traM zhes pas me tog phul la/ ya na na mA(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI ya d+ha nu ga ta pra tiSh+Tha ta puShpa ko ta no ta thA ga dA ya arha te sa muk+kaM?
220b6(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+hA ya/ tadya thA/ oM puShpe swAhA/ zhes bya ste/ 'khor ba'i sems can ma lus kun/ /mtshan dang dpe byang rdzogs thob nas/ /blta bas mi ngoms gzugs kyis ni/ /sems can don rnams rdzogs byed shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM sya na d+ha?
220b7(rgyud 'grel): ye swAhA/ zhes byas te gdan phul la/ sems can ma lus sangs rgyas te/ /stobs bcu ldan pa glang po'i gdan/ /mi 'jigs seng+ge'i gdan dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rta yi gdan/ /dbang bcu thob pa rma bya'i gdan/ /thogs mong zhugs 
221a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan mkha' lding gdan/ /'dod gu 'byung ba rin chen gdan/ /skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i gdan/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal nyi zla'i gdan/ /gdan rnams myur du thob par shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM d+ha ra d+ha ra mi li dza
221a2(rgyud 'grel): le swAhA/ zhes gzhal yas khang du gshegs su gsol/ /ji ltar chos dbyings dag pa yi/ /gnas su bsam shes bzhud pa ltar/ /bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyang ngo/ /dag pa'i gnas su gshegs gyur cig /de naS oM su pra tiSh+Tha
221a3(rgyud 'grel): badzre swAhA/ zhes bzhugs gsol te/ rin chen gzhal yas chos dbyings su/ /sems can don du rtser dgongs la/ /ji srid sems can byang chub par/ /de srid du ni gzhug par mdzod/ ces bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra d+ha rA nyu? sha rim tiSh+Tha hUM a b+hi
221a4(rgyud 'grel): Shiny+tsa maM zhes brjod la/ dbang bskur te rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par bya'o/ /de ni brtan par bya ba'i cho ga yin no/ /des ni phun sum tshogs pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob dpon byang chub sems/ /ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod bya ste/ /bla
221a5(rgyud 'grel): med sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs/ /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung zhing/ /bdud dang phyir rgol log 'dren tshogs/ /thams cad pham byas bde la dgod/ /sems can nyid mtshams sbyor ba yis nyon mongs ma lus sbyar?
221a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /nga rgyal? ri ni gzhom bya zhing/ /skye ba'i ljon shing gcad par bya/ /'chi bdag srin po brlag bya ste/ /ma rig pa yi mun pa gsal/ /lta lo g.yang dag lta la dgod/ /las kyi chu klung bskam par bya/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho yang ?
221a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ /tshes sgron spar zhing byang chub lam/ /brtan par byas te bzod de byos/ /'dod chags me dang zhe sdang mtshon/ /phrag dog tshub ma ser sna bdud/ /'jig tshogs bdag gis gzhom par bgyi/ /sems can bde ba bla med kyis/ /byang chub
221b1(rgyud 'grel): lam la rab dgod phyir/ /bdag gis sdig bral mthun pa yiS/ /dngos grub sna tshogs bdag la stsol/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du byas pa 'am/ yang na mchod rten bum par gdugs dkar can dmigs pa de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyag la sogs
221b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mos 'jig rten khams khengs par bya ste/ de dag gi sgrib pa gsum ma lus par dag par bya ste thams cad lha mo'i rang bzhin du byas la/ /sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor dag par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA k+tsit+ta? mahA sa ma ya s+thaM
221b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bstan par bya'o/ /dung phor du dri chab la sogs blugs te/ lag pas bzung la a las zla ba'i rnam par las 'od zer gyis yon chab bdud rtsi bsams la gtso mo nas 'khor la sogs pa'i snying po bzlas te dbul lo/ /de'i sngags/ oM a
221b4(rgyud 'grel): bri ta arg+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ zhes lan gsum du spyi bor bzhag la dgang/ der ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas mchod pa lnga yang rang rang gi sngags kyis dbul/ sgeg mo la sogS pa brgyad kyis kyang mchod de/
221b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so/ /mchod pa bsang ba dang sbyang ba ni/ oM sarba pE dza puShpe swAhA/ zhes pas sbyang ngo/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pas bstod pa bya ste/ de yang dang po spyir yang bstod pa ni/ 'gro brgyad lnga'i 'khor lo ?
221b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gzir ba'i 'gro gzigs nas/ /thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa/ /thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /sems can smin cing grol ba mtshams pa'i
221b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /sems can khams na bzhugs shing spyod gyur kyang/ /chags bas mi gos pad+ma ltar dag pa/ /'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa la/ /thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab ?
222a1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /zhi ba rin chen mchog gling skyel mdzad pa/ /kun gyi ded dpon lha mo khyod la 'dud/ /sems can bkren ba chos kyis phongs gyur pas/ /ma rig thibs pa'i nang du song ba rnams/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis
222a2(rgyud 'grel): tshim mdzad pa/ /ye shes sgrol ma'i lha mo khyod la bstod/ /sems can las kyi chu bo'i 'bad pa rnams/ /dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad pa/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad la 'god mdzad pa/ /gsung gi mnga' bdag lha mo
222a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod la bstod/ /ces pa dang/ yang slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis bstod pa'i/ /srid gsum ston pa lha dang mi yis mchod 'os la sogs pas kyang bstod pa bya/ de nas yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la bsams pas smon lam rgya chen po gdab
222a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bdag sogs sems can skal ldan 'di rnams kyis/ /chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs pas ni/ /dge tshogs ma lus ci yod mdun byas te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha mo thob par shog /'khor lo sgyud? rgyal mchog gi lus thob shog
222a5(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du skye bar shog /tshe 'di nad dang gnod pa dang/ /'byung po 'khrugs dang gdon kun zhi 'gyur shog /ces bya'o/ /shar phyogs su gzungs tshar gcig gam/ /gnyis sam gsum la sogs pa nyer bshad ltar klag /
222a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par byed na/ dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i byang du slob ma 'dug la/ bkra shis kyi dbang la sogs pa bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas bsdu gshegs gtor ma btang ba kun bya/ khyad par du legs ldan gyis mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas dge
222a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dun gyi mchod ston la sogs pa kun bya'o/ /tsha tsha'i cho ga 'di byas pas khams gsum ma lus sems can kun/ /lha mo nyid dang skal mnyam nas/ /gdul ba'i don la myur brtson? shog /tsha tsha'i bya ba slob dpon pad+ma'i lcags kyus
222b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //zangs dkar lo tsa bas tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/
222b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma rje btsun sprul pa yi/ /rang bzhin lha mo gus btud de/ /rab gnas cho ga bsdu pa yi/ /man ngag rim las bri bar bya/ /de la gang zag thams cad la/ /rab
222b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'thad pa ma yin te/ /skye ba med pa'i ngo bo la/ /gang gi gang la ji ltar ni/ /rab tu gnas pa byas pa yod/ /kun rdzob la yang gnas bas ni/ /de yi byin brlab mi shes pas/ /rab gnas cho ga 'thad pa min/ /las dang po yi rnal 'byor
222b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rgyud sbyangs dang dang nges bskyed phyir/ /rab tu gnas par bya bar gsungs/ /de la dang por slob ma yis/ /gzhi dang rdzas rnams tshogs gyur nas/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la/ /lan gsum gar du gsol ba gdab/ /gnang? pa byin la bla ma
222b5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga brtsams par bya/ /rab 'bring rtags dang ldan pas ni/ /sta gon cho ga la 'bad bya/ /sa phyogs la sogs sngon 'gro pas/ /dkyil 'khor khrus kyi stegs bu dag/ bstar ba ba? yi rnam lngas byung/ /brtan pa'i cho ga yan lag
222b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de nas bum pa mtshan nyid ldan/ /bkru dang brgyan pa la sogs bya/ /rang rang mtshan ma bkod la gzhag /bskyed dang bzlas pa rdzogs par bya/ /rnam rgyal bum par chu bsdus la/ /gzungs thar rdo rjes gzung la bzhag/ de nas mchod stor
222b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bya'o/ /bum pa sta gon bya ba'o/ /zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang/ /rgyu skar bcu bzhi la bab dang/ /tshes grangs bdun gyi grangs nyid dang/ /rgyas pa'i rab gnas la sogs bya/ /de nas rab tu gnas pa'i gzhi/ /dgram dang 'phan gdugs
223a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan gyis/ /gnas khang brgyan dang mchod pa bsham/ /lugs ma la sogs stegs bu ste/ /ras ris la sogs byang du bsgrig/ khrus dang mchod pa'i rdzas tshogs bya/ /ras ris sku lo dkra shis bya ste/ /gyur
223a2(rgyud 'grel): bsal la sogs cho ga ni/ /yungs kar chu dang 'bru zan dang/ /dUr bas byabs te sbyang bar bya/ /oM badzra ba dra zhes pa'i sngags kyis so/ /de nas ba yi rnam lnga dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis snod bkang la/ /dUr ba'i pir gyis bkrus par bya/ /
223a3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ /de nas til mar dri zhim ba/ /spos kyis bsgos pas gong ltar byug /de yi sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM hUM traM h+ri baM/ de nas de ni bsal ba'i phyir/ /u dum ba ra shir sha dang/ /a shwadtha dang n+ya gro?
223a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /barka ti yi shun pa yi/ /phye mas bskus te bkru bar bya/ /de nas skyu ru ra sogs pa/ /bdag chal kun gyis byug par bya/ /de nas bum ba'i chu gtsang dang/ /dri zhim bdud rtsi lnga yis bkru/ /bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems ?
223a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rigs 'dzin la sogs kun/ /bkra shis brjod dang mchod bstod bsam/ /lha mos chu ni blugs bsams te/ /ji ltar bltams ba tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /der ni?
223a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM A(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ de nas chu yi thigs pa dag /ras bal 'jam pas phyi bar bya/ /ras ris glegs bam la sogs pa/ /dngos su bkru ba med pa la/ /?
223a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs la khrus sogs bya/ /de ni khrus kyi cho ga yin/ /tsan dan gnyis dang gur kum dang/ /lang gu ldan te dri lnga yis/ /rten la thig le byas de nas/ /oM badzra gand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ de nas mchod pa rnam lnga sogs/ /rang rang sngags kyis
223b1(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /nam mkhar spyan drangs mchod bstod la/ /khyad par rigs kyi lha bltas te/ /thugs ka spyi bo mgrin pa dang/ /phrag pa rdo rje dang bcas pas/ /reg la lag tu spos thogs te/ /bus mo sar gtsugs
223b2(rgyud 'grel): lce hUM las/ /rdo rje dmar por bya ste brjod/ /bcom ldan gtsug tor gdugs dkar can/ /rig sngags rkyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can khyod kyi/ /sang ni rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal/ /slob ma la ni brtse ba dang/ /khyod
223b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /gus pas bdag dang de la ni/ /bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad pa'i rigs/ /'gro ba 'khor lo'i bya don phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /dgra bcom byang chub sems rnams dang/ /gang yang sngags kyi
223b4(rgyud 'grel): lta gzhan dang/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ /bstan pa la ni mngon dga' zhing/ /byang chub la brten 'byung bo dang/ /rdo rje spyan ldan sems can rnams/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag /rig pa yi ni rgyal po yi/ /ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa dang
223b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba zhi bas rab gnas bgyid/ /slob ma mchod dang bdag la ni/ /khyod kyis thugs brtse nyer bzung nas/ /rab gnas 'di la thams cad kyis/ /thugs brtser ldan pas gnas par mdzod/ /de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM bi ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes/ /nam mkha' i lha
223b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams dam tshig bstims/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur rgyas gdab bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dang/ /sgra yi tshogs pa dpag med dbul/ /de nas bum chus slar yang bkru/ /de nas lha yi rtags dag ni/ /skyon lnga spangs la bshad?
223b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas dang por gsol btab la/ /nang du byon par 'dod pa yis/ /tshigs bcad yang ni yi ge bya/ /tha ma mu(rgyud 'grel): yis mtshan pa gshegs/ /rdzas kyiS g.yogs te bzhag par bya/ /slob ma yod na sta gon bya/ /'di ni lha yi sku? gon no/ /ded?
224a1(rgyud 'grel): thig tshon la sogs bya ba ni/ rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga ltar/ /mchod pa'i dngos po gser thur dang/ /rgyan dang sku chings glegs shing dang/ /na bza' la sogs rgyas par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bskyed la bzlas sogs bya//
224a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang blang dam tshig rdzogs par bya/ /de nas gzhim bkru la sogs/ /gong gi cho ga ltar bya'o/ /de nas sa bon lha bkug la/ /nam mkha' gnas la mchod bstod bya/ /spos dang rdor bril thogs nas su/ /bus gtsug gong ltar byin brlabs te//
224a3(rgyud 'grel): sang ni rab gnas bgyid lags na/ /zhes pa bgyid par 'tshal du bsgyur/ /de nas ye shes spyan drangs la/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug bya/ /de nas mchod bstod rol mo'i sgra/ /dpag med mchod dang gnas gsum brlab/ /dbang bskur
224a4(rgyud 'grel): byas te bum chus bkru/ /rnam snang rang gi rigs kyi lha/ /gang yin pas ni rgyas gdab bo/ /de nas dbang gzhan rim pas bskur/ /oM badzra A b+ha ra Na bi b+hu Sha ni swAhA/ /zhes pas rgyan gyis mchod pa 'bul/ /de nas rang rang rigs kyis bstod/ /
224a5(rgyud 'grel): gser thur a dza na byugs pas/ /spyan dbye sngags ni 'di yin no/ /oM tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni badzre swAhA/ oM an da sa mA d+hi d+hya naM pra na ne swAhA/ zhes pas bza' ba bzang po dbul/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yi/ /sngags kyi zhabs
224a6(rgyud 'grel): bkod dbul ba ni/ /rdo rje bzung ba'i lag g.yas kyis/ /lan gsum bskor la brtan par bya/ /de nas su bra tiSh+Tha badzre swAhA/ zhes pas gnas su gzhug par bya/ /de nas mchod bstod rgyas par bya/ /de nas bla mas slob ma la/ /khyod kyis nga la
224a7(rgyud 'grel): gsol btab pa'i/ /sku gzugs da ni khyad par du/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin spyan dbye ba /de ni ngas kyang byas 'gyur te/ /khyod kyi de ni kun rdzob pas/ /ci bde bar ni mchod par byos/ /zhes bya zhal khab la sogs bya/ /de nas slob mas
224b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang/ /bla ma yon gyis mnyes par bya/ /bla mas legs ldan gtor mas mchod/ /byin chen bkra shis yun ring du/ /bzhugs par bka' yis chos skyong bsgo/ /gsol btab la sogs bla mas bya/ /slob ma'i sgrib pa gzhom pa dang/ /rang
224b2(rgyud 'grel): gi lhag chang bskang ba'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg chogs bskad bar bya/ /bsdu gshegs smon lam gdab par bya/ /mchod bstod la sogs rgyas par bya/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'di/ /kA ma d+he nu'i rjes 'brangs te/ /pad+ma'i lcags kyus mtshan pa yi/ /dge
224b3(rgyud 'grel): slong gis sbyang bsod nams kyis/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyang/ /sprul pa'i sku dang mnyam 'gyur shog /mang du thos pa'i slob dpon pad+ma'i lcags kyus/ /rigs ldan ha ra pa'i slob dpon kA ma la d+he nus pa'i rjes su 'brangs
224b4(rgyud 'grel): nas sbyang ba rdzogs so// //A tsa rya bi na ya tsan+d+ra dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya si tA ta pa tre a ba rA dzi ti sA d+ha naM/

224b6(rgyud 'grel): steng du zla ba nya ba la oM dkar po bsams te/ de'i 'od kyis rang gi sdig pa dag pa dang/ kha dang ba spu'i su? gnas 'thon te/ sems can gyi don byas shing/ /'og min nas gdugs dkar mo can/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpas

225a7(rgyud 'grel): mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a dya nu tanpan twAM ta oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor mas sbyin par bya'o/ /'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
225b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Ti ta bi b+hu ti tsan+d+ra dang/ glo bo lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wa ti uSh+NI Sha bi dza sa sto? tra/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug
225b2(rgyud 'grel): tor rnam par rgyal ma la bstod pa/ mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtso mo bcom ldan 'das ma ni/ /puN+Da ri ka'i me tog ltar/ /skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar/ /zhal gsum phyag brgyad spyan gsum ma/ dbu rgyan mgul ?
225b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan snyan char bcas/ /rin chen sna tshogs mdzes pas brgyan/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /dbus dkar g.yas ser g.yon zhal sngo/ /khro mo'i cha lugs mche ba gtsigs/ /phyag g.yas sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ /pad? steng rgyal ba 'od dpag

225b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po bzhi po ni/ /mdun na khro rgyal mi g.yo ba/ /sngo bsangs g.yas na ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon? na sdigs mdzub skra brdzes pa/ /sprul rgyan stag gi sham thabs can/ /pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /ma rungs 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro chen
226a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni/ /sngo bsangs lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams/ /ma rungs 'dus pa'i rgyan cha can/ /thams cad 'gugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro chen dbyug pa sngon po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas pa na/

226b7(rgyud 'grel): mahA pra ti sa re bidyA? tsakra ni baM b+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa chen mo so so 'brang ma'i 'khor lo/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam ba rdzogs par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das so sor 'brang ma la phyag 'tshal te/ gus pas mde yi?

227b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskor ba'o/ /de'i dbus su oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzri Ni mahA pra ti sa re che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa bre'o/ /'phar ma gnyis pa la/ oM shi kha le shi b+haM ka re g+hu TA g+hu Ta ni/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+ha Ta ni che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa bri? 227b5(rgyud 'grel): ma gsum pa la oM b+ha ya na sha ni trA sa ni trwA sa ni/ trA sa ya twA sa ya/ twA sa ya baku Ti bai Ta te sha te she te/ dza ta ni che go mo puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa bri'o/ /'phar ma bzhi pa la ji tsam 'dod pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi dang/ de'i bar du rdo rje rtse gsum pa

227b7(rgyud 'grel): karSha ni che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa bri'o/ /lho'i pad+ma'i phyi rol tu/ oM b+hA ra b+hA ra/ se b+hA ra saM b+hA ra in+d+ra a bi sha d+ha na ru ru(rgyud 'grel): tsa le hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA zhes pa bri'o/ /nub kyi pad+ma'i phyi rol tu oM a mri te a ? ?
228a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa bri'o/ /byang gi pad+ma'i phyi rol tu/ oM bo phu la gi ma la dza ya ba re a mri te hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa bri'o/ /rdo rje rnams kyi rwa dbus ma la/ me ru oM bi ma le hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ bden bral du oM

228a4(rgyud 'grel): ta/ oM badzra ru ti dra Ta/ oM badzra ki li h+rI:aoM pu pA shi to?/ /oM badzra brad+d+hi? ta yaM badzra bA ShitA? ba le h+ri(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra mA le maM/ oM a mri ta li ri ka sya ra k+Sha ku ru swA hA/ 'phar ma bdun pa la/ oM tsun de h+rI:aoM ma Ni tsu ni h+rI/ oM su paN+Na ki shi kra ta/ oM ga le la/

228a6(rgyud 'grel): ru ru tsa le/ ka sye rak+Sha ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'phar ma brgyad pa la /oM na re traM/ oM rak+Sha? si ki dzi te dzaM/ oM b+hu ta rak+Shi ti ke haM/ oM ka li b+haM/ oM laM sha ri li/ oM d+ha bya la/ oM ki shi ni kAM/ oM ha rA ti traM ?/ oM pany+tsae hUM/ oM shi khes?
228a7(rgyud 'grel): saM ru ta/ oM ku ta dzI b+hi kriT(rgyud 'grel): oM sh+ri ya de bi she /oM sar sha ri laM/ oM pa rme saM/ oM mA ma kI oM/ oM b+h+ri ku Di d+ha?/ oM bud+d+he haM/ oM k+Shi te ke b+h+ra yi ge ka sya rak+Sha ku ru laM/ 'phar ma dgu pa la/ rdo rje 'greng bu sum cu rtsa gnyis bri bar bya'o/ /
228b1(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyis sa bon gyi yi ge 'di rnams bri par bya'o/ /k+ShaM/ sku kaM/ bruM oM/ traM/ haM/ kA/ k+ShaM haM b+haM/ dzaM/ yaM/ h+rI/ ri?/ lI/ hUM/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): saM/ hUM/ dzaM/ buM/ saM/ ho(rgyud 'grel): hUM?/ gre(rgyud 'grel): aM phaT/ dzi/ syaM/ baM/ tiM/ k+Shu? shu/ trai maM/ tshuM/ mu d+he/ saM b+ho/ raM a:b+h+raM dzaM/ laM zhes pa'o /
228b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnams kyi steng du yu ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma kha bye ba'i sdong bu 'brel pa'o/ /de'i sang? du phyag mtshan bri bar bya ste/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ mda' dang/ ba dan dang/ rdo rje dgra sta dang/ rtsa gsum pa dang/ dung dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma
228b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gzhu dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ bum pa bzang po dang/ rdo rje tho ba dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ shaka ti dang/ gsil byed dang/ rma bya'i 'jug sgro dang/ rdo rje dbyug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ mdung thung dang/ chu gri dang/ rin po che'i ste
228b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ lcags sgrog pa dang/ spyan dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ras dang/ Da ma ru dang/ gri gug dang/ thod pa dang/ phreng ba'o/ /phyag mtshan de rnams kyi bar du kaM khaM gaM g+haM daM?/ tsaM? tshaM dzaM d+haM nyaM/ taM thaM daM lhaM naM/ TaM thaM Do DhaM Na/ pho phai be b+haM me/ yaM ro laM wo/ shaM ?
228b5(rgyud 'grel): saM haM k+ShaM zhes pa'i yi ge bri bar bya'o/ /zur bzhir ri bzhi la 'bru dang so ba bskyed pa'i sprin las char 'bab pa bri par bya'o/ /'phags ma rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma'i 'khor lo'i sems sbyang/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgra ? kyis mdzad
228b6(rgyud 'grel): brdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chos kyi sde dang/ le tsa ba dge tshul nam mkha' rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o// */ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
228b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon bstod pa'i/ /so sor 'brang ma la btud de/ /sems can kun la bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de yi 'khor lo bdag gis bri/ /gtsang zhing shin tu mnyam par gzhag par gyur pas /gtor ma la sogs pa byin la/ khu
229a1(rgyud 'grel): tshur bcas pa'i khru gang gi tshad kyi ras la sogs pa la dri bar bya ba ni/ dang por re zhig ser bzhi pa'i tshad kyi rim pa gcig byas la/ /de'i dbus su zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa'i hUM brgyad kyis bskor ba'i yi ge phri de'i dbus su sngar
229a2(rgyud 'grel): oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni mahA pra ti sa re che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha puSh+TiM shAn+taM ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de'i phyi rol tu sor phyed kyi tshad kyi rim pa gnyis byas la/ de'i rim pa dang po la oM ma Ni ? ri badzri Ni mahA pra ti sa re che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha puSh+TiM shAn+ti ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/
229a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du byas la lan gnyis su yang ngo/ /rim pa gnyis pa la yang de bzhin du'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu sor gsum gyi rim pa gcig byas la/ de'i phyogs bzhir ri mo gnyis pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa/ shar la sogs pa'i rim gyis ri mo gnyis kyi mtshams su
229a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags/ /oM bim le jil wa re a mri ta che ge mo shAn+ti puSh+Ti rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ gnyis pa la/ oM a mri te bi lo ki ni garb+ha saM rak+Sha NaM che ge mo shAn+taM puSh+TiM rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ gsum pa la oM b+hA ra b+h+rA ra saM b+ha ra in+d+ra ya ba la ?
229a5(rgyud 'grel): sho d+ha ne che ge mo shAn+ti puSh+Ti rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ bzhi pa la/ oM a mri te d+ha ra wa ra bi shud+d+he che ge mo shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ mtshams rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pa bzhi la/ de'i rtse mo dbus ma bzhi la/ mo'i phyogs
229a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs par rim gyis sngags/ /oM bi spho Ta badzri Ni che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha shAn+ti puSh+TaM ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ gnyis pa la/ oM a mri te d+ha ra che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha puSh+Ti shAn+tiM ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ gsum pa la oM bi ma le che ge ma rak+Sha rak+Sha shAn+ti puSh? ku ru?
229a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ bzhi pa la/ oM dza ya wa re che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha shAn+ti puSh+TiM ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang rdo rje dal gi bar du me la sogs kyi rim pas sngags/ oM ni sum b+ha badzra Ni che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha shAn+ti guSh+TiM ku ru hUM hUM phaT
229b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ de bzhin brgyad pa'i bar du sngags 'di bri'o/ /de'i phyi rol du sor phyed pa'i tshad kyi rim pa bzhi bya'o/ /de la rim pa dang po la yi ge h+ri nyi shu rtsa lnga phreng du bya'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la/ oM a pa rA dzi ta mahA de bi ta/ oM kA la kar+N+Di? kri d+ha li baM oM pad+ma kun
229b2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha li/ oM suSh+Ta dan+ti ni hUM/ oM ma na ku shi hUM /oM badzra sh+ri kha le hUM/ oM mahA she te hUM/ oM mahA kA li h+ri(rgyud 'grel): oM du bi ru da/ oM badzra gi laM h+ri/ oM badzra pA shi nyid h+ri/ oM badzra ba shi b+h+ri ta/ oM badzra ba ne mahA ba la d+hi/ oM badzra mA le maM/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li swAhA/ oM ? la tshwa la hUM phaT b+hyo//
229b3(rgyud 'grel): oM Tak+ki hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA /rim pa gsum la oM badzra h+ri/ a mu baN ke shi kro d+ha/ oM baM ga le laM/ oM b+hi d+hu ma li dza ni dza hUM/ oM shAn+ti hUM/ oM puSh+Ti ba la b+harda ni ta/ oM suM b+ha ka ri hUM/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri hUM/ oM ratna mA d+ha ri h+ri:aoM mahA pra ti sa re taM/ oM b+ha ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu
229b4(rgyud 'grel): ru/ ku ru ku ru/ hUM hUM /oM pa la band+ha ni yo ha/ oM ru ru tsa le hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzrI Ni mahA pra ti sa ro che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru/ oM A:hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rim pa bzhi la/ oM tA re taM/ oM a rak+Sha? se ka dza ti dz+nyA/ e ? ka ri ta ha hUM/ oM ka ?
229b5(rgyud 'grel): oM khaM ke sha re khaM/ oM d+ha n+ya laM ki shi /oM laM ki shwa ri muM/ oM ha ri tyai /dAM k+ShiM/ oM pany+tsi ke kre/ oM li khe saM duSh+Ta/ oM da ni ta ni ku ta/ oM sh+rI ya de bi sh+ri/ oM swA ra swA d+hi baM/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha che ge mo sarba b+ha ? baM oM ? pad+ma ma/ oM ? badzra Ni mA ma kI mo/ oM sbyar?
229b6(rgyud 'grel): Ti dri/ bruM bruM ya/ de'i phyi rol du sor gnyis kyi tshang kyi rim pa gcig byas la/ der rdo rje gyen du bltas pa sum cu rtsa gnyis bris la/ rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshams su nub phyogs nas rim gyis puShpa/ lak+ShaM k+Shi b+haM/ /i bruM haM/ ? khaM/ ha bi/ h+ri dza hi/ ?
229b7(rgyud 'grel): hi su / hUM dza/ baM su/ ho hUM/ oM phaT/ dzaM sma/ kaM baM/ saM/ suM/ oM/ b+haM/ baM/ oM/ triM/ k+ShiM/ d+hi/ shaM/ dzaM ruM/ ruM/ oM/ saM/ de'i phyi rol tu sor gnyis kyi tshad kyi rim pa gcig byas la/ der sdong bu gos dad? ras kyis bkris pa'i pad+ma kha phye ba ?
230a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad bris la/ der nub phyogs nas rim gyis pad+ma kha phye ba'i steng du rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje rtse gsum dang/ dgra ste dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ dung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ ral gri dang/ rin po ?
230a2(rgyud 'grel): mu khyud dang/ rtse gsum dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ dgra ste dang/ dud dang/ ral gri dang/ lcags kyu dang/ rtse gsum dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ mnga' gzhu dang/ rin po che'i snye ma dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ dung dang/ rtse gsum dang/ ral gri
230a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje dang/ dgra lha dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ mnga' gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rtse gsum dang/ dung dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje cags kyu dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rtsi

230a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'khor lo bri ba'i thabs/ slob dpon ratnA? A kar shAn tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngar bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la /a
230a6(rgyud 'grel): lam skyed pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du yi ge praM ser po 'od zer sna tshogs las sems can gyi don byed pa ste/ de yongs su gyur pas skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo so sor 'brang mar bdag nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /mdog ser mo zhal
230a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa ste/ zhal dang po ser po dang/ g.yas pa dkar ba/ rgyab sngo ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyis ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rtse gsum dang/ mnga' rnams dang/ g.yon gyi phyag bsnams
230b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ rdo rje rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la rol pas bzhugs pa/ 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi na
230b2(rgyud 'grel): za'? bsnabs pa/ shing dpung chad dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbu rgyan can/ 'di ltar bsams la/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ oM A:hUM dkar po dang dmar po dang/ sngon po'i yi ge gsum bsam
230b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas nu ma'i dbus su zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge praM bsams nas/ sna tshogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi bdag nyid mchod par bsam te/ ji srid du ngal bar ma gyur pa de srid du spro bas bsgom par bya'o/ /dal bar gyur na rang gi snying ga'i
230b4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la sngags mu tig gi phreng ba'i tshul du zlas par bya'o/ /oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Na mi hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa ni sngags so/ /so sor 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //de bzhin du sngar bstan pa'i tshe
230b5(rgyud 'grel): gas stong pa nyid kyis rjes la sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la/ ma yig ljang gu yongs su gyur pa las/ /'phags ma rma bya chen mo mdog ljang gu/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ zhal so so la spyan gsuM pa ste/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po
230b6(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar po'o/ /g.yas kyi phyag gsum la go rims bzhin du rma bya'i mjug sgro dang/ mnga' dang/ mchog sbyin pa'o/ /phyag g.yon pa gsum na rin po che'i snyem dang/ gzhu dang/ phang par gnas pa'i bum pa'o/ /sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang
230b7(rgyud 'grel): sham thabs can/ sgeg pa lang tshol bab pa'i cha lugs can/ zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gdan can/ phyed kyi sgyil krung can/ /don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can du skad cig gis bskyed la/ de'i spyi bo dang/ lkog ma dang/ snying ga dang/ lte ba
231a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams su zla ba la go rims ji lta bar/ oM A:maM hUM zhes pa'i yi ge bsams te spro ba dang bsdu pa bya'o/ /de nas ngal na sngags zlas par bya ste/ oM ma hA ma yA ri bidyA rAdz+nyI hUM hUm phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa'o/ /'phagS ma
231a2(rgyud 'grel): rma bya chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //de bzhin thams cad sngar gyi cho gas stong pa nyid kyi rjes la/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug pa ste/ g.yas kyis phyag gsum na go
231a3(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin du ral gri dang/ mnga' dang mchog sbyin pa'o/ /g.yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang/ sta re'o/ /sna tshogs pa'i cha byad? can/ /na bza' dang/ rgyan dang dbu rgyan dang ldan pa/ gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa/
231a4(rgyud 'grel): sgeg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/ sa bon bruM yig las byung ba'o/ /pad+ma dang zla ba'i 'od can no/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i? sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
231a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma ni/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhal gcig pa/ nag po ste/ g.yas pa'i phyag dag na rdo rje dang/ mchog sbyin pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag dag na dgra sta dang zhags pa'o/ /hUM gi sa bon can no/ /mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can
231a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i 'od dang zla ba'i gdan can sngar bzhin no/ /'phags pa gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //bsil ba tshal chen mo ni/ phyag bzhi zhal gcig pa/ kha dog dmar mo/ /
231a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis nas phreng ba mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ snying gar gnas pa'i po ti'i phyag mtshan no/ /dzri gi sa bon can/ snang ba mdza' yas kyi dbu rgyan can/ na bza' dang rgyan dang
231b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan ? nyi ma'i 'od dang gdan can te sngar bzhin no/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //oM A:praM mahA pra ti sa re hUM(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): maM hA ma yu ri hUM/ oM b+h+ruM mahA sa ha sra pra ma? ni hUM/ oM A:hUM
231b2(rgyud 'grel): mahA man+t+ra a nu sa ri hUM / oM A:hUM mahA sh+ri da ba ni hUM/ slob dpon chen po dze ta'i dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dang po dbus su lngas mchod/ de nas phyogs bzhir/ yang phyogs
231b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi dbus su mchod/ de nas bzungs la/ de nas 'khor lo la/ tha ma yang dbus phyogs bzhir gtang rag gis mchod pa bya/ de rnams la 'byor pa yod na mchod pa lnga tshan bcu gsum gyis mchod do/ /de ltar byas pas ni be
231b4(rgyud 'grel): te bcu gsum dgos so/ /nas la sogs pa bzhi pos bskor zhing bsregs pa lan gnyis kyis cho ga ste/ g.yas g.yon gyiS lan re'o// //so sor 'brang ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngar brjod
231b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas dang po re zhig sems can skyabs med pa'i nad pa rnams la sngon par bltas nas snying rje des rnams gso bar 'dod pas bsnyung bar gnas par bya ste/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus su yid du 'ong
231b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bla re? bres pas mdzes par byas pas dri zhim pa'i me tog bkram pa'i sa phyogs su sa dang lci bdag gis 'dom pa'i tshad tsam gyis/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi nye bar byug nas/ de'i dbus su pad+ma lnga rnams bri bar bya'o/ /de la dbus su tshon rtsi
231b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar pos 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma'i lte ba'i zla ba la/ 'od zer dkar po dang ldan pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa ste/ phyi rol du 'khor lo'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /de nas shar dang lho dang nub dang byang rnams su rang rang ji ltar
232a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdul tshon rnams kyis dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser bo'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rnams la go rims ji ltar bar rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ zhags pa dang/ g.yas su 'khyil dI? dung rnams dang/ sngar
232a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i kha dog rang rang gi 'od zer dang ldan pa bris nas/ de'i phyi rol tu phyogs dang rjes su mthun par khyams gru bzhi pa la/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ zhags pa dang/ g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dung gis bskor bar bri bar bya'o/ /de nas
232a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus pad+ma'i steng du man ji la gnas pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod rnams sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dri zhim po'i chus khrus byas bzhugs su gsol nas/ de'i steng du bla res las me tog dkar po 'phyang du gzhug par bya'o//
232a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su pad+ma'i 'gram bu go rims ji lta bar tsan dan dang / khrag dang/ 'o ma dang/ gur kum gyi chus gang ba'i kham phor bzhi'i steng du/ me tog gi phreng ba ljang khu dang dmar mo dang/ dkar po dang/
232a5(rgyud 'grel): ser po 'phyang bu gzhugs par bya'o/ /de'i ngos gcig tu mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan bris la/ kha rgyan dang bcas pa dri zhim pa'i chus gang ba lnga bzhag par bya'o/ /de rnams la sna tshogs pa'i
232a6(rgyud 'grel): me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar me dang/ dri dang/ lha bshos rang rang gi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams kyis mchod rten mchod nas/ so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rtse ba'i sngags kyis dbus kyi bum pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
232a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni sngags yin te/ oM a mri ta wa re wa ra wa ra pa wa ra bi shud+d+he/ che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas snga ma bzhin du me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas/ 'bras dkar po'i zan dang/
232b1(rgyud 'grel): mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ sha ka ra la sogs pa rnams kyis gtor ma'i snod bkang nas sngags dang tshigs su bcad pa yang brjod de/ yul 'khor bsrung 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /syang ya the dan/ d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra Ni/ pra d+ha
232b2(rgyud 'grel): na sa ni b+hany+dza? ni/ bra b+hany+dza ni/ bi d+ha ma Ni/ ki pu ru She / sha ka le/ sA ra ti/ shU la d+ha ro/ shu d+d+ha tsa ra ne/ g+ho Sha ba ti / sa ra a gre /shAn+ti che ge mo shar phyogs su bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang/ /'jig rten skyong dang dbang
232b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug che/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang/ /'phrog ma bu dang bcas rnams dang/ /bdag gis me tog spos rnams dang/ /mchod pa 'di dag blang bar mdzod/ /de rnams kyi ni brtson 'grus dang/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang//
232b4(rgyud 'grel): nad rnams thams cad 'joms gyur cig /che ge mo bkra shis par gyur cig /oM a mri ta bi lo ki ni/ garb+ha saM rak+Sha Ni/ A ka rSha Ni che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM(rgyud 'grel): phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis shar phyogs kyi bum pa la lan bdun du
232b5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bsngags par bya'o/ /de nas lho phyogs su sngar bzhin du mchod pa byas la/ nya dang? sha la sogs pa'i gtor ma 'phags skyes po 'khor dang bcas pa la dbul bar bya'o/ /syad ya the da na/ shAn+ti/ sa ra ti/ kAN+Ti/ ka ra Ti/ kid
232b6(rgyud 'grel): ka si/ ki ran ta/ ki ra DaM/ bar d+hi/ ar d+hi ma d+hu ma d+ha ra Ni/ hi ma bi hi/ dzyo ti sa tsa ra Ni/ phal a gri /che ge mo lho phyogs su bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang/ /'jig rten skyong dang pa'ang phyugs che/ /
232b7(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang/ /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams/ /bdag gi me tog spos rnams dang/ /mchod pa 'di dag blang bar mdzod/ /de rnams kyi ni brtson 'grus dang/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang/ /nad rnams
233a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bcom gyur cing/ /che ge mo lho phyogs su bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ de nas oM? gi ma la/ ba pu le/ dza ya wa ra/ a mrita ba ? che ge mo rak+Sha? rak+Sha hUm hUM phaT phaT swAhA// zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis
233a2(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs kyi bum pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la nub phyogs su sngar bzhin mchod pa sngon du song bas spyan mi bzang 'khor dang bcas pa la zho dang 'o ma la sogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /? ya the
233a3(rgyud 'grel): dan/ ba ra mi ba ra a gre /ba la ba ti/ ba li ni/ ni shaM ge /baM se / sa ra ge /kha ri ka bi li/ tsaN+Da ni / ti ri Ni/ ni ra dza ne/ bi d+ha ri Ni/ par+Na pa ti/ a tsa ni/ nub phyogs su che ge mo bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya
233a4(rgyud 'grel): byin dang/ 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang/ /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams/ /bdag gi me tog sbos rnams dang/ /mchod pa 'di ni blang bar gyis/ /de rnams kyi ni brtson 'grus dang/ /gzi brjid
233a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang/ /nang rnams thams cad 'joms gyur cig /che ge mo nub phyogs su bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ de nas oM b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya ma la bi sho d+ha ni ru ru tsa le/ che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT
233a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis nub phyogs su bum pa la lan bdun bzlas pa'i sngags so// //de'i rjes la byang phyogs su sngar bzhin du mchod pa byas la/ 'bras kyi 'o thug dang/ nas kyi/ ?
233a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas lus ngan lo 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /syAd? ya the da na/ /? garb+he/ pa tsak+Sha Ne/ tsak+Sha rA dza ne/ tsan+d+ra pA tA le/ b+ha maM parba te/ kha ra a gre /b+h+ri ku TaM/ ka ra a gre/ e ga a gre/
233b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dag pa ni/ sA rang ga pa ti/ tsan+t+ra ka na ti/ byang phyogs su che ge mo bde legs su gyur cig /swAhA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang/ /'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug tshe/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang/ /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams/ /
233b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi me tog spos dag dang/ /mchod pa 'di ni blang bar gyis/ /de rnams kyi ni brtson 'grus dang/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms gyur cig /cha ga mo byang phyogs su bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ oM ma
233b3(rgyud 'grel): Ni b+ha ni badzrI Ni/ mahA pra ti sa re/ che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'dis byang phyogs su bum pa la lan bdun bsngags par bya'o/ /slar yang dbus su mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ mtshams rnams dang steng dang 'og na
233b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa rnams la/ sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ syAd? ya the dan/ pra t+me brahma g+ho She brahma swA re/ /badzre badzra g+ho She/ thi re thi re/ swA re/ a tsa le / /e raN+De / ra NaN+De/ a raN+De/ shu ra ba ra/ a gra /pra ba te/ sa ra pa te/
233b5(rgyud 'grel): che le mo phyogs mchamS thams cad dang/ steng 'og thams cad du bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang/ /'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang/ /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams/ /bdag
233b6(rgyud 'grel): gi me tog spos rnams dang/ /mchod pa 'di dag blang bar gyis/ /de rnams kyi ni brtson 'grus dang/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug rtobs kyis kyang/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms gyur cig /che ge mo phyogs mtshams thams cad dang/ ? dang
233b7(rgyud 'grel): 'og thams cad bde legs su gyur cig swAhA// //de nas mchod pa ston du song bas/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
234a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung sang pa la mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba'i bar du so sor 'brang ma'i mdo lan cig gdon par bya'o/ /de nas shar phyogs su nad pa la sogspa la gos gtsang ma bgos la kha byang phyogs su bstan nas bzhag ste/ yungs
234a2(rgyud 'grel): kar la sogs pa sa bon sna tshogs kyis byur bsal nas/ seng ldeng dang rgya shugs gi me dag la sa bon blugs bar bya'o/ /de la 'di'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di yin te/ gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos
234a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /tshangs dbang dang ni 'jig rten skyong/ /gnod sbyin sde dbon dbang phyug dang/ /de bzhin gnod sbyin stobs chen dang/ /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dag /de rnams mthu dang gzi brjid kyis/ /ro langs las rnams chad gyur cig /rdo rjes
234a4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen phug pa dang/ /me yis bud shing bsreg byed dang/ /rlung gis sprin rnams 'thor ba dang/ /nyi mas nags tshal skyems byed pa/ /sna tshogs dri dang mar me dang/ /spos kyis sdig pa nges bsal te/ /bden pa'i tshogs ni 'di dag gis
234a5(rgyud 'grel): byang stems la sogs tshig par shog /tadya thA/ oM hu me hu me/ ka ra ba ti/ ka kha li/ kha ra li/ ka ra le/ hu hu ni/ dza ba le/ ga re/ ga ri ni/ sha ba ni/ sha ba ni/ shAn+ti pra shAn+ti swAhA/ d+ha ban ti swA hA/ gand+ha rbe swAhA/
234a6(rgyud 'grel): ba la ga te swAhA/ sarba ka kho rnga tshe da ni swAhA/ sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis che ge mo'i byad dang ro langs dang/ sman dang sngags dang dug gi sbyor ba rnams lha thams cad kyis/ tshe de ta be ti ta/ pa ri dzi ta swAhA/ oM mu ne mu ne ba raM?/
234a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgya thams cad kyis/ sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri? da ya badzra swAhA/ zhes brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas bum pa lnga po rnams kyis go rims ji lta bar dbang
234b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bya'o/ /na ma:sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo ye tiSh+Than+ti/ ngas su ti/ kU oM ma Ni badzri? h+ri da ya badzre/ ma ma ra sye n+ya bi d+ha ri Ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba sha tru na/ badzra garb+he/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ sarba ma ra b+ha ba na ni hUM hUM maM ha ra saM ha ra/ bud+d+ha ne h+ri/
234b2(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta badzra kalpa a ti sti te/ sarba karma A ba ra Na a pa na ya swAhA/ zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pa sngon du song ba'i tsan dan gyis spyi bo nas brtsams te rkang ba'i bar du byug par bya'o/ /de nas cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du so sor
234b3(rgyud 'grel): 'brang ma chen mo'i 'khor lo bris te/ ske 'am dpung pa la btags nas so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i phreng ba'i sngags spyi 'or bsrung bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcoM?
234b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bya'i phyir/ /de la gus par phyag 'tshal nas/ sems
234b5(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /de ni nga yis brjod par bya/ /rig sngags gzi brjid chen mo 'di/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa sta/ /rdo rje gdan la thub pa yis/ /'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang/ /bdud dang bdud kyi rig rnams
234b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gza' dang log par 'bren pa dang/ /bgegs rnams ji snyed gang yod pa/ /thams cad de'i mod la brlag /tadya thA/ oM gi ri gi ri/ gi ri Ni gi ri Ni/ gi ri ba ti gi ri ba ti/ gu na ba ti gu na pa ta/ A ka sha bi shuNd+he?/
234b7(rgyud 'grel): A ka sha ba ti/ A ka sha bi shud+d+he/ sarbba pra b+ha bi ga te/ yA ga she ga ga na te le/ A ka sha bi tsa ri Ni/ dza li ta shi kha re/ ma ni mau kha ti ka /kha ci ta mau lis d+ha re/ su ke she /su b+he she /su ba gte? /su barne su barne/ su barna
235a1(rgyud 'grel): gau ra/ a ti ta/ a na ga te/ pra tut+ta ba ne/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ShAM b+hu ta naM/ dza li ti/ te dze sa/ bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ b+ha ga ba ti/ su rak+Shi me/ su bra b+he/ su pra te/ su ta me/ su d+hand+he/ ba re ba ra te/ b+ha ga bak+ti
235a2(rgyud 'grel): b+ha dra ba ti/ badzre su b+ha re/ bi ma le/ dza ya b+ha dri pra tsaN+De/ tsaN+De/ mahA tsaN+De/ ba g+ho ri ba ri/ gand+ha ri/ go b+hu re/ tsaN+Da li/ mA taM gi /ma li ni/ bartsa ni/ su ma ti/ puk+ka si/ sha ba na ri/ sha ba ri/ shaM ka ri/ dra mi Di/ d+ha mi
235a3(rgyud 'grel): d+hi/ ro du tri ni/ sarbba gra ha bi d+ha ri Ni/ sarbba artha sA d+hA ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba sha truM nAM/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+TAM/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarbba b+hU ta/ bre ta/ pi shA tsA nAM /ma tha ma tha/ sarbba yak+Sha yak+Sha sa/ DA ki nI nAM/ ma nu Sh+ya/ a ma du?Sh+ya?/
235a4(rgyud 'grel): mAny+tsa pra ma tha pra ma tha/ h+ri da yaM/ pi tran sa ya/ dzi bi te/ gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyi srog gzhom du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag gi sdig ba thams cad gzhom du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad
235a5(rgyud 'grel): du 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa las bsrung du gsol/ ma rungs pa thams cad bcing du gsol/ sarba kI la bi shi na sha ni/ mardan te de/ mri tu dan+ta/ ni ba ra Ni/ ma ra dande/ ma ni ni/ mahA ma ni ni/ tsi ti tsi ti/ bi Ti bi Ti/

235a7(rgyud 'grel): shangka ri/ tra mi Di/ da ta ni/ ba tsa ni/ marda ni/ sA ra le/ sA ra le/ sa ra maM b+he/ hi na mad d+hyod/ kiSh+Ta bi d+ha ri Ni/ ma hi le/ ma hA ma he le/ ni ga te/ ni go De/ b+hany+dze/ mat+te mat+te/ mat+te ni dan+ta/ tsakre tsakra /bA ki ni/
235b1(rgyud 'grel): dza li dza le/ sha ba ri sha ba ri/ sarbba bya d+hi/ ha ri Ni/ tsu te tsu Ti/ tsu Di ni tsu Di ni/ dri tsi tsu ni/ mi ni mi ni/ ni min d+ha ra/ tri lo ka dza na ni/ tri lo ka ka ri/ pra ma re/ trai d+hA tu ka /bya ba lo ka ni/ badzra ba ra shu/ ? sha khang+ga/ shaM kha
235b2(rgyud 'grel): tsakra tri shU la/ tsind+ha ma Ni/ matA bidya d+ha ra Ni/ bdag gnas thams cad du gnas pa na/ ma rungs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ /badzre badzre/
235b3(rgyud 'grel): badzre pa ti/ badzra pA Ni d+ha re/ mi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ bi li bi li/ si ri si ri/ ba ra ba ra ba ra De/ sarbA tra dza ya/ ba la d+he swAhA/ sarbba pA paM bi d+ha ri Ni swAhA/ sarbba bya d+hi ha ri Ni swAhA/ saM b+hA ra Ni swAhA
235b4(rgyud 'grel): sarbA tra b+ha Shi swAhA/ sarbba sha traM bta ya ha ra Ni swAhA/ sa na b+hA ra Ni swAhA/ swa stir b+ha ba tu swAhA/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ shAn+tiM swAhA/ puSh+Ti swAhA/ pa la barti ni swAhA/ dza ya tu/
235b5(rgyud 'grel): dza ya/ dzo ya ba ni/ dza ya bi ma la swAhA/ bi bu le swAhA/ om sarba ta thA ga ta mu te swAhA/ oM b+hu ta swAhA/ oM b+hu ba swAhA/ oM b+hu b+hu ba swAhA/ oM b+hu ri b+hu ri badzra ba ti swAhA/ sarbba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya pU ra Ni sand+he ra Ni/ tsa la tsa la/ ba la ba

235b7(rgyud 'grel): legs shog /dus kun bu ni ston par shog /'byung po thams cad bde legs shog /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dang ni /lha rnams kyi ni stobs kyis kyang/ /don ni gang dang gang 'dod pa/ /ngo? ni thams cad grub par shog /rkang

236a3(rgyud 'grel): cad nad ni med gyur cing/ /kun gyis bzang po mthong bar shog /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing/ /sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skye dgu kun la rtag tu byams byed cing//

236a5(rgyud 'grel): ba la sbyin par bya'o/ /oM ma Ni d+ha ra badzri Ni/ mahA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ so sor 'brang ma'i snying po 'di yang bzlas pa'i ched du bslab par bya'o/ /slar yang dbus nas brtsams te/ phyogs bzhi rnams su nya par spyod pa
