255b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje rtse gsum par bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di dag thams cad mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang/ khri'u'i steng na gnas par bya'o/ /dra ba di la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams legs par bris nas langs te/ de'i phyi rol tu byung la dkyil 'khor phyi rol
255b5(rgyud 'grel): tu phyogs kyi lha rnams dgod par bya'o/ /shar phyogs su ni dbang po'i rdo rje bri'o/ /mi'i mtshams su ni me'i thab khung bri'o/ /lho'i phyogs su ni gshin rje'i be con no/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su ni bden bral gyi ral gri'o/ /nub phyogs su ni chu lha'i zhags
255b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung gi ba dan no/ /byang phyogs su ni ku be ra'i dbyug to'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni dbang phyug chen po'i mdung rtse gsum ba bri'o/ /zla ba ni shar phyogs su bri ste dkar por bya'o/ /nyi ma ni nub phyogs su bri ste shin tu dmar por
255b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// sa'i lha'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/ zhags pa'i gong du bri'o/ /phyogs kyi lha 'di dag kyang rang rang gi tshogs dang bcas pa mchod pa bya ste/ brgya byin gyi 'khor ni lha rnams so/ /me'i 'khor ni drang srong rnams so/ /gshin rje'i 'khor ni
256a1(rgyud 'grel): ma mo rnams so/ /bden bral gyi 'khor ni srin po rnams so/ /chu lha'i 'khor ni klu rnams so/ /rlung lha'i 'khor ni rig sngags 'chang rnams so/ /rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor ni gnod sbyin rnams so/ /dbang ldan gyi 'khor ni 'byung po rnams so
256a2(rgyud 'grel): ? lha mo'i 'khor rnams ni sa bdag rnams so/ /nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang rang rang gi lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar phyi rol gyi 'khor du phyogs kyi lha dgod pa'i go rims na bstan zin to/ /dkyil 'khor bris zin nas buM
256a3(rgyud 'grel): pa cho ga bzhin du dag par byas te/ chul sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pa bsangs la lag pa dri yis bskus pas blangs te/ bum pa'i ngos rnams su kak+ko la dang/ tsan dan dkar po la sogs ba shin tu dri zhim po bkra shis pa gang yang dud?
256a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dag gis rdo rje la sogs pa phyag rgya'i ri mo rnams legs par bri bar bya'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags/ oM a mri te hUM phaT ces bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas gu gul la btab ste/ des bum pa bdugs nas chu mi ka
256a5(rgyud 'grel): gam/ rdzing buAm/ chu klung bkra shis pa gang yang rung ba'i chu gtsang ma blangs nas srog chags med pa legs par btsags pa des bkang ba'i bum pa'i nang du rin po che sna lnga ste/ dung dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ byu du dang/ gser
256a6(rgyud 'grel): te rin po che de lta bu dag dang/ sman lnga ste/ go ri kar+Ni dang/ si ha dang/ bya gri dang/ ha sa dang/ ha sa de ba 'di rnams dang/ sa bon sna lnga ste/ nas dang/ 'bras dang/ mon sran gre'u dang/ gro dang/ til te 'di rnams dang/ sngos lta ste
256a7(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dang/ gur kum dang/ du ru ka dang/ a ka ru dang/ ga bur ro/ /dri dang ldan pa 'di rnams kyang bzhag go /bum pa'i mgul pa la yang tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa la yang bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis btab pas bcings la/ dar ?
256b1(rgyud 'grel): ras dkar po sar pas yang bcings te/ bum pa'i kha shing a mra'i rigs ha sa ka ra zhes bya ba yal ga dang/ me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa 'am/ yang na zhim po 'khri shing dang yal ga gzhan gang yang rung ba dag kyang gzhug go /
256b2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa legs par bkang nas de'i 'og tu legs par khrus bya'o/ /khrus byas nas gos btsang ma bgos te thogs nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs sgor 'greng ste/ de'i sngags kyis 'bar ba'i mig gis shar phyogs su bltas la
256b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bsal ba'i sngags kI li kI le se gol dang ldan par brjod do/ /yungs kar gyis kyang bgegs bsal bar bya'o/ /bgegs thams cad bsal nas dra ba dang ra ba phur bu bya ste/ na ma:sarba ta thA ga te b+hya:sarba ta thA ga te bi kaM?
256b4(rgyud 'grel): pa badzra kI li kI la ya a ka ra ya swAhA/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags so/ /na ma:sarba ta thA ga te b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba thA badzra prA k+Sha ra/ sarba ta thA ga te gatshe tsa na ka/ ku ru ku ru tsakra nA ya swAhA/ rdo rjer ba'i sngags so/ /na ma:sarba ta thA ga te b+hya:sarba
256b5(rgyud 'grel): mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba thA badzra ra patsnya? ra Ni k+Shi? pa ga/ ga na ka swAhA/ rdo rjer ba'i sngags so/ /cho ga lhag chad du gyur pa'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg legs par byas nas dbang ldan gyi phyogs la sogs pa dkyil 'khor phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
256b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams su dra bi da la sogs pa lha rnams so so'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshig gis sbyan drangs bar bya'o/ /de la lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis ral gri ltar bsgrengs pa 'di ni dra ba di'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags
256b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma shtsaN+Da badzra pA na yo/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM dra ba di pa ra hUM phaT/ lag pa g.yon mdzub mo gnyis ka logs su gzhug la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum par byas pa 'di ni gtum po chen po'i phyag rgya'o// 
257a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ oM mahA tsaN+Da hUM phaT/ gong ma bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba'i tshig dang lnga ldan par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis snyim pa khong stong du sbyar ba 'di ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM mahA ba la hUM phaT/ snyim
257a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bkan la mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rgyab tu srin lag gnyis sbyar te gung mo gnyis yang de bzhin du de'i rgyab tu sbyar nas nang du bkug la mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad de mthe bo gnyis so so'i ngos la gzhar ba 'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i
257a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM a pa rA dzi te hUM phaT/ lag pa gnyis snying gar byas la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug ste phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse me mthe bo dang mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad 'dud bar byas la/ gung mo gnyis
257a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa nas gang gis ma reg bar bya ste/ mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gshibs pa 'di ni/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya las thams cad byed pa yin te /sngags
257a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ oM badzra dzwa la nA ya swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste bkug nas nas tsam gyis ma reg par bya ste/ mthe bo gnyis par du gshibs pa ni rdo rje yangs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM ha
257a6(rgyud 'grel): na ha na hUM phaT/ snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bsnol te bzhag pa'i ? mthe bo gnyis kyi bkab la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo'i tshigs dbu ma la gzugs/ srin lag gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang por
257a7(rgyud 'grel): gung mo gnyis bkug pa'i rtse mo btsugs pa ni shI li kI li phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM kI li kI li ba la kI li kI li ye swAhA/ lag pa gnyis sor mo'i nang du bsnol te khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo dang/ gung mo dang mthe'u chung
257b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams so sor bshibs te/ bsgrengs pa 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM badzra d+h+ri ka 'di la re re nas lag pa'i phyag rgya sngar bcings la/ e hye hi zhes bya ste/ re re la yang bskul ba'i sngags dang sbyar la yon la sngags lan bdun
257b2(rgyud 'grel): nam nyi shu rtsa gcig btab la dbul/ /de nas dbang po la sogs pa rnams so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang ba dang/ gdan bstan ba dang/ mchod yon la sogs ba dbul bar bya'o/ /shar phyogs kha bltas te rkang pa g.yas brkyang ba'i
257b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su gzhag par bya/ sngags la/ oM ha na ha na b+hin da badzra hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar
257b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod de/ g.yabs pas ni brgya byin spyan drang ngo/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang la phyag rgya bkrol la slar btang ngo/ /me'i phyogs su bltas te lag pa brkyang la mdzub mo bkug ste rtse mo gung mo'i tshigs gsum par gzugs so/ /sngags la/ oM badzra ha mahA b+hu
257b5(rgyud 'grel): ta dzwa la ya sarba mahA b+ha smi ku ru sarba duSh+Ta na hUM phaT/ mthe bo lag mthil du sbyar te brtan por bzhag la g.yabs pas ni spyan drang ngo/ /mdzub mo mthe po'i ngos la btsugs la phyir drag tu brkyang bas ni slar btang ngo/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas te 'greng
257b6(rgyud 'grel): la snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste/ sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur daM du bcings te srin lag gnyis gshibs te bsgrengs nas snying gar bzhag par bya'o/ /oM badzra kA la da hA? ha na ha na hUM phaT/ srin lag gshibs pa las nang du bzlog pas ni sbyin
257b7(rgyud 'grel): drang ba'o/ /nang du bzlog pa las phyir phyung ba gshibs pas ni slar btang ngo/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par gzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs pa la mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis ral br 'dra bar gshibs te bsgrengs la/
258a1(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa yang de'i tshul gyis zhags pa 'dra bar byas te/ sta zur logs su bzhag par bya'o/ /sngags la/ oM ne ri te rak+Sha sa a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g.yabs pas spyan drang ngo/ /phyir bkyed
258a2(rgyud 'grel): de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo/ /chu lha'i phyogs su rkang ba mnyam par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas/ mthe bo dang mdzub mo zhags mig ltar bya/ g.yon pa la yang de ltar byas te/ snying gar bzhag go /sngags ni/ oM nA ga badzra 
258a3(rgyud 'grel): A na la sarba d+ha na da rgya ni dya n+ya su bar+Na ma Ni/ mug ti kar d+hi ni/ sarbo ka ra nishtsa/ badzra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu smar ya/ A kaDShhya A kaDShhya?/ band+ha band+ha/ ha ra ha ra/ pra dz+nyA nAM mahA cod hUM phaT/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g.yabs pas ni spyan
258a4(rgyud 'grel): drang ba'o/ /phyir bskyed de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo/ /rlung lha'i phyogs su 'greng la lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo bkug ba'i thor tho btsugs la/ lag ba g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te/
258a5(rgyud 'grel): lta zur logs su bzhag go /sngags la/ oM badzra a ni la mahA d+he ga A ni la mahA d+he ga an la sarba duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ mdzub mo de nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang slar btang bar bya'o/ /ku be ra'i phyogs su rdo rje bcings pa nang du bzlog nas mthe'u
258a6(rgyud 'grel): chung gnyis gshibs te brkyang ba'i rgyab tu so so'i srin lag bzhag bar bya'o/ /sngags la/ oM ku be ra ya kAM a d+hi ba ta ye swAhA/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste g.yabs bas spyan drang ngo/ /de phyir bkyed de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo//
258a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan gyi phyogs su kha bltas te 'greng la snyim ba bkan nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bcug ste bsnol/ gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgrangs pa'i rgyab logs su rdo rje ltar bya/ mthe bo gnyis bar du gshibs te bzhi//?
258b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags la/ oM dri hUM bi la badzra shu la swAhA/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo sprad pa las nang du g.yabs pas ni spyan drang ngo/ /phyir bkye de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo/ /'og gi ni lag pa gnyis pad+ma ltar byas la spyan drang ba dang slar btang bar bya ba
258b2(rgyud 'grel): la lang nang du g.yabs pa dang phyir bkrol bas bya'o/ /sngags la/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud d+hA nI/ oM dra bi ti swAhA/ steng gi ni gra han shu dya pra ga ti dzyi tir ma ya swAhA/ phyogs kyi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya dang/ sngags 'di dag kyang bshad zin to/ /don
258b3(rgyud 'grel): mtsher yon phul nas dra bi da la sogs pa legs par mchod de/ me tog chu la skyes pa dang/ thar la skyes pa dang/ bdug pa srog chags kyi yan lag ma yin pa'i yid du 'ong pa dag dang/ mar dang/ 'bru lar gyi mar me dang/ tsan dan dang
258b4(rgyud 'grel): ga bur dang/ gur kum la sogs pa'i dri gsung can dang/ khur ba bkra shis ldan/ 'bras chan zho dang sbyar bas mchod nas/ dga' bo la sogs pa rnams la sha chang ma yin ba dang/ sha chang de dang sbyar ba ma yin pa'i bshos cha mang po
258b5(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ /de dag gi 'khor gyi gdon rnams lan sha chang dang ldan par sbyin no/ /de ltar sha dang chang rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu dang/ bgegs kyi kha zas ci yang rung ba sbyin na phyi rol gyi 'khor bgegs kyi gzugs can gang yin pa de dag des dga' 
258b6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i lha rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad ba 'di yang bsgrags par bya ste/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyags gdon gyi cho gas bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag
258b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'tshal/ /me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha/ /me lha'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod ba'i gyang? cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha/ /ma mo'i bdag bo gdon gyi bdag/
259a1(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden dang 'bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi dag /lho nub gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing
259a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa chu'i lha/ /bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /rlung
259a3(rgyud 'grel): gi phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin lag na dbyug tho thogs/ /nor bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang
259a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /byang shar gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gis yi lha mo ba/ /klu mo chen mo zhi ba ste/ /sa bdag 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i mchog
259a5(rgyud 'grel): sa mi lha mo 'khor bcas la/ /mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha chen thams cad dang/ /nyi ma zla ba gza' chen dang/ /gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la/ /mchod cing bstod phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
259a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /yang na snying po brgyad po re res bum pa re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ rtsa ba'i sa bon dang/ sdong bu'i sa bon dang/ snying po'i sa bon dang/ 'bras sA lu'i sa bon dang/ me tog gi sa bon dang/ //ge sar?
259b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sa bon dang/ lo ma'i sa bon te/ sa bon sna bdun gyi phye ma zhib mo til mar gyis sbyar te/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis legs pa btab ste/ de nas khrus byed pa la sogs shig tu lus bkrus shing dril te/ khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gon
259b2(rgyud 'grel): te dkyil 'khor gyi skor bkug nas de la bsrung ba chen po bya'o/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ sogs ba byin te dkyil 'khor du de bcug la/ gus pas phyag byas nas cho ga bzhin du nang du zhugs te 'dug pa'i 'og tu sngags bzlas shing bu
259b3(rgyud 'grel): pa re re nas legs par khrus byed du gzhug /shin tu bde ba dang/ legs pa dang/ bkra shis pa dang/ rgyal bar gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig bya ba'i tshig dang/ rol mo'i sgra skad rab tu snyan pa dang yang ldan par bya'o/ /yungs kar dang
259b4(rgyud 'grel): zho dang rtsa dur ba dang/ li khri dang me long dang/ dung dang bil ba'i 'bras bu dang/ gi wang rnams yang slob ma'i nang du ras khri'i tshang ting ba'i steng du rdzas de bzhag ste/ slob ma de bkra shis 'don pa'i lag tu bzhag la/ de las yungs
259b5(rgyud 'grel): kar la sogs pa blangs shing de la sbyin no/ /de nas yang bsrung ba byas la rdo rje phyed de'i lag tu byin te zhi ba dang dga' ba'i sems dang ldan bas longs shig ces bya ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje phyed po de la 'dzin pa'i bgegs
259b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad las thar nas ldang bar byed/ zla ba dgra gcan gyis btang ba bzhin du lus sdig pa dang bral zhing mdzes so/ /de nas yang 'byor na mar la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bla ma'i yon yang khrus byed pa des shin tu bzang po
259b7(rgyud 'grel): legs par dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon la sogs pa phul te slar gshegs su gsol/ /'phags pa dra bi? 'bum pa'i cho ga rim par phyed ba rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/
260a1(rgyud 'grel): pra tiSh+dza bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rab gnas kyi cho ga /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bya ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /rab gnas cho ga brjod par bya/ /snyan grags mi snyan rnyed ma rnyed/ /bde sdug bstod dang do
260a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin smad/ /'jig rten chos kyis ma gos pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya/ /dkyil 'khor dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyag rgya dang/ byed pa dang/ gdan dang/ bzlas pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ gtor ma dang/ mchod pa'i las dang/
260a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bcing bsdu ba ste/ kho na nyid bcu rig pa rtag tu sdig pa 'jigs shing drang ba dang/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba blo brtan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la ltos pa dang bcas pa'o/ /nyal pa dang/ gnyid dang/ reg pa'i bde ba dang /bzab
260a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i nye bar longs spyod pa rnams la chags pa med pa/ phyin ci ma log pa sgrub pa la snying por byed pa/ /phyi rol la ma chags pa/ sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par byed pa/ 'khor bas 'jigs pa / sems can la
260a5(rgyud 'grel): ltos pa dang bcas pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa/ sdig pa thams cad spangs pa/ 'dod pa'i chags pa la sogs pa la yang dag par mi rtog ba/ mi gtsang ba dang byams pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyogS
260a6(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pa'o/ /dge ba dang ldan pa mtshan nyid 'di rnams dang ldan pa la/ slob mas gsol ba btab ste/ lugs ma 'am 'bur? du byas pa 'am/ 'dus byas la sogs ba rab tu gnas par bya ba'i don du rab tu gnas pa'i sa gzhi
260a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par 'dus byas pa/ bla ma dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pa bslang zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ rgyan med na gser gyi sor gdub gcig thogs te/ de la rab tu gnas pa'i sa gzhi la sku gzugs dang/
260b1(rgyud 'grel): ? ti dang/ thab ga 'am mchod rten la sogs pa mdun du yang dag bar gzhag ste/ de la sku gzugs sam thad ka 'am/ bo ti dang/ mchod rten la bsang dang kha bshal ba dang/ me tog la sogs pa rnam par sbyin par bya'o/ /byis ni nam
260b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la rnam pa lngas yang dag pa mchod de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i slob dpon gyis gdug spos kyi snod bzung zhing/ nam mkha' i khams pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
260b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma ya stwaM/ a haM zhes pa lan gsum brjod do/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /dga' ldan gnas su rab gnas nas/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar/ /de yi rnam par 'dir bzhugS
260b4(rgyud 'grel): shig rtag tu mgon po 'dir bzhugs nas/ /che ge mo yi don phyir dang/ /byang chub sems ni 'phel bya'i phyir/ /me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig /ces bya ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /phyis na
260b5(rgyud 'grel): bstod cing sbyin sreg gi dus su yang ji lta ba'i bstod pa bya'o/ /sku gzugs la sogs pa'i mdun du yang/ yungs kar lag pa g.yon pa dang g.yas pa gnyis su bzung ste/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis g.yas skor du lan gsum du bskor zhing
260b6(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar de rnams ? la thugs par bya'o/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis g.yon du lan gsum du bskor zhing yungs? kar mer blugs par bya ste/ 'dis ni rtog pa med pa khams gsum du skyon bsal ba'i ched du bskor par bya ba ni/ oM sarba
260b7(rgyud 'grel): pA phaM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas khyor ba dang bcas pas chu blangs te me de nyid du blugs par bya'o/ /de sngon du song bas sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas dpar bya'o/ zhes bya ba ni lhag par gnas pa'i rim pa'o//
261a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyi dro'i dus su bum pa ni lnga 'am brgyad dam gcig kyang rung ste/ dri zhim pa dang bcas pa'i chus yongs su bkang la/ skye la gos gnyis kyis dkris te/ pa 'am pa la sha la sogs pa'i yal gas kha legs
261a2(rgyud 'grel): par brgyan la/ yungs kar dang ku su ma'i me tog dang bcas pa'i gser dang/ dngul dang/ mu tig dang/ mu men dang/ byu ru dang/ zhes bya ba rin po che sna lnga dang/ gro dang/ nas dang/ mon sran gre'u dang/ til dang/ 'bras sob
261a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'bru sna lnga dang/ rnam par rgyal ba dkar po dang/ bri ha ti dang/ kaN+Da ki dang/ ha sa de ba dang/ daN+Do ta pa la dang/ sman lnga'o/ de rnams dang yang dag par ldan par byas la/ zlum por byas la bzhag par bya'o/ /bum pa so sor
261a4(rgyud 'grel): blangs te/ oM ru ru sphu ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarbba artha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mngon bar bsngags par byas pa'am/ yang na byin pa'i sngags yi ge gsum dang spel ba 'dis phyi dro'i dus su bum pa mngon par
261a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /nang bar sde bar sku gzugs gos ser pos dkris te/ kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la khrus bya'o/ /de'i khrus kyi rim pa ni 'di yin te/ ba'i rnam pa lnga la/ oM hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis mngon par bsngagS
261a6(rgyud 'grel): cing dur ba'i chang bus gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas dri zhim po'i mar nag gis blugs te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne swAhA/ zhes bya'i ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags cing dUr ba'i chang bus gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su u
261a7(rgyud 'grel): dum ba ra dang/ n+ya gro d+ha las skyes pa'i shing shun legs par btags pa 'khor pa'i snod kyi dbus su bzhag la g.yas phyogs kyi glor bzhag la/ mar nag dbyung bar bya ba'i don du sku gzugs la byugs par bya'o/ /de nas bum pa
261b1(rgyud 'grel): re re'i chus sku gzugs la khrus gsol bar bya ste/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod cing oM sarba ta thA ga
261b2(rgyud 'grel): ta a b+hi? ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o/ /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i rig pa phab ste/ /bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i chus sku gzugs la khrus byed par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis de la gos kyi chu blangs
261b3(rgyud 'grel): shing rlan med par byas la gdan rang rang gi bzhag bar bya'o/ /'di ni sku gzugs kyi khrus kyi rim pa'o/ /gal te thang sku 'am/ po ti 'am/ bris pa'i mchod rten nam sku gzugs la sogs pa khrus byed par 'dod na/ de'i tshe po ti la
261b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa khrus kyi rim pa bya ste/ mdun du me long bstan pa/ me long de la ba'i rnaM pa lnga dang/ mar nag dang/ shun pa la sogs pa'i rim pas sngon bzhin du bum pa'i chus kyang bkru bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni khrus kyi rim pa'o/ /de nas nam
261b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i gzugs la khyad par du gzhag par bya'o/ /gal te sku gzugs sam po tir byed par 'dod na/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor
261b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i? po ti yi ge'i rnam par yongs su gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas gos zung brtsegs sku la bskon bar byas te/ oM badzra pA sa se swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so/ /ku sha'i chang bus ni sku gzugs la sogs pa la
261b7(rgyud 'grel): bsang gtor yang bya zhing zhal bsil yang bya'o/ /me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga sngags 'dis dbul bar bya ste/ oM badzra buShpe hUM de ltar thams cad bya'o/ /yang de bzhin du chu dang thang la skyes pa yi/ /me tog 'di ni mchog yin te
262a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /ji ltar bde bas bzhes su gsol/ /lhan cig skyes dang de bzhin sbyar/ /bdugs?  'di ni mchog yin te/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul laD na/ /ji ltar bde ba? zhes su gsol/ /lhan cig skyes dang de bzhin
262a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /dri zhim bde ba'i mchog yin te/ bdag gis gus pas 'bul lags kyis/ /ji ltar bde bas bzhes su gsol/ /mar dang mar nag mar me 'od/ /lha rdzas 'od 'bar mun 'joms pa'i/ /mi shes thams cad zhi ba'i phyir/ /bdag
262a3(rgyud 'grel): gis dad pas 'bul lags na/ /ci bde bar ni gzhes su gsol/ /bza' dang bca' dang ldan pa yi/ /lha bshos thams cad yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dri dang ro? ldan pa/ /khyed la dbul gyis bzhes su gsol/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis
262a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams kyi go rims bzhin du dbul bar bya'o/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg gi dus su yang arg+ha la sogs pa'i sngags kyis de bzhin du yang bya'o/ /de nas sku gzugs kyi spyan thur mas dbye bar bya ste/ oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni?
262a5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ de nas rdo rje bzung zhing dril bu dkrol nas mi skyong rdo rje ye shes la sogs bas bstod par bya'o/ /de nang par snga bar sngon bzhin du sbyin sreg byas la/ tsA ru'i gza' ba sngags kyis dag byed sgrub par bya'o/ /oM di bya nis mA d+hi ?
262a6(rgyud 'grel): na pri Na ne swAhA/ tsA ru'i bza' ba dbul ba'i sngags so/ /de nas lhag ma gzhan rnams slob dpon dang slob ma dang/ yon bdag gis gza' bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag don du gnyer ba la yang cung zad sbyin no/ /gang yang nye bar dgos pa
262a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyin sreg gi dus dang/ rab tu gnas pa'i dus dang/ rab tu gnas pa'i dus kyi rdzas ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang zhing yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /slob ma dang lha bzo la ni gang yang phul ba'i nor de rnams mi gnod do//
262b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang/ khams pa lo tsa pas bsgyur ba'o// //
262b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde'i man ngag slob dpon po d+hi satwa sa mdzad pa bzhugs so// /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bklag cing de bzhin
262b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa bdun mchod de smon lam gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las bsdus te rim par bglag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mdo bglag cing cho ga rim par mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi mdo bklag cing smon
262b4(rgyud 'grel): lam gdab pa la/ mgo mjug dus kun du gnod sems dang/ 'khon dang bsnabs sems dang/ ma dad pa dang le lo dang/ yid gnyis la sogs te nyon mongs pa'i skyon dang/ sems ma 'dres par bsdam zhing bag bya/ /gzhu rdeg la soD
262b5(rgyud 'grel): pa chab pa dang/ gnod pa'i las ming yang mi grag bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi yon tan dang/ mthe'u khyad par la yid ches shing mos par bya ste/ bka' drin gzo zhing dang ba dang/ dang ba dang gus pa'i sems cher bskyed/ /mdo
262b6(rgyud 'grel): sde'i phan yon la yid ches pa nges par gzung/ sems can la byams pa dang/ snying rje'i sems bskyed la/ khyim pa zhig yin na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims bzung/ btson dang bu lon can bdag la dbang yongs rnams thar bar bya zhing/ yongs
262b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la dpung gnyen bya de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad dang/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ skyabs grol gyi sku gzugs rgyu ci 'byor pa las gsar du bya/ gser du ma 'byor ni sku gzugs rnying pa ci bzhugs spyan
263a1(rgyud 'grel): drang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ mchod pa zhag dus zin gyi bar du nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par tshar bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las mi nyung bar bklag /'phags pa choS
263a2(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba dang/ gnod sbyin rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa dbul ba'i mdo sde bzang po gra gcig kyang rgyun tu bklag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang skom dang/ yo byang thams cad kyiS ci nus mchod pa dang rim gro bya'o/ /mchod pa bya pa'i zhag grangS
263a3(rgyud 'grel): na zhig bdun nam/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ sum cu rtsa lnga 'am bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du bya ste/ lcogs par byed na nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du mchod cing smon lam gdab/ dam chos bklag pa dang mchod pa gzhan rgyun mi
263a4(rgyud 'grel): 'chad par bya/ /cho ga 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa'i mtshan thos shing brjod pa las phan yon 'byung ba yin pas phyag 'tshal ba dang bsngo ba'i bar du skabs ci yod par mtshan lan mang du smos
263a5(rgyud 'grel): shing/ ci nas kyang mang du thos shing brjod pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /mchod pa'i yo byad 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bshams shing gtsang spra che bar bya/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang/ sil snyan dang/ ? rdob pa la sogs pa se yem?
263a6(rgyud 'grel): shing rnga dang gar la sogs pa rol mo ci 'byor pa rgyas bar bya/ yon bdag dang mchod pa'i las la gtogs pa rnams khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma nyin mtshan mchod pa lan du byed pa'i tshe spo zhing bgo'o/ /mchod pa'i rim pa ni yo byad
263a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin bshams kyi 'og tu dge 'dun dang yon bdag tshogs nas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgom/ de nas mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bden pa bdar zhing byin gyis brlabs te
263b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'phags pa spyan drang/ de nas 'phags pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzoms ste/ so so'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam/ de nas 'phags pa'i tshogs mngon du dmigs la gdan 'joms pa'i spyi la phyag 'tshal ba dang
263b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga dbul/ bskul ba'i smon lam bklag /de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la sogS pa re re la mchod pa dbul zhing mdo las 'byung ba'i smon lam gdab par tsher phyin par bya/ /de nas kun gyi gzungs kyi snying po logs shig tu phyung ba
263b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa dgu man chad bdun yan chad ci nus su bklag /de'i rjes la mchod pa lan cig byas nas bsod nams bsngo ba'i smon lam gdab/ de nas bzod pa gsol /te/ slar gshegs pa'i tshigs bcad bklag ste ? mchod pa bshams
263b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs 'byor ba'i stobs kyi ci nus par sbyar te/ maN+Dal chen po'i steng du tshon phye'am/ me tog lngas rin po che sna lnga'i pho brang rta babs dang/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhi pad+ma'i gdon dang bcas pa
263b5(rgyud 'grel): bris pa snam bu bar ma gzhal med khang gi gung la an 'tsham pa'i seng ge'i khri dang sbyar te/ tshon sna lnga'i ras kyis dkris pa'i mdo sde'i po ti dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba brgyad kyi sku gzugs bzhugs/ g.yas g.yon du ?
263b6(rgyud 'grel): khri 'tsham pa bzhag la/ g.yas g.yon gyi gral stod du ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs par bsham/ g.yas gral smad du ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ phyogs skyong ba bcu
263b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dam pa'i chos skyong pa thams cad bzhugs su gsol/ g.yon gral smad du ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis bzhugs par bsham/ shar phyogs kyi ngos su an chung ngu 'am/ gzhong bu 'am many+dzi las gzhi blangs pa'i steng du /'phags pa
264a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ skyabs grol gdan 'jam dpal sngon gyi thugs dam bskul zhing mdo sde'i don las 'byung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa ltar gdan bsham zhing so so'i sku gzugs
264a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang bzhugs par bya/ lha bzhugs pa'i snam bu'i gzhi yang pad+mas 'khor par bya/ dbus kyi pad+mal 'am spyan sngar sgreng ba/ gar sdug cing bde bar gzungs chu'i bum pa kha rgyan dang bcas ba dgu bzhag /phyi rol gyi snam bu'i nang
264a3(rgyud 'grel): du bkra shis dang/ shing ljon pa la sogs pa'i rgyan la 'os pa'i khol ma bkram la/ phyi tshon sna lnga'i gzhal med khang sgom khyud dang/ rta babs su bcas pa bri zhing mu tig gi phreng ba dang /do shal gyi khol ma bkod la/ de dag
264a4(rgyud 'grel): gi steng du lha bshos dang/ yon chab la sogs pa mchod pa rnams kyang dgram/ tshon phyes bri bar dka' na me tog dgram ba 'am/ maN+Dal tsam bya/ steng du yang bla re dang gdugs ci 'byor pas klubs/ ngos su yang rgyal mtshan
264a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag ba/ yan chad ci 'byor pa rgyas par dgram/ mar me'i kha grangs ni lnga bcu rtsa bzhi man chad du bya ste/ de las kha grangs dgu yan chad bzhi bcu rtsa dgu man chad ci nus
264a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyin mtshan du bar mchad bar btang/ lha bshos ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la cha re re/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ skyabs grol la cha re re/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /rgyal po chen bo bzhi la
264a7(rgyud 'grel): cha re re/ dam pa'i chos skyong ba spyi la cha gcig /chos gnyis la cha re re/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis la cha re re/ spyi gtor chen po gcig 'di rnams so so'i spyan sngar gar 'os par dbab/ ngos gnyis su de bzhin
264b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa? bdun gyi smon lam gyi mdo sde nyin mtshan du bar mchad bar thun du bklag /chos kyi sbyin pa dbul ba mdo sde gra gcig gdan khri bsham ste ci nus su bklag /mchod pa bshams pa'i mdun du/ mchod pa la 'du ba rnams kyi stan
264b2(rgyud 'grel): bshams te/ mdun mdun du mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba legs bar bshams la/ rol mo dang sil snyan byed pa'i gra gcig kyang zla la ba ltar te phyed du gzhug /mchad pa bshams pa ni mdor na tshad nges pa med/ bde ba
264b3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi zhing gi yon tan gyi bkod pa dang mthun bar nus kyang rung/ tha ma maN+Dal bya ste/ me tog chu phor gang tsam gyis mchod kyang rung ste/ rang gi 'byor ba'i nyams kyis ci lcogs su 'bad? bya'o/ /yid kyi mchod pa ni ci nas kyang rgya che
264b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing bzang bar bsams shing bden pa bdar te/ smon lam yang gdab/ lha bshos kyi cha dang/ mar me'i grangs kyang mi 'byor na nyung du bsdur yang rung/ 'byor na ci 'os pa mang du bskyed kyang rung/ /dang po mdo sde las 'byung ba'i
264b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rjes khyab par bsgom mo/ /mchod pa bshams te/ de dag bdun tshogs nas phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag bya/ de nas rig pa'i tshul gang la
264b6(rgyud 'grel): goms pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad dmigs su med par stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ci ran cig bsgom mo/ /de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'di snyam du chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i don de lta bu yin la/ 'phags pa
264b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis de kho na nyid thugs su chud pas sku dang gsung dang thugs nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gyur te/ sgrib pa mi mnga' zhing mthu dang byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go 'phang brnyes bar yang rung na/ kye ma sems can
265a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams chos kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs te/ rmongs pas nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal mang pos gzir te/ nyam thag pa'i gnas su lhung bar gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyang thog ma med pa'i 'khor
265a2(rgyud 'grel): ba nas 'gro ba rgyud rnams su bdag gi gnyen bshes dam pa drin gyi zhing du gyur pa 'ga' yang med de/ bdag gis kyang dang po byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed de/ 'gro ba mang po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don dpag tu med pa bsgrub par
265a3(rgyud 'grel): dam bcas pa'i? dus kyi tshe/ sems can thams cad bdag gir blangs zin pas 'di lta bu la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yal bar 'dor ba ni mi rigs na/ 'di dag ji ltar sdug bsngal las ni gdon/ bde ba la ni
265a4(rgyud 'grel): dgong par bya snyam du snying rje dang/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson pa'i sems drag tu bskyed par bya'o/ /yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dang mthu dman pa yin pas/ bdag nyid
265a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig dus 'phral du don rlabs po che 'di lta bu ni mi lcogs kyi/ ston pa bde bar gshegs pas sngon ci ltar phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'grib pa na sems can thams cad rjes su bzung ba'i slad du de bzhin
265a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa las byung ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de bzhin
265a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa bdun la mthu brtan dpung gnyer gsol te/ de ltar gi 'phags pa rnams kyi mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'gro ba rnams la phan pa bsgrub par bya la/ phyis ni bdag nyid gcig pus gzhan la ltos pa
265b1(rgyud 'grel): med par sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bla na med par bsgrub par bya'o snyam du bsam mo/ /snying rje dang byams pa'i bskyed ba'i 'og tu/ sems can gyi don bya bar brtsam pa'i phyir 'phags pa gdan 'joms pa'i pho brang dang/
265b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i tshogs bshams shing bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i yid kyi bden pa bdar zhing yid kyis bsngo ba// //dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thamS
265b3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs dang/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
265b4(rgyud 'grel): bdun dang/ ston pa bde bar gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'jom pa'i lo brang gi dkyil gi dkyil 'khor dang/ mchod pa'i chogs sbyar ba 'di rnams/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon
265b5(rgyud 'grel): lam khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhig gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar
265b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa/ tha gru che ba yangs pa/ reg na 'jam zhing bde ba dang/ dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bsung dang ldan ba/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa/ mdza' rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs
265b7(rgyud 'grel): shing gser dang mu tig gi gram bu dang bye ma brdal ba dang/ utpa la dang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma 'gying zhing ldem pas khebs par gyur cing/ chu bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa sgrog pa dga' la 'phyo zhing lding bas brgyan pa'i yan lag
266a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang ldan pa'i mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka dag gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa lha'i nor bu dang/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang/ rin po che'i sbyangs pa/ me tog gi mgo lcogS
266a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'bras bus mdzes par chags pas g.yur za zhing ldem la/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha 'khrol ba las dam pa'i chos kyi sgra 'byung ba dang ldan pa tshar du sbreng pas legs par brgyan pa'i sa gzhi la gzhal med khang chan/
266a3(rgyud 'grel): po/ rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar bar bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rgyas pa 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba mdza' yas par rnam par gnas pa/ rgya yongs su mchad pa
266a4(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang bsgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
266a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ dri dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ldong dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa mdza' yas pa
266a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyu ba/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brtan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad yang dag par thob par byed pa/ nye bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/
266a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa/ thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa'i gnas dran pa dang blo gros dang/ rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong? chen
266b1(rgyud 'grel): ? bkon? pa yin pa/ rnam par thur pa'i sgo chen po stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rgyal po'i yon tan mdza' yas pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la rten pa'i bkod pa la rten pa'i gzhal med khang
266b2(rgyud 'grel): chen por gyur pa'i nang du/ gung la de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bzhugs pa ? pa'i rin po che'i seng ge'i gdan khri lha'i dar zab dang ras bcos bu g.yo ? pa nem zhing 'phar ba'i rlong dang ldan pa'i sku rten dang bca pa brgyad 'byung zhing
266b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon du yang 'khor gyi gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ chos skyong thugs dam can bzhugs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan brgya stong mang po dang/ mdun gyi ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ skyabs grol bzhugs
266b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i pad+ma'i gdan bzang po 'byung ba dang/ phyi nang thams cad cha rigs dang 'tsham par mi dang lha'i yo khyad? dam pa zhal zas dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ rol mo la sogs pa phul tu phyin pa sna tshogs phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang/ bzang po
266b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor pa'i smon lam las 'byung ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /'phags pa gdan 'dzom pas kyang/ de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig/ de skad lan
266b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum bzlas/ yang de'i rjes su la dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang/ cho gas gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par
266b7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur ci gces lan gsum bzlas/ mchod pa'i tshogs bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drang ba/ pus mo gtsugs te me tog blangs thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces/ shar phyogs
267a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po/ zham 'bring ba byang chub
267a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig bzhugs pa dang/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan
267a3(rgyud 'grel): ba mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dpag tu med pa bzhugs pa dang/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis yongs gang ba rin chen bsags pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoM?
267a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te bzhugs pa dang/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya
267a5(rgyud 'grel): ngan med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor te bzhugs pa dang/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
267a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rgyal mtshan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o? sangs rgyas chos sgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs dpag tu med pas kun nas bskor te bzhugs pa dang/ shar phyogS
267a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgya mtshor legs par gnas pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa /
267b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs grangs med pas kun nas bskor te bzhugs pa dang/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUrya snang ba na bcos ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
267b2(rgyud 'grel): sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed dang/ zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs grangs med pa bzhugs pa la sogs te/ de bzhin gshegs
267b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bdun pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis
267b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrib pa /nang sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyis don dang/ phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du de bzhin
267b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas ba mang po dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bzang zhing rlabs che ba dang/ mthu dang byin gyis brlabs dpag tu ma mchis pa mnga' ba la brten te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba med
267b6(rgyud 'grel): po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod ba'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'jom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ da ltar
267b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa gdul bya'i dbang du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol
268a1(rgyud 'grel): pas sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang/ sngon gyi smon lam chen po dang/ sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can las glengs te/ bdag cag rnams
268a2(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ris kyi gdul bya phyag mtshan du bzhes pa'i nang du gtogs te/ bka' drin thob pa'i 'phro mchis pa tsam la brten te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchi
268a3(rgyud 'grel): na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ dpal?
268a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje dang/ rgyal ba'i sras po skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde bka' stsal pa'i tshe gdan 'dzem par
268a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus te mdo sde byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par thugs skyed pa de dag thams cad kyang che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab bir? slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchi
268a6(rgyud 'grel): na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'jom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlabs du gsol/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'jom pa chen pos bkas gtad cing so so nas kyang rten?
268a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig bden pas mdongs gsol du zhal gyis bzhes te/ dam pa'i chos dang 'khor rnams bzhi bskyong bar mdzad cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di yang lhag par phyag
268b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan du bzhes pa tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ rnam thos kyi sras la sogs pa 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad kyang che ge mo la sogs pa
268b2(rgyud 'grel): ? ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyer du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'jom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sngon de bzhin
268b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa chen po'i sbyin sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'chang ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i sems can de dag phyag mtshan du bzhes shing bsrung bar zhal gyis bzheS
268b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza''dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang/ gnod
268b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ltung 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang/
268b6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po thams cad la yang sngon gyi thugs dam bzang po las glengs te/ che ge mo la sogs pa
268b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'jom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 
269a1(rgyud 'grel): skabs 'dir lha klu spyan drang ste/ phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba dbang dang ldan/ /thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs bsgam dkyel po che/ /lha dang drang srong gshin rje srin po klu/ /rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs
269a2(rgyud 'grel): gza' rgyu skar bcas/ /de dag so so'i dbang po'i skur ston/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs so 'tshal/ /bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /sa mA dza(rgyud 'grel): de ltar spyan drangs
269a3(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la byin par bsam mo/ /spyan drang ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i rjes la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang/ 'phags pa lha'i snyan dang sbyan rnam par dag pa mnga' ba rnams kyi
269a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol tshig 'das ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' nas gshegs te/ gzhal yas khang gi dbus kyi seng ge'i khri chen po brgyad la de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bzhugs so/ g.yas g.yon gyi gral bstod du 'khor
269a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs/ g.yas g.yon gyi gral smad du tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis bzhugs/ /gdan 'dzom pa'i dbus su pad+ma'i
269a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ skyabs grol gsum gdan 'jom pa la/ sngon gyi thugs dam bskul zhing gsol ba'i phrin las mdzad cing bzhugs par mngon du dmigs shing bsam//
269a7(rgyud 'grel): pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang mchod pa'i tshogs kyang ? bden pa bdar ba'i tshul dang 'dra bar gyur par bsam zhing mos pa bskyed spyan drangs pa'i rjes la/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa la spyir phyag 'tshal zhing mchod nas
269b1(rgyud 'grel): bskul zhing gsol ba/ de nas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i pho brang na 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa bzhugs par mngon du dmigs bzhin du/ mchod yon la sogs pa mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul zhing rol mo bya/ /de nas phyag 'tshal ba
269b2(rgyud 'grel): 'greng phyag bdun 'dun bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhim 'bring byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig dang bcas pa la phyag
269b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang/ zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dpag tu
269b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya
269b5(rgyud 'grel): stong du mas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs dpag tu med pas
269b6(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba dang bcas ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor ba dang
269b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa byang chub sems dpa' i
270a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs grangs med pas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i
270a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed dang/ zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs grangs med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /ston pa bcom
270a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu ra gyur pa dang
270a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje dang/ skyabs grol la sogs pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshings pa dang lha'i dang ?  brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa dam pa chos skyong ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o//
270a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la sogs te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /'phags pa'i chogs de dag thams cad la mchod yon dang byug pa/ me tog dang bdud?
270a6(rgyud 'grel): spos/ zhal zas dang mar me/ rol mo dang sil snyan/ gdugs dang ba ngan la sogs pa dngos su ci 'byor pa 'di dag dang/ phyogs bcu na bdag pos ma bzung pa'i lha dang mi'i rdzas dam pa bde ba'i yod byang phun sum tshogs
270a7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dang/ gzungs dang/ rig pa'i mthu dang/ mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las 'byung ba rgya ? mtsho thams cad kyis nam mkha' i mthas klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings su gtogs
270b1(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ dbul lo mchod do/ /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang/ bdag cag gis thog mas? mchis pa nas 'khor ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mdor na mi bgyi bar rigs pa'i las ni bgyis/ bgyid
270b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bas pa'i las ni ma bgyis pa la sogs pa dang sdig ci mchis pa thams cad yang dag par 'chags so/ /dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dang skye bo'i dge ba mdza' dag gis bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /phyogs bcu'i
270b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul lo/ /'jig rten gyi sgron ma gang dag mya ngan las 'da' ba' i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten gyi don mdzad cing
270b4(rgyud 'grel): yun ring du bzhugs par gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dzom pa chen po dgongs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po rnams kyis slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung
270b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnamS
270b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi don dang/ phan pa'i dang bde ba'i slad du/ sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa rlabs po
270b7(rgyud 'grel): che ji ltar btab cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ don de nyid de ltar bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas ji ltar bka' stsal cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/
271a1(rgyud 'grel): skyabs grol la sogS pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bka' lung yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ so so'i dgongs spyong rgya chen po rdzogs par bskang
271a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i slad du/ mdo sde'i don bsgrub pa'i 'phrin las mdzad par phaT pI bka' ? pI zhal gyis bzhes shing ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ tshangs pa dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
271a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po bcu gnyis la sogs te/ lha'i dge bsnyen chen po thams cad kyis gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mdo sde dang/ /mdo sde 'dzin pa'i sems can bsrung ba dang bskyab par zhal gyis bzhes pa la sogs pa/ sngon 'phags
271a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa de rnams gdan 'dzom par mdzad pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor bshamS
271a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i stobs ci mchis pas mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar nas/ gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mtshan nas brjod de mchod pa 'bul bskul zhing smon lam gsol te bka' drin nod cing mchis na/ gdan 'jom pas sngon ji ltar
271a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du /mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing phan yon ji skad 'byung ba'i bka' drin thams cad che ge mo la sogs pa bdag cag gi 'phral du thob par mdzad du gsol/ /de'i 'og
271a7(rgyud 'grel): tu 'phags pa rnams la re re nas mchod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po
271b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan bdun brjod de ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa phul la smon lam 'di skad ces gdab bo/ /deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs
271b2(rgyud 'grel): par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos te/ yid la dran bzhing lan bdun brjod pa dang/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po
271b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag nad sna tshogS kyiS lus yongs su gzir cing/ rims dang/ gshed byed dang/ byang dang ro langs dang/ 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa de dag
271b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis gnod pa dang/ nad thams cad 'phral du byang zhing gtan du rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rims dang sdig pa can gyi gdon rnams med par gyur cig /rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa
271b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can gang dag long ba dang 'on pa dang/ smyon pa dang/ sha bkra dang/ nad tshabs po ches btab par gyur pa de dag thaM cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dbang po thams cad yongs su tshang bar gyur cig /sdug bsngal dang nad thams cad rgyun
271b6(rgyud 'grel): chad par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gis bsgribs ba/ mtshams med pa lta byed pa/ bya ba ma yin pa'i spyod pa mang ba/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
271b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs byed pa/ ngan song gsum dang/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
272a1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su byang zhing zad par gyur cig /sdud bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyun 'phrul du chad cing bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur cig /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas kyi bar du su yang sems can dmyal ba dang ngan 'gror 'gro
272a2(rgyud 'grel): bar ma gyur cig /lha yul ba'i bde ba dang/ mi'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag dbul por gyur te/ zad dang/ skom dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mal che dang/ spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ yo byang mi
272a3(rgyud 'grel): bde gsal? de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dbyig dang gos dang/ nor dang 'bru dang/ mal cha dang/ spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ yo byad 'phrel bar gyur cig /bdag can la sogs pa'i sems can gang dag bcing ba dang/
272a4(rgyud 'grel): brdeg pa dang/ go rar gzhug pa dang/ mtshon cha'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcing ba dang/ brdeg pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig/ /
272a5(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi gdung ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag mgon med par gyur pa lus la gdung ba'i me 'bar ba dang/ seng ge dang stag dang/ dom dang dred dang/ sprul gdugs pa'i nang du ?
272a6(rgyud 'grel): srog la 'bab cing nyams thag pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lus la gdung bI me thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /seng ge dang/ stag dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ sprul gdug pa de dag kyang byams pa la
272a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag phan tshun thabs rtsod cing 'gyed la/ 'khrugs shing 'jigs skrag nas sdangs pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'thab rtsod dang 'gyed pa
272b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /phan tshun byams pa la gnas par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag du'i nang du son te grur zhugs pa/ gling med par phyin pa/ srog 'dod pa/ chu klung dang/ rgya mtsho'i nang du son te/

283a2(rgyud 'grel): rab? tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa dang/ yang 'di skad du 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
283a3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yid la bya/ gus par gzung zhing dad par bya/ sku gzugs bya/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/
283a4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ mar me rnams kyiS mchod par bya/ yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas la nyin bdun gtsang mar byas te sa phyogs gtsang mar byas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam gang du?  sems can thams cad la byams pa dang/ snying rje ba'i sems su byas nas/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po des dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' 
283a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnams kyang sems bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur/ ?
283a6(rgyud 'grel): ring du 'tsho zhing nad med par 'gyur/ gang bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'thab ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang sdig pa thamS
283b1(rgyud 'grel): cad zad par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes ma thag? tu ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs
283b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyur ro zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa dang/ yang 'di skad du grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i mtshan dang/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
283b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum du sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems kyis me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ gtsang mar byas nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas na/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar
283b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang/ dgra dang/ dgon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus?
283b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi tshe yang de bzhin gshegs paS dgongs par 'gyur/ re ba dang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa dang/ yang 'di skad du 'jam dpal gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
283b6(rgyud 'grel): med mchog dpal de'i mtshan thos te/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod pa dang/ sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dang 'di la mchod pa byed ba de dag gis las kyi ?
283b7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ mya ngan dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du log bar ltung bar 'go bar mi 'gyur/ skye ba dran bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
284a1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan med mchog dpal de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma'i snying po'i steng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa dang/ yang 'di skad

284b7(rgyud 'grel): du mi gnyer ba dang/ sbyin pa la dga' ba dang/ sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod ba dang/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ rim gyis rang gi mgo dang/ yan lag dang/ sha khrag kyang slong ba rnams la rab tu sbyin par 'gyur na/

286b1(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te/ gos dri ma med pa bgo zhing phyogs gtsang mar me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ rang dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs su dri ma dang/
286b2(rgyud 'grel): rtog? pa dang/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang byams pa dang/ btang snyoms dang mnyam ba'i sems su bya/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ sil snyan dang/ glu? dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la bskor ba byas te/ de'i sngon gyi smon lam

286b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dug dang/ g.yangs sa dang/ glang po che gtum bo dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ rkang lag brgya pas 'jigs pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag chogs dang/ rkun bo dang/ chom bo yid 'jigs

287a6(rgyud 'grel): do/ /kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka' ba'o zhes ji skad bka' bstsal ba dang// //tadya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me/ i mi ne mi hi/ ma ti ma ti/ sapta ta thA
287a7(rgyud 'grel): ga tA sa mA d+hya d+hiSh+Thi te/ a te ma te/ pA le pA pa sho d+ha naM/ sarba pA pa na nA sha ya/ ma ma bud+d+he/ bud+d+hot+ta me/ u me ku me/ bud+d+ha/ k+She tra pha ri sho d+ha ni d+ha me ni ra d+ha me/ me ru me ru/ me ru shi kha re/ sarba a kA la mri tyu ni/ b+ha ra Ni/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/

287b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom? ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUrya'i 'od ces bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di gang la la zhig sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bdun ba de dag gi sku gzugs byas te/ me
287b3(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs pas mchod pa byed cing 'chang ngam/? klog gam/ mchod dam/ nyin zhag bdun du gso sbyong yan lag brgyad la gnas te/ gzungs kyi tshig lan stong rtsa brgyad du bton na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgongs par 'gyur/ byang
287b4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' thams cad sems par 'gyur ro/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyang yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur/ lha dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa thams cad dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga la soD
287b5(rgyud 'grel): pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ nang thams cad kyi mi thebs par 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba dang dgra dang/ dgon pa'i gnod pa
