287b7(rgyud 'grel): gda' / ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda' / rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las yo la yang gda' / nam mkha' na dog sar 'gyur/ dog sa ni nam mkhar 'gyur/ chab ni zhugs su 'gyur/ zhugs ni chab tu 'gyur/ bser ma ni zhags pas bzung du
288a1(rgyud 'grel): rung? par 'gyur yang gde'i/ lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa sku dang gsung dang/ thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa la yongs su bdag pa mnga' pa de bzhin
288a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung pa'i tshul bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang/ ston pa bde
288a3(rgyud 'grel): bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams te/ mchod nas smon lam du gsol pa rdo ci thog pa'i nyams kyis dpags te bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing/ bka' stsal pa
288a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ da yang gdan 'dzom pa chen pos cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskangs te/ byin gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi 'phral du thob par mdzad cing stsal du gsol
288a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pa 'gyur ba mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum du bstan du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon? thams?
288a6(rgyud 'grel): cad dang bral sku yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ klu dang/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor? tshugs dang/ cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ ngan song gi 'gro
288a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'jom ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal dus ngan pa'i sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal
288b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs kyis bklags pa/ lam dang sa dman par 'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur pa'i sems can rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ gang thos pa tsam gyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad bla na med
288b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing bas par 'gyur ba dang/ bdud sdig can gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang/ gnod pa dang mi bde ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ 'dod
288b3(rgyud 'grel): dgu'i re ba rdzogs shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mtshan dang sngon gyi lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa la dmigs kyis zhu ba mdzad cing gdan
288b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzom ba'i dbus su 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang/ 'chang pa dang/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang/ yi ger 'dri pa dang/ yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang/
288b5(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam la bris te me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ phring ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla
288b6(rgyud 'grel): bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ /tha na rmi lam du yang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar bsgrags par bgyi'o/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i ras rnams kyis dkris te/ phyogs tsang mar bzhag na gang na mdo sde 'di
288b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ lha rbye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyur/ sus kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus te/ phrogs na yang
289a1(rgyud 'grel): slar 'phrog par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa gsungs shing/ 'phags pa'i bka' yang dag par tshad mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar pa'i pho brang gi dkyil
289a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dir bzhugs te mchod pa bzhes shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa la thugs dam las glengs te bskul ba dang/ mdo sde'i cho ga rdzogs par bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ mdo sde'i phan yon ji skad bka' stsal ba thams
289a3(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab cing stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa skyabs
289a4(rgyud 'grel): grol dus ngan pa'i sems can phongs shing sdug bsngal ba rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ 'di skad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ sems can
289a5(rgyud 'grel): bro nad sna tshogs kyis dus yongs su gzir te/ yun ring po'i bro nang kyis lus kyi sha bas shing/ bkres pa dang/ skom pas gre ba dang/ mchu ni bskams 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/ mdza' bshes dang/ nya du dang/ rmag gi gnyen
289a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams du ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong/ gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni sgor drangs te/ de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing/ mi de dang lhan cig skyes
289a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha slad bzhin du 'brang ba gang lags pa de ni dge ba dang/ mi dge ba bgyis ba de dag thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang/ chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjas de la dris shing brtags nas ? dag
289b1(rgyud 'grel): ? dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba la/ gang dag nad ba de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la skyabs su mchi zhing/ 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i rnam par shes pa
289b2(rgyud 'grel): slar sog? cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du/ bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas mchis te/ yang na ni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig /yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la/ de'i
289b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa slar bzlog cing dran pa rnyed la/ de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du 'gyur te/ srog gi slad du yang sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/ /mchod pa'i sbyor ba ni btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nad
289b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis/ nad pa de'i don du nyin bdun mtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bso sbyong gi sdom pa blang bar bya/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang skom rnams dang/ yo byad thams cad kyis ci
289b5(rgyud 'grel): nus su mchod pa dang rim gro bya/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mtshan yid la bya/ mdo sde 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgur gdon par bya'o/ /zhal
289b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar med bud bar bya'o/ /sku gzugs bdun bya'o/ /sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar mar me bdun bdun bzhag go /mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du bya ste/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar ma mi zad par bya'o/ /chen
289b7(rgyud 'grel): sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la nad kyi gnod pa 'am/ rang ngam pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gnod pa 'am/ rgyu skar ram/
290a1(rgyud 'grel): gza' zla ba 'am/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung ngam/ char dam than pa'i gnod pa yang rung ste/ gnod pa dang/ nang 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par 'gyur na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi'o?
290a2(rgyud 'grel): bo nas dbang bskur ba des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya/ btson du bzung ba rnams btang bar bya zhing gong du smos pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai bUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la de lta bu mchod pa byas na/ rgyal po de'i
290a3(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai bU rya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis/ yul bde ba dang lo legs par gyur/ rlung dang char dus su ldang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/ yul de na gnas pa'i sems
290a4(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyang nad med pa dang/ bde ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /yul der gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtso bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ltas ngan thams cad mthong
290a5(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po de'i tshe dang mdog dang stobs dang/ nad med pa dang/ dbang phyug rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa gsungs shing 'phags pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du/
290a6(rgyud 'grel): deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te/ mchod pa bzhes shing de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa la thugs dam las glengs te bskul ba dang/ mdo sde'i cho ga rdzogs par bskang ba'i phrin
290a7(rgyud 'grel): las mdzad de/ mdo sde'i phan yon ji skad bka' stsal ba thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis 'thob par byin gyis brlabs cing stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag
290b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ ku be ra la sogs pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i lha'i dge snyen thams cad la phyag
290b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /mchod skyabs su mchi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang/ tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ ku be ra la sogs pa dam
290b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos skyong ba lha'i dge bsnyen chen po rnams kyis/ ji ltar sngon gdan 'dzom pa chen po'i spyan sngar/ lha'i tshig bden pas mdong gsol du gsung gtsig kho nar 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon
290b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mngon sum du mthong ste/ mchod pa bgyis so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag spyod pa der bdag
290b5(rgyud 'grel): cag g.yog 'khor dang bcas te mchi bar bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ mchod pa bgyid pa dang/ yi ger 'drir stsol ba der bdag cag mthun par lhan cig tu mchis te/ rigs kyi buAm/ rigs?
290b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dang/ 'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi/ grong dang grong khyer dang/ phyogs kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ 'chi ba dang/ dgra dang gzod?
290b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ sems can thams cad la byas pa gzo ba lags te/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/
291a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ ji ltar bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub pa dang/ sems dang lus bde zhing longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug dang/ nor dang/ 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyi/ thams cad du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bcoM
291a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das bdag cag gis rang gi bro bor ba dang ni? bcas pa 'di dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des rjes su dran bar bgyi'o/ /tadya thA/ a g+hu/ ma g+hu/ ta ra g+hu/ ma ma g+hu/ g+hu re/ ha hu he/ mra mra mra mra/ dzu dzu re dzu re swAhA/ gang la la zhig de bzhin
291a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams dang/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ yi ger 'bri ba dang/ yi ger 'brir stsol ba dang/ rab tu gus par mchod par bgyid pa de dag ngan song gsum du mi mtsho bar rig par bgyi ste/ de bla
291a4(rgyud 'grel): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur/ ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyang
291a5(rgyud 'grel): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs shing zhal gyis bzhes pa dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces/ gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi don du bdag gi gzugs kyi gsang sngags
291a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzhi rnams rab tu bstsal bar bgyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tadya thA/ oM badzre badzre//
291a7(rgyud 'grel): mahA badzre/ badzra pA sha d+ha ri ni/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man+ta a pra ti ha ta badzre/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha man+tu/ sarba bya d+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karma Ni/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ga bA na badzra pA Ni/ sarba a shaM me pa ri pU ra ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das
291b1(rgyud 'grel): gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskad bar bgyi/ don thams cad kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o//
291b2(rgyud 'grel): gal te des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'khrir stsal bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun yang bgyi/ rdo rje 'dzin yang sku gdung dang bcas par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yang
291b3(rgyud 'grel): ji skad gong du smos pa bzhin du sdos dang bdug pa dang mar me dang/ phreng ba dang/ rgyan dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ sil snyan dang/ pheg rdob ba rnams kyis mchod de bskor bar bgyi/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang gdon par bgyi/
291b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la yang lan pa'i sems dang/ byams pa'i sems su bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas te lan gsum khrus bgyi zhing gos lan gsum brje bar bgyi/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te
291b5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba phyi ma'i bco lnga'i nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na de la bdag gis rmi lam du mthong ba stsal bar bgyi/ 'bel ba'i bka' mchid kyang bgyi/ re ba thams cad kyang yongs su bskang par bgyi'o/ /zhes 'da?
291b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bka' mi 'gyur ba tshad mang gyur par zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs shing mchod pa bzhes te/ gdan 'dzom pas mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bka' 
291b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo
292a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gsungs rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang/ sgo thams cad nas chos spyod pa rnams la bar chad dang bgegs su gyur pa bdud kyi phyogs thams cad dang/ yul phyogs su mi nad dang phyugs nad gtong
292a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ than pa dang sad dang ser ba la sogs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid pa dang/ gnod pa dang mtshan ma ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa mang po ston cing/ sems can la sdang bar sems pa'i gdon bgegs kyi rigs tha dad pa yul
292a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'di na rgyu zhing gnas ba ci mchis pa thams cad dang/ che ge mo la sngon gyi las kyis gdas pa 'am/ 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa 'am/ yul phyogs dang pha tshan dang rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang/
292a4(rgyud 'grel): srog dang/ chu srid dang/ dbang phyug dang/ 'khor dang/ yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci mchis pa thams cad gang la gang 'tsham pa'i thabs kyis gdul zhing 'khon dang gnod pa'i
292a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa 'dor du stsal te zhi ba dang dge ba dang byams pa'i bsam pa can du bsgyur zhing/ sngon chad bkra mi shis pa dang gnod pa'i sbyor ba bgyis pa rnams kyang 'jig cing mdor du stsal/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid ?
292a6(rgyud 'grel): so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos bsgag cing gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig chen po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol/ mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i lha'i dge bsnyen dam pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis po la 'di lta ste/ gnas
292a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod skyabs su

292b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon gdan 'dzom pa chen po'i spyan sdar? lha'i ngag bden pas gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la yid dang
292b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gror 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phang?
292b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ bde ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o/ /bye brag tu ni grong dam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 
293a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ rim gro byed pa'i sems can de dag la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su
293a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /zhes 'phags pa'i ngag brtags pas zhal gyis bzhes shing thugs dam du glengs te/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang gi phyir khyed de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la byas pa gzo
293a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing rjes su dran la/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa legs so legs so zhes rjes su gnang ba de bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar pa'i pho brang gis dkyil 'khor 'dir dul zhing zhi ba'i sems dang ldan par byams
293a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang thugs rtse bas mchod pa bzhes shing mdo sde'i cho? ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/ phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab du gsol/ lhag par yang de
293a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo la sogs pa/ gsung rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang/ sgo thams cad nas chos spyod pa rnams la bar chad dang bgegs su gyur pa bdud kyang?
293a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs thams cad dang/ yul phyogs su mi nad phyug nad gtong ba dang/ than pa dang sang ser la sogs pas ma rung bar bgyid pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ mtshan ma ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shes pa mang po ston cing/ sems can la sngar pad+ma sems
293a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bden bgegs rigs tha dad pa mang po khams dang yul phyogs 'dir rgyu ba mchi so 'tshal dang/ che ge mo la sngon gyi las kyis gdas pa dang/ 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa dang/ yul phyogs dang/ pha mtshan dang/ rigs
293b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang/ srog dang/ chab srid dang/ dbang phyug 'khor dang/ yo byang la sogs gang yang rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci mchis pa thams cad gang la
293b2(rgyud 'grel): mtsham pa'i thabs kyis gdul zhing 'khon dang gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal ta/ zhi ba dang dge ba dang byams pa'i bsam pa can du bgyi zhing sngan chad bkra mi shis pa dang/ gnod pa'i sbyor pa ngan pa ci bgyis pa rnams kyang 'jig
293b3(rgyud 'grel): cing 'dor du stsal/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos dag gcing/ gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig chen po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol/ re re nas mchod pa 'bul zhing smon
293b4(rgyud 'grel): lam gdab pa rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir/ gzungs kyi snying po legs shig tu phyung ba lan bdun yan chad bzhi bcu rtsa dgu man chad ci nus su bklag /ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
293b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mdzad pa snga ma bzhin du byas te/ mdor bsdus pa'i gsol ba 'di skad gdab bo/ /ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa?
293b6(rgyud 'grel): can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtsir pa/ phongs par gyur pa thams cad rjes su bzung zhing/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i
293b7(rgyud 'grel): smad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa byin gyis brlabs shing dpal gyi mgur nas yang dag par gsungs nas/ phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa rgyas par bka' 
294a1(rgyud 'grel): bstsal pa 'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar lhung yang gda' / ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda' / rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las yol yang gda' / nam mkha' ni dog sar 'gyur/ dog sa ni nam mkhar 'gyur/
294a2(rgyud 'grel): chab? ni zhugs su 'gyur/ zhugs ni chab tu 'gyur/ bser ma ni zhags pas bzung du rung yang gda' i/ lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ sku dang/ gsung dang
294a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa la yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs
294a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang/ ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor ba bshams te/ mchod nas smon lam gsol ba rdo ci thog pa'i
294a5(rgyud 'grel): nyams kyis dpags te/ bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig /sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ nga yang gdan 'dzom pa chen pos cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskangs te/ byin gyis brlabs cing phan yon ji skad
294a6(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis 'phral du mdzad cing stsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag ba tshang mar gyur pa/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum
294a7(rgyud 'grel): du bstan du gsol /'phags pa rnams la so sor re re nas mchod pa phul zhing smon lam btab pa dang/ gzungs kyi snying po bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i 'og tu/ sbyir mchod pa dbul zhing bsod nams dmigs kyis bsngo ba'i
294b1(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gda' ba/ 'phags pa gdan 'jom pa stir? mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas ba'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor
294b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa ma kham pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi
294b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos sgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos
294b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po dang/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod
294b5(rgyud 'grel): cing 'phags pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang/ 'ka' lung dang mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang/ gzhan yang 'phags pa de dag gi spyan sngar deng 'dir sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba phul ba dang bskul zhing gsol ba btab
294b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang/ 'phags pa de dag gi mthu dpal dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ lha sras kyi zhal snga nas kyi thog ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i dngos sdig dang/ sgrib pe ci mnga' ba thams cad
294b7(rgyud 'grel): zhu byang bar gyur cig /sku la bsnyun mi mnga' zhing sku tshe dpag tu med pa ring ba dang/ dbu rmog brtsan pa dang/ /chab srid 'byam par rgya che zhing/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyed par gyur cig /mthar yang
295a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs ba'i g.yung drung gi sku chos kyi rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phangs brnyes par gyur cig /chab 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams cad kyang phyi nang gnod pa thams cad rab
295a2(rgyud 'grel): tu zhi zhing bde zhing skyid pa dang/ 'phral yun du legs pa'i chos bzang po la gnas par gyur cig /mnga' ris kyi yul khams thams cad du yang mi nang dang/ phyugs nang dang/ lo nyes dang dgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang/ bkra mi
295a3(rgyud 'grel): shis pa'i bag ci yang mi 'byung ba dang/ char chu dus su bab ste/ lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang/ bde skyed kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing/ sgo thams cad nas dar zhing rgyas par gyur
295a4(rgyud 'grel): cig/ sgo'i bsod nams bgyid pa la ni 'jug gi sngo bas so so nas ji ltar dad pa bzhin du bris te 'debs su stsal lo/ /smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'og tu/ gyes khar bzod pa gsol zhing slar gshegs par gnas par bgyi ba/ bcom
295a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang
295a6(rgyud 'grel): dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par
295a7(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'jom ba spyen drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag bcal zhing mchod pa dang/ mdo dang
295b1(rgyud 'grel): mthun par smon lam gsor ba dang/ cha ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan ba'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag par gyur bsam 'tshal ba dang/ bag ma mchis pa la sogs pa'i
295b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang/ mchod pa'i dngos po chungs shing ngan la gtsang sbras ma phyed pa dang/ mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa la sogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs
295b3(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na/ thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod par bzhes shing/ 'phral yun gnyis su bdag cag la sgrib pa dang/ gnod par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab
295b4(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang de dang ma dgung 'di'i bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba phongs shing nyam thag ba'i sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing bka' stsal ba yang/ da dung yang bdag cag la thugs
295b5(rgyud 'grel): brtsebs yang dang yang du gdan 'dzoM? bar mdzad par dgongs shing/ /so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i don la gshegs su gsol/ mjug 'dir sngo ba'i tshigs bcad kyang bklag go /rdzogs so// /
295b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dam ba'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po lha sras khri srong lde'u btsan gyi sku tshe bsring ba dang/ dbu rmog btsan pa dang/ chab srid mtho ba dang/ las sgrib sbyang ba dang/ tshogs gnyis spel ba'i ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ?
295b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde'i man ngag /slob dpon bo d+hi satwas mdzad pa// //*/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i gzungs bklag
296a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga mdo sde las bsdus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ lus legs par bkrus la gos bzang po dri ma med pa bgo zhing/ kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya/ sems
296a2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i dri ma med par bya ste/ dkon mchog gi yon tan dang mdo sde'i phan yon la yid ches shing dang pa dang gus pa bskyed/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/ khyim pa yin na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims bzung/ dus bzang po chos
296a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad lta bu la btsam/ gnas yid du 'ong ba gtsang mar byas la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mang pos legs par brgyan pa'i nang du sbos kyi maN+Dal chen po byas la/ tshon phye 'am me tog gis dgram par bya'o/ /lugs sku 'am bas
296a4(rgyud 'grel): bris sam 'jim ba las byas pa yang rung ste/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa bya/ 'khor 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gdan yang bsham/ mchod pa ci 'byor pa yang bsham ste/ sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar mar me/
296a5(rgyud 'grel): bdun bdun dang/ tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bdun bdun bzhag /gzhan yang sbos dang/ me tog dang/ dri dang/ lha bshos dang/ rol mo'i bye brag dang/ rin po che sna bdun dang/ bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad dang/ bum pa la sogs
296a6(rgyud 'grel): sta gon bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la la sogs mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba gzhan yang ci nus kyis bklag /gzungs kyi cho ga 'di zhag bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bzhi bcu rtsa dgu snyed du brlag par bya'o//
296a7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mchod pa bshams pa dang/ dge 'dun tshogs nas snyan bde ba la 'dug nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ci nus su bsgom/ de nas langs nas sems can thams cad kyi don du tshad med pa bzhi sgom zhing byang chub kyi sems yid la bya/
296b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rang gi nus pa dang/ phyogs bzhu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pas de ltar byin gyis brlabs par yang bsam/ de nas gnas byin gyis brlab pa ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 
296b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thad chen po dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa'i
296b3(rgyud 'grel): mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang/ 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'jom pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams ji ltar sangs rgyas dang/
296b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam byed par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang
296b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam pa tha gru che ba/ yangs? pa rog na 'jam zhing bde ba dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bsung dang ldan pa/ lta'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa/ mdza' rin po che'i pha gus brtsags
296b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gser dang dngul dang mu tig gi phye ma gram bur gdal ba/ utpal dang/ ku mu rta dang/ pad+ma 'gyid zhing ldem pas khebs par gyur cing/ chu bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa sgrogs pa/ dga' zhing 'phyo ba lding bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang
296b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan ba'i mtsho dang/ rdzing dang/ ltar ka dag gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa lta'i nor bu dang/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang/ rin po che sbyangs pa me tog gi mgo lcogs dang 'bras bu mdzes par chags pas g.yur ba 
297a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing ldem pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha 'brol ba las dam pa'i chos kyi sgra 'byung ba dang ldan pa tshar du sbreng ? pas legs par brgyan pa'i sa gzhi la/ gzhal med khang chen po rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar pa bkod
297a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba mdza' yas pa rnam par gnas pa/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das ?
297a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul? 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun dang ldan pa/ lha dang//
297a4(rgyud 'grel): klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa mdza' yas pa rnam par rgyu ba/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba chen pos brtan pa/ sems can
297a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi don thams cad yang dag par thob par byed pa nye bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams cad yongs su spongs pa/ thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
297a6(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa'i gnas/ dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi bzhon pa yin pa/ nam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa nyid dang/ smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po
297a7(rgyud 'grel): che'i pad+ma'i rgyal po yon tan mdza' yas pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten pa'i gzhal med khang chen por gyur pa'i dbus su/ pad+ma'i gdan rin po che'i seng ge'i khri'i stan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags
297b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya
297b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan med? mchog dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rtsam bar rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang/
297b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom pa'i bzhugs gnas/ 'phags pa so so'i smon lam khyad par can dang/
297b4(rgyud 'grel): mnga' thad dang 'tsham par grub pa/ mdzes pa sha stag 'byung bar gyur cig /phyi nang kun tu yang cha rigs dang 'tsham par yang lha dang mi'i yo byad dam pa zhal zas dang/ na bza' dang rgyan dang/ rol mo la sogs pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs
297b5(rgyud 'grel): phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang/ bzang po spyod ba'i smon lam las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /'phags pa thams cad kyang gdan 'joms nas de bzhin du byin gyis
297b6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig /ces lan gsum bzlas la/ yang dkon 'chog gsum gyi bden pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs
297b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /ces lan gsum bzlas/ mchod pa'i tshogs byin gyis brlab pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drangs te/ pus mo btsugs
298a1(rgyud 'grel): te me tog blangs/ thal mo sgyar nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs sgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu
298a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang di med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs
298a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po dang/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das sha' kya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu dus gsum du bzhugs
298a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad bdag cag la dgongs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis slad ma'i dus
298a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtsem? pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams
298a6(rgyud 'grel): cad rjes su bzung zhing/ lha dang/ mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa bde? ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bzang zhing rlabs che ba/ mthu dang byin gyis brlabs
298a7(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu ma mchis pa mnga' ba la brten te che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyabs pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir
298b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs shing/ gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de phyin gyis brlabs par ci gnang/ da ltar bdag cag gis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gdul bya'i dbang du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten
298b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi ? gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang/ sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can las glengs te/ bdag cag rnams mnga' ris kyi gdul
298b3(rgyud 'grel): bya phyag mtshan du bzhes pa'i nang du gtogs te/ bka' drin thob pa'i 'phro mchis pa tsam la brten te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po skyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi
298b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'dir/ gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlabs par ci gnang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ rgyal ba'i sras po skyabs grol dang/ phyag na rdo rje?
298b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo bka' stsal pa'i tshe gdan 'dzom par 'dus te/ mdo'i don byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pa
298b6(rgyud 'grel): bka' sgrub par thugs bskyed pa de dag kyang/ che ge mo la sogs pa gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na yang/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shes
298b7(rgyud 'grel): gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa chen pos bkas gtad cing so so nas kyang lha'i tshig bden pas gdod bsol du zhal gyis bzhes te/ dam pa'i chos dang/ 'khor rnam
299a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi skyong bar mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon laM gyi khyad par rgyas ba'i mdo sde 'di yang lhag par phyag mtshan du bzhes pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor
299a2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ rnam thos kyi sras la sogs ba 'phags ba chos skyong ba thams cad kyang/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro pa mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis
299a3(rgyud 'grel): na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam
299a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'chang pa dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa'i sems can de dag phyag mtshan du bzhes shing bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin
299a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza''dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
299a6(rgyud 'grel): po btung 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo pa 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
299a7(rgyud 'grel): po thams cad la yang sngon gyi thugs dam bzang po las glengs te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du sbyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor
299b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang/ skabs 'dir spyan drang ba'i tshigs bcad bklag /spyan drang ba'i rjes la/ so so'i zhing khams nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs te/ gzhal med khang gi
299b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su seng ge'i khri chen po brgyad la de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bzhugs/ chos bo ti yang bzhugs/ bar gyi snam bu la byang chub sems dpa' gleng gzhi las byung ba 'am/ yang na byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dpag tu med pa bzhugs pa'i
299b3(rgyud 'grel): gdan bsham/ de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang/ skyabs grol dang/ phyag na rdo rje gsum gdan 'jom pa la sngon gyi thugs dam bskul zhing phrin las mdzad cing bzhugs par bsam/ gsum pa la g.yon grol du gnod sbyin gyi sde
299b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyi gdan bsham/ g.yas gral du tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin gyi gdan bsham/ sgo bzhi la rgyal po chen po bzhin gi dam bcas ba bzhin sgrub cing bzhugs par bsam/ mchod pa dang dkyil 'khor sngar bden pa bdar ba'i tshul
299b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra bar mos par bya'o/ /de ltar bsam pa'i rjes la spyir phyag 'tshal zhing mchod de/ mchod yon la sogs pa ci 'byor bso/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabS
299b6(rgyud 'grel): su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zham 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dpag tu med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang bcaS
299b7(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skabs su mchi'o/ /de gzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs du mas
300a1(rgyud 'grel): kun nas bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub sems dpa' i bye ba khrag
300a2(rgyud 'grel): khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang
300a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor du mas kun nas bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su

300a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su
300a7(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ skyabs grol dang/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi

300b3(rgyud 'grel): ? pa bde ba'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ gzungs dang rig pa'i mthu dang mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las byung ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyis nam mkha' i khams kyi mthas klas
300b4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'bul lo mchod do/ /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang/ bdag cag gis thog ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mdor na mi bgyi bar rigs pa'i las ni bgyis
300b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis? 'os pa'i las ma bgyis pa la sogs pa'i dngos sdig ci mchis pa thams cad yang dag par 'chags so/ /dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dang/ so so'i skye bo'i dge ba mdza' dag gi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /phyogs bcu'i
300b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul lo/ /'jig rten gyi sgron ma gad dag mya ngan las bzla ba'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten gyi don mdzad cing yun du?
300b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'ds gdan 'jom pa chen po dgongs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na sems 
301a1(rgyud 'grel): can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs la/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du
301a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa rlabs po che ji ltar brlab cing/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ don de nyid da
301a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas ji ltar bka' stsal cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang/ skyabs grol dang/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
301a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' lung yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang/ so so'i dgongs spyod rgya chen po rdzogs par bskang pa'i slad du mdo sde'i don bsgrub pa'i phrin las mdzad par 'phags pa'i bka' btags pas
301a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyis bzhes shing/ ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la sogs te/ dam pa'i chos skyong pa'i dge bsnyen chen po thamS
301a6(rgyud 'grel): cad gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mdo sde 'dzin pa'i sems can bsrung ba dang/ bskyabs par ji ltar zhal gyis bzhes pa la sogs pa/ sngon 'phags pa rnams kyis ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde las 'gyur?
301a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa/ de rnams gdan 'dzom pa mdzad pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor bshams/ 'byor ba'i stobs ci mchis pas mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar nas gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan
301b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan mtshan nas? brjod de/ mchod pa 'bul/ bka' drin nod cing mchis na/ gdan 'dzom pas sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing phan yon ji skad 'byung ba'i bka' drin thams cad che ge mo
301b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bdag cag gis 'phral du thob par stsal par ci gnang/ de'i 'og tu 'phags pa rnams la re re nas mchod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i

301b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan bdun bzlas la/ skabs 'dir mchad pa dbul/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos te/ yid la dran zhing lan bdun ?
301b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag nang sna? tshogs?

301b7(rgyud 'grel): dang sdig pa can gyi gdon dang/ nad thams cad med par gyur cig /rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag long ba dang/ 'on pa dang/ smyon pa dang/ sha bkra dang/ nad tshabs chen pos btab par gyur pa de dag byang chub

303a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgyal po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par nod/ thugs mnyes par byed cing skad cig skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'jug par 'gyur cig/

303a5(rgyud 'grel): can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag zhing las kyi las kyi mdza' dang/ tshong la dga' ste g.yeng ba sna tshogs mang pas dge pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa
303a6(rgyud 'grel): las yongs su nyams te/ 'khor ba naS 'khyam zhing so sor 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ rgung ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi 'di ba dang
303a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug pa sna tshogs so sor myong ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ bza' ba dang/ bgo ba dang/ btung ba dang/ longs spyod dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ dbyig dang gser rnams 'byung zhing/
303b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar gyur cig /byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /ngan song dang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams
303b2(rgyud 'grel): cad ? yongs su thar bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can gang dag grang pa dang/ tsha ba dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom pas lus yongs su gdung zhing/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyam thag pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi las sgribs
303b3(rgyud 'grel): bde dag thams cad yongs su byang bar gyur cig /skye ba de yang tha ma bar gyur cig /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig /bud med
303b4(rgyud 'grel): gang dag nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzing? cing bud med kyi skye gnas la smod pa dang/ sems can gang dag btsa'? ba'i dus gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshar ba myong ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyan chad par gyur cig /skyed de dag yang
303b5(rgyud 'grel): thams? gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa nyid thob par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag 'chi ba dang/ dgra dang dgon pa'i gnod pas gtses pa dang/ phan tshun pham dang/ sring mo dang mdza' ?
303b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ nyi du'i mya ngan myong zhing sdug bsngal pa dang/ mya ngan gyi zug rdu lus la zug pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'chi ba dang/ dgra dang dgon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /mya ngan dang/ sdug
303b7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal dang bral bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag mtshan mo mun pa mun nag na rnam par rgyu ba las kyi mdza' rnam pa sna tshogs la zhugs pa/ sdig pa can gyi gdon sna tshogs kyis gtsos pa/ 'jigs pa dang
304a1(rgyud 'grel): smre sngags 'don pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du mun pa mun nag thams cad med par gyur cig /sdig pa can gyi gdon thams cad las thar bar gyur cig /mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba sna tshogs
304a2(rgyud 'grel): la mngon par brtson par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing/ shes rab chung la dran pa rmongs te/ dge ba'i chos rnams dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs
304a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgo rnams dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du ting 'dzin dang/ dran pa dang stobs dang gzungs kyi sgo dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
304a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon du gyur cig /shes rab chen po rjes su rgyu bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'dod pa bskyed de/ de la gnas shing bla na med
304a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rgyab kyi phyogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi par du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig /nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyis
304a6(rgyud 'grel): las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig /byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po zad pa'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling kun du 'bar bas 'khrugs
304a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur te du zhing mya ngan byed la sngon mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal 'byung zhing skyabs med/ mgon med pa de dag thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang/ mya ngan dang bral bar gyur cig /bsil ba'i dngos po thob par gyur cig /'di nas
304b1(rgyud 'grel): shi 'phos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang/ zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu rgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar gyur
304b2(rgyud 'grel): cig/ skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i yon tan sna tshogs mngon du gyur te/ ston pa bla na med pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas la gzi brjid kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs

304b4(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo mchod ? skyabs su mchi'o/ zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ dang rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom
304b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i mtshan yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod pa dang/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med

304b7(rgyud 'grel): tshe thung zhing nad mang pa dang/ chu dang/ dug dang/ mtshon dang/ me dang/ nad sna tshogs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su byang ste/ /tshe ring bar gyur cing/ /nad med par gyur cig du sa ma yin par 'chi ba'i
