308b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i
309a1(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu lus legs par brgyan par gyur te/ bdag ci 'dra ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig /lus kyi 'od zer kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dpag gis mi
309a2(rgyud 'grel): lang ba lha me/ lha ne/ lha nger gyur cig /lus nor bu rin po che bai DUrya ci 'dra bde 'dra? bar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa dang/ dri ma med la 'od gsal ba dang/ kho lag yangs shing gsal ba dang/ dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang/ legs
309a3(rgyud 'grel): bar gnas pa dang/ nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs par brgyan par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi
309a4(rgyud 'grel): bar du skyes pa dag dang/ gang dag yang mi'i 'jig rten 'di na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na/ phyogs tha dad par 'gro ba de dag bdag gi 'ong kyi phyogs dga' mgur 'gro zhing las rnams byed par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
309a5(rgyud 'grel): sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od de'i shes rab dang thabs dpag tu med pas/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gyi khams dpag gi mi lang ba dag /longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang ldan par gyur te/ su yang cis kyang brel ba med bang
309a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag lam ngan par zhugs pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de dag thams cad theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i lam la zhugs par gyur cig /bdag
309a7(rgyud 'grel): cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du sdom pa gsum gyi bsams? pa dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa med par gyur cig /su yang tshul khrims log par zhugs te/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur
309b1(rgyud 'grel): cig ? bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag lus ngan pa dang/ dbang po ma tshang ba dang/ mdog mi sdug pa dang/ bems po dang/ yan lag skyon can dang/ sgur po dang/ sha bkra can dang/ zhar ba dang/ long ba dang/ 'on pa dang/ smyon pa dang/
309b2(rgyud 'grel): lug la nad kyis btab pa de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas/ thams cad dbang po tshang zhing yan lag yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /sems can gang dag nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med pa/ 'tshog
309b3(rgyud 'grel): ches dang sman mi bdog pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ dbul ba/ sdug bsngal ba de dag gi nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du nad med cing gnod pa med pa dang/ yo byad phun sum tshogs par gnas par gyur cig /
309b4(rgyud 'grel): bud med gang dag bud med kyi slon? brgya ngag gis kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa bud med kyi dngos po la mi dga' ba bud med kyi skye gnas las thar bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad bud med kyi dngos po las log par gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar
309b5(rgyud 'grel): thub? gi? bar du skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan? par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad bdud kyi zhags pa las yongs su thar par gyur cig /lta ba tha dad pa mi mthun pa zing zing bas mi mthun pa dag spangs te yang dag par lta ba
309b6(rgyud 'grel): ? gnas par gyur cig /byang chub kyi spyad pa rlabs po che rdzogs par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can su dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang/ gang dag bcing ba dang/ brdeg pa dang/ go rar gzhugs pa dang/ bsad
309b7(rgyud 'grel): ? 'os pa rgyu du mas kun tu gcos pa/ nga rgyal dang bral ba/ lus dang ngag dang/ sems sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyis mthus/ gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa
310a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can gang dag bkres pa dang/ skom pa'i me rab tu 'bar ba/ kha zas tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa/ sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag gi kha dog dang/ dri dang/ ror? ldan pa'i bza' btung gis tshim par byas te/
310a2(rgyud 'grel): phyis chos kyis ros shin tu bde ba la 'god par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag sgren mo bgo ba med pa dbul ba sdug bsngal ba grang ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ sbrang bu dang/ /sha sprang dag gis nyin mtshan du sdug
310a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag gis/ gos yong su spyad par 'os pa tshon sna tshogs su kha sgyur ba dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ spud pa dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ sil snyan dang/ pheg rdob pa rnams kyis
310a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims kyi dga' ba dang ldan par gyur cig /nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas mi rdzi bar rnam par grol pa'i bde ba la gnas par gyur
310a5(rgyud 'grel): cig /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgya kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye zhing skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang? ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yon tan gyi chog?
310a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mngon du gyur te/ /ston pa bla na med pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyiS rgyal po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par nod/ thugs mnyes par byed cing/ skad cig skad cig la?
310a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'jug par gyur cig/ //ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas dpal
310b1(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi 'o/ /zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa dbul/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan yid la dran zhing
310b2(rgyud 'grel): lan bdun brjod de/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can gang dag las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna
310b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis gzir? ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa/ thams cad rjes su bzung zhing/ lha dang mi'i don dang/ sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang/
310b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa byin gyis brlabs shing/ dpal gyi mgur nas 'di skad du 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ yon tan thams cad don du gnyer ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres par de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mtshan
310b5(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar bya/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du yid la bya/ gus pas dad par bya/ sku gzugs kyang bya/ me tog dang bdug pa dang/ mar me dang/ byug pa dang/ zhal zas dang/ rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas mchod par bya/ /
310b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bya/ nyin bdun gtsang mar byas te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam gdab par bya/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang?
310b7(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i sems su bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ /gzhan yang/ tadya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me yi me mi ni hi/ ma ti ma ti/ sapta ta thA ga ta/ sa mA d+hiSh+Thi te/ a te ma te/ bA le pA pa ma sho d+ha ni/ sarbba pA paM nA sha ya/ ma ma bud+d+ha bud+d+ho? ta me/
311a1(rgyud 'grel): u me ku me/ bud d+ha k+She tra pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+ha me mni d+ha me/ me ru me ru/ me ru shi kha re/ sarbba a kA la mritya/ nI bA ra ni/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ bud+d+he a d+hiSh+Thi te na/ rak+Sha na tu me/ sarba de bA/ sa me a sa me/ sa ma nwA? ha ra na tu me/ sarba bud+d+ha po d+hi
311a2(rgyud 'grel): satwA/ sha me sha me/ pra sha man+tu me/ sarba i tyu pa dra ba byA d+hA ya(rgyud 'grel): pU tra Ni pU ra Ni pU ra ya me/ sarbba A sha yA bai DUrya pra ti b+hA se/ sarbba pA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA/ bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'di 'chang ngam/ kleg
311a3(rgyud 'grel): gam/ mchod dam/ lan stong rtsa brgyad du bton na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems par 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur/ lha thamS
311a4(rgyud 'grel): cad dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis yongs su skyong bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyis mi btab par 'gyur/ ring du
311a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho bar 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jig pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang/ dgra dang/ dgon pa'i gnod pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyis ?
311a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ ci bsam pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa de dag thams cad che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du mdo las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang/ ston pa bde bar gshegs
311a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams gdan 'dzom? pa'i spyan sngar mchod cing smon lam gsol ba dang/ gzungs sngags bzlas pas ji ltar byin gyis brlab shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du byin gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa?
311b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad gyis 'phral du thob par mdzad cing stsal bar ci gnad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pa/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' bde bdag cag la bden pa mngon sum du bstan par cig nang/ /ma rig mun sel sgron ma
311b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog /sdug bsngal nad sel sman gyi phul/ /dam chos dkon mchog thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan bdun bzlas par 'dir chos la bstod pa dang/ mchod pa bya/ dam pa'i chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi
311b3(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis bdag cag tshe rabs nas tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos 'dzin par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/
311b4(rgyud 'grel): sku yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyi brgyan pa/ zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang/ klu dang rigs sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang/ cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal
311b5(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /mchod do/ skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod bci 'byor pa dbul/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal dus ngan pa'i sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis ?
311b6(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ lam dang sa dman par 'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ gang thos pa tsam gyis ci nas kyang?
311b7(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ sdig pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing dag par 'gyur ba dang/ bdud sdig can gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang/ gnod pa dang mi bde ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
312a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ 'dod dgu'i re ba thams cad dang/ bsams pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mtshan dang/ sngon gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde ston pa'i bcom
312a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la dmigs kyis zhu ba mdzad cing/ gdan 'dzom pa'i dbus su 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ gang dag mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang/
312a3(rgyud 'grel): yi ger 'dri pa dang/ 'brir stsol ba dang/ glegs bam la bris te/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de da la bdag gis
312a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrag par bya'o/ /tha na rmi lam du yang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan? rna lam du nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i ras kyis dkris te/ phyogs gtsang mar bzhag
312a5(rgyud 'grel): na gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sus kyang mdangs 'phrogs par
312a6(rgyud 'grel): mi nus te phrogs na yang slar? phrod? par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa gsungs shing/ 'phags pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshar mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir
312a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te/ mchod pa bzhes shing de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom? pa la thugs dam las glengs te bskul pa dang/ mdo sde'i cho ga rdzogs par bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ mdo sde'i phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad
312b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis 'phral du 'thob par byin gyis brlab cing stsal bar cig nang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa skyabs grol la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan bdun bzlas/
312b2(rgyud 'grel): slabs? 'dir mchod bci 'byor pa dbul/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa skyabs grol/ dus ngan pa'i sems can phongs shing sdug bsngal ba rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ 'di skad du btsun pa bcom
312b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir te/ yun ring por bro nad kyis lus kyi sha bas shing bkres pa dang skom pas gre ba dang mchu ni bskams 'gum ba la ni mngon du phyogs/ /mdza' bshes dang nye
312b4(rgyud 'grel): du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams du pa rnams kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong/ gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/ de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing/ mi de dang lhan cig skyes
312b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang lags pa des/ dge ba 'am mi dge ba bgyis pa de dag thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang/ chos kyi rgyal po gshi ni rjes de la drs shing brtags nas dge ba 'am mi dge ba'i? lnga
312b6(rgyud 'grel): bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba la/ gang dag nad pa de'i don du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la skyabs su mchi zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyid na de'i rnam par shes pa slar sdog cing/ rmi lam rmis?
312b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bdag nyid kyang 'tshal ba'i gnas der mchis te/ yang na dni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig/ yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing/ dran pa
313a1(rgyud 'grel): rnyed la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis mngon sum du gyur te/ srog gi lan du yang sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/ /mchod pa'i sbyor ba ni btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nang las yongs su thar par 'dod pa de dag gis nad pa de'i
313a2(rgyud 'grel): don du nyin bdun mtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong gi sdom pa blang bar bya/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang skam rnams dang/ yo byad thams cad kyis ci nus su mchod pa dang ni? ma gro bya/ nyin
313a3(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DU rya'i 'od de'i mtshan yid la bya/ mdo sde 'di yang lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgur gdon par bya'o/ /zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud bar bya'o/ /sku gzugs bdun bya'o/ /sku gzugs re
313a4(rgyud 'grel): re'i spyan sngar mar me bdun bdun bzhag /mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du byas te/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo
313a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la nang kyi gnod pa dang/ rang ngam pha rol gyi dnag tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/ rgyu skar ram/ gza' zla ba 'am/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung ngam/ char ram/
313a6(rgyud 'grel): than pa'i gnod pa 'ang rung/ gnod pa dang nad 'go ba 'am 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba nges sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya/ btson du bzung ba rnams btang ?
313a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing gong du smos pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DU rya'i 'od la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas na/ rgyal po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DU rya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis yul bde ba dang/
313b1(rgyud 'grel): lo legs pa dang/ chang chu dus su ldan zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ nad med pa dang/ bde ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang yul der gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za ma
313b2(rgyud 'grel): rungs pas sems can rnams la gtso bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ltas ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po de'i tshe dang mdog dang stobs dang/ dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa bka' stsal pa gsungs
313b3(rgyud 'grel): shing 'phags pa'i bka' yang dag par tshad mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes bzhin du deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te/ mchod pa bzhes shing de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa la thugs dam
313b4(rgyud 'grel): las glengs te/ bskul ba dang/ mdo sde'i cho ga rdzogs par bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ mdo sde 'di las phan yon ji skad bka' stsal ba thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab cing stsal bar cig nas
313b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ ku be ra la
313b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i lha'i dge bsnyen thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang/ tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po
313b7(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ ku be ra la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i lha'i dge bsnyen chen po rnams kyis ji ltar sngon gdan 'dzom pa chen po spyan sngar/ lha'i tshig
314a1(rgyud 'grel): bden par mdong gsol du gsung cig kho nar 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mngon sum
314a2(rgyud 'grel): du bgyis te mchod pa bgyi'o/ /yang bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag spyod pa der/ bdag cag g.yog dang bcas te mchi bar bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
314a3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ mchod par bgyid pa dang/ yi ger 'drir stsol ba der/ bdag cag mthun par lhan cig mchis te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa
314a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /grong dang grong khyer dang/ phyogs kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /'chi ba dang/ dgra dang/ dgon pa dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /
314a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can thams cad la byas pa gzo ba lags te/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/ /'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhig
314a6(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o/ /ji ltar bsams pa yid bzhin du 'grub pa dang/ sems dang lus bde zhing longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug dang/ nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /thams cad du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rang gi bro bor ba dang/ dam bcas pa 'di dag ?
314a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo des rjes su dran par bgyi'o/ /tadya thA/ a g+hu ma g+hu/ ta ra g+hu/ ma ma g+hu g+hu re/ hA hU he/ mra mra mra mra/ dzu rdzu dzu dzu re swAhA/ gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams dang/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag
314b1(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang/ rab tu gus par mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ngan song gsum du mi mchi bar rigs par bgyi'o/ /de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las slar mi ldog par 'gyur ro//
314b2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs shing zhal gyis bzhes pa dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
314b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi don du bdag gis gzungs kyis gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi/ dgongs su gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo//
314b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta dya thA/ oM badzre badzre mahA badzre badzre pA sha d+ha ra Ni/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man+ta a pra ti ha ta badzre/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha man+tu me sarbba bya d+hA ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru ku ru/ sarbba ka ni sa ma ya ma nu smA ra b+ha ga bAn/ badzra pA Ni/ sarba
314b5(rgyud 'grel): A shI me pa ri pU ra ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskang bar bgyi'o/ /don zhes su sdug?
314b6(rgyud 'grel): par gyi'o/ /gal te des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'drir stsol bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun yang bgyi/ rdo rje 'dzin yang sku gdung dang bcas pa bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs par
314b7(rgyud 'grel): dag la yang ji skad gong du smos pa bzhin du/ spos dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar me dang/ phreng ba dang/ rgyan dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ sil snyan dang/ pheg rdob pa rnams kyis mchod de bskor bar bgyi/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang
315a1(rgyud 'grel): gdon par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la yang phan pa'i sems su bgyi/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas te/ lan gsum khrus bgyi zhing/ chos brgyad nas brtsams te/ zla ba phyi ma'i bco lnga'i
315a2(rgyud 'grel): nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ de la bdag gis rmi lam mthong pa stsal bar bgyi/ 'bel pa'i bka' mchid kyang bgyi/ re ba thams cad kyang yongs su bskang bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bka' 
315a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ba tshad mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil brlab par cig nang/ lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ba'i
315a4(rgyud 'grel): phrin las mdzad de /phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab par cig nang/ lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo la
315a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i gsung rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang/ sgo thams cad nas chos sbyor pa rnams la bar chad dang bgegs su gyur pa dang/ bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa thams cad dang/ yul phyogs su mi nang dang/ phyugs ma gtong bar
315a6(rgyud 'grel): than pa dang/ sad dang ser ba la sogs pas lo thog ma rungs par bgyid pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ mtshan ma ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa mang po ston cing sems can la sdang bar sems pa'i gdon bgegs rigs tha dad pa yul?
315a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'di na rgyu zhing gnas pa ci mchis pa thams cad dang/ che ge mo la sngon gyis? las kyis bdas pa dang/ 'phral gyi rkyen las byung ba'am yul phyogs dang/ pha tshan dang/ rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i
315b1(rgyud 'grel): lung dang/ srog dang/ chu srid dang/ dbang phyug dang/ 'khor dang/ yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci mchis par thams cad gang la gang 'tsham pa'i thabs kyis 'dul zhing zho na dang/ gnod
315b2(rgyud 'grel): ? bsams pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi ba dang/ dge ba dang/ byams pa'i bsam pa can du 'gyur zhing/ sngan chad bkra mi shis pa dang/ gnod pa'i sbyor pa ngan pa bgyis pa rnams 'jig cing 'dor du stsal/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid
315b3(rgyud 'grel): par so so'i rigs kyis bro dam po bsgag cing/ gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig chen po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad par ci gnang/ mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen bcu gnyis la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod
315b4(rgyud 'grel): po skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyis sde dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ? 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod skyabs su mchi'o//
315b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang? 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o
315b6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsams 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod
315b7(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /skabs 'dir mchod pa dbul/ mthu dpal dang
316a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i dge bsnyen gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po re re la g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum? yuM dang bcas pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ ji ltar sngon gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ lha'i ngag bden pas gsung gcig 'di
316a2(rgyud 'grel): skad du sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DU rya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la yang ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur to/ /des na bdag can lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid mtsho'i
316a3(rgyud 'grel): bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun la skyabs mchi'o/ /sems cam thams cad kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o/ /bye brag tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ dgon
316a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang/ gang na de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang/ mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa'i sems can de dag la/ bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar
316a5(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ gdon thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/ bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /zhes zhal gyis bzhes te thugs dam du bzhes shing/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang gi phyir/ khyed de bzhin gshegs pa sman
316a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi bla bai DUrya'i 'od de la byas pa gzi zhing rjes su dran la sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so/ /zhes rjes su gnad pa ston pa de bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshigs sbyar pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'das?
316a7(rgyud 'grel): dul zhing zhi ba'i 'khor dang ldan par byams pa dang thugs brtse bas mchod bzhes shing mdo de'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/ phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad
316b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis thob par byin gyis brlab pa? ci gnang/ lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo la sogs pa gsung rab ngan pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang/ sgo thams cad nas chos spyod pa rnams la
316b2(rgyud 'grel): bar chad dang bgegs su gyur pa dang/ bdud kyi phyogs thams cad dang/ yul phyogs su mi nang dbang phyugs nad gtong ba dang/ than pa dang/ sad dang ser ba la sogs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ mtshan ma dan pa dang/
316b3(rgyud 'grel): bkra mi shis ba mang po ston cing/ sems can la sdang bar sems pa'i gdon bgegs rigs tha dad pa mang po khams dang yul phyogs 'dir rgyu ba mchis so 'tshal dang/ che ge mo la sngon gyi las kyis gdas pa 'am/ 'phral gyi rkyen las
316b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa 'am/ yul phyogs dang pha tshan dang/ rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang srog dang chu srid dang dbang phyug dang/ 'khor dang yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'am? ci yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs
316b5(rgyud 'grel): ci mchis pa thams cad gang la yang gdul pa'i thabs kyis 'dul zhing/ kho na dang gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi ba dang dge ba dang/ byams pa'i bsam pa can du bgyid cing/ /sngan chad bkra mi shis pa dang/ gnod
316b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa bgyis pa rnams kyang 'jig cing 'dor du stsal/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos bsgag cing gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig chen po stsal pa'i phyin las mdzad pa
316b7(rgyud 'grel): ci gnang/ /re re nas mchod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir/ gzungs sngags bzlas la khrus bya/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyir mchod pa ci 'byor pa 'bul/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon
317a1(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun dang/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das
317a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par can dang mthun par smon lam btab pa dang/ de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa
317a3(rgyud 'grel): dang dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang/ de dag gi mthu dpal dang byin brlabs kyi stobs kyis che ge mo la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas/ thog ma ma
317a4(rgyud 'grel): mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa mnga' ba thams cad byang bar gyur cig /sku la bsnyun mi mnga' zhing sku tshe ring ba dang/ dbu rmog brtsan ba dang/ chab srid 'byam dar che ba dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
317a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig /thar yang tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs nas g.yung drung gi sku chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang bsnyes par gyur cig /chab 'og tu gtogs pa'i
317a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bangs thams cad kyang phyi nang gi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par gyur cig /yul khams thams cad du yang mi nang dang/ phyugs nad dang/ lo nyes pa dang/
317a7(rgyud 'grel): dgra'i gnod pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa'i bag ci yang mi 'gyur ba dang/ char chu dus su bab ste lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang/ bde skyid kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams
317b1(rgyud 'grel): cad dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi zhal mthong ste gdams ngag thob nas cho gas gnyis rdzogs nas sangs rgyas par gyur cig /khyad par du yang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing
317b2(rgyud 'grel): sgo thams cad nas dang zhing rgyas par gyur cig /de nas bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ ston pa bcom
317b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol pa'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan ba'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag pas sna tshal
317b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ bag ma mchis pa'i dbang gis lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa dang/ mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan pa dang/ gtsang sbras ma phyed pa dang/ mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa
317b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul cing nongs pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod bar bzhes shing 'phral dang yun du bdag cag gi sgrib par mi 'gyur pa byin gyis
317b6(rgyud 'grel): brlab par ci gnang/ /de nas gshegs su gsol ba ni/ khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang thugs rjes byon par mdzod/ /mgon po thugs
317b7(rgyud 'grel): rjes chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ bdag cag dang sems can gyi don mdzad pa lags kyis/ so so'i zhing khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol/ rdzogs so// //
318a1(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ 'di ltar brjod de/ thams cad du ni sa bzhi dag /gseg ma la sogs med pa dang/ /lag mthil ltar mnyam bai DUrya'i/ /rang bzhin bzang por gnas gyur cig /bde ldan 'jig
318a2(rgyud 'grel): rten bkod pa ltar/ /rin chen sa gzhi me tog bcas/ /ljon shing chu mtsho ma tshad med/ /chos sgrog rgya chen ldan par shog /'jig rten 'das pa'i dge las byung/ /rin chen bdun las grub pa yi/ /tshad med 'od zer 'gyid pa'i gnas
318a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sras bcas bzhugs gyur cig /gshegs byon skye 'bri med pa'i sku/ /ji ltar smon bzhin yod pa dag /dkar po mchod pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /'jig rten skyabs su gshegs su gsol/ /bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das/ /
318a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag bsod nams skal par ldan/ /bdag gis phul ba'i mchod yon 'di/ /bzhes nas bdag la mnyes par mdzod/ /khyed ni rang bzhin yongs dag par/ /sred sogs nyes pa mi mnga' yang/ /yon bdag sgribs pa sbyang slad
318a5(rgyud 'grel): du/ /gtsang ma'i chu yis sku khrus gsol/ /chos don dag pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /dpal ldan dag par gnas bshams par/ /ting 'dzin mi g.yo mnyam gzhag pas/ /dge bar dgongs bas gdan la bzhugs/ /gtsang dangs gdan
318a6(rgyud 'grel): khri yangs pa la/ /thogs dang dog pa med pa'i sku/ /mnyam nyid tshul gyis 'dir bzhugs shing/ /bde bar sbyar ba zhes su gsol/ zhes de ltar yon chab dang sku khrus gsol/ /gdan dbul/ de'i 'og tu ston pa bdun non? 'khor dang bcas la spyi'i phyag byas
318a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ /'di ltar 'gro ba nyon mongs dug gis gzir ba la/ /thugs rjes dug sel sman mchog bdud rtsi ni/ /smon lam chen pos grub bar gyur ba yis/ /bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las dang nyon mongs dbang gis
318b1(rgyud 'grel): sdus ? sna sogs kyis/ /gzir ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas spyod tshe thugs rje yis/ /sdug bsngal zhi byed smon lam sna tshogs bsgrub mdzad pa'i/ /bde gshegs bdun po 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas spyir mchod pa rnam pa lnga 'bul/ /smon
318b2(rgyud 'grel): lam gdab ? bshags bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu re re nas mchod pa ni/ mtshan gyis me tog rgyas pas dag pa la/ /dpe byad bzang pa'i 'bru chags mdzes pa'i sku/ /gang gis mthong thos dran pa'i dpal gyur pa'i/ /ston pa mtshan legs dpal la phyag
318b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshal lo/ /rin chen zla dang pad+mas rab brgyan cing/ /shes bya kun la ma chags thugs mnga' la/ /rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa'i sku mnga' ba/ sgra dbyangs rgyal po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser lter ba/ /nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i
318b4(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid 'bar/ /dri med gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu'i sku/ /gser bzang dri med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mya ngan 'das shing bde ba'i mchog brnyas pa/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gdud ba sel mdzad pa/ /'gro drug mgon dang dpal du gyur pa po/ /mya
318b5(rgyud 'grel): ngan med mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sgra chen pos pha rol rgol ba 'joms/ /rgya mtsho lta bur zab ba'i sku mnga' zhing/ /'gro ba'i dug gsum ma lus sel mdzad pa/ /chos bsgrags rgya mtsho dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi blo
318b6(rgyud 'grel): gros gting dpag dka' ba'i tshul/ /rnam dag chos kyi dbyings la rol mdzad de/ /shes bya ma lus mngon sum gzigs pa po/ /mngon mkhyen rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nang gso mdzad pa sman ba'i mchog /bai DU rya ltar dang ba'i sku
318b7(rgyud 'grel): mnga' zhing/ /sku yi 'od kyi 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sman gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni/ /nad rnams ma lus bsal bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs sman gyi bla la 'bul/ /yon bdag don du bzhes su gsol/ /thabs mkhas
319a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs shing/ /gzhan gyis mi thub bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa/ /gser gyi lhun po lta bu mdzes pa'i sku/ /shAkya'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma rigs mun sel sgrol ma'i mchog /sdug bsngal
319a2(rgyud 'grel): nang sem sman gyi phul/ /dam chos sgron ma thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /ye shes sku yis ngo bo nyid/ /ngag gi dbang phyug gzugs mdzas ldan/ /'jam pa'i
319a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro drug 'jig pa brgyad las skyobs mdzad cing/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che las sgrol ba'i gru/ /mya ngan 'das par phyin pa'i ded dpon mchog /sems dpa' skyabs grol mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum
319a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyis gsang 'dzin pa/ /ma rungs 'dul zhing rig sngags 'chang/ /rdo rne snams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems dpa' nyi ma snang byed ni/ /sku mdog dkar ser gangs ri'i gdan/ /phyag gnyis bdud rtsa'i sa
319a5(rgyud 'grel): gnon tshul /de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /sems dpa' zla ltar snang byed ni/ /sku mdog dkar po pad+ma'i gdan/ /phyag gnyis chos 'chad bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa dam pa 'bul/ /'dod khams 'dam las rab
319a6(rgyud 'grel): tu 'tshangs/ /gzugs khams tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /tshangs chen rgyal po mi mdzed gtso/ /tshangs chen 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dbu gsum phyag drug lha min 'dul/ /kun la khyab cing snyoms par 'jug /lha yis
319a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsal stobs po che/ /lha chen khyab 'jug mchod pa 'bul/ /mtho ris lha yig nas mchog na/ /mi pham mgon gyi zhal mthong ba/ /dga' ldan lha yi sras po rnams/ /yon bdag gus pas mchod pa 'bul/ /lha min gnyen po
319b1(rgyud 'grel): lha yi rje/ /spyan gsum mnga' bas dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i 'khor gzigs pa/ /lha dbang brgya byin mchod pa 'bul/ /lhun po'i rtser gnas lha dbang dang/ /thabs dang tshul bzhin spyod mdzad pa/ /lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yang/ mchod
319b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhes yon dag re bskongs mdzod/ /shes pa'i dad pa chen po che/ /nga rgyal bsnyems pa'i brag bsnyil te/ /ston pa'i zhabs 'bring bka' sdod pa/ /sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas la mchod/ /shar phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen yul 'khor srung/ /sku 'dog
319b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po phyag na yi wa ra 'dzin/ /dri za'i 'khor tshogs smin pa'i thugs dam can/ /de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /lho phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen 'phags skyes po/ /sku mdog sngon po phyag na ral gri bsnams/ /grul bum gdon
319b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs smin drug thugs dam bstan/ /de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bskur mchod pa 'bul/ /nub phyogs dpal ldan rgyal po mig mi bzung sku mdog dmar po phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /klu'i gdon tshogs smin phyir thugs dam bstan/ /de la
319b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bsnyen bskur mchod pa 'bul/ /byang phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /sku mdog ljang gu phyag na ne'u le bsnams/ /gnod sbyin gdon tshogs smin phyir thugs dam can/ /de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa
319b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bul/ /bde gshegs brtan pa bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen mchog /'jigs pa'i gzugs can rngam pa'i cha lugs can/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon ji 'jigs la sogs pa/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /de nas gtong ba?
319b7(rgyud 'grel): btang/ gzungs rnams mang du bzla/ spyir mchod pa lnga 'bul/ 'dod pa'i don gsol bar bya zhing khrus bya'o/ /bzod pa gsol/ gshegs su gsol/ rdzogs so// //de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi
320a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bklag cing de bzhin gshegs pa bdun mchod de/ smon lam gdab pa'i chog mdo sde las btus te rim par bklag pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang/ sangs
320a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs dang/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DU rya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs
320a3(rgyud 'grel): pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang/ ston pa bde bar gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon
320a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sman lam khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil
320a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar mnyam pa/ mchod pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs dang phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang/ bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las byung ba rgya mtsho thams cad las kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /'phags pa gdan
320a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzom pas kyang/ de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ yang de'i rjes la dkon mchog gsum gyis bden pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
320a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi byin gyis brlabs dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces lan gsum bzlas/ mchod pa'i tshogs bden pas byin gyis
320b1(rgyud 'grel): ? pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drang ba/ bus mo gtsugs te me tog blangs thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
320b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs su bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhal 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig dang bcas pa la sogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ /bcom
320b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das thugs rje chen po rnams kyis slad ma'i dus brgya pa thams cad la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyi bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyi lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis
320b4(rgyud 'grel): gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thabs mkhas pa mang po dang/ sngon kyi smon lam gyi khyad par
320b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa bzang zhing brlabs che ba dang/ mthu dang byin gyis brlabs dpag tu ma mchis pa mnga' ba la brten te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po skyobs pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung mnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i
320b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlabs par ci gnang/ da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa gdul bya'i dbang gis 'dzam
320b7(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang/
321a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can las glengs te/ bdag cag rnams kyi mnga' ris kyi gdul bya phyag mtshan du bzhes pa'i nang du gtogs te bka' drin thob pa'i 'phro mchis pa tsam la rten te che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po
321a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'jom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab par ci gnang/ byang chub sems dpa' 
321a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ dpal phyag na rdo rje dang/ rgyal ba'i sras po skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam
321a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde bka' stsal pa'i tshe/ gdan 'dzom par 'dus te/ mdo sde byin gyi brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par thugs bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po skyob pa'i
321a5(rgyud 'grel): slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlabs par ci gnang/ sngon de bzhin
321a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa gdan 'dzem pa chen pos bkas btang cing so so nas kyang lha'i tshig bden pas 'phags pa mdong gsol du zhal gyis bzhes te/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor rnam bzhi skyong bar mdzad cing zhal gyis ba zhes pa'i
321a7(rgyud 'grel): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ rnam thos kyis sras la sogs pa phyogs skyong ba thams cad kyis kyang che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po
321b1(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa'i ? mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab par ci gnang/ sngon de bzhin gshegs
321b2(rgyud 'grel): ? gdan 'dzom pa chen po'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi sman lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'chang ba dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa'i sems can de dag phyag mtshan du bzhes shing bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes
321b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang/ gnad sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza''dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang/
321b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam
321b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dbon chen po bcu gnyis po thams cad pa yang sngon gyi thugs dam bzang po las glengs te/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du?/
321b6(rgyud 'grel): mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gang na 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab par ci gnang/ skyabs 'dir lha klu spyan drangs te?/
321b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba dbang dang ldan/ /thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dkyel po che/ /lha dang drang srong gshin rje srin po klu/ /rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs gza' rgyu skar bcas/ /de dag so so dbang po'i skur ston pa/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig
322a1(rgyud 'grel): rten skyong pa bzhugs so 'tshal/ /bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /sa man dza(rgyud 'grel): de ltar spyan drangs bas thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la byon par
322a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de nas phyag 'tshal ba 'greng phyag bdun bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhabs 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dpag
322a3(rgyud 'grel): tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' i
322a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
322a5(rgyud 'grel): khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs grangs med paS
322a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor ba dang bcas ?
322a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs grangs med pas kun nas bskor pa?
322b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed dang/ zla ba ltar
322b2(rgyud 'grel): ? par snang byed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs grangs med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mche'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su
322b3(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ skyabs grol la sogs pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la
322b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dbon chen po ji 'jigs la sogs te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /'phags pa'i tshogs de dag thams
322b5(rgyud 'grel): cad la mchod yon dang byug pa/ me tog dang bdug spos / mar me dang zhal zas / rol mo dang sil snyan/ gdugs dang bdan la sogs pa dngos su ci 'byor pa 'di dag dang/ phyogs bcu na bdag pos yongs su ma ? pa'i lha dang mi'i
322b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzas dam pa/ bde ba'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa de thams cad dang/ gzungs dang rig pa'i mthu dang mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las 'byung ba/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyis nam mkha' ?
322b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste 'bul lo/ /mchod do/ /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang bdag cag gis thog ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mdor? na
323a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bgyi bar rigs pa'i las ni bgyis/ bgyi bar 'os pa'i las ni ma bgyis pa la sogs pa'i dngos sdig ci mchis pa thams cad yang dag par 'chags so/ /dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo'i dge ba mdza' dag gi
323a2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul lo/ /'jig rten gyi sgron me gang dag mya ngan las 'da' ba' i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi
323a3(rgyud 'grel): 'da' bar 'jig rten gyi don mdzad cing yun ring du bzhugs par gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dzom pa chen po dgongs gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgyal? tha ma
323a4(rgyud 'grel): la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad
323a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su gzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad
323a6(rgyud 'grel): par rgyas pa rlabs po che ji ltar btab cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ don de nyid da ltar bdag cag gi /ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas ji ltar bka' stsal cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang
323a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje dang/ skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' lung yang dag par sgrub pa dang/ so so'i dgongs spyod rgya chen po rdzogs par bskal ba'i
323b1(rgyud 'grel): slad du/ mdo sde'i don sgrub pa'i phrin las mdzad par 'phags pa'i bka' btags bas zhal gyis bzhes shing ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu
323b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la sogs te/ lha'i dge bsnyen chen po thams cad kyis/ gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mdo sde dang/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i sems can bsrung ba dang/ bskyab par zhal gyis bzhes pa la sogs pa sngon 'phags pa rnams kyis
323b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar byin kyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa'i do sde las 'byung ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa de rnams gdan 'dzom par mdzad pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar nas gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar
323b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nas brjod de mchod pa dbul/ bskul zhing smon lam gsol te/ bka' drin nod cing mchis na gdan 'dzom pas sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing phan yon ji skad
323b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i bka' drin thams cad che ge mo la sogs pa bdag cag gis 'phral du thob par stsal bar ci gnang/ de'i 'og tu 'phags pa rnams la re re nas mchod pa 'bul zhing smon lam gdab par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
323b6(rgyud 'grel): legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i mtshan nas brjod de mchod nas smon lam du gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags?
323b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi
324a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa la phyag
324a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal la gus par phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir
324a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrugs rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos
324a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod ba ci 'byor pa dbul/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
324a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo mchod de skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod ba ci 'byor pa dbul/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal? shAkya thub
324a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ /skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo mchod skyabs su
324a7(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchog?
324b1(rgyud 'grel): bci? 'byor ba dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen
324b2(rgyud 'grel): po yul na 'khor srung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ ku pe ra la sogs pa'i chos skyod blta'i dge bsnyen thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ mthu dpal dang
324b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen dam pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis la 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi skye? dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su
324b4(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza''dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung la phyag 'tshal
324b5(rgyud 'grel): lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon?
324b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po btung 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po sgra 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo mchod skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo mtshon skyabs su mchi'o
324b7(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ ston pa bcom
325a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/
325a2(rgyud 'grel): ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa sems can las kyi sgribs pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nang sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis
325a3(rgyud 'grel): gtses? pa/ phongs par gyur pa thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas par byin gyis brlabs shing/
325a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi mgur nas yang dag par gsungs nas/ phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar lhung yang gda' / ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas 'pho yang gda' / rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las yol
325a5(rgyud 'grel): yang gda' / dogs ni nam mkhar 'gyur/ chab ni zhugs su 'gyur/ zhugs ni chab tu 'gyur/ gser ma ni zhags pas gzung du rung ? yang gda' i/ lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen cing
325a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gzigs pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa la yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba/ de gzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i
325a7(rgyud 'grel): don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang/ ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams te/ mchod nas
325b1(rgyud 'grel): smon lam du gsol pa/ rdo ci thog pa'i nyams kyis dpags te bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ da yang gdan 'dzom pa chen pos cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/ byin gyis brlab cing
325b2(rgyud 'grel): phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi 'phral du thob par mdzad cing stsal bar ci gnang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pa/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ba'i bden
325b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mngon sum du bstan par ci gnang/ spyir mchod pa dbul zhing bsod nams dmigs kyis/ bsngo ba'i smon lam gdab/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam
325b4(rgyud 'grel): ? khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal
325b5(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
325b6(rgyud 'grel): med mchog dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos sgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po dang/
325b7(rgyud 'grel): ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod cing 'phags pa de dag gi smon lam khyad par can dang/ bka' lung mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang/
326a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang 'phags pa de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba phul ba dang/ bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang/ 'phags pa de dag
326a2(rgyud 'grel): gi mthu dpal dang/ byin gyis brlabs kyis lha'i sras kyi zhal snga nas kyi thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i dngos sdig dang sgrib pa ci mnga' ba thams cad zhu byang bar gyur cing/ sku la snyun mi mnga' zhing/ sku tshe
326a3(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med par ring ba dang/ dbu rmog btsan pa dang/ chab srid 'byams par rgya che zhing 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig /mthar yang tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs
326a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i g.yung drung gi sku chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang brnyes par gyur cig /chab 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams cad kyang phyi nang gi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing/ bde zhing skyid pa dang/ 'phral
326a5(rgyud 'grel): yun du legs pa'i chos bzang po la gnas par gyur cig /mnga' ris kyi yul khams thams cad du yang mi nad dang/ phyugs nad dang/ lo nyes dang/ dgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa'i ?
326a6(rgyud 'grel): yang mi 'byung ba dang/ char chu dus su bab ste/ lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang/ bde skyid kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /dam pa'i chos ring du sgo'i bsod nams bgyid pa la mjug gi bsngo ba so so nas ji
326a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar dad pa bzhin du bris te 'debs su stsal lo/ /smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'og tu gyes ka ra bzod pa gsol zhing slar gshegs par gnang par bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par
326b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang/ zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang/
326b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai
326b3(rgyud 'grel): DUrya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa dang/ mdo dang mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang/ che ge mo la
326b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag par gyur pas ma 'tshal ba dang/ bag ma mchi pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis lus dang/ ngag dang/
326b5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang/ mchod pa'i dngos po tshung zhing ngan la gtsang sbras ma phyed pa dang/ mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa la sogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs par gyur pa thams cad
326b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na/ thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod par bzhes shing 'phral yun gnyis su bdag cag la sgrib pa dang gnod par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab ? ci gnang
326b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa rnams kyis dang dam dgud 'di'i bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba phongs shing nyam thag pa'i sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing/ bka' stsal pa yang da dung yang bdag cag la thugs brtse bas
327a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dang yang du gdan 'dzom par mdzad par dgongs shing/ so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i don la gshegs par ci gnang/ mjug 'dir bsngo ba'i tshigs bcad kyang bklag go /rdzogs so//
327a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ d+hA raNI? sarba sA d+hA na kra ma dA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ gzungs thams cad kyi sgrub thabs rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba/ sgo drug zhi khro lha tshogs la/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ /sany+tsa la sogs don du ni/ /du ma gzungS
327a3(rgyud 'grel): ? sgrub skabs ni/ /spyi dang bye brag ldan tshul gyis/ /de ni nga yis bstan te bri/ /nyams dga' bde ba'i gnas su ni/ /spyod gnyis ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsham par bya/ /ras ris mchod pa bsham par bya/
327a4(rgyud 'grel): bde pa'i stan la 'dug byas te/ /snying gar zla dkyil tUM bsams te/ /de yi 'od kyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas 'khor bcas mdun du dgug /bdun po rnam dag rdzogs par bya/ /de rjes stong ba'i dang la gnas/ /yaM dang baM
327a5(rgyud 'grel): dang laM las ni/ /rlung mtshor rin chen sa gzhi bsam/ /de steng bruM zhu gzhal yas khang/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam mdzes pa/ /'khor lo pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam/ /pho brang dbus kyi lte ba la/ /rang gi yi dam
327a6(rgyud 'grel): oM du bsam/ /de las 'od 'phros las gnyis byas/ /slar 'dus gser gyi po tir bsam/ /yang 'phros slar 'dus thim gyur bas/ /gtso chen pha rol phyin ma de/ /gser 'od skyil krung 'khor lo dang/ /me tog po ti mnyam bzhag/
327a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas zhi ba'i lta gnas su/ baM las pad+ma'i gdan du bsam/ /khro bo yin ni gnas rnams su/ /ma dang a dang pa las ni/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan du bsam/ /gtso bo'i thugs las 'od zer 'phros/ /las gnyis byas te lha gnas su/ /A dang?
327b1(rgyud 'grel): oM dang h+ri dang a/ /dkar ser dmar ljang zhig su?/ /hUM nI mthing nag 'phros nas su/ /de dag la yang 'od 'phros pas/ /las gnyis byas te slar 'dus pas/ /so so'i mtshan mar bsgom par bya/ /de las kyang ni 'od 'phros pas/ /slar 'dus ?
327b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid la thim pas/ /so so'i sku ru bsgom bya ste/ /dbus kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni/ /ye shes dbang bskur ldan ma dang/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje mi pham so sor 'brang/ /sdig pa spong bas gdugs dkar po/ /bdud 'dzoms sgo mdza' 
327b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa ste/ /kun kyang sku mdog gser ? pa/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag nyid can/ /g.yas na ral gri g.yon me tog /kun kyang de thog zhi 'dzum can/ /rin chen rgyan klungs bsam par bya/ /shar gyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /gser
327b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog shAkya seng+ge ste/ /skyil krung 'khor lo bsnams pa bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /spyan ras gzigs dang byams pa dang/ /nam mkha' i snying po kun tu bzang/ /lag na rdo rje 'jam pa'i dpal/ /sgrib bsil dang ? ya
327b5(rgyud 'grel): snying/ dkar ser mthing sar yang mthing ser/ /ljang gu sngon po mdog yin no/ /kun kyang rgyan klubs me tog snams/ /'dzum bag bzhin rgyas bsam bar bya/ /lho yi pad+ma'i ste ba la/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya can/ /mthing ga zhal gsuM
327b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug na/ /rma bya'i mjug sgro mnga' dang ni/ /mchog sbyin rnams ni go rims g.yas/ /rin chen gzhu dang rnga yab rnams/ /go rims bzhin du g.yon na'o/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba'o/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /dang po'i
327b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma stong chen mo/ /zhal gcig phyag drug dkar mo ste/ /ral gri mda' dang mchog sbyin rnams/ /go rims bzhin du g.yas na'o/ /zhags pa gzhu dang dgra sta rnams/ /go rims bzhin du g.yon na'o/ /gnyis pa so sor 'brang ma ste
328a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi ma la phyag brgyad ma/ /pad+ma dang rgyan rtse gsum dang/ /'dab brgyad dgra sta bcas pa la/ /ral gri pad+mar bcas pa dang/ /pad+ma dung dang bcas pa'o/ /dang po gnyis g.yas tha ma g.yon/ /gsum pa
328a2(rgyud 'grel): bsil tshal mdog dmar po/ /zhal gcig phyag gzhi'i bdag nyid can/ /phreng ba mchog sbyin g.yas na'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu g.yon na'o/ /bzhi pa gsang sngags rjes 'dzin ma/ /ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /rdo rje mchog sbyin
328a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na'o/ /dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na'o/ /kun kyang sna tshogs rgyan brgyan bsam/ /de dag bar gyi 'dab ma la/ /yul 'khor bsrung dang 'phags skyes bo/ /mig mi bzang dang rnam thos sras/ /dpa' bo yi ni cha lugs la/ /pi
328a4(rgyud 'grel): wang ral gri sprul zhags dang/ /mchod rten phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /nub kyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /mgon po bde gshegs tshe dpag med/ /sku mdog dmar po ting 'dzin rgya/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /'khor los bsgyur
328a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bzang po mchog /gzi brjid can dang zla ba dang/ /snyan pa dri med bzang po tog /bkod pa chen po spyan ras gzigs/ /mthu chen thob ste de dag kyang/ /kun kyang dkar ser me tog bsnams/ /zhi ba 'dzum bag bsam par
328a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /byang gi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /chos yum dmar? ser po ti gsum/ /me tog steng thogs 'dzum bag can/ /rgyan ldan pa ni bsam par bya/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /gdugs dkar rnam rgyal gtsug gi nor/ /dri ma med pa'i
328a7(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor te/ /dkar dang sngo sangs dmar ser mdog /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ral gri dang/ /rin chen bsnams te 'dzum bag can/ /de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la/ /'od zer can dang par+Na dang/ /ri khrod lo gyon dpal lung bstan
328b1(rgyud 'grel): mthing? ga gcig dang gzhan rnams ser/ /phyag bzhi dur ba ltar sngo gcig /de yi phyag mtshan gyur pa ni/ /mchog sbyin 'bras bu dgra sta bsnams/ /zhags pa dbyug to g.yon na'o/ /ri khrod lo gyon dgra sta'o/ /'od zer mya ngan med shing bsnamS
328b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog bsnams pa khro 'dzum bsam/ /byang shar pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /bde gshegs tsan dan yan lag ser/ /zhi des tsan ngan bsnams par bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /blo yangs 'brug sgrogs sgrib pa sel /yon tan 'byung gnaS
328b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med/ /kun nas spos mchog rgyal mtshan rtsal/ /nga rgyal gnon dang rgya mtsho dbyangs/ /kun kyang dmar ser ni tshul la/ /sa gnon pa yi phyag rgya'o/ /shar lho pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /bde bar gshegs ba sgron ma mchog /ljang gu
328b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum bags gnon bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi pad+ma la/ /sems dpa' 'od chen 'od dpag med/ /mi pham pa dang 'jam dpal dang/ /dri ma med dang rdo rje snying/ /rgyal ba can dang mtshan mo bzang/ /kun kyang dmar ser me tog 'dzum/
328b5(rgyud 'grel): lho nub pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /mkha' lding gser gyi 'dab ma can/ /rdo rje'i mchu la lus 'bar ba/ /khro bo 'jigs rung rtsal can pa/ /rgyan brgyan klu la stan byas bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /sbas pa rdo rje kun 'bar glog/ 'bum
328b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzi brjid gnam lcags mchu/ /dkar dmar ser dang sngon po ste/ /sprun? zan bzhi ni bsam par bya/ /de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la/ khyab 'jug tshangs pa dbang phyug dang/ /drang srong re byi bsam par bya/ /nub byang pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /mgon
328b7(rgyud 'grel): po spyan ras gzigs yum ni/ /dkar 'dzum me tog bsnams pa bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig zhal/ /phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa bsam/ /gzhan ? mi thub rin chen phreng/ /
329a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen dang ni mdangs phyir 'phrog /kun kyang mdog dkar rin chen phreng/ /'khor lo lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la/ /gser can dang ni rnam rgyal can/ /'gro lding ba dang dbyig dang ldan/
329a2(rgyud 'grel): ser dang dkar dang mthing ljang ngo/ /kun kyang khro 'dzum 'khor lo bsnams/ /bcu drug pa yi 'dab ma la/ /rnam par gzigs dang thams cad skyob/ /log par dad sel gser thub dang/ /'od srungs dang ni mar me mdzad/ /kun kyang zhi
329a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul sa gnon rgya/ /yongs grags dpal dang rin chen zla/ /gser bzangs dri med mya ngan med/ /chos bsgrags rgya mtsho chos rgya mtsho/ /bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po ste/ /kun kyang nam mkha' i mdog lta la/ /sman mchog a rur bsnams pa'o
329a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od stong 'bar/ /snang ba mdza' yas de bsam bya/ /ser sngo dmar ba'i mdog yin no/ /kun kyang ting 'dzin phyag rgya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsibs la ni/ /lag na rdo rje rnam 'joms dang/ /me ltar rmongs byed be con dang//
329a5(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang mthing ga khro bo'i cha/ /rdo rje be con bsnams pa'o/ /gzhon nu bsod nams rgyal mtshan ni/ /ye Ne'i pags gyon sprul gyis brgyan/ /dug gi me tog thogs pa'o/ /khro bo me yi kha la ni/ /mthing ga me dpung lag na thogs/ /tshoD?
329a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dkar po lcags kyu bsnams/ /rnam rgyal dbyug pa sngon po dang/ /gshin rje gshed dang mi g.yo mgon/ /rta mgrin gzhan gyis mi thub dang/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil dang khams gsum rgyal/ /kun kyang khro bo'i tshul can la/ /mthing ?
329a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsnams pa bsam/ /phyogs mtshams 'khor lo rtsibs la'o/ /hUM ka ra dang stobs po che/ /cha lugs gong dang mthun tshul la/ /'khor lo gnyis kyi rtsibs la bsam/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog 'brog gnas dang/ /gangs gnas
329b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga rtsen dor? bzangs dang/ /gang bzangs dang ni grags bzangs dang/ /sa mdzes dang ni phreng mdzes dang/ /kun kyang khro tshul gnas ser la/ /thams cad dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /nag bo che dang lha mo nag /dbyug to zhags pa thogs pa la/ /khro bo'i
329b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can bsam par bya/ /rdo rje 'chang ni gtum mo dang/ /rdo rje khro mo pho nya mo/ /khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /rig sngags khro bo rgyal ba can/ /kun kyang mthing ga khro tshul can/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud/ /de dag phyag na bsnams par bsam/ /khro bo bar
329b3(rgyud 'grel): du gcod sbyong dang/ /khro bo mi 'jigs sbyin pa ste/ /dkar ser khro tshul rdo rje bsnams/ /de yi phyi yi khyams la ni/ /gzugs rnams kun ni thams cad nas /mtshan brjod bde gshegs mdza' dag dmigs/ /lha mo sgo ba rang bzhin dmigs/ /de nas phyi yi rim pa ni/ /'khor
329b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i le tsa khra bo la/ /gza' dgu dang ni rgyu skar ni/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsam par bya/ /de yi phyi yi khyams la ni/ /dus bzung nas brjod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin klu la sogs pa yi/ /mthu chen thams cad dmigs par bya/ /sgo de rgal ba'i phyi rnams su//

329b6(rgyud 'grel): te bye brag lha/ /gang 'dod pa ni bskyed par bya/ /de nas ye shes lha tshogs ni/ /nam mkhar bkug ste mchod nas ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de nas phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /bum
329b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /de lta bur ni bsgom par bya/ /de skyes bzlas pa bya ba yin/ /thun mtshams gtor btang ye shes gshegs/ /sgrub pa thabs kyi rim pa ste dang po'o// //da ni snying bo bsdus pa'i rim pa ni/ /de ni rgyas par btu
330a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /so so'i gzungs kyi nang nas te/ /shAka thub yum gyi snying po ni/ /yi ge nyung na mu ne yin/ /lha mo brgyad kyi snying po ni/ /lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs nang nas/ /ye shes dbang bskur rdo rje dbyings so/ /so sor 'brang

330a6(rgyud 'grel): po ni/ /gsang sngags de yi tha ma yin/ /sarba ta thA mar bcad do/ /gtsug gi nor bu'i snying po ni/ /sngags de yi ni tha ma yin/ /sarba rnam gnyis mar bcad do/ /gtsug tor dri med snying po ni/ /sngags de yi ni tha ma yi/ /sarba rnam gnyis
330a7(rgyud 'grel): mar bcad do/ /'od zer can gyi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /par+Na'i snying po de nang bzhin/ /ri khrod lo gyon snying po ni/ /tadya thA nas bzung nas ni/ /swAhA dang po yan chang ngo/ /dpal lha lung bstan snying po ni/ /

334a1(rgyud 'grel): lag bskyed ldan pas/ /ye shes lha tshogs spyan drangs te/ /rang bzhin chos sku dbyer med kyang/ /'gro ba'i don phyir yul gyi sku/ /yum chen pha rol phyin ma dang/ /ye shes dbang bskur ldan pa dang/ /rdo rje
334a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje mi pham so sor 'brang/ /sdig pa spong ba gdul dka' ma/ /bdud 'jom sgo mdza' sgrub ma ste/ /de ltar 'gro mgon khyed rnams kyang/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yi/ /lus srog bar chad gsal ba
334a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /dpal dad bsod nams spel ba dang/ /las ngan sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /sprul pa'i pho brang dam pa 'dir/ /mchod cing spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /de bzhin spel bar bya ba ni//
334a4(rgyud 'grel): gser 'od shAkya seng+ge dang/ /spyan ras gzigs dang byams pa dang/ /nam mkha' i snying dang kun tu bzang/ /lag na rdo rje 'jam pa'i dpal/ /sgrib pa sel dang sa'i snying bo/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya che/ /stong chen so sor 'brang ma dang
334a5(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i tshal dang gsang sngags 'dzin/ /yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po/ /mig mi bzang dang rnam thos sras/ /mgon po bde gshegs tshe dpag med/ /bzang po mchog dang gzi brjid dpal/ /zla ba snyan pa dri med
334a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bzang po'i tog dang bkod pa che/ /spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen thob/ /chos rnams thams cad yum dang ni/ /gdugs dkar rnam rgyal gtsug gi nor/ /'od zer can dang par+Na dang/ /ri khrod lo gyon dpal lung bstan//
334a7(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs tsan dan yal ga dang/ /blo yangs 'brug sgra sgrib pa sel/ /yon tan 'byung gnas 'od dpag med/ /kun nas spos mchog rgyal mtshan brtsal/ /nga rgyal gnon dang rgya mtsho dbyangs/ /bde bar gshegs pa sgron ma
334b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog /sems dpa' 'od chen 'od dpag med/ /mi pham pa dang 'jam dpal dang/ /dri ma med dang rdo rje snying/ /rgyal ba can dang mtshan mo bzang/ /mkha' lding gser 'dab rdo rje mchu/ /sbas pa rdo rje kun 'bar klog /'bar ba gzi brjid gnam lcags mchu//

334b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsen nor bzang dang/ /gang bzang dang ni grags bzang dang/ /sa mdzes dang ni phreng mdzes dang/ /nag po che dang lha mo nag /rdo rje gtum po rdo rje khro/ /rdo rje pho nya lu gu rgyud/ /rig sngags khro bo rgyal ba can/ /khro bo bar du gcod spyod dang/ /khro ?

335a1(rgyud 'grel): mnga' yang/ /kun rdzob tsam du gnas pa ston/ /zhing khams pho brang la sogs nas/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs sbyang ba dang/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ /sbrul pa'i pho brang dam pa 'dir/ /mchod sbyin spyan
