339a2(rgyud 'grel): sngar ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon pa dang/ ni/ /gzungs 'dzin slob ma rnams kyis su/ /mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu/ /sdig pa'i las ni ci spyad pa/ /mthol lo bshags so yul gsum la/ /de nas glegs bam zhal phye ste/ /rim pa bzhin du
339a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad do/ /stong chen mo yi glegs bam la/ /gzungs ni 'dzin slob rnams kyis ni/ /bklag dang bklag tu gsol ba dang/ /rim pa'i cho ga spyad pa yis/ /stong chen mo yi glegs bam 'di/ /lus la 'chang de sems la gnas//?
339a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod dang phud du khur/ /spyi bor len no gzungs 'di'o/ /de bsgres rim pas spyi bor blangs/ /rig pa gtad pa'i cho ga 'di/ /rdzas lngar lhar bskyed mchod bstod bya/ /de nas 'dod pa'i lha gcig ni/ /slob ma'i mig la phab nas ni/ /'di skad
339a5(rgyud 'grel): du ni brjod par bya/ /gzungs 'dzin pa yi bu khyod ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon nga la nyon/ /rang 'dod lha la lta bar gyis/ /lha 'di yid la bsgom par gyis/ /dang po mos yul byed pa yin/ /gnyis pa gsal bar byed pa yin/ /gsum pa sku
339a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs dngos su mthong/ /zhi pa lung bstan thob gyur nas/ /rgyud rnams kun la longs spyod de/ /rgyud don thams cad khyod kyis khrol/ /'dod lha 'di la mos sems 'byung/ /khyod kyi skye ba snga rol gyi/ /las 'phro 'dir ni sad pa yin/ /bsgrubs
339a7(rgyud 'grel): shig bsgrubs shig rim gyis 'byung/ /sku yi rig pa de gtad do/ /de ba ka sa oM/ /de nas brjod pa'i tshig de ni/ /slob ma'i lce thog bzhag nas ni/ /'di skad du ni brjod par bya/ /gzungs 'dzin pa yi bu khyod ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon ba
339b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyon/ /brjod pa gzungs kyi gsung gi sngags 'di ni/ /sngags ma yin pa'i tshig dang ni/ /nam yang bsre bar ma byed cig /bla ma yi ni ma gsungs pa/ /de la gdags par ma byed cig /gsung gi rig pa da gtad de/ /de phreng snying ga la gtad nas//
339b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du ni brjod par bya/ /gzungs 'dzin pa yi bu khyod ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon paM la nyon/ /rig pa grangs su 'dzin byed cing/ /sbyin dang ldan pa'i bgrang 'phreng 'di/ /rgyan phyir 'chang bar ma byed cig /'gom zhing smad par ma byed cing/ /sdig can
339b3(rgyud 'grel): la gtum gtad gyi/ /thugs kyi rig pa da gtad do/ /de btsit+ta hUM/ glegs bam spyi bo'i steng bzhag ste/ /'di skad du ni brjod par bya/ /gzungs 'dzin pa yi bu khyod ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon nga la nyon/ /gsang sngags chos ni rtogs dka' ste/ /mi
339b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rmongs par ma byed cig /yid gnyis the tshom ma 'cha' zhig /log pa yi ni shes rab kyis/ /mkhyen chos rigs pa ma zung zhig /bla ma sten cing sgros pa mchod/ /gsang sngags chos la thogs med spyod/ /rgyud nyan pa yi snod du rung?/ /rgyud ma
339b5(rgyud 'grel): don slob ma gsal bar gyi/ /yon tan ji snyed steng du ldan/ /yon tan rig pa da gtad do/ /ratna sarba mahA oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rdo rje dril bu lag gtod/ /'di skad du ni bya ba yin/ /rdo rje dril bu rang bzhin gyis/ /thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel la/ /phrin
339b6(rgyud 'grel): las rnam pa bzhi sgo nas/ /'gro ba'i don la dang du bskul/ /phrin las rig pad gtad do/ /de ba karma oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM de nas phrin las 'di skad bcol/ /yum chen pha rol phyin ma dang/ /ye shes dbang bskur dpal ldan la/ /rdo rje mi 'am so so
339b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras/ /sdig pa spong ba gdugs dkar mo/ /bdud 'dzam sgo mdza' sgrub pa ste/ /de ltar 'gro mgon de rnams kyis/ /klu dang gnod sbyin mi min sogs/ /'byung po'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug las/ /? na sdig
340a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyong du gsol/ /yul 'khor skyong dang 'phags skyes bo/ /rnam thos sras dang mig mi bzangs/ /phyogs skyong rgyal po khyed kyis kyang/ /gzungs 'dzin phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang/ /bsrung ba dus su mdzad du gsol/ /tshangs pa
340a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni dbang phyug dang/ /khyab 'jug dang ni drang srong dang/ /gzungs 'dzin phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang/ /bsrung ba dus su mdzad du gsol/ /lha mo nag dang mgon pos kyang/ /gzungs 'dzin phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang/ /bsrung ba dus su mdzad du gsol/ /de
340a3(rgyud 'grel): dag sems dpa' bde gshegs rnams/ /spyan 'dren skabs bsgres phrin las bcol/ /rma bya che dang bsil ba'i tshal/ /gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma ste/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /glegs bam de la bklags pa
340a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /klog tu stsal dang cho ga brgyad/ /de lta bu yi mthu yis ni/ /gzungs dang mthun pa'i phan yon gsol/ /rdo rje mchu dang gnam lcags mchu/ /sprin chen rlung dkyil sprin chen mo/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /rgyal ba
340a5(rgyud 'grel): can dang be con che/ /bar du gcod sbyor 'gro lding ste/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /'od zer can dang yi ge drug /gzican zhusu dang mig rnam sbyong/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /lag na rdo rje bcu
340a6(rgyud 'grel): gzungs dang/ /mdangs phyir 'phrog dang gzhang 'brum sel/ /bu ni mang po rton pa'i gzungs/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /stobs chen dang ni me kha la/ /dbugs chen gzungs dang gza' kun yum/ /bgegs 'joms
340a7(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /rgyal mtshan dbung rgyan gzungs dang ni/ /gser can dang ni nor gyi gtsug /dgra 'joms pa yi gzungs yin te/ /tshe 'di la ni sman pa yi/ /ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma smos kyang
340b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs 'dzoms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /spyan ras gzigs yum me tog brtsegs/ /tsan dan yan lag dbang bskur gzungs/ /tshogs spel 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /yi ge nyud du sgo drug gzungs/ /las kyi sgrib pa sbyong gzungs dang/ /snying
340b2(rgyud 'grel): rje mi shol ba yi gzungs/ /phyi ma la ni sman pa yi/ /ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas? ma smos kyang/ /tshogs sel 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar rin chen phreng/ /rnams 'joms ri khrod lo ma gyon//
340b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs 'joms gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /tshe 'di nyid la sman gtso ba/ /ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma brjod kyang/ /bgegs 'jom gtso bo'i gzungs yin ste/ /sangs rgyas snying pos dbang gzungs/ /sgo mdza' 
340b4(rgyud 'grel): yas dang don yod zhags/ /chogs spel gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal dri ma med/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni 'khor brgyad kyi/ /mtshan ni brgya ni(rgyud 'grel): brgyad gzungs/ /tshogs spel gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /phyi ma'i tshogs su gtso bo yi/ /ji snyed
340b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma smos kyang/ /tshogs spel gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /'chi med ? sgyu gzungs chen po/ /kun tu bzang dang rten 'brel gzungs/ /cha snyoms pa yi gzungs yin te/ /sangs rgyas yan lag dbyig
340b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /bcu gcig zhal gzungs lha mo lnga/ /cha snyoms pa yi gzungs yin te/ /lus kyi dbyibs mdzes chos rgya mtsho/ /tshe dpag med gzungs khyad par can/ /stobs po cha yi gzungs dang ni/ /rdo rje ri rab khangs brtsegs gzungs/ /cha mnyam
340b7(rgyud 'grel): ba yi gzungs yin te/ /'di dang phyi mar sman pa'i gzungs/ /ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma smos kyang/ /mnyam pa yi gzungs yin te/ /gong gi chig bzhugs kun la gdags/ /de nas rig pa'i slob dpon gyis//
341a1(rgyud 'grel): sgo yi them par rkang bzhag la/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer 'jug gzungs kyis/ /gsang sngags dang po bis ra nas/ /nyin mtshan chos kyang spyod par shog /dngos su gsungs pa'i bka' tshe yi/ /gsang sngags tshig bcad bcas
341a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /nang du kha bltas lan cig dang/ /de bzhin phyi ru lan gnyis so/ /gdugs dkar rnam rgyal snying po dang/ /gro ga shog bu la bris la/ /gtor ma dang bcas sgo khar gzungs/ /de tsar de ni tshar re gdon/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo
341a3(rgyud 'grel): bri/ /dkyil 'khor pho brang 'dra ba yi/ /'khor lo pad+ma 'dra ba bri/ /de dag dgod pa'i yi ge ni/ /so so'i lha yi mtshan dang ni/ /de de so so'i snying po dang/ /yang na de'i sngags bzhugs dang/ /ming rus srungs shig bcas pa bri/ /ze 'bru la ni
341a4(rgyud 'grel): A li dang/ /mu khyud la ni kA li'o/ /tha ma mi shigs me ri'o/ /de ni phyi yi bsrungs 'khor// //dgra bcom pa yi bsrung 'khor ni/ /khor yug gsum pa bri bar bya/ /de ni mtshon cha
341a5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis/ /kha phyir bstan pas mdza' skor bri/ /de la dgod pa'i sngags bri ba/ /dang po gser can snying po ni/ /gnyis pa rgyal mtshan rgyan yin no/ /gsum pa gtsug gi nor bu'o/ /phyir bzlog 'khor bri bya ba/ /'khor lo lte rim
341a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa la/ /bcu drug rtsibs ldan 'khor lo bri/ /dang po'i lte rim gdugs dkar ro/ /gnyis pa phyir bzlog stobs can no/ /gsum pa phyir bzlog rin chen phreng/ /bzhi pa hUM gis bskor ba'o/ /rtsibs la yang ni hUM dgod do/ /de bzhin spyad
341a7(rgyud 'grel): de mkhas pas kyang/ /man ngag bzhin du spyad de bri/ /bden tshig 'di dang bcas pa yis/ /de la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gdags/ /na mo sangs rgyas kyi bka' bden pa dang/ chos kyi bka' bden pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi bka' bden pa
341b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sgo drug zhi khro tshogs kyi bka' bden pa dang/ brgyud pa'i bla ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i thod pa can gyi bka' bden pa dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa bzhi yis bden pa yis/ gzungs 'dzin slob ma 'di srungs shig /'byung po mi dang mi ma yin pas 'di la
341b2(rgyud 'grel): tho 'tsham par ma byed cig /sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di 'grus yang srid/ nam mkha' ni lag pas mnan du btub yang srid/ sems can gcig tu 'gyur yang srid/ nyi zla ni sa la ltung yang srid/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ me ni chu ?
341b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi gzhan du 'gyur yang srid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/ /de bas na khyed kyis 'di la gnod pa ma byed cig /des na smon lam 'di skad do/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzungs 'di la//

341b6(rgyud 'grel): pa klu yis gzir pa'i tshe/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya ches/ /bsrung zhing sbas pa byas pa ltar/ /gzungs 'dzin slob ma 'di la yang/ /sngon tshe dge slong sa ri bzhin/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya ches/ /bsrung zhing sba ba byed par shog /sngon tshe bram za

342a1(rgyud 'grel): par shog /sngon tshe shAkya'i bu mo ni/ /sa 'tshe ma la sogs pa la/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang/ /bsrung zhing sba ba byas pa ltar/ /gzungs 'dzin slob ma 'dzin la yang/ /sa 'tshom la sogs bzhin du/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so

342a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum sems can la/ /'di dang phyi mar 'byung bar shog /sna tshogs pa yi gsungs la ni/ /phyin ci ma log spyod par shog /sna tshogs gzungs chog spyad pa yis/ /nyon mongs dri ma dag par shog /ye shes gzungs don bsgoms pa yis

342b7(rgyud 'grel): ma gzungs kyi chos/ /spyod lam mkhas pa slob dpon dang/ /rtag tu mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /dben pa'i nags khrod nyams dga' ru/ /gnyen 'dun 'byor ba kun por te/ /'jig rten chos brgyad phyir spangs nas/ /thar pa'i yid
343a1(rgyud 'grel): byed ma gtogs pa /rnam rtogs gzhan ni mi 'byung bar/ /ye shes gzungs don bsgom par shog /sna tshogs gzungs mchog spyad par shog /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul mthu thob shog /'jug pa byang chub sems kyis ni/ /

343b3(rgyud 'grel): pa de la gus bstod de/ /sgrub pos nang dan nub sogs su/ /tshogs chen dag ni bsags pa dang/ /sgrub thabs kun na mi gsal pa'i/ /bdun po rnam dag gsal bar bstan/ /bde gshegs mdza' dag mkha' la dmigs/ /dus gsum gyi ni bla ma dang/
343b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnams kun gyi bde gshegs dang/ /phyag 'os kun la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mi mdzad 'jig rten 'di lam ni/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ /mchod pa bla na yod pa dang/ /mchod pa bla na med pa yis/ /de dag la ni mchod par bgyi//
343b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor pa thog ma med pa nas/ /nyon mongs srad bus bcings gyur pas/ /mi shes dbang gis bgyis pa yis/ /lci dang yang pa'i sdig bsags pa/ /mgon po'i tshogs la so sor bshags/ /'das dus sangs rgyas ji snyed dang/ /bltar phyogs
343b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i zhing na bzhugs/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas de dag gis/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos bstan gsol/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas de dag gis/ /'khor bar khyams pa'i sems can rnams/ /thugs rje'i dbang
343b7(rgyud 'grel): gis gzigs mdzod la/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas dge ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dge ba dang/ /nyan thos rang rgyal dge ba dang/ /'jig rten dge ba ci spyod pa/ /de dag la yang yi rang ngo/ /zag bcas dge
344a1(rgyud 'grel): bci bsags dang/ /de bzhin zag med dge ba gang/ /dge ba'i tshogs ni ci bsags pa/ /byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdun po rnam dag re re la/ /so gol gyi yang sgra yang bsgrags/ /de ltar bsod nams tshogs bsags
344a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /ye shes tshogs ni 'di lta ste/ /mu st+tegs skye bo tha mal bzhin/ /stong btsam gyis sgyur nas ni/ /phyal bar bya ba ma yin te/ /dman pa yi ni byang chub bzhin/ /'ga' zhig stong pa'i tshul la ni/ /'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin te/ /shes rab pha
344a3(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin pa bzhin/ /gzugs las stong pa gzhan mi btsal/ /'khrul dor bstan pa'i gzugs su snang/ /gzugs dang stong pa dbyer med dang/ /gzugs ni rnam par dag pa yin/ /gzugs nyid stong par shes par bya/ /dper na chu yi zla ba bzhin
344a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ye shes tshogs bsags bya/ /tshogs gnyis bsags pas sgro ba gnyis byang/ /bskyed rim 'byung ba'i dgos pa yin/ /de nas so so'i sgrub thabs bzhin/ /bskyed tshul lha de gsal bar bskyed/ /bskyed rim bsgom pa rnam gnyis te//
344a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa can dang rtogs pa dman/ /rtogs pa can gyis 'di ltar bsgom/ /gang bskyed pa yi lha de ni/ /nam mkha' yi ni 'ja' chon bzhin/ /gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom/ /chu la zla ba shar ba bzhin/ /snang la rang bzhin med bar bsgom/
344a6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa dman pas 'di ltar bsgom/ /yod par rags pa'i rnam pa dang/ /'bur btang ris su bris bzhin du/ /gang ltar gsal ba'i rnam par bsgom/ /de ltar bskyed rim bsgoms nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i tshul ni rnam pa gnyis/ /don dam dang ni
344a7(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob dang/ /ron dam bzlas ba 'di lta ste/ /rtogs pa can gyi bskyed rim bzhin/ /yengs med gsal bar bsgoms nas ni/ /yul gzungs 'dzin pa yongs spangs nas/ /rtogs pa thams cad bkag nas ni/ /nam mkha' stong las sgra 'byung
344b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /sgra de yang ni rang bzhin med/ /chos nyid kyi ni rang sgra'o/ /kun rdzob phrin las bzhi bzlas pas/ /zhi ba'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /sngags brjod sngags kyi 'od zer ni/ /nyi zer lta bur phyogs bcur 'phro/ /ma lus kun la phog pas ni/ /kun gyi
344b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sems zhi byas te/ /phan sems byams sems ldan gyur nas/ /sgrub po nyid la 'dug par bsam/ /rgyas pa'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /sngags 'od nyi zer lta bu ni/ /'dom gang tshad nas khug pa'i tshul/ /rang gi lus la phog pas ni/ /lus kyi tshe
344b3(rgyud 'grel): bsod rgyas par bsam/ /dbang gi bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /sngags 'od lcags kyu lta bus ni/ /phyogs bcur 'phros te ma lus bkug /sgrub pa'i las ka ci bya zhes/ /phyag dang bcas par 'dud par bsam/ /drag po'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /sngags
344b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od me lce lta bus ni/ /phyogs bcu kun tu 'phros pa ste/ /rang gnod bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg /mi bzang skad ngan chen po yis/ /sgrub pa po la skyabs gsol bsam/ /de skye thun mtshams 'di lta ste/ /gtor dbul ye shes nam mkhar
344b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyung/ /yid kyis phar mchod byin gyis tshur brlabs bsam/ /se gol sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /ye shes mchog 'gyur mgon po khyod kyis ni/ /dngos grub chen po stsal du gsol/ /slar gshegs slar yang byon du gsol/ /bstan bcos
344b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsom pa rnam gnyis te/ /sgra tshang dag las phul byung bas/ /lung dang mi 'gal don de gtan la 'bebs/ /mdo rgyud lung thob bstan bcos nas drangs te/ /de la rten dang de dang mi 'gal ba/ /des kyang 'ga' zhig brtsams par rigs pa yin
344b7(rgyud 'grel): sgo drug gis bstan bcos rtsom pa ni/ /yi dam lha'izhal mthong dang/ /de yi gnang ba byin pa dang/ /dngos grub kun la dbang thob pas/ /mdo rgyud lung dang bstan bcos las drangs nas/ /de la rten dang de dang mi 'gal bas/ /des ni brtsam par rigs pa yin
345a1(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs rnams kyi bka' las kyang/ /bskyed rim gsal bar ma bstan te/ /bskyed rim gsal bar ma gyur na/ /don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /de bskyed gsal bar bstan gyur naS/ /shes rab 'chal ba'i gang zag
345a2(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /slob dpon med par zhugs gyur nas/ /bdag nyid phung 'kho nar zad/ /yang na de dus 'khor rnams kyis/ /bde gshegs kyi ni byin brlabs kyis/ /de ni gsol 'khor yin no/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /blo chung sems can
345a3(rgyud 'grel): mang gyur te/ /mdo sde rnams las lung bstan te/ /da ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /blo chung sems can mang gyur te/ /de la dgongs te bde gshegs kyis/ /da dang 'dra ba'i gang zag gis/ /nga yi lung rnams dgrol bar bya/ /de skad lung nas 'byung ba
345a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /mtshan nyid ldan gyis bstan bcos brtsam/ /mtshan nyid mi ldan brtsams gyur nas/ /kun kyang dgongs par ma gyur pas/ /de don gzhan du bstan byas nas/ /sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po ratna kI rtis mdzad
345a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sgrub thabs thams cad kyi las ka gsal byed ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pra tI tya sa mut bA da tri da ya kalpa/ bod skad du/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo/ /sangs
345a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi /rgya dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ /de skad gsung ba dge sbyong che/ /tshigS bcad 'di yi cho ga ni/ /sems can
345a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la phan byed pa/ /las kun 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /cho ga bzhin du bshad par bya/ /de la re shig sgrub pa po'i skyes bus dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang ba chen pos bskyed par bya'o/ /'di snyam du
345b1(rgyud 'grel): yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sems can rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang/ lugs dang mi mthun pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang ldog pa gsungs te/ 'di ltar las dang nyon mongs
345b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yod na ni/ /sems can rnams 'khor bar 'jug par 'gyur la/ las dang nyon mongs pa med na ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las ldog go zhes bya ba'i bden pa'i tshig 'dis bdag gi cho ga zhib mo zhig grub par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i
345b3(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu 'di skad ces tshig brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang
345b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rim pa 'dis de dag gi
345b5(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni cho ga zhib mo dang po yin no/ /de nas rang gi lag mthil lam lus la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ /dpe
345b6(rgyud 'grel): byang bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs par bsam par bya ste/ de lta bu ni lha rjes su dran pa'i cho ga yin no/ /da ni sbyor ba bri bar bya ste/ rims kyis btab pa dang klad pa na ba dang/ mig na ba la sogs pa la ji ltar 'dod
345b7(rgyud 'grel): par chigs su bcad pa 'dis lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis dbyung ba'i tshul du bya ba par bya'o/ /rims nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ rtag pa dang/ rims mi bzad pas thebs ba rnams la bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba'i skud pa la bzlas brjod
346a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya byas pa gdags par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rim sel ba'i bdug pa'i ri lu dag ji ltar 'dod phar bzlas brjod byas nas bdug par bya'o/ /snying nad dang rtsibs logS na bas thebs pa rnams la chu la bzlas brjod bcu 'am bcu
346a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bzlas nas blud par bya'o/ /yang na nang de la phan pa'i sman dang bcas la bzlas brjod byas la blud do/ /g.yan pa dang rdo dang 'bruM bu dang phal? mig la sogs pa dang rma med pa la grog tshang gis la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod byas nas bsku
346a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum ma ma pho mtshan 'brum bus thebs pa rnams la skyer kha 'da' i ri lu 'am byang chub sems dpa' i re lu la bzlas brjod byas nas bsku bar bya'o/ /mdor na nad kyi rnam pa gang gis thebs pa de la bdag nyid kyis tshabs
346a4(rgyud 'grel): che chung shes par byas la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bzlas brjod mang ba 'am/ nyung du nyi shu sum cu bzlas pas phyug pa 'am bsku bar bya'o/ /'khru bas thebs pa rnams la sman khu 'am ri lu'i rdzas kyi rigs gzhan la bzlas brjod lnga 'am drug
346a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas bzar bzhug ste/ /de lta bu ni na? gso ba'i cho ga yin no/ /de nas lo tog nas dang gro dang 'bras dang sran mung ga dang mon sran gre'u dang/ ?bral kyi shing dang/ ? 'brum dang a ru ra la sogs pa la za ba'i srin bu dang/ sbyar ba dang phye ma leb
346a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /byi ba dang ne tso dang ri skags la sogs pa kha bcing ba'i phyir zhing gi khyon shes par byas nas bye ma 'am thal ba bre gang dam/ de las lhag tsam la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas zhing la gtor bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni lo tog la phan
346a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du ha cang car ches na bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i me tog dman ma re re la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas bla gab med pa'i phyogs su ba lang gi lcibs dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa zhig byas la/ dbus su bum pa
346b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas steng du kham phor bzhag par bya'o/ /kham phor gyi nang du me tog dman ma bzlas brjod byas pa bsrags pas 'chad par 'gyur te/ 'di ni char gcad pa'i cho ga'o/ /de bzhin du ser ba bzlog pa la se'u yi lcug ma 'am nya phyis lcug ma
346b2(rgyud 'grel): la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas sprin bzlog par bya'o/ /yang na yungs kar la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas thum por byas te/ se'u yi lcug ma yi thor tho la bcings nas blag ba med par gzugs te/ de lta bu ni sprin bzlog pa'i
346b3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du 'byung po dang sha za dang/ rjed byed kyi gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bum pa 'am zangs kyi ril par yungs kar yang blugs/ dri'i rdzas ga bur dang tsan dan dang/ gla rtsil sogs pa yang bcug nas/ bzlas brjod brgya
346b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad byas te/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ dri gtsang khang dam/ sa phyogs bde ba zhig tu bzhag la/ phyis sa phyogs gzhan par ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ me tog gis gtor la phyogs bzhir
346b5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa gang ba bzhag ste/ gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ /de nas bkru bar bya ba de gos dkar po bskon nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag la/ bum par sa bon thams cad dang rin po che thams cad bcug la/ rje btsun sangs
346b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la reg par byas pi ? chu'i rgyun gyis bkrus na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /nad 'go ba thams cad dang/ 'che ba thams cad thag ring por 'gyur ro/ /rim pa de ltar byas na 'byung po'i gdon dang/ rjed byed dang/ sha za la sogS
346b7(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni bum ba'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyor ba gzhan yang byis pas 'jigs pa rnams la gi wang la bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtse gcig byas pas/ 'phags pa stobs po che bris la gtsang ?
347a1(rgyud 'grel): byas la mgul bar gdags so/ /de bzhin du yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mgul du gdags so/ /gu gul gyi bdug pa la yang bzlas brjod gnyis sam gsum byas nas gdug go /mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la yungs
347a2(rgyud 'grel): kar dang gu gul gyi bdug pa la de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas pas bdug par bya'o/ /yang na skud pa la snga ma de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas nas mgul du gdags te/ de lta bu ni byis pa gso ba'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du bud med du logs
347a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la chu la bzlas brjod lnga 'am drug byas nas blud na legs par btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bud med mo gsham la rje btsun sangs rgyas kyi sku bsil ba'i chu la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ khrus byas pas lus gtsang mar
347a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa la blud na bu che 'byung zhing phan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni rigs rgyud spel ba'i cho ga yin no/ /lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis skud pa la bzlas brjod lan bdun byas nas re re zhing mdud pa dor bar bya'o/ /yang na gos kyi mdza' la
347a5(rgyud 'grel): lan gnyis sam gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa bor na bde bar 'gro par 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni lam du nyes pa mi 'byung ba'i cho ga yin no/ /shu dag tshon gang tsam lo gcig gi nyi ma'i grangs dang mnyam pa blangs nas grangs de
347a6(rgyud 'grel): tsam du bzlas brjod byas la/ mar yang srang de tsam zhig la bzlas brjod byas nas bum pa gcig tu blugs te dkrugs nas nyi ma re re zhing shu dag gi dum bu dang mar srang gcig bzlas brjod byas nas zos na yid gzhungs pa'i
347a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang mar dang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas pa'i 'o thug sna ma'i mgo lcogs kyis dkrugs te zos na yid gzhungs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni yid gzhungs pa'i cho ga yin no//
347b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du me tog dang 'bras bu 'am rtsa 'am shing dam 'jim pa lag pa g.yas pa'i chang par bcug la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig chad par bcug pa byin pa de dang 'dza' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni mdza' bar 'gyur pa'i che ga yin no/ /de bzhin du ba lang dang rta la
347b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa phyugs 'chi bar nye bar gnas pa'i tshe chu yungs kar dang bcas pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i thum po gdags so/ /de bzhin du mi rnams 'chi ba'i gnod pa 'byung ba la yungs kar la de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas pa'i thum po
347b3(rgyud 'grel): mgo skyob kyi thog tu gdags par bya ste/ /'di lta bu ni ? zhig mi ngas dang phyugs pas gso ba'i cho ga yin no/ /re zhig ner ban rak+Shi ta bdag gis rang gi bla ma las tshigs su bcad pa mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyor ba brgya thos so/ /de yang yun rings
347b4(rgyud 'grel): pas kha cig ni brjed de tshe long kun bsdus pa yin no/ /'di thams cad 'grub pa la the tshom mi bya'o/ /nangs na yang gang la yid ches pas dad pa yod pa de la lhag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar nges so/ /bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas
347b5(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa ci yang mi 'grub pa med do/ /tho kar yul nas skyes gyur pa/ /dag slong nor ban rak+Shi tas/ /cho ga bzang po tshul bzhin du/ /rab tu 'bad nas bshad pa yin/ /brten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo/ mkhan po nor ban
347b6(rgyud 'grel): rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la re zhig pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sgor byang chub
347b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu sems bskyed pa thob pa'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge tshul lam/ dge slong gi dge 'dun nas gang zag gis mchod rten nam/ bris sku la sogs pa rab tu gnas par byed pas gang rab tu gnas par bya ba mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i de'i nye
348a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor cig skyang nul byas te/ mthar tsan dan la sogs pa dri zhim po'i rgus byugs nas mdun du maN+Dal gru bzhi pa khru gang yan tshed nas ji tsam nus par byugs nas/ dar? pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa tshon gyis bri bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du
348a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa gser la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa kha rgyan dang/ mgul dkris dang bcas par rin po che dang/ sman dang/ 'bru rnams gzhug cing/ tsan dan dang ga bur la sogs pa dri zhim po dang sbyar ba'i chu klung
348a3(rgyud 'grel): gi chu gtsang mas dgang zhing/ grangs kyang gcig nas brtsams te ji snyed 'byor pa gzhag par bya'o/ /me tog la sogs pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pa rnams kyang mdun du sta gon byas la/ nang bar snga dro'i dus su yid du 'ong ba'i bla ra? bris pas
348a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i gnas su sgrub pa pos stan bde ba la skyil mo krung la sogs pa mnyam par bzhag pa'i spyod lam gyi gnas te/ 'jig rten skyod ba rnams la gtor ma byin nas/ gser ram dngul gyi gzhi 'am grog la'ang rung/ tsan dan
348a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar pos/ ye d+harma he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to dya ba dang/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI mahA sh+ra ma Na:zhes pa tshar bdun du bris la/ tshar re re zhing lan bdun bdun bklags te/ bum pa'i chus bkrus la bum pa de nyid du ?
348a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas bum pa'i steng du zla ba la sngags kyi phreng ba dkar po 'od dang bcas pa skad cig gis bsams te/ de'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas lha'i bdud rtsi'i rgyan rnams bkur pa bum pa'i chu de
348a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi phreng ba zhu ba dang lhan cig ro gcig tu gyur pas bum pa gang bar dmigs nas/ de la lag /pas reg nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la mchod rten la sogs pa'i nang dam snying gar zla ba la snga ma ltar sngags
348b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi phreng pa dmigs la de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khyab par bltas te/ des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ? bskul nas/ gang zhig rab tu gnas par bya ba mchod rten la sogs pa de'i gzugs kyis byon nas de dang de la thim
348b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sngags la sogs pa thams cad ro gcig tu gyur par bsams nas lugs su blugs pa rnams la ni dngos su khrus bya'o/ /glegs bam la sogs pa la ni me long la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang/ glu dang/ ? dang bcas pas
348b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlos bzhin du sngar gyi bum pa'i chus khrus gsol par bya'o/ /de nas dri zhim pas bsgos pa'i gos kyi sku phye ba byos pa'i rjes la ci 'byor pa'i na bza' dang rgyan rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa ci 'byor
348b4(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams dbul lo/ /de'i rjes la lag pas reg nas snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mchod rten naM ma lugs sku'i nang du gro ga la snying po bris te gzhug go /glegs bam mam zis sku'i ni tha mar bri'o/ /de ltar byas nas slar yang me
348b5(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod cing cing rol mo'i sgra yang bsgrugs te/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing/ /sa 'am 'on ti bar snang 'khor ba dag /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing/ /nyis dang mtshan du chos
348b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang spyod gyur cig /rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden pa'i byin gang gis/ /bden 'di gsung ba 'di la sdig med cing/ /lhar bcas lha min gyis rtag mchod 'os pa'i/ /bden pa des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /dam chos bdud rtsi thams cad
348b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa yis/ /zhal nas gsungs pa bsil ba'i ro 'di yis/ /nyon mongs 'bar ba'i me yis gdungs pa yis/ /'gro kun sdug bsngal rtag tu zhi byed shog /ces rjod cing sngar gyi bum pa'i chu'i lhag mas rab tu gnas pa'i sa gzhi
349a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gnas khang dag tu nyung zad gtor bar bya'o/ /bya ba rnams rdzogs pa na rdul tshon la sogs pa rnams chu bo chen po 'am/ khron pa rnying par dor nas sa gzhi lci
349a2(rgyud 'grel): bsar pas byugs te/ /rab gnas byed pa'i slob dpon dang/ /dge slong la mchod ston dang/ yon dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas rten de la mchod pa phul te/ yon bdag 'di'i
349a3(rgyud 'grel): ched du bzhugs la sems can gyi don mdzad par gsol ba gdab bo/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga thun mong ba paN+Di ta dpal su ma ti kI rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //
349a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa de nyid dang lo tsa ba pradz+nyA kI rtis bsgyur ba'o// //yed+ha rmA he tu pra b+ha wA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to hya ba data/ teShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM wA
349a5(rgyud 'grel): dI mahA sh+ra ma Na:// //mang+gA laM//
